1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a mo g+hA pA sha kalpa rAng / bod skad du/ 'phags pa
1b2(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ / // bam po dang po/
1b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems
2a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag
2a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri bo pi Ta la ni spyan
2a3(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang shing sA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang
2a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / a ti muk+Sha ka sna tshogs mang pos legs par brgyan pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po
2b1(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa ya bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ gnas
2b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsong ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa na/ dbang phyug dang / dbang
2b3(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu rnams kyi dbang phyug mdzad nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub
2b4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
2b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das
3a1(rgyud 'bum): ga la ba de logs su 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom
3a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gang 'di don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ bdag gis bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon
3a3(rgyud 'bum): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par lta ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po las mnos nas/ 'di ltar
3a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu brgya sto
3a5(rgyud 'bum): phrag mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dzin du stsal nas/ bdag gis rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes
3a6(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa la sogs te ting nge 'dzin brgya stong phrag bcu thob par bgyis lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang sa phyogs
3b1(rgyud 'bum): gang du snying po 'di spyod pa sa phyogs der yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i bu khI nyis stong gis bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang /
3b2(rgyud 'bum): sba ba'i slad du gnas par rig par bgyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang na don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i snying po 'di spyod pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'ong bkur bar
3b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur lags so// gang zhig don yod pa'i
3b4(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa'i snying po 'di mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das sdig pa spyod pa 'am/ sdig pa'i chos kun tu spyod pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i
3b5(rgyud 'bum): chos spong ba 'am/ mnar med par gzhol ba'am/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong ba de 'gyod par gyur cing /
3b6(rgyud 'bum): ma 'ongs pa na sdom par 'thob par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das re zhig de nyid kyis zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ tshe 'di nyid la las de rnam par dag
3b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gtugs pa dang / bsal bar 'gyur ro// rims nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa'am/ de bzhin du rims nyin bdun
4a1(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ mig nad dam/ rna ba'i nad dam/ sna'i nad dam/ so'i nad dam/ mchu'i nad dam/ lce'i dang drakan gyi nad dam/ snying nad dam/ lto nad dam/ ro
4a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyab dang rked pa'i nad dam/ yan lag dang nying lag gi nad dam/ gzhang 'brum mam/ pho ba'i nad dam/ tshad pa'am/ lag pa dang rkang pa'i nad dam/ sna nad dam/ klad pa'i nad
4a3(rgyud 'bum): dngam/ sha bkra chen po'am/ sha gzi gu'am/ mdze'am/ rkang shu 'am/ 'brum bu phra mo 'am/ lhog pa 'am/ mtshan mar rdol ba 'am/ 'brum bu 'am/ brjed byed dam/ byang
4a4(rgyud 'bum): dam/ gzhan gyis bgyis pa'i gsod pa 'am/ 'ching ba 'am/ rdeg pa 'am/ skrod pa 'am/ bden pa ma lags pas skur pa 'debs pa'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdor na lus
4a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gdung ba 'am/ sems kyi gdung ba 'am/ rmi lam ngan pa'i las de yongs su gtugs par 'gyur na/ sems cad dag pa lhag par dad pa rnams kyi yongasasu byang bar 'gyur
4a6(rgyud 'bum): ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'khor bzhi'am/ rigs bzhi las gang dag sgyu dang g.yos bdag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di nyan par bgyid//
4a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin par bgyid/ 'chang bar bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid/ kun chub par bgyid/ sems can gzhan la'ang sgrog par bgyid cing
4b1(rgyud 'bum): than dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams kyi rna khung du gtad de rna bar bzlas brjod bgyid la/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnams sems par bgyid de/ skur pa ma mchis pa dang / gzug
4b2(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun tu 'byung ba ma mchis pa dang / ring du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang / gos pa ma mchis pa dang /
4b3(rgyud 'bum): sems mnyam pa nyid dang ma bral ba dang / phung po lnga dang bral ba ste/ rnal 'byor 'dis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par bgyid na/ de la phyogs bcu nas sangs rgyas stong zhal ston
4b4(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad par 'gyur zhing nongs pa 'chags par 'gyur ba la sogs pa rgyas par sbyar ro/ / glegs bam du bgyis te khyim du 'chang bar bgyid dam/ rje dpon gyis skrag pas sam//
4b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi ngor ram/ bzhad gad tsam gyi rgyus mnyan par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das mkhas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mthus de dag gi rna khung du sgra de grag pa
4b6(rgyud 'bum): lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das dper na skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis tsan dan nam/ ga bur ram/ bla rtsis zhig la khros sam/ yongs su smad de rdo la btags nas
4b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid la byug na tsan dan nam/ ga pur ram/ gla rtsi de 'di snyam du/ 'dis bdag la khros sam/ yongs su smad pas dri mnam par mi bgyi'o snyam du mi sems kyi/ gzhan du na
5a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid la dri gda' bar bgyid lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di'ang gang su'ang rung bas bzhad gad tsam
5a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro/ / bcom ldan 'das g.yo dang sgyus mchod par bgyid na'ang de nyid sems can dmu rgod de dag gi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur lags so// gang dang gang du skye bar
5a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur bar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dri dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/ tshul khrims kyi dri gda' bar bgyid pa lags so//
5a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang yang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen pha 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de las gzhan pa'i
5a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can su'ang rung bas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ched du yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la smyung ba bgyis te/ gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod
5a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das des tshe 'di nyid la phan yon nyi shu rtsa gcig thob par 'gyur te/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i lus la nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
5a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i lus la las kyi dbang gis nang rnams byung na'ang myur du zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lus mdangs dang ldan pa dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo mang po'i snying du sdug pa dang dbang po sbas par
5b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de'i don rnam 'grub par 'gyur ro// de'i don grub pa' 'chom rkun gyis mi 'phrogs te/ zhugs kyis mi 'tshig/ chab kyis mi 'tshal/ rgyal po'i mthus dbrog par rngo mi thogs
5b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de'i las kyi mtha' rnams rgyas par 'gyur te/ se rabs ma lags so// chab kyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ rlung dang char gyi 'jigs pa ma lags so// don
5b3(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po thal ba dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ zhing gis phyogs mtshams dang steng 'og tu bcing ba bgyis na gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro//
5b4(rgyud 'bum): ga bi brjid dang mdangs dbrog par rngo mi thogs par 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang yid du 'thad par 'gyur ro// de la dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de
5b5(rgyud 'bum): la dgra'i 'jigs pa byung yang myur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / de la mi ma lags pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ byad kyi 'jigs pa ma lags/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa ma lags te/ de la nyon
5b6(rgyud 'bum): mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa drag po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / me dang / mtshon dang / dug gis 'gum par mi 'gyur ro// de la'ang lha rnams kyis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang /
5b7(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa dang / sbed pa'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur bar byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang stobs dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur te/ de la phan yon
6a1(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/ / gzhan yang chos brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'gum pa'i dus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
6a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dge slong gi gzugs su mngon sum du zhal ston par 'gyur ro/ / bde bar 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// lta ba 'khrul par mi 'gyur ro// lag pa mi g.yob pa dang / rkang pa
6a3(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yob pa dang / bshang gci ma mchis pa dang / khri'i steng du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// kha sbub tu 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par mi
6a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'gum pa'i dus na'ang spobs pa mi bas par 'gyur ro// de'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du smon pa der skye bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
6a5(rgyud 'bum): nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan gsum du bzlas brjod pagyi'o// chang dang / sha dang / rkun dong dang / ke'u dang / sgog skya dang 'dres pa dang / lhag rol dang / 'di rnams
6a6(rgyud 'bum): khyad par du don du gnyer bas spang bar bgyi'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang sems can rnams la mthu mchis pa dang mthu ma mchis par 'tshal bar bgyis nas bsgru
6a7(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud mi bgyi'o// 'di ltar dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser sna spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lags te/ sems can rnams kyi don bgyi ba'i sla
6b1(rgyud 'bum): du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par 'gyur bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs kyi nang du gtogs so// byang chub ces bgyi ba ni shes rab lags/ sems dpa' zhes
6b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba ni thabs lags te/ chos 'di gnyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad kho nas thob pa lags so// gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rjes su gnang na/ 'di ltar bdag
6b3(rgyud 'bum): gis snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khor bzhi rnams dang / gzhan sdig pa spyod pa rnams kyi don dang / sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du bsgrag par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
6b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can dag pa de de'i dus la bab par shes na khyod spros shig/ de bzhin
6b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad zin te/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rnams la ba'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa
6b6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugs mig mi 'dzum par/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par grol
6b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don du bdag la gsan du gsol/ dus gsum du
7a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang /
7a2(rgyud 'bum): ma byon pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo//
7a3(rgyud 'bum): byams pa la sogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
7a4(rgyud 'bum): med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
7a5(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ e h+ye hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ tsi ri tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ si ri si ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bi ri pi ri/ bi ri bai ri/
7a6(rgyud 'bum): mahA pad+ma hasta/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ bud+d+ha bu d+d+ha/ d+hU bad+hU ba/ ka Na kaN/ kiN+Di kiMNi/ kuNu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud d+ha satwa/ ka ra kar/ ka ri ki ri/
7a7(rgyud 'bum): ku ru ku ru/ ma hA sA ma prAH/ tsal tsa la/ sar+b+ba la sa ny+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ oM phaT e Ta Ta/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hai ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye Ni/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ ma hA ba shu pa ti be Sha d+hA ma
7b1(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsar car/ har harA/ hahA satwA/ bihrIHdz+riM/ huh+mAd+har+tha/ oM kAr thah+ma be Shad+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu sad+hu rba/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ 6
7b2(rgyud 'bum): ra/ rasmi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti man+di ta/ shA rI rA ya/ dzA la dzA la/ tA pa tA pa/ b+ha ga wAn so ma/ A di t+ya/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+ma nA ri Shi de ba ga na/ a b+hu rtsi ta tsa ra Na/
7b3(rgyud 'bum): su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ sa ned ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu d+ha da da/ de ba/ ri Shi nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+ha
7b4(rgyud 'bum): ru/ tha ra tha ra/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ la ra la ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ pa ra pa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra dA ya ka/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ bi lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra
7b5(rgyud 'bum): mu hu mu hu/ mu ru mu ru/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal sa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / bdag dang / sems can tham
7b6(rgyud 'bum): cad 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / don thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig/ bsad pa dang / bcing ba dang / brdeg pa dang /
7b7(rgyud 'bum): bsdigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon las yongs su thar bar mdzad pa/ ka Na kaN/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku rtsa ku N+Da/ 6ratsa
8a1(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ri ya/ ba la bo d+h+r-i ga/ tsa tur AHsa t+ya saM pra kA sha ka/ tA pa tA pa/ dam dag/ sa mas ma/ a sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mo/ oM d+ha ka ra/ bi d+ha ma na Shawa pA ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/
8a2(rgyud 'bum): me li mi li/ TaTarbaT/ ShaH3/ wi Ti T+Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Ta/ e ne ya tsarma kri ta pa ri ke ra/ e h+ye hi/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga NA sa b+hAny+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba ra/ 18
8a3(rgyud 'bum): ka ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ bA si na/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka shwe ta ya dz+nyo pa bI ta/ rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra si kri ta ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ ma hA da b+huta
8a4(rgyud 'bum): ka ma la a laM kri ta ka ra d+ha rA ya/ d+hA na sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha A pra kaM pya/ ba hu satwa san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sarba karma a wa ra Na bi sho d+ha ka sar+b+ba byA d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka sar+b+ba A shA
8a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba satwA sa mA shwA saM na ka ra na mo stu te swA hA/ bklags pas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod bgyid na mtshams med pa lnga 'byang
8a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur zhing / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad pa la ni a ka ru'i bdug pa'am/ thal ba 'am/ chab bam/ yungs kar dang /
8a7(rgyud 'bum): seng ldeng gi phur bu la sogs pas so// rims thams cad la ni skud pas so// nad thams cad la ni mar ram/ 'bru mar ram/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor bar bgyi'o//
8b1(rgyud 'bum): byang grol ba la ni mtshon gyis so// lto na pa la ni srung ba'i skud pas so// dug gsad pa la ni sa 'am chab kyis so// mig nad la ni skud pa dkar pos rna ba la gdags par bgyi'o//
8b2(rgyud 'bum): so na ba la ni shing ka ra wI ra'i so shing gis so// mtshams gcad pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi la bcing nas phyogs
8b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhir gzugs par bgyis na mtshams chen po bcings par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad srung ba la ni skud pa 'am/ chab bam/ thal bas bya'o// gdon thams cad la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pas
8b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rims thams cad la ni skud pa dkar pos so// g.yan pa dang / khyi rngo dang / ldog pa dang / mgrin pa 'gags pa thams cad la ni sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling bsres pas so// mi ga nang la
8b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dri chu dang / shing ba la sha'i chu 'am/ shing mngar gyi chus so// rna ba'i nad la ni 'bru mar gyis so// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa 'gyed pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa thams cad la ni
8b6(rgyud 'bum): chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te kha bshal bar bgyi'o/ / dpung dang / yul dang / rgyal srid dang / yul 'khor rnams srung ba la ni bum pa gang ba bzhag la gos gtsang ma bgos pas mchod pa rgya
8b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po bgyis nas bklag par bgyis na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ / de yang chab kyis gtor bar bgyis te/ sems can thams cad la srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad dang / gnod
9a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa dang / glags lta ba rnams la ni tsan dan la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te snying khar byug par bgyi'o// mtshams ma
9a2(rgyud 'bum): mchis pa'i las thams cad bas par bgyi ba ni rtag tu bzlas brjod kyis so/ / khyim srung ba la ni pad+ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// sems can thams cad bskyang ba dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa dang /
9a3(rgyud 'bum): gdon thams cad las srung ba la ni tsan dan gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dza yA dang / bi dza yA dang / nA ku lI dang / gan d+ha nA gu lI dang / ba ru ni dang / tse'i dra ba ru Ni dang / a b+ha ya ba ni dang / in dra ba
9a4(rgyud 'bum): ni dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / tsakra dang / ma hA tsakra dang / biSh+Ta krAn+ta dang / so ma rA dzi dang / su nan da rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te nor bur bgyis nas/
9a5(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo 'am dpung pa la gdags pas bsrel bar bgyi'o// khye'u rnams la mgul par ro// bu mo rnams la ni sta zur nas te/ dpal dang ldan par bgyid pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rab tu zhi bar
9a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa'i nor bu 'di bsrel na thams cad las srung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / dug dang mes mi tshugs lags so// dug gis gnod pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// skyes na'ang gnod pa skyed par mi bgyid
9a7(rgyud 'bum): cing byur du zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / gdon rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// rlung dang / 'brug dang / se rab gcad pa dang / chab kyi rgyun dang / ser ba bzlog pa la ni shing ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas te/ las
9b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bgyid pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po grub pa dam pa ma bsgrubs par las 'di rnams bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ / de nas sgrub par 'tshal na thang sku'i cho ga ni ras
9b2(rgyud 'bum): la lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ral pa'i thor tsugs dang / e n+ya ya'i pags pa dang / phyugs bdag gi cha
9b3(rgyud 'bum): lugs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri bar bgyi ste/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong can 'drir stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas sgrub pa pos sku gzugs de'i spyan sngar ba'i lci ba'i dkyil 'khor
9b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ me tog dkar po'i sil ma bkram la spos kyis bkang ba'i snod brgyad gzhag par bgyi'o// sna brgyad pa'am/ drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'am/ gzhan yang lha bshos sha dang khrag dang
9b5(rgyud 'bum): ma 'dres pa bshams shing drangs la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// nyin zhag gcig gam/ nyin zhag gsum du spyang ba bgyis nas zas dkar
9b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum 'tshal te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid mchis nas bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
9b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / ldong ros sam mig sman la bzlas brjod bgyis te mig la bskus na/ de nas mi gda' bar gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi
10a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// de ni 'grub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub
10a2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i
10a3(rgyud 'bum): bu rnams yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// don yod pa'i zhags pa rdzogs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho rab
10a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byam thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/
10a5(rgyud 'bum): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'od zer stong 'phro zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i lus kyis/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
10a6(rgyud 'bum): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing rdzogs la zhi ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i mthu yid la byed pas/ rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten la phan pa dang snying brtse bas don
10a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grub par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis bla na med pa'i de kho na nyid grub pa mchog sbyin pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra
10b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i snying po 'di mchis te/ 'di pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid chen po snying por 'phags pa/ snying por gyur pa
10b2(rgyud 'bum): de kho na nyid grub pa/ pad+ma dam pa/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po rim par phye ba gsang ba dam pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang sgrub
10b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsgrag par bgyi'o/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen
10b4(rgyud 'bum): po dang / mi mang po'i 'khor chen po'i mdun dang / rig sngags grub pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdun 'dir yang bsgrag par bgyi'o// gang yang dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
10b5(rgyud 'bum): tshang pa dang / lha dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang / rgyu skar dang / rig sngags 'chang grub
10b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha mo rnams kyi mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po yang dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa bklags pas sgrub pa dang bsgoms pas sgrub pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
10b7(rgyud 'bum): sngar rig sngags chen po 'chang ba'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba'i mdun du de kho na nyid kyi snying po gsang ba dam pa bsgrags shing brjod par bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bsod nams stong gis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis rnam par spras pa/ phyag dpung pa'i mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu
11a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'phro ba du ma'i 'phreng ba dang / spos kyi glang po che'i sna lta bu'i phyag brkyang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyi bor
11a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas klad pa la byugs te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sems can dag pa dam pa snying rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs te/
11a4(rgyud 'bum): ngas kyang da ltar byin gyis rlob kyis/ khyod gsang ba dam pa'i dam tshig smros shig/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa/ gang+gA'i klung
11a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
11a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyogs bcur bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang gi snying po de kho na nyid gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag gsol to// oM pad+ma hasta ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha
11a7(rgyud 'bum): sA d+ha ya sa ma ya hri da ya/ tsa ra tsa ra hUM/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyi snying po yin no// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsang ba'i snying
11b1(rgyud 'bum): po 'di brjod ma thag tu ri'i rgyal po po Ta la 'di brag dang / nags tshal dang / rtswa shing du bcas pa dang / ri rab khor yug dang / khor yug chen po dang bcas pa rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing lha'i
11b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas rnams kyang ldeg par gyur te/ thams cad 'dara'adar por gyur to// klu'i gnas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs
11b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang 'khrugs par gyur to/ / chu gter rnams kyang 'khrugs par gyur to// de ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs brnyan bzhugs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces
11b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang bka' stsal to/ / rgyal ba'i bdag nyid du skyes pa don yod pa/ gsang ba'i snying po bklags pas 'grub pa bla na med pa smras pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
11b5(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gsang ba bklags pa de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa ni legs so legs so// sems dpa' dag pa khyod kyis
11b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba bklag pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa rgyas pa dang bcas par smros shig/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pa
11b7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis de'i mod la phyogs bcu tha dad pa nas gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag brkyang ste spyi bo la bzhag nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gsungs te/ gsungs
12a1(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyi mod la sngon bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i sgrib pa rnams nyams par bgyid/ zhig par bgyid do// sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / de bzhin du
12a2(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa zhi bar bgyid do/ / sdig pa dang / sems can gdug pa rnams dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba rnams 'jig par bgyid de/ 'di la the tshom mi bgyi'o// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan
12a3(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin lha 'tshal bar 'gyur lags so/ / rig sngags 'di'i cho ga sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas shin tu khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgo
12a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / byams pa dang snying rje yid la bgyis pas 'byung po thams cad la mchog tu snying pa rtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi'o//
12a5(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la sgrub pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi
12a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du thog mar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / tshig gzhan mo smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te
12a7(rgyud 'bum): chab dang yungs kar gyi dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ / phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi ste lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu gdon par bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyis ni dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur
12b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / de'i 'og tu don yod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bton pa tsam gyis de'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo
12b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang bcas pa 'bum 'gyur du bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod rdzogs nas ri mo'i gzugs 'bar zhing sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
12b3(rgyud 'bum): gi lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lag na thogs pa'i zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang snying dga' ba dang spyi bo'i gtsug 'bar
12b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni grub pa'i rtags yin no zhes grub pa'i rtags dang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub par 'gyur ro//
12b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas dgos pa thams cad dang las thams cad brjod pa tsam gyis de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa sa ya bye ba brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i
12b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin gyi lus shin tu dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag
12b7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ gsang ba'i snying por gyur pa so sor gnas par 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi rang bzhin mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro//
13a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa thams cad du grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar snying las skyes pa'i bu bzhin
13a2(rgyud 'bum): du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob kyi bar yongs su sbyong bar bgyid do/ / de lta bas na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing legs par
13a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa na khang pa brtsegs ma legs par brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri mchog la/ 'phags pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med 'od zer
13a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag 'bum 'phro ba'i skus bzhugs shing chos ston pa lta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba/
13a5(rgyud 'bum): yar gyi ngo la byams pa'i sems dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa dang / dang ba dang / zhe sa dang / bla mar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la
13a6(rgyud 'bum): ci 'byor pa me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / lha ba lbub dang / ba dan gyis mchod par bgyi'o// tshes brgyad nas/ tshes bcu gsum gyi
13a7(rgyud 'bum): bar du bas dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du don yod pa'i rnag pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / tshig gzhan mi smra bar khro bo'i rgyal po'i
13b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du mchis nas nyal bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang yon chab dus gsum du dbul bar bgyi'o//
13b2(rgyud 'bum): ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi me tog khu ba dang bcas pa gla rtsi dang lhan cig bsres nas bslang bar bgyi'o// dgug pa'i sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/
13b3(rgyud 'bum): don yod khams gsum rnam par grags/ bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med/ gang phyir bdugs pa tsam gyis ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
13b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams su bdug pa'i sprin chen po 'khrigs pas rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / dri 'khrigs pa de dag gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
13b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams la dri chen po'i mchod pa dang / bdug pa chen po'i mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur
13b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing / nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyur zhing / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can gang
13b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gis bdug pa'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / rtsod pa dang /
14a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyed pa dang / nang 'khrugs pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / gdung ba dang / mi bde ba thams cad dang / nang
14a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / rlung dang / ser ba dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i sprin thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags kyi sbyor
14a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / rims dang / bza' nyes dang / sgo mnyes dang / gnod
14a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrib dang / gnod ltas thams cad bdug pa'i dris 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'gyes par 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du lan 'ga' yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro//
14a5(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di rtag tu sbyar bar bgyi'o// 'di ltar tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo mchis la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad dang / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// zas dkar
14a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi gtor ma ci 'byor pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ / snying po dang nye ba'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la dri dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs de nyid mdun du nam langs kyi bar
14a7(rgyud 'bum): du mchis nyal bar bgyis te/ rmi lam du dbyig gi mdzod mthong ngam/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rin po che'i shing dang bcas/ rin po che'i ri dang bcas/ rdzing dang bcas/
14b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang bcas/ khang pa brtseg ma dang bcas/ gzhal med khang dang bcas/ rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byang chub
14b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs pa/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
14b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med de'ang rig sngags 'chang de la dbugs 'byin par
14b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad cing legs so zhes bgyi ba'ang stsol bar mdzad de/ kye skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis rig sngags 'chang gi skyes bu'i byed pa mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang du bskrun pa dang / khyod kyis lhag
14b5(rgyud 'bum): par mang du byas pa dang / khyod kyis bya ba gang yin pa byas pa dang / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags rnam par phye ba'i snying po
14b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa ni grub zin te legs so legs so/ / khyod rig sngags 'chang gi sangs rgyas nyid du gyur cig/ khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal gyi skye ba blangs te tshe brjes nas nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar
14b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes phyag g.yas pa klad pa'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dngos
15a1(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad stsol cing / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa ste/ 'di ni dam pa sgrub pa yin no zhes bdag nyid sad nas dga' bar mthong ste/ sgrib pa thams cad
15a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro//
15a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyi ri mo de'ang 'bar zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yon tan brgya stong mang po gzhan yang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// skye bo
15a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur
15a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / grub pa chen po bla na med pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de nas tshes bcu bzhi la thog mar dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams la ci 'byor pa'i
15a6(rgyud 'bum): yon dang bcas pa'i mchod ston stsal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas bdag nyid longs spyod par 'gyur ro// gang gis tshe'ang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la lta ba dang / lha rnams la
15a7(rgyud 'bum): lta bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bdug pa'i rgyal po la dgug pa'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug par bgyi'o// bdug pas bdugs pa
15b1(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi mod la zhal ston par 'gyur zhing / dge ba'am mi dge ba thams cad dam/ nyams pa 'am bri ba de dag thams cad gsung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam tshe'i mthar thug gi bar du gsung ba 'am/ 'gro
15b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'am/ 'ong ba gsung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga dang / sgrub pa'i don dang / las kyi cho ga'ang ji lta ba bzhin du bshad par bgyi'o// oM pad+ma d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha dza ya de tsu ru tsu ru
15b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i nye ba'i snying po'i gsang sngags so// oM pad+ma pA sha d+hA rA ya/ a mo g+ha ba ra sats+tshe da ya hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams
15b4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa bskul ba'i
15b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags te/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs nas chab dang yungs kar bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs bcur gtor na thams cad bskul bar bgyis par 'gyur
15b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / oM trai lo kya a b+hu hA na/ a mo g+ha pA sha/ pad+ma bi lo ki ta A yan+tu/ b+hu ba ne su ra/ su ru su ru/ bi ma le hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad/
15b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis nas chu dang me tog bsres nas phyog bcud gtor bar bgyi ste/ thams cad nas dgug pa dam pa grub pa lags so// oM pad+ma b+hu dza ma hA pA sha d+hA ra Ni man+t+ra ya mi/ a mo g+ha bA sha
16a1(rgyud 'bum): yan tu b+hu ba s+t+ra/ mu ru su nuts+tsha/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / dkyil
16a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs la sogs pa spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags te/ ril ba spyi blugs dang / chab dang / me tog dang / tshems shing la bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdugs te/
16a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ thams cad spyan drang ba'i rig sngags so// oM pad+ma a mo g+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na ku ru ku ru swA hA/ sa'i dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ chab
16a4(rgyud 'bum): dang yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas sa la gtor na dpag tshad sum brgyas kun nas 'khor ba'i sa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de thams
16a5(rgyud 'bum): cad bsrungs pas ni rdo rje sra ba'i sems su 'gyur ro/ / dgra rnams kyis mi mthong ba dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang /
16a6(rgyud 'bum): brjed byed dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can thams cad kyis mi mthong ste/ rnam pa thams cad du mi mi mthong bas rdo rje sra bar 'gyur ro// oM A
16a7(rgyud 'bum): mo g+ha pA sha pad mo d+ha ra saM hA/ san+na Ti si ri si ri hUM/ gdan gyi gsang sngags te yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te sa la gtor na/ pad+ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang gi gdan du byin gyi
16b1(rgyud 'bum): brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i seng ge'i gdan du byin gyis brlabs nas legs par phul bar 'gyur ro// rig
16b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gis rang gi stan la chab la yu ngas kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor te/ rig sngags grub pa'i pad+ma'i stan gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA kA ru Ni ka/
16b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma a mo g+ha pA sha dri D+ha badz+ra a d+hiSh+Thi ta b+hu ru b+hA ru b+han d+ha re swA hA/ dkyil 'khor mtha' dag na khyim dang / nags tshal dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang dang / bsti gnas dang / 'chags
16b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / phug dang / dgon pa dang / gnas gsang ba'i phyir dri chab dang yungs dkar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyis te/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad gsang ba chen po
16b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / nyes par bgyid pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad 'bros par 'gyur te/ gnas gsang ba'i gsang sngags so// /
16b6(rgyud 'bum): / oM pad+ma a mo g+ha pA shA na sa man+ta da sha su dik+ShA si mA ban d+hA ya/ tu ru tu ru hUM/ lcags kyi phur bu sor brgyad pa'i tshad lnga la tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas phyogs
16b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhir gzugs par bgyi'o/ / lnga pa ni dbus kyi gzhir gzugs par bgyi ste/ rgyang grags bdun 'khor bar mtshams bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po
17a1(rgyud 'bum): bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la ban d+hA ya sa man/ pad+ma ma hA bad+me/ d+hA ru d+ha ru swAd+hA/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba ste/ dri chab dang yungs kar la lan brgyam
17a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bzlas brjod bgyis nas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / de bzhin du 'og dang steng du'ang gtor te/ dkyil 'khor chen po bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang /
17a3(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mchis par 'os pa thams cad kyis mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can gdug pa dang / lha 'am/ klu gdug pa gang su'ang rung ba de dag thams
17a4(rgyud 'bum): cad zil gyisamanan par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten pa'i bgyi ba ngan pa dang / sngags ngan pa dang / sems can ngan pa dang / bgyid pa ngan pa thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// oM
17a5(rgyud 'bum): a mo g+ha pa ri shud d+he sho d+ha ya sa man+te na/ d+hi ri d+hi ri shud d+ha satwa ma hA pad+me hUM/ 'dis pa'i rnam lnga la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i cha mtha' dag na gtsug lag khang
17a6(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ bya skyibs sam/ tshang tshig ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ gnas sam/ tshal lam/ nags tshal lam/ skyed mos tshal lam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ brangs 'am/ skyabs
17a7(rgyud 'bum): sam/ khang pa la gtor na stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa 'am/ 'dab rdzab dang / mi gtsang ba dang / phyag dar gyis gang ba dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / yi dgas la sogs te rigs ngan pa
17b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro/ / gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// gnas gtsang mar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid la dbang bskur na/ bza' nyes dang / sgom nyes dang / gnod ltas dang / gnod
17b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrib kyi gnas ngan pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / gtsang ma dag par 'gyur ro// mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs par spyod pa ma lags pa tshangs pa spyod par 'gyur ro// bsnyen
17b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas ma bgyis pa ni bsnyen gnas bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / de la lha thams cad srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshang ba dang / khyab 'jug dang / khyab 'jug chen po/
17b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang mchod par 'os
17b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / tshig brtsan par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir kun
17b6(rgyud 'bum): tu gtor na 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas dang / yams dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig/
17b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bdag nyid la dbang bskur ram reg par bgyis na rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par dbye ba dang / las chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i grub pa chen po 'grub
18a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der cher mchod par 'gyur ro// khas thams cad kyis mi bzlog par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin gzhal med khang rgya chen
18a2(rgyud 'bum): po bkra zhing rnam par bkra ba chen po rma lam du mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du mchog rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag dang / rgyal
18a3(rgyud 'bum): po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// rtag tu gtsang mar spyod par gtsang zhing dag par 'gyur ro// rtag par dus kun
18a4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas 'od dpag med rmi lam du rtag tu mthong zhing / shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// oM pad+me sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ma hA a mo g+ha sa ma yA swA hA/ gsang
18a6(rgyud 'bum): ba chen po'i dam tshig gi gsang sngags so/ / oM bi pu la pad+ma a mo g+ha pra sa ra pra bi sha tu/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 'jug pa'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a nu sha ya ma hA pad+ma ban d+hu re hUM/
18a7(rgyud 'bum): slob ma'i gsang sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma shi ge tu ru tu ru/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra ban d+he swA hA/ spyi gtsug gi bcing ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma dza long
18b1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ b+hi ri b+hi rits+tsha/ chab bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha bi ka Ta saM b+ha ra pad+ma a sa Ne dza la ba ti/ ku ru ku ru hUM/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya/
18b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad+mo pra sa ra a mo g+ha bi ma le b+ha ra b+ha ra swA hA/ chab kyi rgyun gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma su pad+me/ pUr+N+Na ka re d+hi ri d+hi ri bi ma le
18b3(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ lag pa'i gsang sngags te lag pa gnyis la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i
18b4(rgyud 'bum): / dgos pa thams cad bgyis ste/ sgrub pa thams cad la bsgrub par bgyi zhing las thams cad la dus thams cad bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha bi pa le dzi hwA gra saM sho d+ha ni pad+ma ka ma la dzi hA/ saM sho d+ha ya d+ha ra d+har
18b5(rgyud 'bum): su bi ma le swA hA/ lce sbyang ba'i gsang sngags te/ dri chab la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ kha ba shal la lce'i dri ma yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dang ku mu da'i 'dab ma dang 'dra bar lce mnyen par
18b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / so dang / dkan dang / mgul pa yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// oM a mo g+ha gan d+ha ba ti su ru su ru/ pra b+hu ru di bya gan d+he pad+ma pra b+he sAhA/ gsang sngags 'dis khar stsal ba'i ril
18b7(rgyud 'bum): khu can dan dang / na la da dang / spri ka dang / ut+pal dang / gur gum dang / gla rtsi lhan cig bslang ba bgyis la/ phye ma zhib mor btags nas ril bu zho gnyis tsam pa'i tshad du sbrang rtsi dang lhan
19a1(rgyud 'bum): cig sbyar la/ gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyis te/ zangs kyi snod du stsal nas/ bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i tshe khar stsal nas skad cig tsam zhig
19a2(rgyud 'bum): bsdad pa bgyis na rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyung grags tsam du the tsom med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' yang dgyes/
19a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mgon po mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal
19a4(rgyud 'bum): po bam po gnyis pa/ / bzlas pas bde ba 'grub 'gyur ba// don yod rigs ni bla na med// rig sngags 'chang dang gtam bgyid pas// dus kun rul dri spang bar bgyi//
19a5(rgyud 'bum): mkhris pa bad kan snabs dag dang // de bzhin kun 'jigs myur du ni// kha nas lha yi dri dag 'byung // su la tshig dag smras pa ni// de ni myur du dbang du 'gyur// lha rnams dbang du mchis pa
19a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lho lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag dang // zla ba nyi ma nyid dag dang // thams
19a7(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang du 'gyur nas mchis/ / 'di ni kha na mur bgyid na// tshig ldan lce yi rtse mo la// mchis pas tshig ni gsal bar 'gyur// rtag tu mi min dbyangs 'gyur te// dri ma'i skyon ni rnam par
19b1(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / tshigs bcad stong ni klog pa dang // sngon bklags pa ni nyams mi 'gyur// hUM zhes bgyis pas lha kun dang // lha gang dkyil 'khor gnas pa'ang mchi// phaT ces bgyis pas
19b2(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa dang / / bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po sha za dang // brjed byed 'byung po gsang ba pa// thams cad mod la 'byor 'gyur zhing // kha sbub tu yang 'gyel
19b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / ril bu kha na thogs na ni// dus kun tu ni mkhas par 'gyur// grub pa myur du thob 'gyur te// thams cad du yang tshe ring 'gyur// tshig mnyen 'jam zhing snyan par 'gyur// ril
19b4(rgyud 'bum): bu 'di ni bcang bgyis na/ / don yod pad+ma dri ma med// ril bu zhes bgyis 'grub par 'gyur// oM ma la bi ga te pad+ma bi ba re/ sany+tsa ra ba ba tsa re swAhA/ a mo g+ha sid d+he/ sho d+ha ya hUM/ nag pus pa'i
19b5(rgyud 'bum): shun pa dang / u shi ra dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / li shi dang / ka ko la dang / spang spos dang / rgya spos dang / gur ku ma dang / pra pun da ri ka dang / e la dang / sa ma ka dang / u gra
19b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / su gan d+hi ka 'di rnams cha mnyam par bgyis te zhib tu btags nas/ gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas char pa'i chab dang bsres pa khrus bgyis shing 'tshal ba 'am/ chab dron pos khrus bgyi ba 'am 'tshal ba
19b7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu khrus bgyis pa gtsang ma dag pas bag tsha ba ma mchis pa gtor ba tsam gyis/ sngon gyi drag po'i las rnams dang / gdon kun 'joms par 'grub pa dang / nad kun rnam par nyams pa dang / 'dod
20a1(rgyud 'bum): chags zhe sdang gti mug gi/ mun pa mi bzad spongs par gsungs// bkrus 'tshal tsam gyi mod la ni// dri ma kun zhi som nyi med// dpal gyis lha yi bzhin du 'bar/
20a2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel// gzi brjid phung po rtag tu 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// gtsang ma'i lus su gyur pa na// lus ni lha yi bzhin du 'gyur// mi gtsang ba ni
20a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang bar 'gyur/ / ma dag pa ni dag par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod min tshangs spyod 'gyur// thub min thub pa kho nar 'gyur// tshangs par mi spyod tshangs spyod 'gyur// mgo skye gnyer ma spangs
20a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / rtag tu bro nad ma mchis 'gyur// lus la lha mo'i dri rnams 'byung // pad+ma ku mud mnyen pa'i lus// sngon gyi dri ni rab spangs te// lha yi tsan dan dri dag ni// mda' rgyang gang du
20a5(rgyud 'bum): som nyi med/ / rtag tu bde bar nyal ba dang // bde bar yang ni sad par 'gyur// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // lha min gdug pa log 'dren dang // gdug pa'i bgegs kun mthong mi 'gyur//
20a6(rgyud 'bum): mi bzang dgra rnams kyis kyang min// lus nyid sbyangs pa bgyis nas su// bzlas brjod brtson pa'i bsgrub pa bgyis// legs par sgrub pa'i las bgyis na// de nyid bde bar 'grub par 'gyur/
20a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' kun// de bzhin mod la gzigs par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang gang dag gzhan// dkyil 'khor gnas pa myur du mchi// ci 'dod yid la bzlas pa yi// rtag tu don
20b1(rgyud 'bum): yod 'grub par 'gyur/ / thog mar lus sbyangs chog bgyi// de nas gsang sngags legs par spyad// oM a mo g+ha pad+ma la tsan de m+b+ha/ dri Sh+Ta pa ri shud d+he/ su ru sarba pa zlas NI shwa b+hu nA d+hA rus ma/
20b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba lo ka ni swAhA/ ldong ros gi'u wang rgya mtsho lbu ba hA sa dza// ut+pal sbrang rtsi lhan cig reng bu 'di bgyis la// gsang sngags sum stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i mig sman 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa
20b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis mchog tu bzangs zhes gsungs/ / 'di ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin gyis// kun pas bkra shis shes 'di mig nad kun// 'joms par bgyid de g.yar lam bzang po rmi//
20b4(rgyud 'bum): yid du mi mchi ba nyid mthong mi 'gyur// ngan par snang dang ngan par lta// nam yang mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gtum mo 'joms pa gtum po dang // lhag ma sbags pa sgomanyes dang // bza'
20b5(rgyud 'bum): nyes gnod sgrib gnod sbyin dang / / srin po dang ni sdig sbrul dag/ thams cad nyin dang mtshan dag tu// mi snang bar ni the tsom med// mig gis bzang po mthong ba dang // rmi lam bzang po mthong bar
20b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / zla ba srid du rab sbyar bas// lha rdzas dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// mig yongs su sbyong ba'o// oM bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha pad+ma a mo g+ha mu khi/ ba ra ba ra ba ra de swAhA/ rig sngags
20b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dis gi'u wang la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan mdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// snying po dang nye ba'i snying
21a1(rgyud 'bum): bo lan rgyam brgya bzlas da kyig/ bzlas brjod pagyid pa ma ba sgyus bras pa'i dbus su zag lnga basmras te/ big 'an tsug rgyas pas
21a2(rgyud 'bum): ste na skar ma'i dbyibs lta bur gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gdug pa thams cad dbang 'gyur mchis// gnod sbyin 'byung po gang dag dang // srin po bgegs dang log 'dren nyid// thams cad 'jig
21a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur the tshom med/ / sems can gdug pas gdug bsams kyang // phyir zhing bzod par mi nus pas// de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur te// me la phye ma leb bzhin no// rtag tu rgyal po skye
21a4(rgyud 'bum): bor bcas/ / 'khor bcas blon por bcas pa dang // blon po che dang mdun na 'don// btsun mo tshogs bcas dbang du 'gyur// dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dag/ thams cad dbang du mchis par
21a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rgyal rigs dmangs rigs nyid dag ste// thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su 'gyur// rig sngags lha ni thams cad dang // gang dag dkyil
21a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gnas pa ste/ / de dag thams cad dam tshig gi/ rjes su sgrub cing skyong bar 'gyur// phyogs bcur srung ba bgyid 'gyur zhing // rtag tu grub pa bla med stsol// thig le 'di bgyis
21a7(rgyud 'bum): grogs med rgyu ba dag/ chom rkun dang ni chom po g.yo can dang // g.yul 'gyed nyid kyi 'jigs pa gang yin pa// kun nas bsgral bar 'gyur te som nyi mang // seng ge stag dang dom dag dang /
21b1(rgyud 'bum): glang chen khro bo mi bzang dang // wa dang gdug bcas srog chags dang // so gdug sbrul kun mgo nas za// gang dag srog chags gdug par bcas// de dag thams cad nub 'gyur te// nam
21b2(rgyud 'bum): yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / ser ba med dang tshig pa dang // char pa mi bzang mtshon chu byad// mkhas pa thig le 'chang ba'i lus// khyim rdib pas kyang non mi 'gyur// mkhas pa rig sngags
21b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba'i don/ / thams cad 'di yis bgyid par 'gyur// shin tu ma grub gsal bar yang // 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis bdag dran par
21b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyid cing / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dran par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du bdag mchis nas yid la bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// /
21b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mchog thams cad ji skad gsungs pa bzhin stsal bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// don yod pa grub pa rjes su sprul bar bgyi'o// bden par dam bcas
21b6(rgyud 'bum): pas dam tshig rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par bgyid na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang /
21b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas rjes su gnang ba de dag thams cad bdag gis stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa dang bral bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das
22a1(rgyud 'bum): de ni bdag gis ma nongs so/ / de lta bas na rig sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgya bsgrub par bgyi ste/ dgos
22a2(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag thams cad the tshom ma mchis par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas gsang sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra sa pra sa ra hUM/ mchod phyir thogs pa'i skud pa'i gsang sngags te/
22a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i sku da pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas mdud pa gsum dor bar bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra Na/ mu ru mu ri di bya ka shi ki/ saM b+ha ba tu ta ra ta ra swA hA/
22a4(rgyud 'bum): / gos kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha bas+t+ra n+yod k+Shi bA pi bo d+hi ni pad+me swA hA/ gos bteg pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM di byo da ka saM b+hu ta a
22a5(rgyud 'bum): mo g+ha ba ru Na tsa re b+hi k+Shin tsu hU~M/ / khrus kyi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mri ta a mo g+ha pad+ma a sa ne/ baR+Sha ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ nye reg gi sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//
22a6(rgyud 'bum): oM a mo g+hu rak+Sha Ni/ ku ru ku ru swAhA/ bdag bsrung ba ste/ yungs kar dang chab la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas rang gi lus la dbang bskur ro// oM a mo g+ha sa ma ya/ ma hA pad me tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM/
22a7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lang bdun bzlas so// oM sar+b+ba tra a mo g+ha ba pa ti tiSh+Tha rak+ShaM tu hUM/ slob ma dang grogs bgyid pa srung ba ste/ thal ba la lan bdun bzlas nas dpral bar thig le bgyi'o//
22b1(rgyud 'bum): oM trai lo kye pad ma a mo swa kra ma na mi li mi li swAd+d+ha/ gos pa 'dor ba'i sngags te lan ti gu rtswa gcig bzlas so// oM pad+me ma hA pad+me sa ra sa ra/ sa marten pa ri baSh+TA ya/ a mog+hA bA shen su na su rba sa/
22b2(rgyud 'bum): tshon skud sA lnga la lan bdun bzlas te dkri bar bgyi'o// oM bo tsit+ta a mo g+ha bstan na rag bi shud d+hA ya/ ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/ ba dan gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bkris so// oM a mo g+ha sha ra badz+ra d+had+d+ha
22b3(rgyud 'bum): tha ra tha ra swA hA/ mda'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi pu la a mo g+ha ma hA d+ha ra bi shu de d+he/ si ri si ri swA hA/ rta babs kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// su dag der zhug
22b4(rgyud 'bum): na mtho ris kyi sgor zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// oM nA nA bi tsi Ti/ a mo g+ha puSh+pa/ pha la tA kIr+Na pU ra ya/ ba ra pa ra hUM/ bum pa gang ba'i
22b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ / oM a mo g+ha rat+na bi ma Na/ ka Ta tsa/ a driSh+Ta bi bya gan d+ho dza la s+pha ra Na/ sa man+te na dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ pog por gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM
22b6(rgyud 'bum): dz+wa la ba ti/ rat+na ga ta/ si ri Ni tu Ti tu Ti swAhA/ gtor ma'i snod kyi gsang sngags te len bdun bzlas so// oM di bya bA dza na a mo g+ha can ga mo g+ha pad+ma ba pur ya Sh+kaM/ kham po dkyigs sngags te lan bdun pa zlas so
22b7(rgyud 'bum): oM a mo g+ha saM pu ra Ni dro Na gan d+ha ba ti swA hA/ thig le'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sa ra ni sA ra ya/ a mo g+ha b+ha dzi na mA da ne hUM/ ril ba mgrin rings kyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas
23a1(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM rat+na di pya rat+na kum b+ha ba ti sA ga ra/ saM pU ra Ni swA hA/ bum pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi tsid tro dz+wa la nA ra raM ga bi b+hak+Sha ya saM shwa d+hA ya tu Ti swA hA/
23a2(rgyud 'bum): tshon rtsi'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM di bya a wa lo ki ni bi b+ha dza yaM tu sa man+te na sa ma ra ne swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te so sor dbye bar bgyi'o// oM nA nA pra hA ra
23a3(rgyud 'bum): Na a mo g+ha mu drA dz+wa la dz+wa la swAhA/ phyag mtshan bri ba ste lan bdun bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha rat+na sU tra d+ha re/ ki Ni ki Ni swA hA/ thig skud kyi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te
23a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor ram/ ri mo bri ba'i ras sam/ gzhan gzhi ci'ang rung ba la'ang gdab par bgyi'o// oM bi pu la ba re pra ba re sha ya/ a mo g+ha pad+me hUM/ sgo'i cha dbye ba'i gsang sngags te sgo re rer yang
23a5(rgyud 'bum): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ / oM su b+hi b+hak+Shi su maM ga la d+hA ra bA ban ti/ oM di bya bA dzA na/ a mo gA pA sha na pa na ba re/ gi ri gi ri hUM/ oM sa pUr+Na/ rU pya di bya ba dza ni/ a mo g+ha pad+me
23a6(rgyud 'bum): swAh+na/ lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// oM bi bi d+ha rU pa hA ro pak+Sha ra Na/ tsa la tsa la/ a mo g+ha ba ti swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM di bya gan d+hA nu sa ra Ni a mo g+ha ba le d+ha ra d+ha ra swAhA/
23a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod yon gyi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM gan d+ha s+pha ra Ni sa man+ta/ a mo g+ha pra s+phu ra hU~M/ dri'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM ni ra ma la kA ya sho d+ha ni di bya gan d+ha pra pU ra
23b1(rgyud 'bum): NaM pU ra ya trUM/ byug pa'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM gAn d+ha tsud+d+ha pra bA ra Ni/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ dri'i phye ma'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM sam sa man+ten/ bi ma legs
23b2(rgyud 'bum): d+ho ta ta re swA hA/ bskul ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM di bya gan d+ha pra b+hA ra Ni sA ga ra dza la dib bya a d+hiSh+Ti te ka la sho d+ha ra/ pUr+Na pU ra ya dza ya sid d+he swA hA/ bum pa'i dri chab kyi gsang
23b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ / oM ra sa sA gra pa ti/ sar+b+ba bi d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te saM pU ra ya hUM/ gtor ma ro sna tshogs can gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dib
23b4(rgyud 'bum): b+ho dza na/ saM pU ra ya/ pi pU la pra b+he swA hA/ kha zas kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM tri shukra b+ho dza na/ ba li bi pU la ra sA gra ba te su ra pra su ra hUM/ zas dkar gsum gyi
23b5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma 'am/ gtor ma gzhan la'ang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pha la ba ti sA ra ba ti dib bya ba ni sU ti/ ta ra ta ra tu ni swA hA/ 'bras bu'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so//
23b6(rgyud 'bum): oM dib bya ku su mod pa la nA nA puSh+pa pra baR+Sha Ni b+ha ba b+ha ba swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// o bi bi d+ha la ta puSh+mA pe kuN Ni ta ba na spa ti A ha ra saM pU r+Na/ kuM b+he swA hA/ me tog
23b7(rgyud 'bum): gtor ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so/ / oM ma hA d+hU ba me g+ha pa Ta la sany+tsa dA ya/ sa man+te na hUM swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sdigs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a tha ra pa r+Ni dzA
24a1(rgyud 'bum): la dz+wa la de ba mu khe swA hA/ me'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM bi bi d+ha ma Ni ka na ka rat+no dz+wa la pU Sha Na ma Ni ma Ni a mo g+ha ma Ni swA hA/ cha zhing brgyan pa'i gsang
24a2(rgyud 'bum): / sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM pad+ma ka re bi ma la na Sha/ ang gu li/ sa ma sa ma sar+b+ba ta tha ga ta/ a d+hi ShI te swA hA/ thal mo sbyar ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so//
24a3(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba gu Na pra Na ta/ shi ro b+han d+ha nA ya na mo ska ro mi/ mi li mi li tu ri Ni swA hA/ phyag bgyi ba'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM da sha di sha a b+hi ban d+ha d+ha pra sa ra tu hUM/ bskor ba'i
24a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so/ / oM bi bi d+hA yu d+hA dz+wa li ta pa ni/ pra dz+wa la pra s+phu ra hUM/ thal mo'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dIb bya a mo g+ha bi pu la swA hA/
24a5(rgyud 'bum): re ma d+hu ra nir g+ho Sha ru te na ra Na hUM/ dril bu'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// yang na brgya rtsa brgyad do// oM rash+mi dz+wa la sa man+te na a ba b+hA sa ya ma hA ma Ni rat+na shi khe swAhA/ mar
24a6(rgyud 'bum): me'i gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ / oM d+hu ru d+hu ru a pa hA ya shI g+hA dza be hUM/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM duSh+Tas
24a7(rgyud 'bum): do bi bo d+ha ni/ sa ma sa ma ya ba re swA hA/ dam tshig gi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas so// oM bi tsi tra ma Ni bi pu la pra bar ta ni hUM/ bgrang 'phreng gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad
24b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas so/ / oM bi tsi tra rat+no dz+wa lo dpe bya/ ku su ma ba re pum+ba ra ti swAhA/ me tog 'phreng ba'i gsang ba'i sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM dib bya lo tsa ne a mo g+he pra ba re/ sarba dib
24b2(rgyud 'bum): bya a d+hiSh+Thi ta sid d+he shud d+ha bi lo kau te swAhA/ dgug pa'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM a mo g+ha pad+me sa man+te shu b+ha ne ta ra ta ra/ gats+tsha swa b+hA ba na ma swA hA/ slar gshegs/
24b3(rgyud 'bum): su gsol ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dib pya saM pU ra Ni/ nA ga bi lo ki na hUM/ 'khar gsil gyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM pad
24b4(rgyud 'bum): Ta s+phu ra Ni s+phu ra ya/ a mo g+ha bi ta sa man+ta pra b+he swA hA/ lhung bzed kyi gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dur b+ha saM s+tha ra bi d+h+ya a tiSh+Thi ha pra sa ra/ su ra su ra/ ri Shi pU dzi te swA hA/
24b5(rgyud 'bum): / rtswartsa gding ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// oM dz+wa la du ma dz+wa la shi khi ra sh+lau gar b+he swA hA/ sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM pad+ma ni pad+ma sa
24b6(rgyud 'bum): ne ba re pra ba re nA ga b+hu ba ne swA hA/ 'bab chu dang mtsho'i gsang sngags te lan bdun bzlas so// oM kha ga tsa ri Ni/ ga ma ga ma ya pa da pra tsa ri Ni hUM/ len pa'i gsang sngags te lan brgya
24b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ / oM sarba tra a mo g+ha b+hi She ma ma hA tsA Da bi ma le/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mA na/ pra ba ra pA Ni b+hu dze pad+me d+ha dze swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
25a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas so/ / rig sngags 'chang gis gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad so sor cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad so sor sbyar nas cho ga bsgrubs na
25a2(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa rgya chen po'i 'byor pa'i mthu 'di dag dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rin po che'i snod sna tshogs dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gzhal
25a3(rgyud 'bum): med khang rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i me tog dang / gdugs dang / ba dan sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyi mchog dang / ro sna tshogs kyi
25a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gtor ma bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ji tsam de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
25a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin
25a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams la so so'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mi
25a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi khang pa ji lta ba dang / kha zas kyi mchog ji lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dgos pa'i rnam pa thams cad bgyi ba dang / de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i ji skad gsungs pa'i cho ga
25b1(rgyud 'bum): zhib mo dang / cho ga dang / gsang sngags bsgrub pa rnams bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa bla na med pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis las
25b2(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang gis mdun du bdag rang gi gzugs kyis nye bar mchis nas bsam pa dang re ba thams cad
25b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / gnod pa thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// yongs su dag pa'i lha chen po ltar lus dag par bgyi'o// cho ga zhib mo dang /
25b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'i mchog thams cad stsal bar bgyi'o// rig
25b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ / de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub pa'i grub pa stsal bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig
25b6(rgyud 'bum): rten las 'das pa sgrub pa 'i grub pa chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/ / shin tu rgya che zhing bag tsha ba ma mchis pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog khyad par du 'phags
25b7(rgyud 'bum): shing nor 'du ba'i bkra shis dang dpal stsal bar bgyi'o/ / 'di la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi zhing / dngos po gzhan du'ang yid la mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la byams pa
26a1(rgyud 'bum): dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyis brtse ba la mchog tu brtson par bgyi'o// bu gcig pu bzhin du sems can du gyur pa thams cad la mchog tu
26a2(rgyud 'bum): brtse bar bgyi'o/ / bden par smra ba dang / bden par dga' ba dang / snyan par smra ba dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzla bar bgyi'o//
26a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi zhing / phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyang bzla bar bgyi'o// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yid la bgyis nas
26a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bgyi'o// 'phags pa mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag bgyis nas
26a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon gsum du bsgom par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la phyag bgyis te/ mdun du rtswa'i gding ba bting nas skyil mo krung bcas
26a6(rgyud 'bum): te mchi nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas pa bgyi ste/ 'di ni gsang ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o// bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i de kho
26a7(rgyud 'bum): na nyid grub par gyur cig/ 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po thugs rje can sems can la byams pa dang / sems can dag pa lag na pad+ma can/ sems can thams cad la byams pa'i bdag nyid
26b1(rgyud 'bum): can gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs dang / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po lha min gsang ba pa// 'jig rten skyong dang tshangs pa
26b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / drag po khyab 'jug gzhon nu sogs// gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // drang srong tshogs dang de bzhin du// zla nyi kun 'gyed gzhon nu dang // de bzhin dbang phyug dbang chen dang // phyag
26b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ / de dag myur du 'du bar 'gyur// sgrol ma bdun ni 'du bar 'gyur// de bzhin pha rol phyin bcu dang // mgrin sngon de bzhin gos dkar can// de bzhin pad+ma/
26b4(rgyud 'bum): gar gyi dbang // rgyal dang rnam rgyal nyid dang ni// lcags sgrog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // lha mo khro gnyer mA ma kI// dpe med pho nya mo dang ni// 'jigs med dpal dang dbyangs can dang /
26b5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma ko ti ut+pa la// pad+ma'i so can de bzhin du// ti se yi ni rtse mo na// 'phrog ma 'byung po ma dag dang // de bzhin lag na rdo rje bcu// mthu chen ji bzhin rig 'dzin dbang // rdo rje
26b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang chen de bzhin du/ / bcu gsum lha dbang lhan cig dang // sum cu gnyis nas lha dag ni// gsang sngags phyag rgya bcings tsam gyis// de dag thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// phyogs
26b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing ston par mdzad do/ / de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur
27a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / rtag tu mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong spyan stong pa dang / phyag rgya sna tshogs 'dzin pa lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa
27a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni/ / bram ze'i cha lugs don yod zhags// mthong bar 'gyur te so ma nyi med// mgrin sngon dang ni rta mgrin dang // de bzhin rgya mtsho'i glong dang ni// mgon po'i zhal ni bcu
27a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig dang / / de bzhin zhal ni bzhi dag dang // mgon po 'jigs pa brgyad 'phrog dang // de bzhin gzigs pa bsam mi khyab// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i
27a4(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin/ / phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mgon pos thams cad ston par mdzad// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams// rgyal ba 'dren pa 'od dpag med// byang chub sems
27a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i tshogs bskor ba/ / mgon po mod la mthong bar 'gyur// gzhan yang sangs rgyas zhing ni stong dag gi/ chu bo gang+gA'i bye ma dang mnyam pa'i// de bzhin gshegs 'bum bye ba brgya phrag
27a6(rgyud 'bum): stong / / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas yongs bskor mgon// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba chen po'i rnam par gzhan mthong ste// nyin gcig
27a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du byang chub snying po dang / / chos kyi 'khor lo de bzhin rdo rje'i gdan// de dag rmi lam snang ba mthong 'gyur bas// de la yid gnyis som nyi the tsom med// sangs rgyas rnams kyis
27b1(rgyud 'bum): gshung ba'am mtshams med lnga/ / mgon po che la gdug sems nyid dang ni// byang chub sems dpa'i bar chad 'phags pa la// kha zer nyid dang dam chos slu ba dang // rgyal bas gsung
27b2(rgyud 'bum): spong mnar med gzhol ba dang / / mi bzad dmyal ba bcu drug gnas pa dang // bskal pa 'bum po thams cad skad cig grol// phyag rgya gsang sngags bzlas pa tsam gyis sam//
27b3(rgyud 'bum): thos sam mthong ngam ming ni gzung bas kyang // sdig pa de kun 'jig 'gyur som nyi med// don yod zhags snying phyag rgya mthong ba yang // 'jig rten mgon dang mtshungs te khyad par
27b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags/ / sangs rgyas 'bum phrag stong dang gang+gA yi// bye ma brgya stong dag ni mthong bar 'gyur// byang chub snying por gtogs pa thams cad dang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar
27b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / don yod rgyal po'i snying po phyag rgya dang // gsang sngags mthong na bsod nams phung chen gyis// bsod nams phung po 'di dag 'phel bar 'gyur// de yi tshe yang rnam par
27b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar 'gyur/ / de ni dpag tu med par som nyi med// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur nas// gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas ni thog mar yang // yo byad sgrub pa gtsang zhing
27b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa gtsang / / rtag tu yan lag spos ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs bdug pas rab tu bdug bgyis shing // dpung pa lag pa lha yi spos kyis byug/ gtsang ma'i sa phyogs gtsang ma'i
28a1(rgyud 'bum): stan bshams par/ / skyil mo bkrung bcas nas ni byams sems dang // snying rje'i lhag bsam de nyid mnyam bzhag nas// phyogs bcu dus gsum gshegs pa'i
28a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dang / / rtag tu 'jig rten dbang la phyag bgyi zhing // rtag tu bla ma mchod ras chos la brtson// shin tu rig pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar// shin tu rig pas srung ba'i cho ga
28a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ / shin tu bkra shis bla ma de nyid gus// bden par smra zhing snyan par smra ba dang // sems can kun la snying rje'i bdag nyid can// lhan cig rjes mthun gyur nas de nas ni// phyag
28a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyu 'di bcing bar bgyi ste/ / lag pa pad+ma'i tshul du gzhag la sor mo rnams mnyam par bcings te mthe'u chung zla ba'i tshul du snying khar bzhag go// phyag rgya 'di ni don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying
28a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du stsol bar 'gyur ro// mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug dgug pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM a mo g+ha bi kur bi ta/ sa man+ta a wa lo ka
28a6(rgyud 'bum): ya na ma s+t+rai ya d+hA/ a d+hiSh+Thi ta a mo g+ha pad+me tsa ra sany+dza ra hUM hUM/ de ma thag tu dus gsum la rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i rgyal po'i pad+ma 'bar ba gsal ba'i cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyal pos
28a7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po mtha' dag cher g.yos par 'gyur ro/ / dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
28b1(rgyud 'bum): 'das de dag gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma dag byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad rab tu dgyes shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mdzad pa'i thugs rje chen pos
28b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ / grub pa dam pa don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa stsol bar 'gyur
28b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / khyab bdag dang / kun 'gyed gzhon nu la sogs pa lha rnams srung ba dang /
28b4(rgyud 'bum): skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang / chad pa thams cad las yongs su
28b5(rgyud 'bum): thar par 'gyur ro/ / de'i grub pa yid du mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa'i phyag rgya thams cad du mchog lags par grags pa lags so// don yod dam tshig mchog grags pa//
28b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma rgyas pa'i phyag rgya bcing // mdzub mo gung mo rnams pad+ma lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyis la/ sen mo mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bstan te/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor brtse ba'i
28b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do/ / oM a ma~M g+ha pad+mi ku sha sa ma yA na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA satwa hUM/ phyag rgya bcings te bcings ma thag tu'am/ gzung ba tsam
29a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bgyi brtsol bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag tham
29a2(rgyud 'bum): cad dgyes pa dang / mnyes pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / tshim pa dang / thugs dgyes pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la thugs rje chen po rgyas pa'i snying po grub pa dam
29a3(rgyud 'bum): pa stsol bar 'gyur zhing / yang ras yang du mthong bar stsol bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
29a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib me phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'dzin pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba tsam gyis dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug
29a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du 'phags pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa'i gsang sngags grub par
29a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil pad+ma lngar bgyis la/ mdzub mo gung mo rdo rje ltar bgyi zhing /
29a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung brkyang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ pad+ma 'chang la bdug pa dang // me tog la sogs dri rnams dang // 'phreng ba byug pa phye ma dang // ba dan gos dang brgyan dang ni// gtor ma mchod
29b1(rgyud 'bum): yon rab tu dbul/ / bum pa gang ba'i dri sogs dang // mtshon skud sna lnga tshon phye'o// gzhan yang zas ni sna tshogs la// phyag rgya 'di ni kun la mchog/ 'di ni dbul ba'i phyag
29b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyar gsungs/ / thams cad du ni don yod mchog/ go bar bgyid pa'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma'i phyag gis byin gyis brlabs// gung mor nor bu dkris pa lta bu'i phyag rgya 'di ni bag
29b3(rgyud 'bum): che ba med pa'i pad+ma rin po che'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni grub pa dam pa lags so// spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ma hA satwa a ya tu mi ha maN+Da le/ bai ro
29b4(rgyud 'bum): ri pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// gsol ba gdab pa'i gsang sngags te// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // phyag na pad+ma gsol gdab
29b5(rgyud 'bum): dgug/ lha rnams kun dang de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha rnams dgug/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin byang chub sems
29b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yang 'du/ / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min de bzhin du// nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto 'phye chen po nyid dag ste// de kun skad cig 'du 'gyur zhing //
29b7(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// lag pa rdo rje'i tshul du gzhag la// lag pa'i mthe'u chung rnams pad+ma'i mtshams su bya ste/ gung mo rnams yid tsam bskum pa'i phyag rgya bcings
30a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ grub ldan 'di ni phyogs bcing dang // dkyil 'khor bcing bar bgyi ba yi// srung ba'i las la bag tsha med// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam dang // gsang
30a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags stong ni bzlas tsam gyis/ / dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu// mtshams bcing dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // srung ba'i las ni bgyis par 'gyur// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dri n+ta pad+ma
