30a3(rgyud 'bum): ban d+ha sa man+te na ma hA sa man+da rak+Shan+na mAM/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT/ de nas don yod phyag rgya ste// grub ldan sems can kun smra na// don yod pa ni phyag rgya ni// khyad par 'phags pa gzhan
30a4(rgyud 'bum): yang bstan/ / rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas/ sor mo rnams mnyam par gzhag ste/ srin lag kha gdengs la sor mo rnams yid tsam bskums pa ni/ don yod sna tshogs rgyal po yi// pad+ma'i
30a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen por bsgrags/ / phyag rgya 'di ni las kun dang // 'jug pa'i las kun sbyar ba dang // dkyil 'khor phyag rgya mchog kun gsungs// phyag rgya 'di ni gzung tsam dang // gsang
30a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags dam pas bsrung bgyis na/ / rig sngags 'chang ba 'jug par 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa rnam thar pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa grub par 'gyur// oM badz+re badz+ra/
30a7(rgyud 'bum): / d+hiSh+mid pad+me bi shwa rU pa d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra hUM/ pra be sha tu s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga ta na d+hi ri tu Ti swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// de nyid grub pas phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam drug tu/
30b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yos par 'gyur bar som nyi med// phyag na pad+ma'i lus 'bar nas// mgu ba chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la 'dzum bzhin gyis// rtag tu lta zhing mdun na mchis//
30b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang // mtho ris sgo rnams 'byed par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis gnas rnams na// gnas pa'i lha rnams sgo 'byed cing // sum cu rtsa gsum gnas sgon//
30b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa thams cad sgo 'byed do// bde can 'jig rten khams dag ni// sgo na gnas pa sgo 'byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings tsam gyis// gnas kun tu ni 'jug par 'gyur// phyag rgya
30b4(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad 'phrog/ nye ba'i nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol// gnod pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba bcu drug rnam las
30b5(rgyud 'bum): thar/ / phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// mi bzang 'jigs pa brgyad rnams dang // nyes byas thams cad 'jig par bgyid// dmyal ba'i sgo ni gcad par 'gyur// mi bzad 'jigs
30b6(rgyud 'bum): las bsgral bar 'gyur/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid mthong tsam gyis// mtshams med lnga ni bgyis pa dang // sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// sems can kun la rtag tu sdug/ de bzhin
30b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs kun byin gyis rlob/ / phyag rgya 'di nyid mthe bo'i rtse mo cung zad bkug la bzung ste/ gung mo pad+ma'i ral pa'i tshul du bgyis te/ spyi bo'i ral pa sa la gzhag pa ni/ pad+ma'i ral
31a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya lags te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bsgrags te/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gsang sngags 'di brjod par bgyi'o// oM a mo g+ha
31a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo dza le bi sho d+ha ya hUM/ bi ri bi ri bi ma le swA hA/ phyag rgya spyi bor bzhag nas chab dag gis// bkrus nas gtsang mas gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas su// phyag rgya gsang
31a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags dogs med pas/ / rtag tu bkrus pa'i mod tsam gyis// mi gtsang ba ni gtsang bar 'gyur// mi gtsang spyod pa gtsang ba dang // tshangs spyod ma yin tshangs spyod 'gyur// mi thub pas
31a4(rgyud 'bum): ni thub par 'gyur/ / bsod nams phung pos lha bzhin 'bar// zla ba nyi ma bzhin du mdzes// 'jig rten kun snying rtag tu sdug/ gsang sngags bla na med pa 'grub// grub pa don yod
31a5(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa yi/ / don yod de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams kun ni 'du 'gyur te// srung ba'i phyir ni som nyi med// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// sems dpa' mchog
31a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dag pa po/ / mchog sbyin rgyun du thams cad du// nyi ma re re mthong 'gyur zhing // tshe 'phel rtag tu nad med 'gyur// de bzhin mgu dang rgyas par 'gyur// thams cad du ni las 'grub/
31a7(rgyud 'bum): ste// gnod pa kun las rnam par grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par thar// thams cad du ni bkra shis mchog/ khrus kyi rnam par 'di dag ni// don yod khrus kyi mchog yin no// lag
31b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bsdams la 'og tu bstan/ / srin lag gnyis yid tsam bskum pa ni pad+ma'i nor bu phyag rgya lags te/ kun nas kyang ni mnyam par gzhag/ phyag rgya ting 'dzin lta bu 'di// skyil mo
31b2(rgyud 'bum): krung bcas mchis nas su/ / phyag rgya 'di dag bcing bgyis shing // mnyam par bzhag nas gsang sngags bzlas// bcings pa tsam gyis mod nas ni// skyil krung rdo rje lhun mnyam 'gyur//
31b3(rgyud 'bum): kun nas go char gyur nas ni// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // gnod sbyin srin po 'byung por bcas// lha min mkha' lding gis mi mthong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams
31b4(rgyud 'bum): dag tu/ / de dag thams cad rgyang ring 'gros// bgegs med par ni las 'grub pa// bzlas pa'i las la som nyi med// oM a mo g+ha badz+ra dri d+ha pad+me shwa ra hUM/ thal mo mnyam par sbyar la
31b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo rka 'gung mo bkug nas mthe bong pad+ma kha phye ba ltar bgyi ste/ don yod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gsang sngags dang/
31b6(rgyud 'bum): phrag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// oM pad+me sha ra a mo g+ha ba ra da/ b+hi ri b+hi ri swAhA/ 'dis thog mar bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i zhags
31b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po da kho na nyid sems pa'i bsam pa rtse gcig pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / lan cig brnas pa tsam gyi mod la dus gsum du rgyun du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong gang+gA
32a1(rgyud 'bum): klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rig sngags 'chang de la
32a2(rgyud 'bum): legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / dbugs 'byin par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang de la 'od zer sna tshogs gtong bar mdzad do// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
32a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la mdun du mchis par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ltar bcings pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu
32a4(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa
32a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'di bcings la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyis pa tsam gyi
32a6(rgyud 'bum): mod la yon tan dang phan yon rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings nas zhag gcig spyang ba bgyis te bzlas brjod bgyis na/ 'phags
32a7(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin du mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol te/ rig sngags 'chang la legs so legs so// 'di ni bzlas
32b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod kyi dam pa yin no zhes dpung pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag pas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/ tshur shog bu gang 'dod pa'i mchog slongs shig
32b2(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyin no/ / khyod rjes su bzung zhing byin gyis brlabs pas nga'i bu rig sngags 'chang gi thu bor gyur cig/ rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub pas rnam par
32b3(rgyud 'bum): grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par dbye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po la brtan par bgyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la gom par gyis shig/
32b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i mngal du gnas nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / khyod pad+ma'i nang du rdzus te skyes nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing mtshan
32b5(rgyud 'bum): dang dpe byad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/
32b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya brgya rtsa brgyad bcings pas lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor los sgyur bar
32b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bye ba brgya stong phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod rgya cher snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
33a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / rdzu 'phrul gang gi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dpung pa bskum pa las brkyang ba tsam gyis mchi zhing slar
33a2(rgyud 'bum): ldog par 'gyur ro/ / bzlas brjod brgya stong bgyis la phyag rgya brgya stong bcings na/ tshe 'di nyid la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
33a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis rnam par rol pa'i don yod pa'i mig yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / drag po dang / dbang po dang /
33a4(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan la sogs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar du
33a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams 'dul bar gyur pa de lta de lta bu'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i bzlas brjod sgrub pa 'bum lags so// 'bum
33a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du sdang ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
33a7(rgyud 'bum): cad las lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du phyir mi ldog par byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bcings te skyil mo krung bcas
33b1(rgyud 'bum): nas sems can thams cad la brtse ba dang / 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan cig bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
33b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis ma thag kho nar lan drug brgya bzhi bcur bzlas brjod bgyis par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dran pa dang / blo gros dang /
33b3(rgyud 'bum): gzi brjid lus la 'jug par bgyid do// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ri mo'i sku gzugs de la'ang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur
33b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid rmi lam du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs
33b5(rgyud 'bum): su dag par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bsal ba dang btugs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa rnams kyi dam
33b6(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur bas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ / // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po gsum pa/
33b7(rgyud 'bum): thal mo lhan cig bsdams te sbyar la rtse mo yid tsam bkug ste khar gtad la/ srin lag gnyis phyir 'gyed cing gung mo pad+ma lta bur bgyis te sngags 'di brjod do// oM tu ru tu ru pad+me a
34a1(rgyud 'bum): mo g+ha sid d+hin+tu/ phyag rgya 'di ni don yod grub// las rnams grub dang ldan pa yi// 'di ni bcing ba bgyis pa yis// kun rig myur du 'grub par 'gyur// myur du ston pa
34a2(rgyud 'bum): stsol 'gyur te/ / rnyed dka' don yod grub pa mchog/ mchog kun rab tu stobs par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das pa de bzhin 'jig rten pa// sgrib pa thams cad las ni rnam par grol// bsod
34a3(rgyud 'bum): nams phung po dag ni rtag tu 'phel/ / bkra shis sgra ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// lha rnams rtag tu srung bar 'gyur// rdo rje bcing ba shin tu bcing // rtag tu sems ni brtan por bgyi// mdzub
34a4(rgyud 'bum): / mo dag ni yid bskums nas// snying kha dag tu rab tu brkyang // don yod pa'i pad+mas pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang // snying po gsungs pa dang / pad+ma'i dbang phyug gi phyag rgya las dang don thams
34a5(rgyud 'bum): cad grub pa'i gsang sngags de dag gsungs nas/ de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po gsungs pa/ oM a mo g+ha hri da ya/ pad+me d+ha ra d+ha ra pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA maN+Da la hri da ya hUM/ snying po phyag rgya 'di ni bcings
34a6(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / pad+ma 'chang ba'i don yod snying po yi// grub pa de nyid yang dag som nyi med// thams cad du ni las rnams thams cad dag/ de ni grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// shin tu gsang ba'i
34a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya gzung / / shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags bzlas// shin tu bkrus pas gos gtsang bgo/ gtsang ma'i sems kyis 'chang bgyid cing // sems can kun la brtser gyur nas// rtag
34b1(rgyud 'bum): tu bla ma gus par sgom/ / rtag tu shin tu dang bgyi zhing // pad+ma'i phyag la dga' bar bgyi// myur du las 'grub myur du ni// pad+ma 'chang dang sangs rgyas 'thob// myur du 'jig rten dbang phyug
34b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thob/ / myur du sems can kun phan ldan// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang ba tsam gyi khar pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la/ lag pa bsgyur nas mdzub mo gyen du sgreng / mthe bong yid tsam pa bkug la lag
34b3(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ sor mo rnams pad+ma'i tshul du bzhag la mthe bong yid tsam bkug ste/ gung mo don yod pa'i zhags par bgyi ba ni don yod pa'i zhi ba'i cho ga chen po'i mig sems can thams cad
34b4(rgyud 'bum): / la byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i bdag nyid can lags te/ gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM pa shu pa ti pA shA d+ha ra sa ha sra rash+mi pra ti maN Di ta ka ya/ A ka ri Sha ni/ sany+tsod ni/
34b5(rgyud 'bum): b+hu ru b+hu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha sid d+hi hUM/ phyag rgya 'dis gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i
34b6(rgyud 'bum): tshul du gdeg cing / slar yang rang gi gnas bzung zhing gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te lan bdun du'ang gdeg go// don yod rgyal po bzlas pa ni// bsam pa mchog tu dag par bgyi// bzlas pa
34b7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi mod la ni/ / don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// byang chub thams cad dgug pa dang // mod la sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dag/ ji ltar yid la bsam
35a1(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin/ / mod la grub pa bla med dang // mod la thams cad dgug par 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min nam mkha' lding // mi 'am ci dang lho 'phye/
35a2(rgyud 'bum): che// rig sngags 'chang la blta ba'i phyir// thams cad de yi mod la 'du// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dag/ de nyid gzigs pas gzigs par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang la bas/
35a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' 'du bar 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// mchog sbyin spyi bor phyag 'jog 'gyur// yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi// rang bzhin
35a4(rgyud 'bum): mod la ston par mdzad/ / gang dag mnar med song ba dang // sems can mtshams med lnga bgyid dang // gang dag 'phags la skur 'debs dang // gang dag dam chos spong ba dang // phyag
35a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya 'di mthong 'dzin bcug dang / / bcings pas mod la sdig pa kun// 'jig 'gyur mod la 'dren pa mthong // phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//
35a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam dang // gsang sngags zlos par bgyid pa dang // rig sngags 'chang ba mthong ba de// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang ni// mngon du mthong bar blta bar bya//
35a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe rabs brgyud par bskal pa ni// brgya dang stong du bsags pa yi// sdig pa las kyi sgrib pa rnams// phyag rgya bcings som mthong tsam gyis// de kun 'byang 'gyur som nyi med//
35b1(rgyud 'bum): thal mo lhan cig dam du sbyar te/ mkhas pas pad+ma'i tshul du bgyis la mdzub mo nor bur bgyis te/ gung mo yid tsam zhig bkug pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo ste/
35b2(rgyud 'bum): lag pa spyi bor brkyang nas spyi bor dbang bskur ba stsol ba'i gsang sngags 'di brjod do// oM stA d+hA nu ga ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu/ sarba s+yA d+hA/ a b+hi She keHpad+ma ma Ni su pad+me/ a mo g+he sarba ta thA
35b3(rgyud 'bum): ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te hUM/ 'dis dbang bskur ba tsam gyis rig sngags 'chang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
35b4(rgyud 'bum): gi phyag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
35b5(rgyud 'bum): dag par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pu'i gnas su 'gyur ro// spyi gtsug rdo rje pad+ma bcing // rtag tu sor mo'i rtse mo brkyang // mdzub mo lcags kyu'i tshul du bgyi//
35b6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi gdong gri khro gnyer bzhin// khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// las kun sgrub par bgyid pa yi// thams cad sgrub bgyid phyag rgya ste// kun sgrub dam pas gsang sngags pas// 'di dran grub
35b7(rgyud 'bum): pa kun gyi mchog/ oM kro d+ha rA dzA d+hA ma ma hA a mo g+ha ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+TAn hUM/ phyag rgya 'di dran tsam gyis kyang // mthu chen po yi gsang sngags kyis// gdug pa kun ni rnam 'jig ste// ri rab
36a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni snyil bar bgyid/ / phyag rgya bcing bar bgyis pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid// sems can gdug dang gdug pa'i klu// bgegs dang log 'dren
36a2(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa ste/ / de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis// lha dang mi dang dge sbyong dang // bram ze rgyal rigs dmigs gang
36a3(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / thams cad dbang du gyur nas ni// mchis par 'gyur bas som nyi med// rgyud ni rtag tu mnyag bzhag la// mthe bong mnyam du bteg nas ni// gung mo yis ni gung mo nyid// yid
36a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam bkug nas bsgreng bar bgyi/ / 'di ni pad+ma chen po yi// lha mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ste// grub pa bla na med pa yi// thams cad kyi ni dam pa lags// thal mo pad+ma'i tshul du sbyar// mthe bong
36a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni brkyang bgyis la/ / mthe'u chung yid tsam bkug pa ni// dkar sham chen mo'i phyag rgya ste// 'di ni kun grub bla na med// rdo rje'i tshul du thal sbar dam bcings shing // shes rab can gyis
36a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i lag bsgyur la/ / khro gnyer bzhir ni de bzhin khro ba dang // phyag rgya chen po kun 'dod rab tu sbyin// lag pa gnyis kyi thal sbyar brkyang nas ni// gsang ba de brkyang gung mo bskum nas su//
36a7(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung brkyang nas lcags sgrog pad+ma yi// tshul du snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis// dkyil 'khor kun nas lha dag dang /
36b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor lha kun dga' bar 'gyur// thams cad tshogs shing 'du ba dang // kun gyis srung bgyid som nyid med// phyag rgya 'di nyid bshig nas lag pa ni// thal sbyar pad+ma'i tshul bzhin du
36b2(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / snying khar bzhag pa gnod sbyin pho nya mo// 'di ni phyag rgya lags par legs par bsgrags// dang po rdo rje khu tshur legs bcings la// gung mo lhag ma bskum zhing mthe bong gzhag/
36b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i tshul gyi bzhin dram sgrol mdun gyis// grub pa kun gyi bla med phyag rgya 'di// sdig pa thams cad 'jig cing nyon mongs kun// nad kun nye bar zhi bar som nyi med// don yod pa'i grub pa bla
36b4(rgyud 'bum): med kyis/ / cho ga zhib mo thams cad rab tu 'grub// lag pa gnyis ni mnyam bzhag ste// rdo rje'i tshul du pad+ma bcing // mdzub mo bskum pa bgyis nas ni// mthe bong yang ni dgug par bgyi//
36b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// cho ga zhib mo'i dam pa lags// pad+ma'i tshul du thal mo sbyar// mdzub mos 'khyud la gung mo ni// lcags kyu'i tshul du bsgreng bar bgyi// don yod zhags pa'i
36b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di/ / rgya mtsho'i glong gi kha lta bur// rdo rje za ba nyid kyis gsungs// 'di ni las kun bgyid pa po// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// phyag rgya 'di ni mdzub mo'i mthe bong nyid//
36b7(rgyud 'bum): lcags sgrog lhag ma bskum nas pad+ma'i tshul// snying kha'i gnas su bzhag pa mgrin sngon gyi// 'di ni dogs med las kun phyag rgya lags// lag gnyis pad+ma'i khu tshur te// g.yas
37a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du ni bzhag nas su/ / kun nas zhi ba'i bzhin du gzhag/ byams pa'i mig gnyis bgyis pa ni// zhal ni bcu gcig phyag rgya ste// de bzhin kun gyis mi thub
37a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / mthe bong mnyam par mnyam bgyis la// sor mo'i rtse mo bskums pa dang // mdzub mo gnyis ni pad+ma'i tshul// rig pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya las// phyag rgya 'di nyid dbus su ni//
37a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i tshul du mdzub mo bskum// g.yon pa brkyang ba dbang chen gyi// phyag rgya 'byung po thams cad 'joms// lcags sgrog dam du bgyis nas ni// lag pa gnyis po brkyang nas kyang // snying
37a4(rgyud 'bum): khar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/ / 'di ni rgyun du gshin rje lags// lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// sor mo bsgreng ba'i thor to dgug/ g.yas pa snying khar bzhag nas su// mthe bong dang ni mthe'u chung
37a5(rgyud 'bum): dgug/ lhag ma rnams ni brkyang bgyis te// 'di ni chu lha'i phyag rgya ste// klu kun dgug pa'i mchog lags so// lag pa gnyis ni bsdams bgyis la// sor mo phying ga log tu sbrel// g.yA pa
37a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni g.yon pa dag/ snying kha'i gnas su bzhag bgyi ste// phyag rgya 'di ni lus ngan gyi// gnod sbyin thams cad skrag par bgyid// lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor yang // mthe bong mdzub mo dgug bgyis
37a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ / lag pa g.yon pa brkyang nas su// mdzub mo gyen du bsgreng ba ni// 'di ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya ste// thams cad du ni las sgrub pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid g.yas pa yi// mthe'u chung sor
37b1(rgyud 'bum): mo dgug bgyis te/ / drang srong tshogs kyi phyag rgya 'di// lha rnams kun gyis phyag bgyis pa'o// lag pa gnyis ni dam bcings la// blta sdug 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste// lha min thams cad
37b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs pa yi/ / khyag 'jug phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// g.yas pa bi dza pu rar bgyi// g.yon pa rtse gsum tshul du bgyi// mthe bong mthe'u chung bskum pa ni// 'byung po thams cad skrag bgyid
37b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'di ni drag po'i phyag rgyar gsungs// g.yas pa khu tshur bcings nas su// mdzub mo brkyang nas g.yon pa ni// dkur brten khu tshur bcangs nas bzhag/ sor mo rnams ni brkyang bar
37b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ / drag po rgyun tu lta bgyid pa// de bzhin lha yi sde dpon gyi// gzhon nu phyag rgya 'di zhes gsungs// gyen du lag pa gnyis bsgrengs nas// sor mo gsum ni brkyang bgyi te// mthe bong
37b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo bkug pa ni/ / 'od zer stong dag 'phro bgyid pa// 'di ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya lags// phyag rgya 'di nyid sor mo gsum// bkug nas sor mo gnyis gnyis brkyang // skar ma'i tshogs kyi
37b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzes gyur pa/ / 'di ni zla ba'i phyag rgyar gsungs// gsang sngags chen po phyag rgya 'di dag ni// las dang don kun grub pa sgrub par bgyid// sdig pa thams cad spong zhing nyon mongs kun//
37b7(rgyud 'bum): nyams par bgyid cing sgrib pa thams cad 'byang // las kun zad par bgyid cing don yod pa'i// las grub don yod grub pa 'grub par 'gyur// oM pad+ma tA re tA ra ya pad+ma b+hu dze hUM/ oM ma hA pad+me
38a1(rgyud 'bum): shwe taM ge hu ru hu ru swA hA/ oM b+h+r-i ku Ti pad+me ta ra ta ra hUM/ oM pad+me pAN+Da ra bA si ni kuN+Da kuN+Da swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba ra de sid d+hi sid d+h+yaM tu hUM/ oM sarba tra gA mi ni A b+hA
38a2(rgyud 'bum): ya/ ro dri ni hUM/ oM a mo g+ha ni tA re tA ra ya pad+me b+hu dzen+d+haM/ oM dA ru ta ru la pad+me a mo g+ha hUM/ oM ba Da ba mu khe ni krin ta ya duSh+TAn hUM/ oM pad+me nI la kar+t+ti shwa ra/ b+hu ru b+hu ru hUM/ oM sau mya
38a3(rgyud 'bum): / ba da ne pra si da shwA sa ma ya hUM/ oM pad+me shwa ri sA d+ha ya hUM/ oM a mo g+he shwa re hUM/ oM sa ma ri ta re ta re hUM/ oM nA ga pad+ma ni hUM/ oM yak+ShA d+hi pa ti mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM a mo g+he brah+ma ra te hUM/
38a4(rgyud 'bum): / oM shi ra bi ra de a mo g+ha b+hu dze hUM/ oM a mo g+ha biSh+Nu rA dza pad+ma nA b+he/ sa ra sa ra sa man+ta b+hu dze swA hA/ oM ru dra ru Ti mi li mi li swA hA/ oM shaM ka ti d+ha re a mo g+ha ba ti swA hA/ oM sa ha sra ki ra Ne hUM
38a5(rgyud 'bum): ru ti swA hA/ oM so ma pra b+he hUM/ de bzhin phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs pa yang // phyag rgya tha dad gsang sngags tha dad sgrub// gsang sngags 'chang gis ji skad gsungs pa'i las//
38a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu kun gyis mdor na thams cad bgyid// gtsang ma spyod ma gtsang ma dag/ legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// dri zhim dri yis dpung pa dang // lag pa yan lag byugs nas su//
38a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lan re bcings pa na// gsang sngags lan re bzlas par bgyi// phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa dang // gsang sngags bzlas pa'i mod la ni// brgya stong phrag ni 'bum phrag 'bum//
38b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dag ni bcings par 'gyur// phyag rgya bcings pa bgyis pa na bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis lung bstan
38b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / lha thams cad kyis legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla
38b3(rgyud 'bum): ma gcig pur 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba dang dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngag
38b4(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur ro/ / tshig btsan par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// blo gros thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
38b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dgra dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa
38b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad pham par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha b+ha dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang /
38b7(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chen po thams cad la bag tsha bo ma mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas
39a1(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du gtso bo gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du bla ma'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// tshe ring bar 'gyur
39a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// skyon gyi dri ma dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// legs par dran zhing lus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro//
39a3(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba'i dus kyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur te/
39a4(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu khyod 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig ces shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro// ngan song gi
39a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba na rtag tu skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// thams cad du pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur
39a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jig rten dbang phyug sprul pa yi// phyag rgya'i rtag ni rjod par bgyid// wu
39a7(rgyud 'bum): gang kho na'i tshad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor lham gyis bri bar bgyi// gang zhig mthong ba'i mod tsam gyis// dga' ba dang ni mgu bar 'gyur// sdig pa kun las grol ba dang // de nyid dag/
39b1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'grub 'gyur ro// rgyun du gang gi go cha yis// rtag tu go cha bgos par 'gyur// go cha'i go ni 'bar ba dang // mdzes pa rtag tu stsol bar 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo legs grub ste//
39b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags bla med thams cad 'grub// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris tsam gyis// gnod sbyin srin po 'byer bar 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis don kun kyang // 'jig par 'gyur te som
39b3(rgyud 'bum): nyi med/ / gnod pa kun las grol 'gyur te// nad kun las kyang de bzhin no// pha rol dpung ngam rang dpung ngam// mi thub pa yi dgra kun las// rtag tu legs par rgyal bar 'gyur//
39b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu gdon las srung ba dang // dus kun tu yang 'grub par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang yang bde bgyi'i phyir// de nyid dam pa 'grub 'gyur zhing // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
39b5(rgyud 'bum): gis/ / phyag rgya'i mtshan ma mtshon cha dag/ dgos pa kun gyi rjes mthun par// gang dang gang du bkod pa dag/ de dang der ni phyag rgyar 'gyur// pad+ma kha bye zhes bgyi ba// pad+ma 'dab
39b6(rgyud 'bum): mas mdzes pa dang / / kun nas 'khor bar 'bar ba'i 'phreng // rnam par rtog pa med par bgyi// phyag rgya 'di kun srog las byung // 'di nas thams cad 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje
39b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum rdo rje'i mda'/ / dkyil 'khor pad+ma rdo rje dang // pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rdo rje'i mtshan// pad+ma rab gnas pad+ma gnyis// rtag tu pad+ma legs par bgyid// pad+ma'i khu tshur de bzhin du/
40a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i mdzub mo pad+ma bgyis// pad+ma'i lcags kyu'i thal mo sbyar// pad+ma'i lcags sgrog pad+ma'i gzeb// rtag tu pad+ma sems pa dang // nor bu pad+ma rdo rjer gsungs/
40a2(rgyud 'bum): don yod pad+ma de bzhin du// pad+ma'i ral gri pad+ma'i dril// rtse gsum zhes bgyi gtun shing 'chang // nor bu dbyug pa me tog dbyug/ de bzhin zhags pa gtun shing dang // chu srin 'dzin dung
40a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo phyed/ / bi dza pU ra rtag tu se'u 'bru// zla 'dzin nyi ma 'dzin pa dang // tho ba 'dzin dang tshems shing dang // me tog phur ma bgrang 'phreng dang // rdo rje rtse lnga don yon zhags//
40a4(rgyud 'bum): don yon grub pa de dag ste// thams cad pad+ma'i steng du dgod// lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di bri ba// gang dang gang du dgod pa ni// lag pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham// 'di dag kyang ni bri
40a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi/ / kun nas kyang ni 'bar bar bgyi// nor bu'i rgyan gyis grub par bgyi// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i ras sam ni// ra ba'am rtsig par bgyis pa'am// ci yang rung ba de dag ste//
40a6(rgyud 'bum): de dag mthong ba tsam gyis sam// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// rtag tu sdig pa thams cad spong // mnar meng gnas su gtogs pa dang // mtshams med pa ni lnga nyid de// thams cad skad cig
40a7(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis 'byang / / sems can dag pa dran bgyid na// phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur// sems dpa' sa bcu rab tu gnas// 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas// gang lags dkyil 'khor mthong
40b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang mchog sbyin ni// rgyun du spyi bo lag na thogs// gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba// rgyun du mchog sbyin 'jig rten dbang // rtag tu mngon sum mthong ba yi// de
40b2(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshungs te khyad par 'phags/ / gsang sngags sum cu rtsa lnga'i tshig/ rtag tu dran bgyid thams cad 'grub// de ni dus rnams kun tu yang // ngan 'gror mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam grol
40b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rab myur bar/ / myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'od dpag med kyi sras po yi// thu bor gyur par som nyi med// 'jig rten mgon gyi thugs zhal nas// skyes sras rtag tu
40b4(rgyud 'bum): thu bor 'gyur/ / 'dren pas 'di ni chos nyid dang // chos las skyes par lung ston 'gyur// gang+gA'i klung sa ya bye ba brgya stong dang mnyam pa'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
40b5(rgyud 'bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi sug par phyag rgya dang
40b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di mchis par gyur na/ phyag rgya 'di las 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang zhing che ba mchis par bsgrags so// de la gsang sngags ni/ oM a mo g+ha maM dza li mi li mi li tsi li hUM/
40b7(rgyud 'bum): oM a shwA sa yak+Sha Na bi ga te hUM/ oM a b+ha ya ba ra de Di hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+hi ri d+hi ri hUM/ oM pad+ma hrid ya muSh+Tits+tsha/ oM b+hi sa ra b+hi sa ra sar+b+ba mA lAn ta rA dza ya hUM/
41a1(rgyud 'bum): baN+Di san+naT+Tarban+tu/ sa r+m+ma A sa g+hA A kaR+Sha mar+d+ha/ oM ka ba sas t+pan+na d+harur+N+Na/ oM u oM / ma ma man+d+ha/ oM a moHtsan+na trAr+sa u0f7fb+h+yad+d+ha/
41a2(rgyud 'bum): a mo grA ma Ni tsi li tsi lin+d+ra/ oM badz+ra tu Ta tsi lidz+dza/ oM a mo g+ha hr-i da ya tsa ra tsa ra shud+d+ha satwA n+tu/ oM gr-I Sha pra ti tsi Ti tsi Ti hU~M/ oM bing+ga khad ga tsin ta ya sha trun hU~M/ oM dz+r-i ma la ba ra~M shud+d+he b+hi TiSh+T+rI
41a3(rgyud 'bum): tsiTIhUM/ oM su ru su ru hUM/ oM ma Ni ma Ni hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti dza ye hUM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta pA sha d+hA ra d+ha ra hUM/ oM pad+ma pA sha bi shud d+he hUM/ oM badz+re pA she b+ha ba tu mu ru mu ru hUM/ oM tsan+ta ma Ni pA sha ba ra de
41a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ oM tsakra pA sha swa ni ra g+ha ta ka d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM/ oM tri shu lI pA sha bi lo ka tA ra ya hUM/ oM nA ga pA sha b+han d+hA ya kar+N+Na ya duSh+Ta nA ga na pA sha pA ta ya hUM/ oM dza lod b+ha ba d+ha rA ya hUM/ oM tsan+d+ra bi ma le/
41a5(rgyud 'bum): bai sho d+ha ya an d+ha kA ra rashrI ba re hUM/ oM shr-i bo d+ha ya hUM/ oM bi dza ya pUr+Na ba re hUM/ oM pha lod b+ha be tu ri hUM/ oM pUr+Na maN+Da le dza ya hUM/ oM sa ha sra rash+mi ki ra Na hUM/ oM sarba duSh+TA na pra ha
41a6(rgyud 'bum): ra shA sA ya hUM/ oM ma Na bi sho d+ha ya mA lA bi ma le hUM/ oM puSh+pa ba ti su g+ha d+ha ba re hUM/ oM pA sha sa ha sra gu Ni te k+Sha Nak+Sha Na hUM/ oM badz+rod k+She pa su tsi mu Sha tsi Ti tsi Ti hUM/ oM a mo g+ha a pra tiH
41a7(rgyud 'bum): ta pA sha ha ste trAM/ oM sarba tra a mo g+ha sid+h+ya sid+d+ha sA d+ha ya hUM/ lag pa'i phyag rgya 'di dag dang // de bzhin gsang sngags phyag rgya dag/ lan gcig bzlas pa tsam dang ni// phyag rgya mthong ba kho nas
41b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / sdig pa thams cad mod la 'joms// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo myur du 'grub// don yod zhags pa rnam grol ba'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa 'grub par
41b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de la mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ni nor bu rin po che dang / me tog dang / pad+ma dang / ril ba spyi blugs dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang / bgrang 'phreng dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / dbyug
41b3(rgyud 'bum): todang / / mdung thung dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / mtshon shag ti dang / rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / rtse gsum pa gnyis dang / nor bu dang / rdo rje dang /
41b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshon shu li dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / mtshon cha dang / be con dang / dbyug pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i rtse gsum dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa dang /
41b5(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu dang / sbrul dang / ljon shing dang / b+hu ru dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra sta yu ba sbom po can dang / lag pa dang / gtsug pud dang / nor bu sgron ma dang / 'od dang /
41b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dang / gtun shing dang / 'phyang mo nyug pa dang / dgra sta dang / snod zlum po dang / bum pa dang / brag dang / ri dang / lhun po dang / sbrul 'khyil ba dang / gdugs dang /
41b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan dang / chu srin dang / nya dang / rus sbal dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rtse gsum dang /
42a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dang / ral gri dang / gri dang / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang / rtse gsum dang / mu sun di dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / phyag rgya bzhi dang / mche ba
42a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang / zlum po dang / dung dang / 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / rtse gsum dang / dung dang / nor bu'i dung dang / pad+ma'i dung dang / urda dang / gos dang / seng ge'i gdong dang /
42a3(rgyud 'bum): shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing ka dang / ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang / gdong bzhi pa dang / dkyil 'khor bzhi dang / rtse
42a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang / bum pa gang ba dang / zla ba phyed dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / pad+ma bzhi dang / pad+ma gsum dang / rgya mtsho dang / me tog dang / phur ma dang /
42a5(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam dang / ri dgas kyi g.yang gzhi dang / rdo rje dang / lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rta babs dang / lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / 'khar gsil dang /
42a6(rgyud 'bum): so mangs dang / kha khyer dang / ska rags dang / gtsug pud dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / 'phreng ba chen po dang / gru gsum dang / kun nas rdo rje sde dang / phyag rgya mtshon cha 'di dag ni//
42a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'dren pas gsungs pa bzhin// rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di// don yod zhags pa'i cho gar dran// ras sam gos sam rtsig pa 'am/ ci yang rung bar 'dri bgyid pa//
42b1(rgyud 'bum): dogs med legs gsal legs 'byor pas// mtshon gsal kun tu pad+mar gzhag/ phyag rgya kun nas 'bar bar bgyi// thams cad srog las byung bas ni// don dang las rnams kun
42b2(rgyud 'bum): stsol cing / / phyag rgya mod la sdig pa 'phrog/ de ni mod la 'bras bu ster// 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug kun// phyag rgya 'di ni byin gyi brlabs// sangs rgyas kun dang shAkya yi//
42b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas brlabs// de lta bas na mkhas pas su// rtag tu kun nas mtshon bcangs na// sangs rgyas rnams ni dgyes 'gyur te// sras kyi thu bor som nyi med//
42b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rim phyed dam pa 'chang ba gang // 'jig rten mgon po'i sras kyi thu bor 'gyur// don yod zhags pa'i snying po gsang ba yi// rnam par grol ba'i snying po bla na med// phyag rgya dang
42b5(rgyud 'bum): ni gsang sngags dam pa dag/ 'di 'chang ba la myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de nas don yod pa las thams cad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i zhags pa bdun bshad par bgyi ste/ de nyid 'grub
42b6(rgyud 'bum): pas ji lta bu'i/ / cho ga'i cho ga sgrub pa bzhin// so so so sor 'tsham pa yi// de dag kun ni rtogs par bgyi// de nyid grub pa'i ji lta bu'i// mtshan nyid gzugs ni ji bzhin pa// de
42b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid bsgrub pas zhags pas ni/ / skud pa lnga las 'grub 'gyur te// gsang sngags 'dzin pas mod la ni// 'grub par 'gyur te som nyi med// ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang // arga kha che
43a1(rgyud 'bum): dar dag gis/ skud pa shun pa'i skud pa ste// skud pa 'di dag bkal nas de na nyid kyi cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo sgrub pas zhags pas ras skud kyi rgyu las langs te/ tshad
43a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bkal nas rtag tu smyung ba bgyis la legs par bkrus pa gos gtsang ma can tshangs par spyod pas zas dkar gsum 'tshal nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs su don yod pa'i zhags
43a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po mdor na byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas dran par bgyi'o/ / de nas shin tu mnyam par bzhags pas brgyad sgril du bkal te/ don yod rgyal po thal mo sbyar bas pad+ma kha phye
43a4(rgyud 'bum): ba thogs pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lus phyed pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// bgyis nas gzugs rnam pa gsum du bgyis
43a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ nges pa'i gzugs dang / khro gnyer gyi bzhin dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs te/ dngul lam gser las bgyi'o// de nas zhags pa srid kyi tshad khru bcu drug pa zhags pa'i thor
43a6(rgyud 'bum): to gcig rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang / skyu ru ra lhan cig sbrel ba gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshes bco lnga 'am/ tshes brgyad la legs par bkrus
43a7(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgos nas zhag gcig mchis te skyil mo krung bcas nas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis te/ tshig gzhan mi smra bar zhags pa la lan stong
43b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / stan bzang po bshams nas de'i steng du zhags pa gzhag par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dbang
43b2(rgyud 'bum): bskur bar bgyi'o/ / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / ba dan bzang po la sogs pas mchod par bgyi'o// a ka ru dang / tsan+da
43b3(rgyud 'bum): dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mar me'ang dbul bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te zhags pa'i
43b4(rgyud 'bum): steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la'ang ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa
43b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te/ ma 'khrus pas gdugs rtse ba'i bar du mchod pa bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod re re bgyis te zhags pa'i
43b6(rgyud 'bum): steng du gtor zhing / stong rtsa brgyad tshang gi bar du gdugs re re mchis par bgyi ste/ rngo ci thogs pas gdugs rtse'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchod par bgyi'o// kha zas ngan pa
43b7(rgyud 'bum): spang bar bgyi'o/ / lhag ma dang sbags pa spang bar bgyi'o// gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa 'bar bar 'gyur te/ gal te 'jig rten pa'i grub na ni me'i
44a1(rgyud 'bum): kha dog tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grub na ni kha dog sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i lus de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sgra/
44a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi zhags pa 'di grub kyis/ khyod kyis byang chub kyi sems bla na med
44a3(rgyud 'bum): pa khug cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i khongs su gtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shig/ 'on te 'jig rten pa'i sgrub na ni yid bzhin gyi nor bus bsams ji lta ba
44a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar yid la bsams shing smon pa bzhin lag pas 'phangs na gsang sngags kyis thams cad sgrub par bgyid de/ thams cad bkug par 'gyur
44a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / phyogs gang dang gang du 'phangs pa de logs su don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyis te/ mod la bsams pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te mtshams med pa lnga
44a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa 'am/ mnar med par mchi ba zhig na'ang de'i legs par 'grub par 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o// khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis gang du 'phangs na lha dang /
44a7(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams bkug nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du
44b1(rgyud 'bum): mchi bar 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bran bzhin du mchis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad mchis par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyis
44b2(rgyud 'bum): cher mchod par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi don du zhags pa 'phangs pa'i don du 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phang
44b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gdug pa'i sems can thams cad zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na lo 'am/ lo brgya
44b4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ stong ngam/ bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// nam byams pa dang snying rje bskyed nas de'i tshe don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan gsum bzlas nas
44b5(rgyud 'bum): phyir dkrol bar 'gyur ro/ / dpung gi nang du 'phangs na dpung rnams zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su 'phangs na mtshon dang / go mtshon dang / gzhu dang /
44b6(rgyud 'bum): mda' dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / mu sun di dang / 'khor lo dang / thag mdung dang / mtshon cha thams cad dang / go cha dang / ya lad thams cad zhags pas
44b7(rgyud 'bum): bcings par 'gyur ro/ / chab dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa la gdugs gcig bzhin ci 'byor pas mchod par bgyi'o// gang
45a1(rgyud 'bum): gi don du bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // 'on te mi snang ba sgrub par 'tshal na/ don yod
45a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas bcings te/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pas gong du ji skad gsungs pa bzhin zhags pa bzung nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
45a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ / brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod bgyis na nam mkha' la mchis par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro//
45a4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag 'bum gyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// lo bye ba bcur 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang brtson 'grus pha rol gyis
45a5(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis mi non par thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ / char pa 'tshal bas mchod pa bgyis na ji tsam gsol ba btab pa bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches pa dgag pa'i slad du mchod pa
45a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na char pa bkag par 'gyur ro/ / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad dang / mings thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'tshal bas/ rig sngags 'chang legs
45a7(rgyud 'bum): par khrus bgyis pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la/ lag pas zhags pa blangs te gnas mthon por 'dzegs nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang zhags pa bcings te/ don yod
45b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po phyogs bzhir lan bdun bzlas nas zhags pa 'phangs na de dag thams cad dran pa tsam gyis 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi
45b2(rgyud 'bum): dpung thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / mi ngas chen po dang / mu ge'i
45b3(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / ha cang char che ba dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / grang ba dang / rlung dang / tsha ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi
45b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad brgya stong khor yug tu mtshams chen po bcings pa bgyis par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar thams cad 'grub par 'gyur pas/
45b5(rgyud 'bum): don yod rgyal po mchod par bgyi zhing bzlas brjod bgyi/ gsol bar yang bgyi'o// mchod pa dang gsol ba bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/ de la yid
45b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ / cho ga zhib mo las ji skad gsungs pa bzhin las bgyid pa rnams kyi cho ga de bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas skad cig de'i mod la thams cad 'grub
45b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras
46a1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o/ / dkon mchog gsum la gus par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gus pa dang / bla mar yid la bsgom
46a2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / mi gtsang ba spyod pa gtsang bar bgyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ngang tshul can du bsgom par bgyi'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa de kho na nyid kyi cho ga sgrub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu
46a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub dgug par bgyi'o/ / de nas zhags pa'i 'khor lo'i cho ga sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang de kho na nyid sgrub pas phug tu 'jug pa'i sgrub pa thams cad kyi mchog phug
46a4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jug pa dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / dri za'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / lha'i gnas su 'jugs pa dang / nam mkha' la
46a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ba dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du 'jug pa dang / klu'i rgyal po'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / thang la rgyu ba dang / nyi ma'i gnas su
46a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / zla ba'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / skar ma'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / rgyu skar gyi gnas su 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / ri la rgyu ba dang / 'bab nu chen po
46a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa ste/ ji lta ji ltar yid la bsams pa de lta de ltar 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga sgrub pa tshegs chung ngu dang / brtsol ba chung ngus 'grub par 'gyur te/
46b1(rgyud 'bum): de la yid gnyis dang som nyi bskyed par mi bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas zas dkar gsum 'tshal la/ gtsang
46b2(rgyud 'bum): ma de kho na nyid la gus pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o/ / byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag nas snying rje'i bsam pa dag pa'i yid kyis tshes bcu gsum nas
46b3(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te/ zla ba nye ba'i bar du gsal ba shin tu bkra shis pa la dus gsum du ci 'byor pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis mchod par bgyis la/ rtag tu brgya rtsa brgyad pa yi// dus gsum
46b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyun du bzlas brjod bgyi/ / nyin par dus gsum lan gsum ste// mtshan mo'i dus su lan gsum bgyi// 'khor lo zhags pa bla med 'di// skud pa gsum las bsgrub bgyi ste/
46b5(rgyud 'bum): ras skud pad+ma'i skud pa dang // arga'i skud pa sum 'gyur du// de ni legs par tshad bzhin du// khru ni sum cu rtsa drug bgyi// 'khor lo rnam pa las ni bgyi// rgyar ni sor bzhi'i tshad lags
46b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ / snying por bcas shing mu khyud bcas// kun nas rtsibs dang ldan pa dang // gser dang dngul dang zangs las bgyi// chos bstan legs par brgyan pa yi// bzang po'i stan la gzhag
46b7(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ / spos kyi dkyil 'khor me tog gi/ sil ma bkram nas bum pa dgod// de bzhin mchod yon snod kyang bsham// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste chos kyi
47a1(rgyud 'bum): snyan bsham par bgyis pa'i steng du 'khor lo'i zhags pa bzhag ste mchod pa bgyis la/ bsams pa ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
47a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs la mchod par bgyi zhing
47a3(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa rnam pa gsum po a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / gu gul rnams dbul bar bgyi'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun na chos kyi stan mchis pa la mngon du phyogs te mchis nas don
47a4(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas zhags pa'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang nas zhags pa

47b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du bcing bar bgyi zhing / g.yas pa zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang 'khor lo'i tshul la brten nas blangs te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brjod nas phyogs
47b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o/ / de nas phyogs bcur khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bdag nyid kyi lus la dbang bskur ba'i tshul du lan bdun du bskur bar bgyi'o//

47b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum du mchis par gyur pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya lag pas blang bar bgyi'o/ / phug gi sgo gang lags pa der zhags pa lan gsum du bskor bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bgyis te
47b7(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa gdab par bgyi'o/ / zhags pa btab pa tsam gyi mod la gnas kyi phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur ro// 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / phug dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / brtsegs ma dang /

48a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / lcag sgrog rnams dum bu dum bur chad cing gyes par 'gyur/ nyams par 'gyur// 'jig par 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu rgya che ba'i gzhal
48a3(rgyud 'bum): med khang 'byor pa rnam par 'phrul pa dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkra ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gnas/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi ljon shing gis brgyan pa'i gzhal

48b4(rgyud 'bum): don yod rgyal po bzlas par bgyi ste/ de nas mig tshugs kyis lta bar bgyid na rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pas gzhu bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu bdud rtsi'i chab 'byung ste/ blang bar bgyi/

48b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhes la 'tsho ba dag ji ltar lag mthil na mchis pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / gang dag 'das pa dang / gang dag ma byon pa dang / gang dag da

49b5(rgyud 'bum): cad phyir byung nas mdun na sdod par 'gyur te/ kha gcig gi lag na ni bum pa gang ba'o// kha cig gi lag na gdugs so// kha cig gi lag na ni lha'i gos thogs so// kha cig ni lha re
49b6(rgyud 'bum): nor bu rin po che thogs so/ / kha cig ni dri dag go// kha cig ni me tog dag go// kha cig ni 'phreng ba dag go/ kha cig ni rgyan dang lhab lbub sna tshogs thogs so// kha cig ni byug pa dag go/

50a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog
