52b6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'phangs pa tsam gyis nags khung gi gnas kyi gzhal med khang gi klu thams cad bcings nas thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang la phyag
52b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyis nas/ rig sngags 'chang khyod gnas chen po mchog tu zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po bzlas te/ lag pa zhags
53a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgyas nags khung du 'jug par bgyi'o/ / zhugs pa tsam kho nas nags kyi gnas rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / dbus kyi nags kyi mtha' na rin po che sna
53a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi rdzing lha'i chab dngas shing rnyog pa ma mchis pa/ shin tu gsal ba/ lha'i tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa/ ha cang mi grang ba/ ha cang mi dro ba/ reg na bde ba/ ro dang ldan pa/ bdud rtsi'i bcud
53a3(rgyud 'bum): can mchis te/ 'di ltar don yod pa'i rgyal po snying po yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rdzing gi dbus su zhags pa 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bud med
53a4(rgyud 'bum): rin po che'i gzugs 'dra ba'i lha'i bu mo'i lus phyed byung nas/ lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan cing / rin po che sna bdun gyi bum pa gang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la
53a5(rgyud 'bum): dbul zhing spyi bo smad de 'dzem pa dang bcas pas rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rje btsun rig sngags 'chang khyod ma bzhengs par gnas su zhugs shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i tshig
53a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten pha rol gyi don dang / rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub grub ste/ bdag nyid kyi ma dang / sring mo dang / mngag gzhum zhes gar
53a7(rgyud 'bum): bde bar brjod la/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bgyi ste/ sring mo kho bo la 'jig rten pha rol gyi don byin cig ces 'jug par bgyi'o// de yang rig sngags 'chang khyod rang gi gnas
53b1(rgyud 'bum): su snoms te zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa zhags pa'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bgyi zhing / don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas so// de nas gnas
53b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po mchog rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang lha'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / gser dang / gos sbyangs pa/ dar gyi chun 'phyang rab tu sbyangs pa gda' ba nas bu mo de yang nor bu
53b3(rgyud 'bum): rin po che chen po thogs te/ rig sngags 'chang 'jig rten pha rol gyi don du rin po che chen po bzhes shig ces dbul bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis stan bshams pa'i steng
53b4(rgyud 'bum): du zhags pa legs par yongs su skyil te/ stan du bting la nor bu rin po che chen po de zhags pa'i steng du bzhag cing me tog dang bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas par bgyi'o//
53b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la zhags pa nor bu rin po che dang bcas te 'bar bar 'gyur ro// nor bu rin po che chen po de las yang 'o ma'i chab 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i chab
53b6(rgyud 'bum): de las blangs la sbyor chu lan bdun du reg par bgyi'o/ / 'o ma'i chab kyis reg pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma dang bral zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// don yod snang ba nor bu
53b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhal med kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'od zer zhes bgyi ba thob nas sa bcu la gnas te phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa
54a1(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin sgyu ma lta bus rnam par 'phrul pa thob par 'gyur zhing / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis don yod
54a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhags pa'i cha lugs 'chang ba rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag ste/ nga'i rig sngags 'chang gi bu thu bo khyod kyis grol ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor
54a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su dag pa 'thob bo zhes dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong nas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin
54a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// khyod ni byang chub lam du zhugs// khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'thob ste// grol ba'i lam zhes bya ba bsgrubs// 'on te rig
54a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang nyid don du gnyer na/ de'i tshe gser gyi me tog stsol bar 'gyur te/ blangs la bu mo de nyid kyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ oM zhes bgyi bas mnan par bgyi'o// oM zhes bgyi ba'i sgra
54a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod nas spyi bor bzhag pa tsam gyi mod la bu mo de'i mig mchog gnyis nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis blangs te nye reg bgyi'o// nye reg bgyis pa tsam gyi
54a7(rgyud 'bum): mod la rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / sba bcung zad 'khyil cing lag pa na 'khor lo'i zhags pa thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bye ba
54b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag bco brgyad kyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe lo drug khri nyis stong du 'gyur zhing skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// 'on te gsang sngags 'chad 'jig rten pa'i dngos gru
54b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga slong na/ de'i tshe 'di lta bur 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi sgra 'di sdoms shig ces de'i tshe bud med des rang gi skra'i ral pa bton nas rig sngags 'chang la 'bul ba na/
54b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra thams cad blangs te dum bu gsum du bkum nas srad bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyi ste// mgo la btags pas ni/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa de bzhin du mig 'phrul
54b4(rgyud 'bum): ston par 'gyur ro/ / 'bras bu dang me tog 'tshal ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// bden pa ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin ston par 'gyur ro// mgul du btags pas ni mi gda' bar 'gyur nas//
54b5(rgyud 'bum): gnod sprin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// dpral ba la btags pas
54b6(rgyud 'bum): ni lha dang klu thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / dpung pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur te/ phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi 'dza' ba dang /
54b7(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs pas stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
55a1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing bdag gi nor du 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi
55a2(rgyud 'bum): sgo nas rgyal po'i sgo la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
55a3(rgyud 'bum): khye'u dang / bu mo dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa bya dang / gcan gzan dang / ri dgas dang / gdug pa dang /
55a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags rnams dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// brla g.yas pa la btags pas ni 'tshal lam/ ser ga 'am/ ri 'or ram/ phug
55a5(rgyud 'bum): gam/ dgon pa 'am/ bsti gnas gang du zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la nor thams cad dang / sman thams cad dang / lha thams cad rang gi gzugs su mngon nas mchis par 'gyur
55a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / byin pa g.yas pa dang rkang pa g.yas pa la btags pas ni rgya mtsho chen po'i pha mthar yang rgal bar 'gyur na/ chu klung chen po'i chab kyis byin pa nub tsam du 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal//
55a7(rgyud 'bum): byin pa g.yon pa la btags pas ni nyi ma re re zhing dpag tshad brgyar phyin nas dub pa ma mchis par slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// brla g.yon pa la btags nas dur khrod chen por zhugs na dur khrod
55b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad na gnas pa'i gcer bu pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gnas de nyid na spyod na rig sngags 'chang des lag pa g.yon pas bum pa
55b2(rgyud 'bum): gang ba bzung zhing / lag pa g.yas pas bud med de bzung nas gnas chen po'i mchog tu 'jug par bgyi'o// gnas mchog de'i dbus na rdzing me tog gis chal par bkram pa bgyi ste/
55b3(rgyud 'bum): rdzing der gnyis ka khrus bgyi zhing chab kyis nye reg bgyi'o// bkrus shing reg pa tsam kho nas 'khor lo rig sngags 'chang zhags pa dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro//
55b4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang 'bum phrag bdun stong gis yongs su bskor cing tshe bskal pa khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// nags kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang bdun cu rtsa
55b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi dpon po rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / gal te ma zhes bgyi bas don du gnyer ba ni bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / chas dang /
55b6(rgyud 'bum): nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su grub par bgyid do// sring mo zhes bgyi bas ni dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshang bar stobs par 'gyur zhing yan
55b7(rgyud 'bum): lag spong bar bgyid do/ / nyi ma re re zhing rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa'i lha'i bu mo khrid de mchi bar 'gyur/ lha'i gzhal med khang 'byor pa stobs par bgyid/ lha'i khyim dang gzhal med khang
56a1(rgyud 'bum): stobs par bgyid do/ / mngag gzhug ma zhes bgyi bas ni gang dang gang du mngags pa de dang der mchi bar 'gyur te/ lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin
56a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi gnas sam/ srin po'i gnas sam/ 'byung po'i gnas sam/ gzhan yang mngag gzhug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs yid la bsams pa bzhin du bgyid do// nags sgrub pa'i
56a3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'o/ / / de nas rig sngags 'chang thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na gtsang ma khrus bgyis pas gos btsang ma bgo bar bgyi/ gnas dben pa gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor
56a4(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhir bgyis la dri sna tshogs kyis byug/ ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ a ka ru'i bdug pas bsregs te/ nub gsum du mchis nas 'khor lo zhags pa'i
56a5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i phyag rgyas don yod rgyal po'i snying po'i bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas du ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ khro bo'i rgyal po
56a6(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bzla bar bgyi'o/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas skyes pa nag po chen po'i tshul mi sdug pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du 'greng ba/ mgo 'bar ba/ mig dmar ba
56a7(rgyud 'bum): mchu dang lce dmar ba/ sen mo dmar ba/ skra sngo ba/ dpung pa mkhrang zhing brtan pa/ gsus pa 'phyangs po/ mchod phyir thogs pa dang ldan pa/ mgo lnga pa/ sbrul ltar lce bsgyur ba/ stag
56b1(rgyud 'bum): gi sham thabs bgos pa/ lag pa na dgra sta dang dril bu thogs pa zhig lus phyed tsam byung nas phyogs bcur lta bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis skrag par mi bgyi ste brtan
56b2(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi la/ khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas nas 'khor lo'i zhags pa 'phangs te mgo gcad la khrag mang du byung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis khrag des lus thams cad byug par bgyi'o// /
56b3(rgyud 'bum): byug pa tsam gyi mod la bdag nyid kyi lus mi chod pa dang mi shigs pas rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// mig gnyis phyung la rang gi mig phyis nas mig la bskus na lha'i mig tu
56b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rkang brus te byug nas tshe bskal pa stong phrag bcur 'gyur zhing thos pa gsal ba'i rgya mtshor 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i skye ba dang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro//
56b5(rgyud 'bum): snying phyung ste 'tshal na nam mkha' la mchi'o// khrag gis snying khar thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lce gcad na ral grir gyur nas dgra thams cad rlag par bgyid do// gal
56b6(rgyud 'bum): te thang la rgyu bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad zhags pa dang 'khor lo la bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'khor lo zhags pa gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshul gyis thal mo sa la
56b7(rgyud 'bum): brdab par bgyi ste/ lan gsum du thal mo brda bra ba dang / de'i 'og tu thang gi sgo dbye bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug par bgyi ste/ zhugs nas slar yang mchi zhing dgos pa
57a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan thams cad bgyid pa dang / thang thams cad la gnas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro// 'on te nam mkha' la mchi 'tshal na gyen du bltas nas
57a2(rgyud 'bum): don yod rgyal po'i snying po yungs mar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag nyid la byugs te/ lag pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur zhing nam mkha'
57a3(rgyud 'bum): go 'byed par 'gyur ro/ / lha'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal na lha'i khyim du mchis nas zhags pas lha'i mgu la nas bcing bar bgyi zhing / don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ lha bcis
57a4(rgyud 'bum): pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod na/ lha de babs nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rig sngags 'chang la/ rig sngags
57a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ci zhig don du gnyer ba de snoms shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gis lha'i gnas su 'gro'o zhes brjod par bgyi'o// gal te gzhan bsams pa zhig mchis na mchog thams cad stsol
57a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyid do/ / de nas lha'i gnas nas mchi ba na lha'i gnas lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lag pa na thogs te nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// ji srid 'tshal bar lha'i gzhal med khang chen po longs spyod par
57a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / 'on te mi 'tshal na lha'i gnas nas slar yang 'bebs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji ltar rang gi blo gros dang yid la bsams pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad grub
57b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ de la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o// 'khor lo'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas rig sngags 'chang pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal bas/
57b2(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang de gtsang ma legs par bkrus te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// nub gsum mchis sam/ nub lnga mchis sam/ nub gcig mchis nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhags pa'i skud pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/
57b3(rgyud 'bum): ras kyi skud pa'am pad+ma'i skud pa bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog lta bur mtshon gyis kha bsgyur bar bgyi zhing / khru nyi shu rtsa gcig par bkal te/ de la'ang pad+ma bgyi ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'dab ma kha phye ba sor bzhi
57b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshad kyis pad+ma gser gyi 'dab ma dang / dngul gyi 'dab ma dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / rin po che rka ti ka las bgyi zhing mu tig gis bskor ba bgyi ste/ de nas zhags pa la gdags
57b5(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / zhags pa'i thor to gcig la ni pad+ma'i phyag rgya gdags par bgyi'o// de nas legs par brgyan pa'i chos kyi stan bzang po bsham par bgyi'o// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la/
57b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri'i pad+ma bsam par bgyi zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi steng du chos kyi gdan bshams la bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog gi sil ma bkram zhing a ka ru dang /
57b7(rgyud 'bum): btsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil gyi snod kyang gzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma'i zhags pa de'ang chos kyi snyan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi'o// 'phags
58a1(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du rig sngags 'chang gis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan khri bzlas te/ bzlas pa'i yungs
58a2(rgyud 'bum): kar re re nas de'i steng du gtor bar bgyi'o/ / lan khri rdzogs nas de nas tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya'i nub mo mchis nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// zhags pa de'ang
58a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bgyi'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// de nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ nyin mtshan
58a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum dus gsum du bzlas brjod dang mchod pa bgyi'o/ / de nas pad+ma'i zhags pa 'bar zhing kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// legs so legs so zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'byin par
58a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus la kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang phyag rgya'i skyil mo krung gis mchis nas mig mi
58a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum zhing bzhin 'dzum pas snying rje chen po yid la bsgom par bgyi'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du bltas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan sum stong bzlas par
58a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi lha'i rang bzhin mdun du mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes
58b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing / 'di skad ces kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyid do// rig sngags 'chang ba'i bu snying nas skyes pa'i thu bo bzlas brjod kyi cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i cho ga chen po 'dis nga la
58b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i mchog byas pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi mchog dang grub pa'i mchog ste/ khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis pad+ma'i zhags pa chen po grub kyis/ ji ltar yid la bsams pa
58b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du mchog khyer cig/ khyod kyi yid kyi brnag pa thams cad ni yongs su rdzogs par byas/ khyod 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rgyu ba las ni grol/ khyod skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i mya ngan
58b4(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad pa'i 'jigs pa las thar na/ khyod dmyal ba chen po mi bzad pa bcu drug las ni yongs su grol/ 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba brgyad las ni yongs su thar/ 'di nas
58b5(rgyud 'bum): phyi ma'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa las shi 'phos te/ rig sngags 'chang khyod byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar
58b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / khyod kyis gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag stong brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba cher bskyed pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ni ldan//
58b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis lhag par bya ba mang po ni byas/ khyod rig sngags 'chang chen por ni lung bstan/ dmyal ba dang sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa thams cad las ni grol gyis/ ji ltar
59a1(rgyud 'bum): yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog khyer cig/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin de'i tshe mchog thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
59a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis pad+ma'i zhags pa de blangs te/ gnas gtsang mar gus pas mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// nam dgos pa de'i tshe zhags pa blang bar bgyi ste/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro//
59a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa g.yon par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pas zhags pa bzung ste/ don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ sems can
59a4(rgyud 'bum): nam lha gang gi ming nas brjod de bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdun du mchis nas 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang byang chub tu
59a5(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan pa don du gnyer bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas legs par khrus bgyis te/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
59a6(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis nas/ pad+ma'i zhags pa de'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// zhags pa'i thor to ya gcig gis ni rang gi mgul du btags la/
59a7(rgyud 'bum): don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku gser gyi mdog can rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs
59b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor phyag bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ lung ston par mdzad/ yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang sdig
59b2(rgyud 'bum): pa tshe rabs brgya stong du bsags pa thams cad gtugs par 'gyur/ lhag ma ma lus par gtugs par gyur nas/ lus yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing phrag dog dang ser smra
59b3(rgyud 'bum): spangs par 'gyur ro/ / 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba'i mngal du gnas nas/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar bgyis nas sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig pur 'gyur ro// mchod par 'os
59b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bla ma'i gnas su'ang 'gyur ro/ / nad rnams dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'gums pa'i dus su phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
59b5(rgyud 'bum): dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / dbugs 'byin par mdzad/ legs pa'i lam ston par mdzad par yang 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun na mchis nas dbugs 'byin par bgyid
59b6(rgyud 'bum): cing lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par bgyid do/ / de bde bas shin tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas lus 'dor bar 'gyur ro// bor ba tsam gyi mod la skal ba mnyam pa bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams
59b7(rgyud 'bum): su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad kyis spras pa'i lus pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong gi skye ba'i tshe rab
60a1(rgyud 'bum): dran par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par g.yar thon du bgyis
60a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ sa bcu la gnas shing phyin ci log tu ma gyur pas phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen pos lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / gzhal med
60a3(rgyud 'bum): khang dang / gnas mchog dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mchi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bde ba
60a4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba'i chos kho na la lta bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi gnas gtsang ma'i phyogs sam/ gnas sam/ khang pa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ 'khor gyi
60a5(rgyud 'bum): khyams sam/ 'chag sa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs ma 'am/ spyil po gtsang ma phyi bdar legs par bgyis pa'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor gru bzhi dbyes pa khru gang ba tsam/ khru do pa'i dkyil 'khor
60a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ grwa kun nas cha 'byes pa/ sa dang sbyar ba'i lci bas shin tu legs par phyi bdar bgyis la rtswa sngon po mnyen po lta bu la mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mtha' dag gi cha dbye ba'i thig
60a7(rgyud 'bum): gdab par bgyi'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po la pad+ma rgya chen pos dbyes pa/ 'dab ma brgya pa tshon sna brgyad kyi tshon rtsis bkra bar bgyi zhing 'byes par bgyis la/ snying po ni rin po che rka ti ka
60b1(rgyud 'bum): las bgyi'o/ / pad+ma'i mtha' nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis bskor la/ grwa bzhi nas kha khyer sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyi'o// pad+ma'i bar gyi phur byur du ut+pa la sngon po legs par brisA la/ kha khyer
60b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyi rol nor bus 'khor ba'i mtha' de mchos bskor bar bgyi'o/ / lha'i chab rin po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes par bgyis la/ chab la me tog sna tshogs kyi sil ma bkod
60b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bya sna tshogs gnas 'cha' ba/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / khrung khrung dang / dur pa dang / shang shang te'u dang / ka la bing+ga dang / bya'i tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyis la/ nya dang / chu srin
60b4(rgyud 'bum): dang chu srin byis pa gsod kun nas rten 'cha' bar bgyid do/ / mtsho'i 'gram na rin po che'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing sna tshogs kha khyer dang bcas par bgyi'o//
60b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi kha khyer gyi phyi rol na lag pa dang thal mo'i phyag rgya bris la sgo bzhi rnams su rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi'o// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la pad+ma'i gdan bzang po bshams te/ de'i steng du
60b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob gzhag par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor bum pa gang bas brgyan par bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang /
60b7(rgyud 'bum): dri dang / byug pa'ang dbul bar bgyi'o// ba dan bzang po sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// gtor ma dkar po dbul bar bgyi'o// yon chab dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dbul
61a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / pad+ma'i zhags pa 'od dpag med kyi phyag tu dbul bar bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos btsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// legs par khrus bgyis nas pa'i
61a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam lngas nye reg bgyis la/ zla ba nya la nyin zhag gcig mchis par gyur pas kha shar phyogs su bltas la skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lag pas zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
61a3(rgyud 'bum): byams pa dang brtse ba'i sems kyis lhag par brtson par bgyi'o// snying rje mchog tu brtse bar gyur pas sems can thams cad la brtse bar bgyis na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bgyi ste/
61a4(rgyud 'bum): ji tsam na thun tha ma la 'od dpag med 'bar bar gyur nas dkyil 'khor chen po de la'ang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang g.yo bar gyur nas lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
61a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis skya rengs shar tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags pa 'od dpag med gser spangs pa lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha
61a6(rgyud 'bum): dog gis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du bzhugs nas/ phyag g.yas pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor bzhag ste dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing / yid kyi brnag pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
61a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad nas mi gda' bar gyur pa dang / shin tu rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnyid thob nas/ ji ltar nyal ba tsam mam mig btsum pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
61b1(rgyud 'bum): can gzhal med khang dang / gnas dang / 'jig rten dang / yul ljongs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor mtha' dag dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par mthong bar 'gyur
61b2(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston par mdzad pa'ang mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag thams cad dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa dang / gzhal med
61b3(rgyud 'bum): khang dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul thams cad mthong bar 'gyur lags so// 'di nas ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba nas shi 'phos te 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skal
61b4(rgyud 'bum): ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ skye ba bdun stong rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// de sad nas zhags pa la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas lag pa g.yas
61b5(rgyud 'bum): pas bzung na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ / lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhags pa grub pa rnams dang rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor khri brgyad
61b6(rgyud 'bum): stong dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / pad+ma'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang rdo rje'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ shing shun dang / ras skud dang / kha chedar
61b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi skud pa mnyam du lhan cig bkal te/ khru nyi shu rtsa gcig gi tshad tsam du bgyis la/ tsan dan dkar po las rdo rje sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bgyis te/ rtse lnga pa 'byung po la sogs pa'i mgo dang sbrul gyi skra
62a1(rgyud 'bum): rags bcings la/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i dra ba'i 'phreng bas dkri ba bgyis nas zhags pa la gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas
62a2(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ / legs par khrus bgyi'o// ba'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// rtswa'i stan bting nas ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lag pa g.yas pa zhags pas mnan nas don yod pa'i
62a3(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa'i snying po khri bzlas so/ / khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po stong bzlas so// de nas zhags pa de 'bar bar 'gyur te/ de bzung nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin
62a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs gang dag lags pa de dag thams cad mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar gzugs dang / mthu dang / brtson
62a5(rgyud 'bum): 'grus pha rol gyi zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur ro// lha'i lo khri nyis stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid pa rdo rje'i zhags
62a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dgra thams cad 'joms par bgyid pa'i zhags pa steng ngam/ 'og gar 'phangs par yid la bsams pa bzhin thams cad bcings nas dgug par bgyid do// phyogs bcur 'phangs te khro bo'i rgyal
62a7(rgyud 'bum): bopo bzlas nas skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ gzhan gang ci'ang rung ba thams cad zhags pas bcings nas myur du 'gugs par bgyi ste som nyi mi bgyi'o// gal te lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/
62b1(rgyud 'bum): srin po 'am/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po thams cad zhags pas bcing nas myur du 'gugs par bgyid de som nyi mi bgyi'o// zhags
62b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan mo nam phyed na zhags pa phyogs bzhir 'phang bar bgyi'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang /
62b3(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdug pa thams cad zhags pas bcings nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis mdun na mchis shing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dbang du gyur nas mchis te
62b4(rgyud 'bum): bran bzhin las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ bltas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag
62b5(rgyud 'bum): pas zhags pa blangs te dur khrod du zhugs na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur ro/ / phug gi sgor mchis nas rdo rje zhags pas brdabs na phug thams cad kyi sgo 'byed par
62b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / 'khrul 'khor dang gtan pa thams cad dum bur chag par 'gyur ro// lam ngan pa dang / mi ngan pa dang / mi ma yin pa dang / 'bab chu ngan pa dang / sbrul dang / dbugs gdug
62b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / srog chags go na sa dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags su gtogs pa thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// mi drang po dang lam drang por ji ltar rang gi gnas sam/
63a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsug lag khang ngam/ khang pa bzhin du zhugs nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrubs te/ slar yang gnas nas phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// rdo rje zhags pa las thams/
63a2(rgyud 'bum): cad bgyid pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas rig sngags 'chang nor bu'i zhags pa sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nor bu stsal bar bgyi ste/ rdo rje 'am/ bai DUR+Ya 'am/
63a3(rgyud 'bum): shel rang byung ngam/ mar gad dam/ in+d+ra nI la sor mo'i tshigs pa bas lhag tsam shin tu phyis paM/ shin tu yongs su dag par bgyis pa/ gser gyi me tog gi tshul du bgyis pa/ mu tig gis
63a4(rgyud 'bum): dkris pa/ ge sar kha bye ba/ tsam pa ka'i me tog ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyis la/ ras bzang po'i skud pa tshon rtsis dbyes pas kha sbyar ba/ shin tu tshad la bab par bkal ba/ khru nyi shu rtsa
63a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa/ sor mo gung mo'i tshad tsam gyi nor bus brgyan la/ thor to cig shos su ni nor bu'am gser las bgyis pa'i lcags kyu gdags par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsangs
63a6(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ / legs par bkrus nas pa'i rnam lngas nye reg bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du spos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan pa bgyis la/
63a7(rgyud 'bum): grwa bzhir bum pa gang ba bzhag cing po gapor gyi snod pashams nas a ke ru'i bdug pa dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su chos kyi stan babang po
63b1(rgyud 'bum): tshad dang ldan pa bshams la/ ba dan sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bskor bar bgyi'o// me tog sil ma dang / dri dang / rol mo'i cha byad dag dgod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gis zas
63b2(rgyud 'bum): dkar gsum 'tshal bar bgyi'o/ / btung ba ngan pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / gnas ngan pa dang / lhag ma dang spags pa rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po nyi khri
63b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig stong bzlas nas lag pa g.yas pas chos kyi stan gyi steng du bzhag pa'i zhags pa la mnan no/ / lan nyi khri tshig stong tshang ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa
63b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad tshang bar bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad chang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs
63b5(rgyud 'bum): la mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la'ang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bco lnga'i nyal
63b6(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas mchod pa rgya cher bgyis ste/ mchod pa'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad la re re nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas
63b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis nas dbul bar bgyi'o/ / de nas skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas nyin mtshan kun tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar re re nas brdeg par
64a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs
64a2(rgyud 'bum): dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nor bu'i zhags pa de'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo'ang 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba tsam gyi mod la rig sngags 'chang gis lag pa g.yas pas
64a3(rgyud 'bum): nor bu'i zhags pa blangs pa na sgra chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang gi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// /
64a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs 'od kyi rgyal po'i sku gser gyi kha dog gis nam mkha' la
64a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur/ phyag dpung pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba brkyang ba'i phyag gis rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bor bzhag nas
64a6(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par mdzad de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par dag pa grub po// khyod kyis
64a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa grub ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod dgur sgyur ba thams cad de/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don
64b1(rgyud 'bum): yod grub pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i/ gas pa thogs nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'bad mi dgos par yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i grub pa'i rang bzhin 'dis 'jig
64b2(rgyud 'bum): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa la ltos shig/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs la ltos shig/ rig
64b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du song zhig/ 'on te bde ba can lta bar 'tshal lam/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i lha rdzas kyis mchod par 'tshal
64b4(rgyud 'bum): lam/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod par 'tshal lam/ lha'i me tog dang / lha'i dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang /
64b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / gos kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spyi bo'i gtsug tu dri'i
64b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bgyi la me tog dang bdugs pa'ang dbul bar bya/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod zhags pa'i mchog 'di lag pa g.yon pas mnan la/ lag pa g.yas pas don yod yid
64b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu'i mchog bzung nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ 'di lta bu'i yid la bgyis pa chen po ji lta bu'i bsam pa yid la bgyid pa de lta bu'ang bsams nas don yod rgyal
65a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas te phyag bgyi'o/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod pa 'di bzlas nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po 'di lan
65a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i snying gis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyis nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bkyis
65a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po lnga pa/ / // dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
65a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba thams
65a5(rgyud 'bum): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / yang dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas kyi mchog dga' ldan na
65a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa tshogs dang bcas pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bde ba can gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa 'od dpag tu med
65a7(rgyud 'bum): pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
65b1(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bu gzugs sna tshogs mnga' ba spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA yA/ oM ma hA pad+ma
65b2(rgyud 'bum): tsan+d+ra ma Ni ma Ni/ a mo g+ha ma Ni su ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta a laM kA ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha ma Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra sany+tsa ra/ ni sha tsa tsa re shwa ra ma hA/ pad+ma b+hu dza ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi shwa rU pa
65b3(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra/ pra ba ra ma hA bo d+hi satwa pad+ma d+har pad+ma A san pad+ma ma ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ pad+ma gau ra/ pad+ma a laM kri ta ta nu sa ha sra b+hu dza sa ha sra ne tra/ nA nAd b+hu ta/ pra ba ra Na/ mu dra bi b+hu Shi tA si ha sra b+hu dza/ dza ya dza ya/
65b4(rgyud 'bum): sha ta sa ha sra rash+mi pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bi tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Na d+ha ra/ ma Ni ka na ka/ badz+ra bai rUr+Ya/ ma ra ka ta/ in dra nI la pad+ma ra ga b+hu Shi ta sha rI ra/ tsi re tsi ri/ bi tsi tra/ tsa raNA/
65b5(rgyud 'bum): ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da brah+ma/ biSh+Nu ma he shwa ra/ rU pA d+ha ra/ pad+me shwa ra lo ke shwa ra/ a nat+te shwa ra/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra r-i Shi ga Na ku mA ra/ se nA pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
65b6(rgyud 'bum): ma hAd b+hU ta be Sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hik+Sh+mI sa mA ya ma nu s+pha ra b+ha ga ban+da/ b+hA ra ya me A tA shAt+ta ra ya pA rad/ shA ya yA satwAM/ ta rA da ya dun+d+ha nA pA ta ya bis+thAn/ mA ra ya tri do shra mA la~M/ sa
65b7(rgyud 'bum): sa ra/ pA baM/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ si d+h+ya si d+h+ya/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni/ a mo g+ha pA sha d+ha ra/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi pu laM sid d+hi/ ma mai tri b+hu ba na de b+hA pra yats+tsha ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ bud+d+ha bun+ya
66a1(rgyud 'bum): bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+hA ya/ ma d+hU pa shu pa ti pA shA d+ha ra/ a nan+ti ba kur bAn/ rid+d+hi san+na rA ya/ tu mu hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ ga ga ne bi pu la bi mAn/ san d+ha rIShiH
66a2(rgyud 'bum): namo stu te bi bu la pu N+ya ko Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM hUM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ tri b+hA ba na de byA/ pi pu la kIrti ka re swA hA/ b+hu ba swA hA/ b+hur b+hu ba swAhA/ a mo g+ha pi pu le swAhA/ ma hA tsin tA
66a3(rgyud 'bum): ma Ni sid d+he swA hA/ ma hA tsin tA ma Ni sid d+he ba ra de swA hA/ sarba sid d+hi ba ra de swA hA/ oM bi pu le shwa ra/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma hA tsin+tA ma Ni/ ma hA a mo g+ha sid d+he hUM phaT swA hA/ don yod nor bu'i
66a4(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa chen po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang gi lus thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa lag pas mnan na nam mkha'i ngos la rdzu 'phrul
66a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs/
66a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'od dpag med kyang tshogs dang btsas/ 'khor dang bcas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang gzhal med khang mchog dang bcas rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur
66a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / bde ba can gyi gnas mtha' dag tu mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi mthus mchod pa'i sprin chen por gnas par 'gyur ro//
66b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can na gnas pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med des rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang des kyang sgra de dag thams
66b2(rgyud 'bum): cad thos par 'gyur zhing mchod pa'i char chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'bebs par 'tshal na/ de'i tshe bsams pa tsam gyis 'bebs par 'gyur
66b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / 'on te mi 'tshal na nam mkha' de nyid na nam mkha' la grub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog don yod rgya chen grub pa yid bzhin nor bu lag pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur
66b4(rgyud 'bum): ba mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// tshe bskal pa chen po brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur
66b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / 'on te babs na lo khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug dang 'dra bar mchod pa dang gus pa cher bgyid par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor gcig pur 'gyur ro// /
66b6(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kyang babs nas rig sngags 'chang de la mchod pa'i mchog rgya chen po dag bgyid par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// mchod
66b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro/ / lnga thams cad kyis kyang kun tu srung zhing phyag bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang phyogs
67a1(rgyud 'bum): bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa/ rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan
67a2(rgyud 'bum): thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po sangs rgyas kyi
67a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa la mngon par dad pa dang bcas pa la mchod pa bgyid par 'tshal ba'am/ phyogs bcu dus gsum du gtogs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsod nams
67a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'tshal ba'am/ lha'i zas kyi mchog ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / lha'i bcud
67a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis len gyi mchog gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la bstabs par 'tshal ba 'am
67a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa mang po dang chen po gtong bar 'tshal ba'am/ nyin re zhing mchod pa'i sprin bgyid par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des legs par bkrus te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas
67a7(rgyud 'bum): ci 'byor pas dkyil 'khor grub bgyi ba bzhi pa bgyis la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dang bdug pa'ang dbul bar bgyi'o/ / pus mo
67b1(rgyud 'bum): btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas zhags pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bgyi'o// yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po rgya chen don yod 'di'ang mchod par bkru'o// 'phags/
67b2(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po lan bdun bzlas par bgyi'o// yid la bgyid pa yangs pa rgya chen po mchod pa'i sprin chen po dang / sbyin gtong chen po dang / kha zas dang / btung /
67b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / brgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan 'phya
67b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob dang / rin po che'i ljon shing dang / 'bras bu'i ljon shing dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / mar me'i ljon shing dang / dpag bsam
67b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi ljon shing yid la bgyi ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzungs bzlas nas ji ltar yid la bsams shing don du gnyer ba bzhin phyogs bcur 'phangs na/ de'i tshe phyogs bcur dus gsum du gshegs
67b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu gtogs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba ma mchis par/ ci bsams pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil
67b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i char gyi sprin chen po 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du mkho ba'i yo bad thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po mtshang ba ma mchis pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin mthu chen po 'tsha
68a1(rgyud 'bum): bu rgya chen don yod la mchod pa'i gzungs bzlas shing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di'ang nyin gcig bzhin du thun gsum du la na gsum
68a2(rgyud 'bum): du bzla bar bgyi'o/ / des na rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag mnyes par bgyis pa dang / mchod pa bgyis pa dang / rim gro bgyis par
68a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshogs chen po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis
68a4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang la dran pa dang / blo gros dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid stsol bar mdzad do// nyin gcig bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu de
68a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la
68a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung ba dang / skrag pa dang / sdang ba rnams rnam par zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyi kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro// rims kyis ma lags/ dug gis ma lags/
68a7(rgyud 'bum): dug sbyar mas ma lags/ sbyor bas ma lags/ mtshon gyis ma lags/ mes ma lags/ chus ma lags te/ lus la gser ba 'bab par mi 'gyur ro// dgras 'jigs par mi 'gyur te/ pha rol gyi
68b1(rgyud 'bum): dpung gi 'jigs pas ma lags/ pha rol gyi sde'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ phas kyi rgol ba dang mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ lha'i 'jigs pas ma lags/ klu'i 'jigs pas ma lags
68b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba dang / sbyor ba rtsub mo'i 'jigs pa
68b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad gcig gi nang tshun chad gzung bar mi nus shing rgyang ring por 'bros par 'gyur te/ de la bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mnar med par gnas par 'gyur ba'i
68b4(rgyud 'bum): sems can nam/ mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa 'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba 'am/ bskal pa bye bar bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pas lus yongs su dkris pa
68b5(rgyud 'bum): gang lags pa de'ang mthong ba'i chos la thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gtugs par 'gyur/ yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te tshig gzhan mi smra bar lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyid
68b6(rgyud 'bum): cing smyung pa lan cig bgyis te bzlas brjod byas na/ de bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du 'khor bar skye ba las phyir ldog par 'gyur/ gzungs kyi bzlas brjod kyis las kyi sgrib pa snga ma rnams kyang 'byung bar
68b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa rnams nyams par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i nyes pas phyir yang gos par mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis pad+ma bzhin du gos par mi
69a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mthong ba'i chos la sa lnga pa thob par 'gyur ro// bsten pa tsam mam/ mo ga'i bzlas brjod la nges par gnas na phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas 'thob par 'gyur ro//
69a2(rgyud 'bum): dran pa tsam gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i rjes su mchi bar 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mthong ba'i chos
69a3(rgyud 'bum): la kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa dang / dam tshig thams cad la zhugs par 'gyur ro//
69a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bskyed pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang mthong ba tsam gyis mnar med par gnas pa rnams kyi sdig pa rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// chung ngun rig sngags
69a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang dur khrod du zhugs nas gum pa'i rus pa'am/ gum pa'i sha'am/ gum pa'i ro rul pa'am/ gum pa'i zhun nam/ chung ngu na gum pa'i gos bor ba 'am/ rtsig pa'i ri mo la rig sngags 'chang
69a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i grib mas phog par 'gyur na/ sems can gang dang gang gi dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur pa de dang de nas mod la thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de la yid gnyis sam som
69a7(rgyud 'bum): nyi bskyed par mi bgyid na/ gang dag che mang du lhag par bgyid par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ gang rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge
69b1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba 'ga' zhig bzung 'di 'chang bar bgyid/ rjod par bgyid/ klog par bgyid/ gdon par bgyid/ sems par bgyid/ sgom par bgyid//
69b2(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bgyid/ 'dri bar bgyid/ 'drir 'jug par bgyid na/ de nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mthong ba'i chos la yon tan chen po brgya
69b3(rgyud 'bum): stong mang po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'di nyid bcangs na mthong ba'i chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par
69b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gzung 'di nyid re zhig kun chub par bgyis nas mkho ba'i yo byad thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur na/ dgos pa mang pos grims par bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas
69b5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa bsgrubs nas yid la bsams te/ bsams pa'i las thams cad bgyis na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ dgos pa dang bgyi ba thams
69b6(rgyud 'bum): cad grub par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin mngon sum du mthong nas lung bstan pa bzhin du don yod pa'i yid bzhin nor bu'i zhags pa 'di de bzhin
69b7(rgyud 'bum): du blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di la yid gnyis mi bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhogs pa mgrin par btags la lag pa g.yas pas nor bu blangs te/ lag pa g.yon pas lcags kyu blangs
70a1(rgyud 'bum): na mi gda' bar gyur nas gar dga' ba der 'jug par 'gyur te/ mtshan mo'ang nor bu'i 'od kyi snang bas nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// thams cad du lha'i gnas su 'jug
70a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / ri sul gyi phug dang / ri dang / nags tshal dang /
70a3(rgyud 'bum): thang gi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mi mngon par zhugs nas slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro// zhing ci 'tshal ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi nang du lha'i tshe lo brgyar
70a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa'i skyon thams cad spangs par 'gyur/ 'on te rig sngags 'chang gis grub pa'i don la brtag par 'tshal na/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad dam
70a5(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi la legs par khrus bgyi'o/ / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o// gtsang ma'i gnas sam phyogs su ba'i lci ba ste ba'i rnam lngas yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o// gnas de'i
70a6(rgyud 'bum): nang logs kyi dbus su dri'i dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/ / me tog sil ma dgram zhing bum pa gang bas brgyan cing spos sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i bdug pa gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas 'phags pa
70a7(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du stan bzang po bshams te/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas zhags pa sbrul 'khyil ba'i tshul du zlum po bskyil nas bzhag par bgyi'o// dbus su
70b1(rgyud 'bum): nor bu gzhag par bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod par bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
70b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas de'i 'og tu tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul zhing nor bu la brtag par bgyi
70b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ zhags pa dang de thams cad nor bu'i nang nas gda' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa gda' ba 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' gda' ba 'am/ lha gda' ba 'am/ klu gda' ba
70b4(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gda' ba 'am/ 'byung po dang / lto 'phye chen po gda' ba 'am/ g.yul 'gyed pa
70b5(rgyud 'bum): gda' ba 'am/ tshe ring ba gda' ba'am/ tshe nyams pa gda' ba 'am/ tshe 'phos pa gda' ba 'a rgyal srid gda' ba 'am/ grong 'thob pa'am/ yul 'thob pa'am/ grong khyer 'thob pa
70b6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byu ru dang / ka le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan gda' ba 'am/ nor sgyur ba sma
70b7(rgyud 'bum): ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ gter smra ba'am/ 'bru smra ba 'am/ bud med 'phrog pa 'am/ las sgrub pa'am/ gsang sngags 'grub pa 'am/ dbang du bgyi ba 'am/
71a1(rgyud 'bum): ngo mtshar ba de dag thams cad nor bu'i nang na gda' bar 'gyur zhing / dge ba 'am mi dge ba de dag thams cad kyang gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo 'am/ lo phyed dam/ gnod pa 'am/
71a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba 'am/ yams sam/ mi ngas sam/ mi ngas chen po 'am/ phyugs ngas sam/ gor ram/ rta nad dam/ glang po che'i nang ngam/ rang gi dpung ngam/ gzhan gyi dpung gi 'jigs pa dang skrag
71a3(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po de dag thams cad me long gi dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba de bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur lags so/ / gang bsams shing gang gnyer bar 'grub pa'am/ mi 'grub pa'am/ dge ba'am/ mi
71a4(rgyud 'bum): dge ba thams cad gda' bar 'gyur te/ de la the tsom dang / yid gnyis dang / som nyi mi bgyi ste/ dngos po don yod gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i dus su klu'i gnas su nor bu gzhag
71a5(rgyud 'bum): na ci tsam 'tshal bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / ha cang char ches na nam mkha' la nor bu bstan na char chen po 'chad par 'gyur ro// nyi ma char kar nyi ma la bstan na nyi ma babs nas mchog
71a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / zla ba tshes pa la bstan na zla ba babs nas 'dod dgu thams cad kyi mchog stsol bar bgyid do// chu klung chen por bstan na rin po che rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
71a7(rgyud 'bum): nags khung du bstan na sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas gang gnyer ba de len par 'gyur ro// ri phug tu bstan na sman thams cad 'bab par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal
71b1(rgyud 'bum): pa de blang bar bgyi'o/ / 'bru'i phung po la bstan na 'bru thams cad 'du bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma mo'i gnas sam nag po chen po la bskan ma la gcig
71b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhag na/ nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas dbang du 'gyur zhing dgos pa dang las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i
71b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du bstan na yan lag bzhi'i dpung dang bcas pa/ blon po'i tshogs dang bcas pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ dbyig dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang /
71b4(rgyud 'bum): shang ka shi la dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / khang pa dang / ngo mtshar du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas/ ji srid 'tsho ba'i
71b5(rgyud 'bum): bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i nang du zhags pa 'phangs te/ don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs bzlas na ji ltar 'tshal ba yid la bsams pa bzhin
71b6(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / gzhal med khang gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i rtse mor bzhag ste/ rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba khyim gyi steng ngam khyams su bzhag la/
71b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas kyis sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bar bgyi'o// don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas khro bo'i rgyal
72a1(rgyud 'bum): po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o/ / de nas don yod yid bzhin nor bu'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad gsang bstod de bzlas brjod bgyi'o// lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshangs nas
72a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / nor bu dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub la sogs pa me tog dang 'bras bu'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab

72b1(rgyud 'bum): bab par bkum pa/ sgrub pa'i dgos pa yongs su rdzogs pa la sum sgril du bkal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/
72b2(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa dang ral gri mnan la lag pa g.yas pas dkyil 'khor la bzhas ste gzung bar bgyi'o// khros pa'i khro gnyer gyi bzhin gyis skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras

72b6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa dang ral gri grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// tshe lo khri thub par 'gyur ro// 'on te rig sngags 'chang khros pas ral gri
72b7(rgyud 'bum): bskor na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gdag pa can thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// g.yul gyi dbus su lan cig

74a1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis gzung nas mi gda' bar gyur nas klu'i gnas su mchis te/ klu'i mtshor mchis na klu'i gnas kyi sgo rnams 'bye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zhugs

76b1(rgyud 'bum): mchis nas nyin gcig bzhin dong rtse stong stsol bar 'gyur/ gser stong stsol bar 'gyur te/ des nyin gcig bzhin sbyin pa'ang stsa la/ bsod nams kyang bgyi'o// nag po chen po'i mgul du btags
