76b5(rgyud 'bum): chen por 'gyur ro/ / gu gul gyi bdug pas bdugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po bzlas na nag po chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas ci 'tshal ba'i mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid cing /
76b6(rgyud 'bum): ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ci 'tshal ba bgyid pas dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// mdung rtse gsum pa'i zhags pa sgrub pa'i cho
76b7(rgyud 'bum): ga'o/ / // de nas zhags pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i ri mo'i cho ga de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa brjod par bgyi ste/ 'jig rten mgon pos sna tshogs pa'i// rnam pa'i
77a1(rgyud 'bum): kha dog gzugs bstan pa/ / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyi// cho 'phrul sna tshogs gzugs bstan te// lag pa stong dang mig stong dang // mtha' yas pa yi phyag rgya bskam/
77a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi gzugs// khams gsum dag tu bstan pa ni// gdul bya gdul phyir gzugs bstan to// gsang ba 'di yi gzugs bstan pa// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// rig
77a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags grub pa bla med pa/ / de nyid zhags pa sgrub phyir ro// de bas rig 'dzin shes rab can// 'jig rten pha rol rjes 'thun pa// sangs rgyas nyid don gnyer ba dang // de bzhin gshegs kun lta ba dang // bde
77a4(rgyud 'bum): can lta bar 'tshal ba dang / / de nyid 'jig rten 'das pa yis// 'jig dbang mgon po mthong 'tshal la// mchog tu gus pas bgyi ba yi// cho ga'i rgyal po 'di brjod kyis// de nyid gus par dad pa dang // shin
77a5(rgyud 'bum): tu dang ba nyid du bgyi/ / grol ba sna tshogs 'tshal ba la// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs bstan te// sna tshogs thabs kyis grol bar 'gyur// don yod rgyal po cho ga'i mchog/ don yod grub pa'i 'jig rten 'das// don
77a6(rgyud 'bum): yod 'bras bu dam pa po/ / don yod kun tu grub pa 'thob// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// don yod 'jig rten 'jig rten mgon// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa// don yod 'jig rten ci 'tshal
77a7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ mchog 'tshal ba ni grub par 'gyur// don yod rgya chen rdzu 'phrul gyi// cho 'phrul rnam 'phrul rgyun mi 'chad// de lta bas na kun bsgrims te// bdag nyid yongs su dag bgyis nas// ji ltar cho ga bkod pa bzhin
77b1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'phrul par ri mo'i gzugs/ / rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs lta zhing // zhags pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin khro bo'i rgyal po dang // rig sngags rgyal po de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor lha dang me
77b2(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / / sbyin sreg rlung lha chu lha dang // khro bo'i gzugs dang zhi ba dang // lha dang klu yang ston pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs dang ni// 'byung po lha min dri za dang // nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// lto
77b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phye chen po'i gzugs kun tu/ / 'jig rten mgon pos mchog sbyin bstan// gshin rje dang ni lus ngan dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// gzhon nu dbang phyug lha dang ni// dbang phyug chen po nyi
77b4(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / / zla gzugs rgyu skar tshes grangs dang // 'di dag rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// gzugs su 'jig rten mgon pos bstan// sems can rnams la phan 'tshal bas// gdul ba'i don du 'gro ba'i
77b5(rgyud 'bum): lam/ / sems can rnams la bstan pas na// de bas som nyi nyid mi bgyi// mchog tu dad par bgyi ba lags// ji ltar mthun pa'i dgos pa rnams// ji ltar mthun pa bzhin du sgrub// ji ltar mthun
77b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ri mo'i gzugs/ / ji ltar mthun pa'i zhags pa sgrub// gnas ni gang du 'os pa dang // gang du sems ni dga' 'gyur ba// goms pa gang gis phyag rgya dang // gang gi dkyil 'khor char dbye ba/ 'phags
77b7(rgyud 'bum): baspyan ras gzigs dbang mgon/ / kun tu sgrol ba 'dren pa'i gtso// don yon 'bras bu stsol ba po// don yod pa yi grub pa 'thob// don yod dgos pa thams cad dang // thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor
78a1(rgyud 'bum): lo ni/ / mchog nyid la yang reg par 'gyur// zhags pa dang ri mo sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i las dang dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad kyi sbyin sreg gi
78a2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ sdig pa thams cad mod la 'phrog pa/ sgrib pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dgra thams cad 'joms pa/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ gdug pa thams cad
78a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa'i mchog sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bcu drug las grol bar bgyid pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad rtag tu 'phrog pa/ mi mdza' ba rnams rab tu 'joms pa
78a4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyi dpung bzlog pa'i mchog nad thams cad 'joms pa/ mod la 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa zhi bar bgyid pa/ mu ge'i dgon pa 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'joms
78a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ lha'i bde ba 'dren par bgyid pa'i cho ga de kho na nyid kyi sangs rgyas sgrub pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa'i mchog thams cad sgrub par bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad kyi mthun mong mchog sbyin shin tu
78a6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par dka' ba/ lha rnams rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba/ klu thams cad dga' ba 'thob par 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rtag tu nyin mtshan du gzigs par som nyi ma mchis pa/ byang chub sems
78a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dus kun tu shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog sbyin rtag tu mchis par som nyi ma mchis pa/ rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas
78b1(rgyud 'bum): pa srung ba'i don du thams cad du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur lags so/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang shes rab dang ldan pas gtsang ma'i gnas su mchis nas sbyin sreg bgyis te/ gtsang ma yi ni sa phyogs
78b2(rgyud 'bum): sam/ / ca co ma mchis dben par ni// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // drag shul spyod pa rnams bgyi'o// zhi ba sems can thams cad kyi// don du sdig pa thams cad 'joms// rgyas pas rgyas pa 'thob 'gyur te//
78b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur// dgra dang log 'dren gtug pa dang // gnod sbyin srin po gsang ba pa// gdug sems can rnams bred pa dang // skrag par bsdigs pa drag shul spyod// gsang
78b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags sgrub pa'i sprin sreg ste/ / gsang sngags sgrub pa'i bla na med// 'jig rten 'jig rten pha rol gyi// sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// me lha'i lha dang klu dag dang // de bzhin rig pa 'dzin pa'ang dgug
78b5(rgyud 'bum): / khung brkos de la pad+ma'i tshul// pad+ma rtag tu bri bar bgyi// cho ga ji bzhin khung nang gi/ pad+ma la ni ge sar bgyi// gru bzhi 'am ni zlum po ste// de lta bur ni brko bar bgyi// legs par byugs shing shin tu brnag
78b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu sbas shing tshad la dbab/ / tshes grangs rgyu skar nyid dag dang // shin tu bkra shis dag la bgyi// bkra shis phyag rgya chen po dang // bzang po'i gtor ma'i las bgyi'o// bdug pa me tog la sogs pa/
78b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po dag ni 'khor bar dgod// thog mar me lha bkug nas ni// de nas sbyin sreg las rnams bgyi// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur pa// legs bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos nas// gsang sngags
79a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa'i cho ga bgyi/ / de la mtshams kyang bcing bar bgyi// bdag srung gtsug tor bcing ba dang // gzhan srung dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang // de bzhin grogs bgyid srung ba dang /
79a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyun du a ka'i shing spar te// dri yi shing rnams nyid dag dang // mar dang yungs kar 'bras yos dag/ nyi shu gcig dbul me tog bgyi// de nas me yi lha dgug go// oM na mo ag+ni dz+wA la ma hA dzA la/ rjod
79a3(rgyud 'bum): sna pra b+ha maN+Da la/ sar+b+ba bid A hU ti/ pra hU ti rak+ti ni rad tuSh+Ta dz+wa la/ d+hu ma shwa sa/ a tsi ShA mu kha tik+Sh+Na/ rashrId pa ag+ni sh+tsa bi tu ta sh+tsa hU ta sha na mu kha na te/ sar+b+ba de bA nAM/ sarba yak+Sha ma hA bIr+ya ma hA dza ya/ ma hA
79a4(rgyud 'bum): bApA la nir ma ri shan/ sar+b+ba da ha na pra pu la A ka ra sha sa mu gad kash+tsa a ba pra saM kA sha na/ maN+Da la pU dzi to// ma na ti sar+b+ba tra di bya rU pa bi ShA ra da A bA hA na sar+b+ba tra gAn/ de ba hU ta/ sha na hu tra/ sha na ta ma si bi
79a5(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ma kan/ an d+hu ka ra na/ muk+taM ra shI ma pri yo ku gan d+ha pha lA ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ a gra dza/ sAk+ShA su tI k+ShAsh+tsa mri ti san dzi be na/ pri yau bash+ma puSh+pa bas+tha bas+t+ra tsa basma bsta ni/ se ba ka ma/ basmA sany+tsa d+ha ni t+yan d+hu ma
79a6(rgyud 'bum): mA ku la/ dza ya se/ ba ka sid d+ha ra sa d+ha ra sa grA tsa ra sarba tra pra d+ha ba ri shA/ sarba tri ni ra ma ri shi No/ nai t+yai smiSh+pa dASh+Ta na mun tsa si/ dA tr-i sha/ b+ha ba no d+ha ba ag+ni/ mu khe de bA ta/ a ru tsi ru dzA ba la ba da ka ma hA
79a7(rgyud 'bum): na ta/ a tha par No/ de ba de ba na/ bi shA ra da/ a yAn tu sA d+ha ya ta da tA ta/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ tiSh+Tha sa ma yan/ hu ru hu ru hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis ni lan bdun du// bzlas nas me ni dgug par bgyi/
79b1(rgyud 'bum): gu gul yungs kar mar sbyar ba// spar bdun spar bas me la dbul// mchod yon snod rnams dbul ba yang // de bzhin spar ba'i spar bas so// dri rnams dang ni byug pa dang // bdug pa rgya chen dbul bar
79b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ / de bzhin 'bras bu spar bar dbul// de nas chab kyis gsang ba bgyi// ji ltar lha rnams rim bzhin du// nye reg dag kyang dbul bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis su// sbyin sreg las
79b3(rgyud 'bum): ni yang dag brtsams/ dri zhim shin tu dag pa dang // p+lag sha u dum pa ra dang // sna ma'i me tog tsam pa dang // kar ni ka ra nyid dag dang // pad+ma ut+pal thang shing dang // de bzhin dri bda'i tsan dan dang //
79b4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub ljon shing shing dag dang // de bzhin gzhan yang dri gda'i shing // 'on te 'bras bu'i shing mang dang // shi ma shi ba'i las lags pas// mchod yon de bzhin rtswa dag ste// de dag gis ni me sbar nas//
79b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi ni las bgyi'o// 'bras yos tsan dan phye ma dang // a ka ru dang du ru ka/ kun tu ru la sogs pa dang // du ru kar bcas spri ka dang // spang spos pri yang ku blangs te// de dag lhan cig sbyar
79b6(rgyud 'bum): bsres shing / / mar ram mar gsar lhan cig brdzi// don yod rgyal po'i gsang sngags ni// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas me la dbul// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du lan stong
79b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad kyi sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / nam phyed na me lha rang gi gzugs 'bar bar shin tu gnas pa langs nas phyogs bcur lta zhing kun tu brtag nas rigs sngags 'chang la legs
80a1(rgyud 'bum): so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// bdag tshim par byas pas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga grub kyi/ mchog slongs
80a2(rgyud 'bum): shig dang thams cad sbyin no/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji lta bu'i 'dod pa'i mchog rnams blangs par bgyi ste/ ji ltar blangs pa bzhin thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
80a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod yon gyi snod dang zhabs bsil gyi snod dag dbul zhing gtor ma dbul ba'i las bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar dang bsres pa'i gong bu chen po dag gis sbyin sreg bgyi zhing / 'bras
80a4(rgyud 'bum): bu'i shing la me sbar nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / thab kyi dbus nas skyes pa zhig lus phyed tsam phyung nas dngul gyi gzhong pa kha
80a5(rgyud 'bum): bas kyis bkang ste/ pus mo nub tsam du dbul bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gis lus la
80a6(rgyud 'bum): me 'bar ba'i 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de 'tshal na tshe lo khrir 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa bcu tshun chad kyi sngon gyi skye ba dran par
80a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / don long rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor kha gton tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gal te snod mi len na de'i tshe yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na cher g.yo bar
80b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs kyi mdun du mchis na rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// rig sngags
80b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang khyod kyis sbyin sreg gi cho ga de bsgrub zin gyis/ mchog slongs shig dang sbyin no zhes/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis ci bsams pa'i mchog smras pa de'i tshe thams cad stsol bar bgyid do//
80b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis skyes pa de las snod blangs te/ rang gi lag nas rig sngags 'chang la stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang gis blangs nas zas kyi gong bu de bza'
80b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyi'o/ / 'tshal ba tsam gyi mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur ro// lus las me'i snying po 'bar ba'i kha dog sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don yod rgyal po'i rig
80b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po drug pa// / gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag
80b6(rgyud 'bum): / khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag
80b7(rgyud 'bum): khrig phrag brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang don yod rab tu gnas pa'i gnas rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang ri dang / tshal
81a1(rgyud 'bum): dang nags tshal dang bcas pa/ me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs yal ga dang / sbal mig dang / lo ma dang / rtsa ba dang / myu gur bcas pa kha cig ni gser gyi me
81a2(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / kha cig ni dngul gyi me tog/ kha cig ni rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i me tog dag go/ gzhan yang lha'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dag dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / lcug ma'i me tog dang /
81a3(rgyud 'bum): ta la dang / g+han da bar shi ka dang / sna ma dang / yu thi ka dang / ta ra na dang / ku ba pya ka'i me tog dag dang / tshal dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang gis mdzes
81a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyis pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba dang yid du mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i chu klung dang / 'bab chu dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing lha'i tsan dan gyi dri chab kyis yongs su gang ba de
81a5(rgyud 'bum): la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i gzhal med khang dang / lha'i pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos legs par brgyan pa'i chab gser gyi bye ma legs par bdal ba'i gzhal med
81a6(rgyud 'bum): khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / dri ba mo'i tshogs kyis dga' bar bgyis pa/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / klu dang / rig 'dzin dang / mi 'am ci'i
81a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / lha'i 'byor pa'i gzhal med khang legs par bstabs pa'i gnas na/ thams cad du rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi
81b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po la thug pa nas/ byang chub la mchis kyi bar dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du tshe'i tshad gcig tsam du skyong bar bgyid do// de bzhin du grub pa bla na med/
81b2(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te/ de ltar zas kyi gong bu sgrub pa'i cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' lags so//
81b3(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu mtha' dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon sum du chos nyan
81b4(rgyud 'bum): pa thos par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi
81b5(rgyud 'bum): snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang sngags dang phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad
81b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rgya chen po mtha' dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di kho na nyid du gnas par 'gyur lags so// klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag brgya stong rnams de'i dbang du gyur nas rtag par rgyun du mchis par 'gyur ro//
81b7(rgyud 'bum): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// 'og min gyi gnas kyi lha
82a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bar du rig sngags 'chang de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang zhing rtag par rgyun du yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
82a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs dag lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la sogs
82a3(rgyud 'bum): pa sbyin sreg gi cho ga don yod pa sgrub pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'on te skal ba chung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa bon ma mchis pa zhig mchis la/ des snod de
82a4(rgyud 'bum): blangs pa tsam gyi mod la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur te/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyi mod la tshe lha'i lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// de la
82a5(rgyud 'bum): phyis kyang nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad kyis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / gdug pa dang / rab tu gdug pa thams cad nub par
82a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud gro'i spyi gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dgas kyi yul thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchod gnas
82a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig pur 'gyur ro/ / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / sems can thams cad lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan zhing don yod pa 'thob
82b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / 'gum pa'i dus su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzigs bzhed par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// dran pa shin tu nye
82b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bzhag nas dus bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / dus bgyis nas skal ba mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro//
82b3(rgyud 'bum): lan 'ga' yang phyir ngan song du mchis par mi 'gyur te/ phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta ba'i phyir/ sangs
82b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rtag tu mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / dpral bar thig le bgyis na thams cad du mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// me lha rtag par rgyun du dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis rang gi gzugs
82b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ / dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas don yod bsgongs pa sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des 'bras dang sran ma shar bsres
82b6(rgyud 'bum): te bsgral la bsgongs nas mar dang / bu ram dang / sha kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi lhan cig brdzis nas/ bil ba'i tshad tsam du bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu shing ka ra wI ra'i me spar nas bsgongs pa re re la lan bdun
82b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar dang me tog ji snyed pa dang bsres
83a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas me'i dbus su stsal bar bgyi'o// 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gtor bar bgyil
83a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas me'i dbus nas me lha lus phyed tsam phyung nas rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i snod zas bsgongs pas bkangs nas/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis zas bsgongs pa sgrub
83a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga grub zin gyis/ lha'i zas bsgongs pa chen po long zhig ces stobs par bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zas bsgongs pa'i snod de blang bar bgyi'o// blangs pa tsam kho nas bcud
83a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis len du gyur nas nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro/ / sgra ba cung zad 'khyil par yang 'gyur ro// pags pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig
83a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba drug khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / me lha gnas dang gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du mchis nas las thams cad bgyid par
83a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang dang gang gis zas bsgongs pa la reg pa de'ang thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
83a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas pa 'di nyin gcig bzhin du sho lo ka stong klog gam 'chang bar bgyid
83b1(rgyud 'bum): naHtshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skyes nas skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang phyis dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par 'gyur/
83b2(rgyud 'bum): te sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// mchod pa chen po'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams
83b3(rgyud 'bum): cad dbang du gyur nas gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro/ / bud med gang zhig bu'i ched du zas bsgod pa de 'tshal na bu gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa
83b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog dang ldan pa rnyed nas yun ring du 'tsho zhing yid gzhungs pa dang / mkhas pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad la bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas skye bo 'bum la zas stsal bar 'tshal na'o//
83b5(rgyud 'bum): ma'i thug pa bsgrub par bgyi ste/ gnas gtsang ma gcom bskyungs par shing ka ra wI ra'i lcug mas dkrug cing don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de nas khro bo'i rgyal po
83b6(rgyud 'bum): chab dang yungs kar la bzlas brjod bgyis nas gtor bar bgyi'o/ / de nas zas bsgongs pa gcig snod kyi nang nas phyung nas 'o thug gi nang du stsal lo// de nas char bgos te thog mar dkon mchog gsum
83b7(rgyud 'bum): la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o/ / de'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu 'phags pa 'jam dpal la dbul bar bgyi'o// de'i
84a1(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / bkren pa dang /
84a2(rgyud 'bum): sdug 'phongs pa dang / lam gyis dub pa dang / slong mo pa rnams la rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o// ji tsam du skye bo 'bum ci 'tshal bar kha zas 'tshal du stsal kyang snod de gang ba 'am bri bar mi mngon zhing de bas par
84a3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / gang dag zas de 'tshal ba de dag sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa thams cad dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang
84a4(rgyud 'bum): mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lus mnyen cing 'jam par 'gyur ro// nga ro la
84a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar mnyen zhing snyan la dga' bar bgyid pa mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu dub pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bde ba yang dag par stobs par 'gyur ro// tshe
84a6(rgyud 'bum): brjes nas bde 'gro thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / 'o ma'i thug pas lhung bzed bkang nas de gnas mthon po bla gas med par dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa
84a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la lhung bzed de dbul bar bgyi'o/ / phul ba tsam gyi mod la chu bo gang+gA bye ba 'bum phrag brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i
84b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i zas bsgongs pa dang / lha'i 'o thug gis lhung bzed bkang ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor lha'i me tog sil ma bkram pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du
84b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya
84b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i mchog gis bstabs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis
84b4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang yon bdag de'i yon sbyong bar mdzad do/ / gang gi phyir yon sbyangs nas skal ba dang mthun pa'i tshe 'di nyid dang gzhan du dbang phyug chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// grub pa chen po'i gser gyis 'byor par
84b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mdzod dang / bang mdzod mang pos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad blta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyi
84b6(rgyud 'bum): de las srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des legs par
84b7(rgyud 'bum): khrus bgyis te/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos nas 'o thug mar dang bsres pa 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// sgron shing dang arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me spar bar bgyi'o// sbyin sreg lan
85a1(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nub gsum du bgyis nas klu'i
85a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po thams cad gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / nub lngar bgyis na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
85a3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma lags pa thams cad dang / mi thams cad 'khor dang bcas par dbang du gyur nas mchi bar 'gyur ro// nub bdun du bgyis na rig 'dzin thams cad dbang du
85a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / nub thams cad du bgyis na brgya byin la sogs te sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / gtsang ma'i lha'i bu mo rnams babs nas
85a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur te/ ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchis par 'gyur ro// zla ba nya nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo'i tshes nyi shu gsum mam gnam stong gi bar du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin
85a6(rgyud 'bum): sreg bgyis la/ arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gis me sbar nas gnam stong gis rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas rig sngags 'chang la legs
85a7(rgyud 'bum): so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// nga mnyes par byas kyis/ rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang mchog sbyin te gang mnyer ba de thams cad sbyin no// gter smra ba 'am/
85b1(rgyud 'bum): nor bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ zhing smra ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ cho ga zhib mo sgrub pa de dag thams cad sbyin no// rgyal po nyid dam/ blon po
85b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid dam/ yul bdag nyid dam/ phyug pa nyid dam/ grong rdal 'thob pa 'am/ gos 'thob pa 'am/ ba lang dang / rta dang / ma he dang / rnga mo dang / lug 'thob pa 'am/ nor 'thob pa 'am/ 'bru 'thob
85b3(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag thams cad sbyin no/ / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'am/ mi snang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phral 'thob pa 'am/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa'am/ gzungs 'thob pa 'am/ phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
85b4(rgyud 'bum): zhib mo sgrub pa 'am/ ro langs bslang ba 'am/ rig 'dzin grub pa nyid dam/ ral gri'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ nam mkha'i rig 'dzin nyid dam/ phug tu 'jug pa'am/ dur khrod du 'jug pa'am/
85b5(rgyud 'bum): nags su 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba de dag thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams shing smras pa de dag thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// rig sngags 'chang la bstan pa tsam
85b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi mod la dri med don yod lta ba zhes bgyi ba lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma'i ze ba'i dbus nas rdzus te pad+ma las skyes nas
85b7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ / don yod zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang bcas
86a1(rgyud 'bum): pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag dang bcas pa 'di rdzogs te/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du kha ton du gnas par bgyi'o// de nas la du'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags
86a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang des kha zas las la du stong rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas legs par khrus bgyis te gtsang mas gos
86a3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ / de nas la du mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bgyi'o// shin tu dri zhim po'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me spar bar bgyi'o// stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me'i dbus nas khye'u zhig byung nas
86a4(rgyud 'bum): snod lha'i la dus bkang nas dbul bar bgyid do/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yut+pa kar la lan bdun bzlas te khye'u de'i la du la gtor ro// khye'u des rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang
86a5(rgyud 'bum): ci zhig don du gnyer/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'dod pa thams cad byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang snod kyi la du khyer cig dang / 'dis khyod kyi dgos pa dpag tu med pa
86a6(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni khyod kyi bcud kyi mchog yin no// rig sngags 'chang long zhig/ 'di ni khyod kyi grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snod gang ba de blangs te khye'u
86a7(rgyud 'bum): la'ang khyod kyis kho bo'i grogs gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ / khye'us smras pa/ dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i grogs bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe gu gul dang
86b1(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan lhan cig bsres la mar dang yungs kar sbyar nas don yod lcags kyus lan bdun bzlas te sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / arga'i shing gi me sbar ro// sbyin sreg bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la bdag bkug
86b2(rgyud 'bum): pas mod la mchis nas dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / las thams cad bgyi'o// ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bsnyen bkur bgyis shing bkur stir spyad par bgyi'o// bgegs dang / log 'dren dang /

86b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba sa ya phrag gnyis dang / bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor bar
86b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa drug khrir 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// la du lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag
86b6(rgyud 'bum): nas don yod rgyal po'i khro bos dbang bskur te/ de nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad
86b7(rgyud 'bum): stsol bar bgyi ste/ longs spyod du stsal kyang bas par mi 'gyur gyi/ slar zhing slar zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du lhung bzed nang na la du mchis pa de srid du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ji srid du skye
87a1(rgyud 'bum): bo 'bum 'bum mang zhing phal che bar stsal kyang gtugs par mi 'gyur ro/ / la du la don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de'i 'og tu gang du reg pa de'ang
87a2(rgyud 'bum): gser bzang por 'gyur ro/ / la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te klu'i gnas su 'phangs na/ de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po mthar gtugs pa'i klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas
87a3(rgyud 'bum): mchis par 'gyur te/ bsgo na char mi 'bab pa bsgo ba bzhin char 'bebs par bgyid do// ci bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// ha cang char ches na bsgo ba bzhin ha cang char chen po 'gum par bgyid
87a4(rgyud 'bum): do/ / rlung dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / ser ba thams cad bsgo ba tsam gyis gcod par bgyid do// phug gi sgor la du la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis nas phug gi sgor bsnun na phug gi sgo thams
87a5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro/ / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / sgo glegs thams cad dum bur bcag par 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad phyir byung nas rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis
87a6(rgyud 'bum): te bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ / nags tshang tshing gi dbus su 'phangs na nags tshang tshing gi gnas kyi sgo thams cad phye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// /
87a7(rgyud 'bum): la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te dur khrod chen po'i dbus su 'phangs na 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang bcas pa'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang /
87b1(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad sgren mor gyur nas thams cad dbang du mchis par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin mchis par 'gyur ro// rma ma byung ba'i mi ro dri chab kyis khrus bgyis
87b2(rgyud 'bum): la la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa gnyis su la du stsal la gos dkar pos ro g.yogs nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar dang chab la lan bdun bzlas nas dbang bskur na ci
87b3(rgyud 'bum): dris pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nongs pa dang / nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung dang / phas kyi dgra bo dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs
87b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mi ngas dang / yams kyi nad de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye ba smra bar 'gyur zhing / dmyal bar skye ba smra bar 'gyur ro// tshe ring ba 'am che/
87b5(rgyud 'bum): thung ba smra bar 'gyur ro// dus ma lags pa'i 'chi ba smra bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur te/ nor bsgyur ba'i gtam mam/ zhing gi gtam mam/ mig 'phrul gyi gtam smra bar 'gyur ro//
87b6(rgyud 'bum): cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / gsang sngags 'grub pa dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'grub pa dang / ril bu 'grub par smra bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba
87b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / mi gda' bar bgyi ba dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / ris mngag pa dang / dgra chad pas bcad cing dbang du bgyi ba de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// sgyu thabs smra bar 'gyur ro// nyams pa
88a1(rgyud 'bum): smra bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phel ba smra bar 'gyur ba nas/ bskal pa las 'das pa'i 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bar du smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags
88a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi chab kyis khar stsal la la du blangs na ro 'gyel bar 'gyur ro/ / la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyal po'i sgor bsnun na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bdag

88a4(rgyud 'bum): zhing nor chen po 'du bar 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'i gnas chen por 'gyur ro// la dul lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te/ dpal lha mo chen mo'i lag pa sprul na dpal lha mo chen po
88a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur nas nor chen po stsol cing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// la du la yan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas khug ma'i nang du stsal te mchan khung du bsrel bar bgyis ste/
88a6(rgyud 'bum): ji tsam du bsrel ba de srid du mi gda' bar gyur nas gang du stsal ba der 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang na shing gcig gam 'bab chu gcig par la du la khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/
88a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur nas shing gi drung du brdegs na 'dod dgur sgyur ba dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// ji ltar bsams pa'i 'dod pa thams cad nye bar mchis nas yongs su spyod pa dang / ji srid mtsho'i bar
88b1(rgyud 'bum): du mchis par 'gyur ro/ / la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te/ ma mo'i gnas su nag po chen po'i spyi gtsug tu bzhag la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas te chab dang yungs kar gyis
88b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bar bgyis na/ de nas sbyor ba mo thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du gyur nas mngag gzhug pa las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// la du la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te
88b3(rgyud 'bum): nag po chen po'i lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag na/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro//
88b4(rgyud 'bum): la du la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi lhung bzed kyi nang du stsal te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bgyis na ji srid du lhung bzed na la du mchis pa de srid
88b5(rgyud 'bum): du phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar lha'i zhal zas ro sna tshogs kyi ro'i mchog dang ldan pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor
88b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa tshim par bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag
88b7(rgyud 'bum): gis rig sngags 'chang de'i yon sbyong ba mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / la du la lan brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur la lcags kyu'i rgyal pos chab la bzlas brjod bgyis
89a1(rgyud 'bum): nam thab kyi mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o/ / de nas arga'i yam sreg shing gis me spar la la du de ma thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ mar dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang
89a2(rgyud 'bum): bsres pas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / me lha me'i rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis byung nas/ rig sngags 'chang la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang legs so leg
89a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bdag tshim par byas so// bdag dga' bar 'gyur to// rig sngags 'chang bdag gis mchog tu dga' ba thob kyis/ rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la bsams shing 'dod pa smros shig dang
89a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog sbyin no/ / rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa bzhin mchog brjod par bgyi'o// me lha des kyang thams cad stsol cing dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// las thams cad grub
89a5(rgyud 'bum): pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / me'i phung po'i dbus su zhugs na 'od zer stong 'phro ba rnams gangs bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur te chab nas byung ba bzhin no// lag pas me rnams tshugs par bgyid do// 'bar ba bzhin
89a6(rgyud 'bum): du klad pa'i spyi bor bzhag na skra nyag ma gcig kyang 'tshig par mi bgyid de/ me'i dbang du mchi bar mi 'gyur ro// 'bar bzhin du g.yar gyi nang du bsrel na cung zad dro ba tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// lus la bab na
89a7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar tsar dan bzhin du bsil zhing bde bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro// gos kyi mtha' mar thum po bgyis na tshig par mi 'gyur ro// chab kyi nang du stsal na 'gum par
89b1(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / sbyin sreg thams cad kyi cho ga so so'i gzugs su mchis par 'gyur ro// thams cad du dgos pa 'di yan grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa gang dang gang du bskos pa de dang der
89b2(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad grub pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga sgrub pa thams cad lung 'bogs par 'gyur ro// du ba dang / rlung dang / me 'bar ba'i
89b3(rgyud 'bum): shugs kyis dpag tshad stong du mchis shing slar yang ldog par 'gyur ro/ / dgos pa thams cad nye bar ston par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// thams cad du grub pa stsol bar
89b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas don yod me 'bar ba// bla med 'bar bzang sgrub 'tshal ba// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang // gzi brjid nyi ma dang mnyam pas// phyogs bcu kho ra khor yug gi/ kun nas su ni
89b5(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar bgyi/ / sgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'tshed pa bla na med pa 'grub// bcud kyi mchog ste dam pa lags// nor sgyur smra ba bla na med// gzhan yang 'tshed pa sna tshogs pa// sgrub pa bla na
89b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa lags/ / ji ltar nyin mtshan gda' bas na// nyin par gyi ni gdugs dang mtshungs// lan cig dgos pa sgrub pa na// legs par las bgyis nor bu dang // rdzas bsres leg par bgyis pa la//
89b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang mas bzlas pa'i las rnams dang // gtsang mas spyad pas sgrub pa dang // don yod chu dang me dang ni// me yi shing rnams brjod par bgyi// me 'bar 'od dang mtshungs pa ste// de dag thams cad
90a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig spungs pa'i/ / yam sreg cho ga bla na med// tsan dan dang ni seng ldeng dang // pa tang ka ra wI ra dang // arga sha mi smyug ma dang // shir sha kar na ri ka dang // 'o ma'i shing
90a2(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub shing / / p+lag sha dang ni sna ma dang // gan d+ha bar shi pad+ma yi// rtsa ba dang ni lo mar bcas// pad+ma dkar po ku mu de// ut+pal me tog l-i ma rtsa// bi dza pu ra bi la ba shing // sin du bi ra tsam pa
90a3(rgyud 'bum): ka/ dre ka bi tsu marde tsa// sa ha ba la tsi dra ka/ shing de kun ka bsdus pa yi// yam sreg shing gi las bgyis te// yungs kar mar dang zho dang ni// sbrang rtsi 'bras yos sbyin sreg bgyi// bzang po'i
90a4(rgyud 'bum): zangs las srang gsum dang / / mtshal las nyis 'gyur gang bskus kyang // srang gcig tsan dan dkar po nyid// srang bcu ldong ros srang gcig ste// de dag bsres pa'i rdzas rnams dang // de bzhin
90a5(rgyud 'bum): yung ni nyis 'gyur dag/ zhi ga dag ni bkang nas su// me thab dbus su gzhug par bgyi// sbyin sreg stong ni rtsa brgyad du// shin tu mnyam bzhag legs gsal ba// gtsang ma gtsang mar spyod pa yi//
90a6(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang legs par khrus bgyis pa// dri zhim dri yis bsgos par bgyi// ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma dang // me tog 'bras bu nyid kyang dgod// bzlas brjod kyi ni sbyin sreg nyid// stong rtsa brgyad
90a7(rgyud 'bum): ni tshang ba dang / / de nas lha bshos gtor ma dang // me tog bdug pa mchod yon snod// dbul te 'o mas mdag ma dgum// 'o mas zhig zhi bar bgyi// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi bzlas brjod stong
90b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bgyis nas yungs kar gyis bsnun par bgyi'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// de nas zhig 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhig
90b2(rgyud 'bum): de la mchod par bgyi'o/ / de nas zangs kyi sgrom bu 'am dngul gyi sgrom bur zhi gnas nor bu blangs te/ sgrom bu der gzhag par bgyi ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu ji lta ba bzhin du 'di'ang don yod pa 'bar
90b3(rgyud 'bum): ba mthu chen po'i mthu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan mo ni zla ba'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nyi mo ni nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du gda' bar 'gyur ro// nam 'tshed pa'i dus kyi tshe nor bu de bzhag na 'tsho ba dang
90b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg pa dang / 'tshed pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// nam hom bgyid pa de'i tshe thab kyi dbus su bzhag ste/ sreg blugs kyi sbyin sreg bgyis na me chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi thams cad
90b5(rgyud 'bum): du dgos pa rnams sgrol mas gsal bar bgyis pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / g.yul ngo chen por g.yul 'gyed pa'i dbus su skyes pa dpa' bo legs par khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ya lad dang
90b6(rgyud 'bum): go char bsdams pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po de'i spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag nas gcig pu g.yul gyi dbus su zhugs na de nas skyes pa de me 'bar ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ / de nas g.yul 'gyed pa'i pha rol
90b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi dpung rnams pham par gyur nas phyogs bcur 'khrugs nas 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ / phyi nas lan 'ga' yang pha rol gyi dpung dang dgra'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dgra dang mi mdza' ba'i
91a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / lag pas nor bu bzung nas phug gi gnas su zhugs na gnas kyi sgor thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// gnas na gnas pa thams cad mdun du mchis
91a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i gnas thams cad du mchis nas lag pas nor bu bzung ste gnas kyi nang du zhugs na chab thams cad kyi phyir mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams cad mdun du mchis nas bden par dam
91a3(rgyud 'bum): bca' bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang du gyur nas ji srid mtsho'i bar du las bgyid par 'gyur ro// bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / rtsa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshal thams cad bde ba 'phel bar
91a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / snyan cing mdangs dang ldan pa dang mnyen par 'gyur ro// gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / dran pa dang ldan pa dang / mi bde ba chung bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gis kyang lo tog dang / me
91a5(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / 'bras bu la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad dang / gzhan ches mang po dag gis dgos pa mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba ni nor bu chen po don yod 'bar ba'i nor bu me 'bar ba'i chen po
91a6(rgyud 'bum): lags so/ / de nas don yod snang ba rnam par lta bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug ste rang gi gzugs su blta bar 'tshal na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo
91a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / lus legs par bkrus te spos chab kyis byug par bgyi'o// shing arga'i yam sreg shing gis me spar bar bgyi'o// yungs kar dang / a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
91b1(rgyud 'bum): mar sbyar bas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas don yod lcags kyu gu gul las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sreg blugs kyis sbyin sreg bgyis na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs
91b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis mdun na mchis nas/ mchog thams cad bsams pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do// ji ltar yid la bgyid cing bsam pa'i mchog stsol bar bgyid do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar
91b3(rgyud 'bum): yid la bgyis shing bsams pa'i mchog smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad stsol bar bgyid do// de nas mig sman sgrub par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des
91b4(rgyud 'bum): legs par bkrus te gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bgyi'o/ / nub gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ des zangs kyi za ma tog bgyis la/ de nas mig sman so bi ra dang yung ba nyis 'gyur du bsres pas dgang bar
91b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis nas thab kyi dbus su gzhag par bgyi'o// de'i steng du u shi ra dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres pas lan
91b6(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / shing arga'i me spar bar bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas mig sman blangs la gtun gyi steng du legs par zhib du btags la/ ldong ros dang / ga bur dang
91b7(rgyud 'bum): glaslar rtsi bsres nas slar yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa ni thams cad
92a1(rgyud 'bum): du mgul pa legs par sbyar te/ de nas don yod rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas lan bdun phyag rgya bcings so// de nas mig sman gyis byug
92a2(rgyud 'bum): na nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ / skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dpral bar thig le bgyis na mi gda'
92a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / mig la bskus te tshig gzhan mi smra bar rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// mchod pa phal po ches cher mchod
92a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / nor 'du ba grub pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i dus sam bzlas brjod kyi dus su mig la bskus na bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud kyi rigs kyi lha thams cad kyi sa mi
92a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / phyis kyang bgegs byed par mi nus te/ bar chad bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// bde ba sgrub pa'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga grub par 'gyur ro// mig la byugs te skye bo mang po'i
92a6(rgyud 'bum): nang du zhugs na de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lha ba lhub rgyan phal po che 'grub par 'gyur ro// bud med kyang mig mi 'dzums par lta bzhin du bdag nyid dam nor dbang
92a7(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / mig la byugs te dgon pa chen por zhugs na chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa dang / sbrul dang / dbyig dug dang / sbrul gyi dug gi 'jigs pa
92b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bde legs su slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad la mig sman bskus na smra ba rnams kyi bla na med par 'gyur te thams
92b2(rgyud 'bum): cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du mchis nas mig la byugs na thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur zhing / 'jigs pa thams cad las bsgral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas
92b3(rgyud 'bum): zin pa thams cad la mig la bskus na gdug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / rims zhag bzhi pa thams cad la mig la
92b4(rgyud 'bum): bskus na rims nad thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / dug mi bzad pa 'tshal la mig la bskus na dug ma mchis par 'gyur ro// gdon thams cad kyis zin pa la mig la bskus na gdon brgyad khri
92b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi stong las thar par 'gyur ro/ / mig bro 'tshal ba la bskus pa tsam gyi mod la byang bar 'gyur ro// klang pa cher bro 'tshal ba la'ang mig la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa'i srin
92b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i gdon dang brjed byed kyis zin pa la mig la bskus pa tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po khros pas gsad par 'os pa gang su'ang rung ba khrid pa mig la bskus pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams
92b7(rgyud 'bum): cad spang ba'i thar par 'gyur ro/ / nor bu chen po'i mig la bskus na rang gi gzugs kyis dus su mdun na mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol cing dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i
93a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / dpal lha mo'i mig la bskus te mig mi 'dzum par don yod rgyal po'i snying po lan gsum bzlas na/ dpal
93a2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo chen mo mchis nas dgos pa thams cad dang 'bru rab tu mang po stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / nyal ba'i tshe mig la bskus te nyal na rmi lam bzang po mang zhing phal che ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'phags
93a3(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs mthong bar stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dran pa dang blo gros rgya chen por 'gyur ro// mig la bskus te tshogs kyi
93a4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su zhugs na mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na rtag tu mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu blta 'tshal
93a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gi'u wang dang lhan cig sbyar te mig la bskus nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na dbang phyug rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// longs spyod chen po phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ro//
93a6(rgyud 'bum): don chen po 'grub par yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang / blon po'i tshogs dang / 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyur nas thams cad dbang du gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// dpal lha mo chen
93a7(rgyud 'bum): mo'i gzugs brnyan gyi mig la bskus na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing / las bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// nag po chen po'i gzugs
93b1(rgyud 'bum): brnyan gyi dpral ba dang mig la bskus na gnod sbyin thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mi ro'i mig la bskus na ldang bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad kyis zin pa thams
93b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi mig la bskus na/ dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang / gsang sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang slar zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur ro// bkres pa'i mig la bskus te
93b3(rgyud 'bum): grong du zhugs na bza' ba dang btung ba'i ston mo lhun gyis 'grub cing 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / bsod snyoms pa'i mig la bskus te bsod snyoms la mchis na kha zas sna tshogs mang po dang yon phal po
93b4(rgyud 'bum): che 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / sme ba dang / ling tog dang / rab rib dang / chu bur dang / mtshan mo 'thob pa dang / g.yal ba dang / tshag po dang / mig gi rdzi ma rdung ba dang / mig sle bo de dag thams cad
93b5(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mig nad thams cad las sos par 'gyur ro// lha'i mig dag pa 'dab bzang dang mtshungs pa 'dab bzangs kyi mthong ba thob nas thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang / dbang du gyur
93b6(rgyud 'bum): nas nor rnyed pa dang / don grub pa'ang thob nas dbang phyug bla na med par 'gyur ro// de nas nor dang / 'bru dang / gos dang / lhab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang thams cad dgug pa dang / 'phel bar
93b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyid pa dang / don yod me lha dgug pa'i sbyin sreg rgya chen po brjod par bgyi'o// grub pa kun gyi bla na med// don kun grub pas mod la ni// mkhas rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid// dbang phyug skal
94a1(rgyud 'bum): ba phun sum tshogs/ / mod nyid kho nar 'thob 'gyur bar// the tshom du yang mi bgyi zhing // yid gnyis nyis kyang ma lags so// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos dag dang // legs par
94a2(rgyud 'bum): bkrus pa'i las sgrub bo/ / sbyin sreg bla na med 'phel ba// 'di ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab// kar na rtsa ba sdong bur bcas// 'dab ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// arga'i shing dang blag shing gi/ yam sreg
94a3(rgyud 'bum): dag gis me spar la/ / sa bon bdun po 'bras dang bcas// 'bras yos til dang yungs kar dang // zho dang sbrang rtsi mar dang ni// yungs mar dag dang bsres pa yi// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad tshang bgyi//
94a4(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po lan stong rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ba tshang ba dang / de nas don yod lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas gu gul dang / ske tshe'i 'bras bu dang / mar du sbyar bas sbyin
94a5(rgyud 'bum): sreg bgyi'o/ / dgos pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / de'i tshe bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gnas mal dang / stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba 'phel
94a6(rgyud 'bum): bar yang 'gyur ro/ / gos sna tshogs dang / ltab lhub dang / rgyan dang / rgyan 'phyang dang / me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa rnams lhun gyis grub par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug gi
94a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la nyin zhag gcig mchis nas mig la bskus te/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan
94b1(rgyud 'bum): dgu bcu bzlas brjod bgyis la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ de nas mig la mig sman gyis bskus na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis par 'gyur
94b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ mig sman grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi gtso bo rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// sgra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// bskal pa khrir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// mig sman 'dis
94b3(rgyud 'bum): mig la byugs na nyin par ji lta ba bzhin du mtshan mo mthong bar 'gyur zhing mi gda' bar yang 'gyur ro/ / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad du zhugs na thams cad kyi dpon
94b4(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bdun pa/ mig sman 'dis mig la byugs nas ma mo'i gnas
94b5(rgyud 'bum): su zhugs na/ lha gtso bo de dag mig mi 'dzums par lta bar bgyid pa la khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// de nas ma mo dang lha'i gtso bo thams cad mdun du mchis nas mchog thams cad stsol bar
94b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du las thams cad sgrub par bgyid pas mchis par 'gyur ro// ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bkur cing snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// rtag par rgyud du srung ba dang /
94b7(rgyud 'bum): skyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir gnas shing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas gi'u wang sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ don yong rgyal po grub pa yis// rig sngags 'chang ba bde myong zhing // lnga
95a1(rgyud 'bum): dang lha min mchod pa dang / / sgrub pa'i don kun 'grub pa dang // dbang du 'gyur ba dam pa dang // mkha' la mchi ba'i dam pa dang // mi snang shin tu rnyed dka' dang // mod la phug tu
95a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa dang / / nags kyi nang du 'jug pa dang // ri sul dag tu 'jug pa dang // thang dag la ni rgyu ba dang // klu gnas mtshor ni 'jug pa dang // de bzhin chu klung che bsgral dang // rdzu 'phrul grub dang bskyed pa
95a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin 'jigs dang sgrib kun dang // nad kun zhi bar bgyid pa nyid// sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// g.yul ngor g.yul las rgyal bgyid de// rtag tu dgra kun rlag par bgyid// gdon rigs
95a4(rgyud 'bum): kun dag tshar gcod cing / / rims rnaMs thams cad zlog par bgyid// sngon gyi sgrib pa 'jig bgyid cing // sdig pa thams cad nyams par bgyid// dbang phyug stsol cing skal ba stsol// nor dang 'bru rnams
95a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar bgyid/ / 'thab pa 'thab mo rtsod pa dang // 'gyed pa rab tu zhi bar bgyid// bcing ba dang ni shing sgrog dang // khong sgril lcags sgrog phye mar rlog/ rgyal po gdug pa khros pa yis// gsad par
95a6(rgyud 'bum): 'os pa sel bar bgyid/ / da ltar 'di la brten pa nas// mi bdag bu sdug bzhin smra zhing // mi bde kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'di ni kun tu sdug pa dang // gnas kun mchis par mchos par 'os//
95a7(rgyud 'bum): lus can snying du rtag tu sdug/ rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa'i// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang ni// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dmangs rigs dang // bud med kun dang de
95b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / skyes pa khye'u bu mo yi// rtag tu gnang chen dag tu 'gyur// gi'u wang bla na med pa'o// 'di la gang dag rtag brten na// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug ste// mchog sbyin rtag tu mchod par
95b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyid/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// nyin dang mtshan du srung ba dang // rtag tu mchog stsol phyir mchis so// gzhan yang lha ni mang po dang // klu yi rgyal po mthu chen dang // 'byung po gnod
95b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin srin po dang / / grul bum mi min lto 'phye che// dri za lha min nyid dag dang // nam mkha' lding dbang mthu chen te// de dag thams cad srung ba yi// ched du nyin dang mtshan dag tu// rang dbang nyid
95b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis gnas par 'gyur/ / gi'u wang grub pa dam pa po// de ltar stobs dang ldan pa lags// de nas rig sngags 'chang ba yis// gtsang gyur legs par khrus bgyis nas// gtsang ma yi ni gos
95b5(rgyud 'bum): bgo ste/ / gi'u wang legs par bsgrub nas su// dmar po chen po nyid dag dang // gur kur dag dang mnyam sbyar la// zangs kyi snod du bkang nas su// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs mdun du// stong
95b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad ni tshang bzlas nas/ / rgya dar gyi ni kha dgum mo// de nas seng lde gi shing dang / arga'i shing gi yam sreg shing gi me spar la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / 'bras dang /
95b7(rgyud 'bum): til dang bsres la/ zho dang sbrang rtsi mar du bsres te lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyi'o// lan stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / de nas me zhi zhing me mdag phra mo'ang zhi ba dang thal ba blangs te snod kyi nang du stsal
96a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de nas slar yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ phyag rgya'i phyag rgyas kyang dbang bskur ro// de nas dpral ba'i dbus su thig le bgyis
96a2(rgyud 'bum): nas nam mkha' la 'phur nas rig sngags 'chang chen po'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur zhing skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro//
96a3(rgyud 'bum): lo dgu khri dgu stong du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing gnas kyi sgo thams cad rtag tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// dpral ba la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar gyur nas gnas thams cad du zhugs na gnas thams cad
96a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag por 'gyur zhing 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po mthu dang ldan pa thams cad kyis yongs
96a5(rgyud 'bum): su bskor nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// mig la bskus na ji ltar nyin par bzhin du mtshan mo snang zhing thams cad du gter mthong bar 'gyur
96a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / sa'i phug dang thang gi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// thang gi gnas su zhugs na thang gi dgos pa thams cad bgyi ste/ slar yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// chu klung chen po'i nang du zhugs na khyim dang
96a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// chab la gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur
96b1(rgyud 'bum): nas mchis par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i mtsho dang gnas su ji ltar rang gi khyim bzhin du 'jug cing 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lus mtha' dag byugs te g.yul ngor g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du zhugs na/ ya
96b2(rgyud 'bum): lad dang go cha bgos pa bzhin du mthong nas thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / khar bsrel te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro//
96b3(rgyud 'bum): gang la tshig smras pa de dag thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang la blangs pa de dag thams cad ster bar 'gyur ro// gang la bsgo ba de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// khar 'chos
96b4(rgyud 'bum): nas gang dang gang du mchis pa de dang der skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad bdag nyid dam nor dbang du gyur nas mchis par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la byugs nas su
96b5(rgyud 'bum): la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / mngag gzhug pa rnams dbang du gyur nas bsgo ba bzhin
96b6(rgyud 'bum): mchis par 'gyur ro/ / mdzub mo g.yas pa la bskus nas ser ba dang / sprin dang / 'brug gi dus su sprin la mngon sum du bstan te bsdigs na/ grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser pa thams cad zhi
96b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro// char ha cang ches na lag pa g.yas pa sprin la mngon sum du bstan pas ha cang char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab
97a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus su lag pa g.yas pa'i lag mthil la byugs nas klu gnas pa'i mtsho'i chu la thal mo lan gsum brdabs na/ de'i mod la klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po gtong bar
97a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te mod la char pa mi 'bebs na de'i tshe lan lnga brdegs pa dang / klu de dag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe char pa mi 'bebs pa de'i tshe klu thams cad
97a3(rgyud 'bum): la klad pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te lan bdun bsnun na klu'i rgyal po thams cad la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi rig sngags phung bar bgyis par
97a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyi mig la bskus na/ bskus pa tsam gyi mod la gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims kyis thebs pa rnams kyi dpral bar la thig le
97a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na rims zhag gcig pa 'am/ nyin gnyis pa 'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa'i rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// nad kyis zin pa rnams la khrus bgyis na mod la nad thams cad las
97a6(rgyud 'bum): thar par 'gyur ro/ / sha bkra dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / shu ba dang / 'brum bu rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / shu ba mched
97a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo mched pa la byugs pa tsam gyis thar par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis mi gdug par 'gyur ro// dug gis myos par bgyis pa thams cad
97b1(rgyud 'bum): la 'tshal ba tsam gyis thar par gyur ro/ / lton pa dang / skran dang / dmu chu dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / gzhang nad dang / tshad pa dang / gcin srib
97b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsung pa dang / ma gzhu ba dang / rtug skams la bsros nas 'chal ba tsam gyi mod la zhi bar 'gyur zhing / phyis lan 'ga' yang gnod par bgyid par mi 'gyur ro// 'tshogs mar gi'u wang gi ril bu
97b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ phug gi sgo dang nye bar mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa la'ang byugs te/ mgo la thal mo brdabs na phug gi sgo thams cad 'bye bar 'gyur ro// bag tsha ba ma mchis par 'jug ste/ slar cung zad kyang
97b4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ / gnas de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur nas mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro// dgos pa sgrub pa chen po thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rkang pa
97b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la byugs te me 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na me lha rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis nas lag pa nas bzung ste/ rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang bdag gi gzhal med khang gi gnas su
97b6(rgyud 'bum): zhugs shig/ rig sngags 'chang gis bsgo ba thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o zhes smra ba na/ de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang gis bgyi ba ci mchis pa de bsgo bar bgyi ste/ thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro//
97b7(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa gnyis la byugs na glang po che bdun gyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la byugs na tshugs pa ma mchis pa'i gyad du 'gyur ro// byin pa gnyis la byugs na 'bab chu chen po'i pha rol
98a1(rgyud 'bum): tu rgal bar 'gyur ro/ / mgrin pa la byugs nas nags khung du zhugs na nags khud kyi gnas kyi sgo thams cad dbye nas sman gyi rdzas thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na//
98a2(rgyud 'bum): mchis par 'gyur te ci 'chal ba de blang bar 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi ril bu bgyis te khar bsrel nas ri sul dang sman gshong du zhugs nas skad drag po lan gsum gdon par bgyi ste/ ri sul dang sman
98a3(rgyud 'bum): gshong gi gnas gsang ba'i sgo gang dag lags pa 'bye bar 'gyur zhing / de na gnas pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad rang rang gis gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing las thams cad bgyid
98a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / nags tshang tshing gi sman gyi rdzas gang lags pa dag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur zhing / gang dag gi bcud kyi mchog de dag la 'dzag
98a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ bcud srung ba de dag kyang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'tshal ba bag tsha ba ma mchis par dgos pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig
98a6(rgyud 'bum): le bgyis nas snying la cung zad ci bsams pa dang / yid la bsams shing brnag pa'i dgos pa de dag thams cad mod la grub par 'gyur ro// lto la thig le bgyis na kha zas dang btung ba'i ston mo 'dod
98a7(rgyud 'bum): dgu thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad lhun gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rtsibs logs gnyis la byugs na ji ltar bsams shing don du gnyer ba'i gos rnams 'thob par 'gyur/
98b1(rgyud 'bum): ro// sgal tshigs la byugs na ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i mal dang stan 'thob par 'gyur ro// rna ba la byugs sam gnad dang gnad thams cad kyi gnas su byug na ji ltar bsams pa'i rgyan dang lhab
98b2(rgyud 'bum): lhub thob par 'gyur ro/ / mjug do la byugs na rta'i bzhon pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nang par tshig gzhan mi smra bar gi'u wang gi ril bu re re la don yod rgyal po'i snying po bzlas nas 'tshal
98b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ nyi ma dang po la tshigs su bcad pa stong bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyin gcig bzhin nyis 'gyur du bgyis nas bklags na 'dzin par 'gyur ro// zhag bdun gyis thogs pa mang por 'gyur ro//
98b4(rgyud 'bum): zhag bcu bzhir bgyis na mi 'am ci mo lta bu'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis na thos pa bsags pa'i rgya mtsho chen por 'gyur ro// ka la bing ka'i dbyangs ltar mnyen cing snyan la rna ba'i sgra
98b5(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ / bu'i ched du mar dang lhan cig stsal na bya rog lta bu dang mo gsham rnams kyis kyang bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// btson rar stsal ba dang shing sgrog dang / lcags sgrog dang / gtan pa dang /
98b6(rgyud 'bum): khong sgril la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyi mod la dum bur dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// 'thor bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes bco lnga la don yon rgyal po'i snying po lan bdun bzlas
98b7(rgyud 'bum): la/ khro bo'i rgyal pos rang la bskur nas gi'u wang gi ril bu dang spos chab bsres pas khrus bgyi'o// khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs
99a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / nub gsum du khrus bgyis na gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa'i mchog thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza
99a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gdug pa dang / sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang thams cad kyis thams cad du 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// phyis lan 'ga'
99a3(rgyud 'bum): yang sdig pas dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ / gi'u wang gi ril bu til mar dang bsres te kha gdong la byugs nas rgyal po'i mdun du mchis na bu bzhin du phang du 'khyud nas dga' ba chen po 'thob pa dang /
99a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po khro bo'i 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lus thog thag tu byug na gsad par 'os pa'i lus la'ang mtshon gyis phog par mi 'gyur te/ dum bur dum bur 'chag par 'gyur ro// 'da'
99a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phangs na lus la 'bab par mi 'gyur zhing gzhu 'chag par 'gyur ro/ / gi'u wang gi ril bu mgul tu btags nas 'brog dgon pa dang / ri dang / nags tshang tshig gi bgrod dka' bar zhugs na chom po dang /
99a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yo can dang / rkun po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma lags pa dang / gcan gangan gdug pa dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te mi
99a7(rgyud 'bum): gda' bar 'gyur ro/ / dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na thams cad du pha rol las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod gnas chen por yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mthu dang brtson 'grus chen po
99b1(rgyud 'bum): brdzi ba med pas pha rol zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/ / dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi gnang chen du 'gyur te/ thams cad lha 'tshal
99b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// dgos pa mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// byin pa g.yas pa la gtags na dub pa ma mchis par dpag tshad stong du mchis par 'gyur ro// gi'u wang gi
99b3(rgyud 'bum): ril bu khar bsrel la lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar gyi don yod lcags kyu bzlas nas drangs te tshig gzhan mi smra bar gnas mthon por 'gyur te/ phyogs gang du bsams pa'i skyes pa dang / bud mas
99b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mchis pa'i phyogs der yungs kar gyis gtor na mod la bkug par 'gyur te mchis par 'gyur ro// gal te dpag tshad brgya tsam na gnas pa zhig na'ang gdon mi 'tshal bar de
99b5(rgyud 'bum): zhag gsum gyis mchis par 'gyur te yid gnyis mi bgyi'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa 'am/ lag pa g.yon pa la gi'u wang gi ril bu btags na gang du reg par nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang
99b6(rgyud 'bum): mu tig dang / shang ka shi la dang / b+hu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / gos dang / lha ba lbub de dag thams cad bkug nas mchis par 'gyur te/ ci 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro// byan tshang du
99b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas tshang mang gi sgor thal mo brdabs na/ 'tshed pa dang 'tsheng pa'i kha zas de dag thams cad bkug nas mchi bar 'gyur te/ gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// spos 'tshong gi tshong khang
100a1(rgyud 'bum): mang du mchis na tshong khang gi yo byad thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / chang 'tshong gi sgor thal mo brdabs na chang gi bum pa thams cad mchi bar 'gyur ro// bang ba'i sgor
100a2(rgyud 'bum): thal mo brdabs na 'bru thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ / bcud 'byin pa'i khyim du zhugs nas 'khrul 'khor la reg par bgyis na/ bu ram gyi khu ba dang sha kha ra'i glegs bu thams cad mchi bar
100a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang du 'tshal ba der mngags par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor mun tshab tshub na thal mo brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa thams cad gnyid sgrogs par 'gyur ro// dgra bo'i sgor btab na
100a4(rgyud 'bum): bskrad par 'gyur ro/ / mtshon mkhan gyi khyim du 'phangs na mtshon cha dang go cha rnams rengs pa dang rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i sgor btab na phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang
100a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can gdug pa thams cad bcings pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmugs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// dung la byugs nas gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang du grags pa de dag tu 'thab pa dang /
100a6(rgyud 'bum): 'thab mo dang / gnod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / byang dang / dug sbyar ma dang / dug dang / nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi sgor bus na yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang /
100a7(rgyud 'bum): mi ngas thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyugs lhas su bus na 'o ma thams cad phrogs par 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// ra lug gi lhas su bus nar lug gi 'o ma
100b1(rgyud 'bum): phrogs par 'gyur te/ gar 'tshal ba de mchi bar 'gyur ro// skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dbus su bus na thams cad sgren mor gyur nas go thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro// rdza rnga la byugs te 'khyams
100b2(rgyud 'bum): mthon po'i steng du brdungs na grang ba dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad bcings pa dang bshig par 'gyur te tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu ser ba bkag par 'gyur ro//
100b3(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer ram yul 'khor mtha' dag tu bus na nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad
100b4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mi ngas dang mu ge'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong dag bgyid par 'gyur te/ thams cad la sbar bar bgyi'o//
100b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong ba zhi pa dang rgyas pa nang thams cad zhi bar bgyid cing / sdig pa thams cad 'jig par bgyid pa/ yams kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/
100b6(rgyud 'bum): mu ge'i dgon pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gdon dang / brjed byed thams cad rlag par bgyid pa brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar
100b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas legs par khrus bgyis te/ spos dri zhim pos lus byugs la/ gos gtsang ma bgos la spos dri zhim pos bsgos nas byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag cing / sems can thams
101a1(rgyud 'bum): cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje chen pos snying gdung bas sbyin sreg gi las 'di bgyi ste/ arga'i shing dang / sha mi'i shing dang / shing 'o ma can nam/ ji ltar yang byang chub
101a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi shing ste/ de dag gi yam sreg shing gi me spar la/ 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar du bsres par sbyin sreg bgyid
101a3(rgyud 'bum): don yod zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ de nas don yod zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing ngo // de nas sbyin sreg
101a4(rgyud 'bum): gi dgos pa rnams mthar phyin pa'i mod kho nar dpag tshad gcig khor yug tu yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa mi bzad pa dang / rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi
101a5(rgyud 'bum): dpung gi 'jigs pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / chom po dang / g.yon can dang / rkun po dang / gcan gzan gdug pa can dang / sbrul dang / dug mi bzad pa
101a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / gdug pa dang bcas pa'i srog chags kyi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgyad khor yug tu rims mi 'byung ste/ gnod pas ma lags/
101a7(rgyud 'bum): nad kyis ma lags te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / nang khrug
101b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / skrod pa dang / mdangs gcod pa dang / 'ching ba dang / bsdigs pa rnams kyis mi tshugs te rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro// shin tu lo
101b2(rgyud 'bum): legs shing mdangs dga' la skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang zhing / me tog dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// nor dang / 'bru dang / lo tog rab tu mang po 'grub par 'gyur ro// shin
101b3(rgyud 'bum): tu ro dang ldan pa dang / shin tu smin pa dang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshang tshing dang / myu gu dang / rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu bzang po yongs su rdzogs
101b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / phyir zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yul de na yid du mi mchi ba'i reg pa myong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul de na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dpangs rigs dang //
101b5(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams rtag tu nad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bde bar 'tsho ba dang yid la dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur ro// byams pa dang snying rje'i sems kyis gnas par
101b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de dag thams cad kyang legs par srung ba'i phyir rtag tu bsrung ba dang /
101b7(rgyud 'bum): bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su bgyid par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi'ang dpung dang bcas te yongs su sbyong ba
102a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad bzlog pa dang / srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang phyug
102a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu 'khor dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
102a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad kyis yul de legs par bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gzi byin stsol bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad gcig kho ra khor yug tu sems can thams cad yongs
102a4(rgyud 'bum): su srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rig dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la srung ba
102a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed par bgyid par 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i las 'di'i mthus sems can thams cad sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
102a6(rgyud 'bum): yul de la dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro// sems can
102a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la dbugs 'byin par ston par 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad yongs su srung ba'i don du nyi ma dang zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang bcas pa legs par 'byor par 'gyur ro// 'phags
102b1(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag par rgyun du skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// yongs su bsrung ba dang yid kyi brnag pa thams/
102b2(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'gyur te/ yang nas yang du lta bar 'gyur ro// de nas des sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang dri chu skyo ma bgyis te phyogs bzhi kun tu dbang bskur na mtshams chen po bcad pa bgyis par
102b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / nad kyi zin pa thams cad kyi nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// rims thams cad la thig le bgyis na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dri chab dang thal bas khrus bgyis na
102b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / btson ra na mchis pa 'am phyag sbal na mchis pa'i gos la bskus pa na ral bar 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa dang dug gis myos pa
102b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la bskus na gdug par mi 'gyur ro/ / me dgug pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir pad+ma'i rigs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
102b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po brjod par bgyi ste/ 'di ni ma bsgrubs par las brgya spong bgyid par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs rgyu skar
102b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po dang / / shin tu bkra shis mchog dge la// legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang bgo/ byams pa'i sems la mnyam par gzhag/ sems can kun la brtse ba dang // snying rje dam pas brgyan pa dang //
103a1(rgyud 'bum): don yod zhags pa rig sngags che// grub pa bla med cho ga'i rgyal// bklags pas las rnams thams cad dag/ 'grub par bgyid de som nyi med// 'jig rten bla ma'i snying po dag/ de
103a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gang dag rtag brjod na/ / lus can rtag tu mchog sbyin gyis// phyag na pad+ma rtag tu 'gyur// ji ltar gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong la// bsod nams phung po khri khrag bskyed// dge ba'i
103a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba sogs pa dang / / sangs rgyas bya ba bgyid par 'gyur// smyung ba bgyis nas bzlas brjod gcig/ mkhas pa'i mis ni brjod bgyis pa// dge slong pha dang dge slong ma// dge bsnyen po mos de bzhin du// bde ba
