103a4(rgyud 'bum): can du myur du mchi/ / sdug bsngal mi bzad myong 'gyur ba'i// nyon mongs pa las thar bar 'gyur// rtag tu sangs rgyas byang sems dag/ mthong bar 'gyur te som nyi med// de nas don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i
103a5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga brjod par bgyi ste/ bzlas brjod kyi ni las bgyis na// rig sngags 'chang de nye bar 'grub// don yod zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi// mdun du ba lci'i dkyil
103a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bgyi/ / gru bzhi kho ra khor yug tu// tshod rtsi dkar po zhib mo yis// gru bzhi lhab par thig gdab bo// ngos bzhi rnams su sgro bzhi dag/ dbus nas ngos bzhi rag shis su dbab// tsan dan dkar po
103a7(rgyud 'bum): bri ba ni/ / dkyil 'khor mchog la pad+ma dag/ 'dab brgya gur kum gyis gtong cing // pad+ma'i ze ba'i dkyil dag tu// ma zhom pa yi bum pa ni// spos chab kyis ni bkang ba yi// yungs kar ldan pa
103b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bgyi/ / a ka ru yi bdug pa dbul// bum pa gang ba'ang dgod par bgyi// me tog sna tshogs brgyan par bgyi// mchod yon snod kyang bzhi gzhag go/ rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur par/
103b2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// legs bkrus rnam par dag pa dang // gso sbyong dag ni blangs pa dang // dkar gsum zas ni 'tshal nas su// dus gsum du ni khrus bgyi'o// dus gsum bzla
103b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyi ba ni/ / don yod zhags pa'i snying po dag/ dus gsum du yang brgya rtsa brgyad// 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ mngon sum skyil mo krung bcas te// bzlas brjod phyag rgya bcings
103b4(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / bgrang 'phreng dag ni blang bar bgyi// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ brkyang nas zhi zhing dul ba yi// yid kyis byams sems mnyam par gzhag/ ting 'dzin brtan pas lus snyoms par//
103b5(rgyud 'bum): legs par bzhag ste zhi bar lta// tshig gzhan mi smra bzlas brjod bgyi// bzlas brjod bgyib tsam gyis mod la sa chen po g.yo bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te phyag bgyis na
103b6(rgyud 'bum): sa chen po'ang g.yo bar 'gyur/ brtan pa'i sems kyis skrag par mi bgyi'o// sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa mthong ba tsam du
103b7(rgyud 'bum): bris la/ ji tsam na khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas so// lan bdun bzlas pa tsam gyi mod la sa chen po g.yo zhing sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba
104a1(rgyud 'bum): nas 'od zer byung nas kun tu snang bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang de'ang cher snying dga' ba dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu rab tu dga' bas spu gzing zhes bgyid
104a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gdong du blta bar bgyi ste/ gdong du bltas pa tsam gyi mod la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag g.yas pa nas legs so/
104a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig bsgyur bar bgyid cing kun tu legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra byung na/ rig sngags 'chang gi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob nas lus yongs su dag pa chen
104a4(rgyud 'bum): po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba sa ya phrag brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// lus 'jam pa
104a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / shin tu gzhon sha chags pa dang / mnyen par 'gyur ro// skra cung zad 'khyil ba dang / mnyen pa dang / snyan pa'i tshig smra bar 'gyur ro// mig yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa
104a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / gnyen ma dang / skra skye bo spangs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la lta ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// ji tsam du 'dug ce na/ 'phags
104a7(rgyud 'bum): paspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs ston cing dbugs 'byin par bgyid de/ lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag nas mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la mchi ba 'am/ mi gda'
104b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi ba 'am/ lha'i mig 'thob pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing lta ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa 'am/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhing mo 'grub pa
104b2(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ gtsug lag smra ba'am/ gsang sngags smra ba 'am/ thos pa 'dzin pa nyid dam/ gter smra ba 'am/ nor bsgyur ba smra ba 'am/ mig 'phrul smra ba 'am/ 'jig rten du 'gro ba 'am/ phug tu 'jug pa'am
104b3(rgyud 'bum): klu'i gnas su 'jug pa 'am/ zhing smra ba'am/ gnod sbyin dgug pa 'am/ srin po dgug pa 'am/ ro langs slang ba 'am/ nags khrod du 'jug pa 'am/ ri la rgyu ba 'am/ grong khyer du 'jug pa 'am/
104b4(rgyud 'bum): sman lta ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'am/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang nyid dam/ 'khor los sgyur ba nyid dam/ rgyal po 'thob pa 'am/ yul 'thob pa 'am/ yul gyi
104b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag po nyid dam/ dpung chen po rab tu gzhom pa'am/ bskrad pa 'am/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa de dag thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar gang du
104b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bar yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshams ma mchis pa lnga rnams byang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na sems can thams cad la lta ba sgrib pa dang bral ba dag pa zhes bgyi ba'i
104b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / smig sman sgrub par 'tshal bas des zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ldong ros kyi mig sman zangs kyi snod kyi nang du stsal te/ tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis la 'phags
105a1(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du bzhag nas/ legs par khrus bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung
105a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas te mchis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshams bcing bas mtshams bcing bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun du bzlas par bgyi'o// zas dkar gsum 'tshal bar
105a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang rung bas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas la goms par bgyis nas bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la
105a4(rgyud 'bum): zangs kyi snod 'bar ba dang / rlangs pa dang / dbu ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de blangs nas mig la byugs na nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis mchis nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
105a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// phug gi gnas phye ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//
105a6(rgyud 'bum): gter byung ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang du 'tshal ba der mchi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za
105a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gdon dang / mi dang / mi ma yin dang // phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ bco lnga la tshig gzhan mi smra bar 'phags pa spyan ras/
105b1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i bdag nyid kyi
105b2(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis nas lag pa g.yas pa spyi bor bzhag pa dang / dri med 'phags kyi lta ba'i cho 'phrul zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
105b3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs pa'i byin gyi rlabs bkod pa yang dag par lta ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul thob nas tshe'i tshad lha'i bskal pa stong du 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid lha'i rang bzhin thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
105b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis dam pa'i chos kyi gtam gleng bar mdzad pa thos par 'gyur ro// bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po thams cad bsu ba'i slad du lha'i gzugs kyi mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ / skra cung zad 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// pad+ma snang ba'i gzhal med khang zhes bgyi ba'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i gzhal med khang mthong bar
105b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas rang gi lus rdo rje sra ba bdag nyid kyi snying po'i rang bzhin thob par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des spos chab des bum pa bkang nas lan drug khri nyis stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ byang chub sems
105b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du nyin zhag gcig mchis par 'gyur bas khrus bgyi'o/ / khrus bgyis pa tsam gyi mod la lus rdo rje las byung ba'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin
106a1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad de la gzigs par 'gyur ro/ / tshe lha'i lo khrir 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po'i gdon thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lha dang klu
106a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi dpon por 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam mam sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mod la gdon thams cad dang brjed byed thams cad babs nas
106a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad smra bar 'gyur te/ bden pa 'am/ mi bden pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ yang dag pa ma lags pa 'am/ skal ba dang ldan pa'am/ skal ba dang mi ldan pa'am/ byung ba'am/ ma byung ba'am/
106a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa de dag thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs te las bgyi ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// bran bzhin du las thams cad rtag tu bgyid
106a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / yang na 'jig rten thams cad so sor bsgral bar 'tshal ba 'am/ thams cad dbang du gyur nas gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas
106a6(rgyud 'bum): sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar bar bgyid par 'tshal lam/ don yod ye shes bkod pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'tshal lam/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'tshal lam/
106a7(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des gzugs brnyan so so ba bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i gzugs su bgyis te/
106b1(rgyud 'bum): ral pa'i thor zhugs dang / ri dgas e n+ya ya'i pags pas brgyan pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung ngam 'greng ba/ drung na nor babang pus mogs
106b2(rgyud 'bum): pa phab pa/ g.yon na khro bo'i rgyal po gdong gyen du lta ba khro bo'i gzugs lag pa drug pa/ 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa/ thams cad ring bsrel dang bcas par
106b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ste/ ri'i steng gi pad+ma'i stan la mchis par bgyi'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bgyis nas nyin zhag gcig mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang gis pa'i rnam lngas
106b4(rgyud 'bum): nye reg bgyi'o/ / chab dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// snying rje chen pos gdungs pa'i snying gis blta bar bgyi'o// gal te 'di lta bu'i cho gas mi bgyid na bklags pa
106b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi mod la'ang 'grub par 'gyur na/ bzlas brjod kyi las kyi tsho gas lha mos kyang ci 'tshal/ yang rig sngags 'chang gang zhig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma phrag brgyad bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i
106b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mchod par 'tshal lam/ lta bar 'tshal lam/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bskyed par 'tshal lam/ sems can thams cad
106b7(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu gzhag par 'tshal lam/ thams cad kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des dge slong pha 'am/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge
107a1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ btsun mo 'am/ gzhan su'ang rung bas thams cad cho ga 'di bzhin bgyis te/ des ci 'byor pa'i gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
107a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs brnyan bgyi'o// de nas kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/ gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ gru bzhi cha 'byes par li khris thig gdab par
107a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / dkyil 'khor dbus su pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bgyi'o// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'i dbus su ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang 'phreng gzhag par bgyi'o// me tog sna tshogs kyis mdzes par bgyi'o// spos
107a4(rgyud 'bum): chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o/ / mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o// pog por lnga las a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par
107a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / dris bsgos pa'i mar me bcu drug spar bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi'o// me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dbul bar bgyi'o//
107a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te/ bdag nyid la dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bgyi'o//
107a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dmigs pa yid la bgyis nas phyogs bcur yid kyis mchod cing phyag bgyi'o// bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bzlas brjod brgya rtsa
107b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bgyis pa dang sa chen po g.yos par 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid dga' bar gyur nas 'bar bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang zhal mngon sum du ston pa nye bar ston par/
107b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ral pa'i gseb 'bar bar gyur nas legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod
107b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na grub pa chen po'i rtags ston par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa
107b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gzigs pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / don yon zhags pa grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i rtse na de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mthong bar
107b5(rgyud 'bum): gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad pa lan gsum bzlas na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
107b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi gzugs skya rengs 'char ka'i dus su mdun du mchis nas pad+ma dri ma med pa zhes bgyi ba'i zhags pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / grub pa thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med
107b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang legs so zhes bgyi ba stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / gang su'ang rung bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong na de ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug khri bzhi stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par
108a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de la lha thams cad dang tshangs pa la sogs te/ dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po'i lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lta 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral
108a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa bgyid par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
108a3(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po brgyad pa// / des ci 'byor pa'i gser la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa
108a4(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ de nas zhal shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la gur kum gyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa legs par 'byes pa byas te/ li khris thig btab la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su ril ba bring
108a5(rgyud 'bum): ka ra dang / bgrang 'phreng bri/ me tog sna tshogs bkram la bum pa spos chus bkang la/ me tog ci 'byor pas legs par brgyan pa bzhi gzhag/ mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bya zhing / pog por lnga nas a
108a6(rgyud 'bum): ka ru'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ / spos sna bcu drug dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bldam ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang /
108a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dag kyang dbul bar bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung bcas la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bdag nyid la dbang bskur ro// khro bo'i rgyal po lan gcig
108b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas la phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas te/ yid kyis phyag byas la lus kyis kyang phyag byas te/ bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
108b2(rgyud 'bum): pas sa chen po g.yo bar gyur zhing bdag nyid snying dga' la 'bar bar snang ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad zhal nye bar ston par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dbu ral pa'i
108b3(rgyud 'bum): gseb 'bar zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo / / brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa gnyis pas ni dngos grub chen po'i mtshan ma ston to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags
108b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang la don yod pa'i zhags pa 'grub par 'gyur ro//
108b5(rgyud 'bum): tho rangs de bzhin gshegs pa de dag zhal ston par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod brgya
108b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad gsum pas ni skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na bzhugs te/ pad+ma'i dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa sbyin par mdzad cing / dngos
108b7(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad sbyin par mdzad do/ / rgyal ba 'od dpag med legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mdzad do// gang la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi skur bstan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag
109a1(rgyud 'bum): drug cu rtsa bzhi la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro/ / lha thams cad dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams rtag tu lus ston 'dod par//
109a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang / mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar byed par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams
109a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas dngul las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs snga ma bzhin du byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor du tsan dan dkar po'i dri chab kyis
109a4(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba gzhag par bya zhing mchod yon gyi snod lnga gzhag par bgyi'o/ / me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing tsan dan dkar po'i bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod
109a5(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / dri sna bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / bdug spos kyi snod bzhi bcu gzhag par bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas
109a6(rgyud 'bum): la rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ngo // bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo
109a7(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / shar phyogs nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra grag par 'gyur zhing bdag nyid dga' bar snang ngo // rgyal po dang /
109b1(rgyud 'bum): blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ming brjod pas dpag tshad stong nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba de byed
109b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nyid bla mar 'gyur zhing cher mchod par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang /
109b3(rgyud 'bum): chu lha dang / rlung lnga la sogs pa dbang du 'gyur zhing bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// gang bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi 'khor gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dbang du
109b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / brgya rtsa brgyad lan gsum bzlas pas nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' las 'bab cing mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// mtshan mo'i lha dang nam mkha'i lha 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing
109b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / thams cad ci bgyi zhes pa'i bya ba byed cing 'dug par 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad lan bzhi bzlas pas klu thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur te/ rgya mtsho'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang
109b6(rgyud 'bum): nye dga' bo la sogs pa'i bar thams cad dbang du byas par 'gyur ro/ / zangs las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa la tsan dan dmar po'i dkyil 'khor byas
109b7(rgyud 'bum): / me tog dmar po bkram la bdug spos kyi snod bzhi nas bdug par bya zhing mar gyi mar me lnga bcu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya'o// mchod yon gyi snod bzhi bzhag la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
110a1(rgyud 'bum): phyug la mchod pa bya'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rjes su dran par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bcing bar bgyi'o// ras la bris
110a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung du 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad la dmigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la bya'o// phyogs bzhir byams pa'i lta bas blta bar bya'o//
110a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / lha ma yin dang / yi dag kyi yul thams cad yid la bya'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad yid la bya zhing snying rje'i sems kyis blta bar
110a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i tshul du bcings te bzlas brjod bya'o// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang phyogs bzhir g.yo zhing sgra grag par 'gyur la/ dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad yongs su
110a5(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur ro/ / dmyal ba'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur zhing bcom pa dang thal bar brlag par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bdag nyid kyang byang chub
110a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mthar thug gi bar du dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / lus kyang mtshan bzang pos brgyan par 'gyur zhing / sems can gang dag gis mthong ba de dag
110a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / brgya rtsa brgyad lan gnyis bzlas brjod byas pas ni sa'i 'og gi sems can mun gnag pa snang ba dang bral ba de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i
110b1(rgyud 'bum): mthus mun gnag dang bral bar 'gyur zhing 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / yongs su grol ba'i sems can de dag 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas su rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing
110b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang 'chi ba spang bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du kun nas mthu 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur zhing tshe bskal pa thub par 'gyur ro// shi
110b3(rgyud 'bum): nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi mthar thug gi bar du de nyid kyi zhab kyi drung na gnas par 'gyur zhing mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po
110b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / spos kyi rigs sna tshogs gzhan dag phye ma zhib mor byas te/ yang legs par btags la kun du ru ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / gan d+ha ra sa dang / chu dang lhan cig/
110b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te/ sha kha ra btab la legs par btags pa las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i
110b6(rgyud 'bum): / thor tsugs dang / e n+ya ya'i pags pas bzhag pa/ phyugs bdag gi tshe lugs 'dzin pa/ phyag bzhi gcig na pad+ma thogs/ gnyis pa zhags pa thogs/ gsum pa gsal shing thogs/ bzhi
110b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dbugs 'byin pa/ gdan pad+ma/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gis brgyan par bya ste/ g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma/ g.yon du dri med 'gro bya'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi 'og tu ni khro
111a1(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rgyal po'o/ / gong du ni 'od dpag med do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing gos sum phrugs bgos la tshes brgyad
111a2(rgyud 'bum): nas/ tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// spos sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor byug par bya zhing tshon sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa dang /
111a3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags kyi lha pus mo gcugs te gyen du lta ba bri bar bya'o// grwa bzhir dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i cha 'byes par bya'o// dkyil 'khor khor lug
111a4(rgyud 'bum): tupad+ma bri bar bya'o/ / grwa bzhir spos kyis bkang ba gzhag go// sgo bzhir dri dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa gang ba bzhag go// dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dang mchod yon gyi snod brgyad bzhag go// me tog sna tshogs
111a5(rgyud 'bum): dgram par bya zhing a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ / spos sna brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya/ 'phan gdugs bzang po sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par
111a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor du zhal shar phyogs su bstan pa bzhag la mchod pa bya'o// ras kyi tshen srud sna lnga pa/ srid du khru bcu drug pa/ thor
111a7(rgyud 'bum): to gcig tu gser gyi yang mig/ thor to gcig tu mu tig gi chun kor btags te/ sbrul 'khyil ba bzhin du bskyil la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ gtsang mas gos gtsang ma g.yog par bya'o//
111b1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan sum cu rtsa gnyis bcing ba byas la bdag srung ngo // khro bo'i rgyal po lan brgya rtsa
111b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas par byas la/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang phyogs bcing ba'ang bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bzhin 'dzum gyis rgyas par byas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ mi smra bar yungs
111b3(rgyud 'bum): kar 'bru re re nas bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas ras kyi srad bu'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / ras kyi srad bu de 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
111b4(rgyud 'bum): legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa grub kyis long la dgos pa thams cad byos shig/ khyod kyis yid bzhin gyi
111b5(rgyud 'bum): nor bu chen po gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma grub pas/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'ang 'bar
111b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku las spos kyi sprin chen 'byung bar 'gyur te/ spos des dpag tshad drug tsam du khyab par byed do// gang la dri mnam pa tsam gyis nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur//
111b7(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / byang dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro// lus thams cad dri ma med par 'gyur
112a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i zhags pa de blangs la zangs kyi gab tshe bzang po'i nang
112a2(rgyud 'bum): du bcug ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du gzhag par bya'o// nam dgos pa byung ba'i tshe gtsang mas khrus legs par byas te blang bar bya zhing dgos par bya'o// nyin re
112a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dus gsum du mchod par bya'o/ / rig sngags 'chang de'ang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing lus yongs su dag par sngon gyi rig sngags 'chang rnams dang lhan cig rtse zhing thams cad dbang du
112a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur te/ shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam pa rnams kyi nang du pad+ma'i snying po la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
112a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du tshe bskal pa brgya phrag stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'ang gang gis mthong ba
112a6(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa zad par 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya ste/ brgya
112a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ rang nyid nor dang bcas/ dbyig dang bcas/ 'bru dang bcas/ bran pho dang bcas/ bran
112b1(rgyud 'bum): mo dang bcas te las byed par 'gyur ro/ / sna ma'i me tog rnying pa de bsdus la/ gla rtsi dang / pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / gur kum dang / spang spos dang / sA ma ka dang / sprig
112b2(rgyud 'bum): ka dang / na la da dang / bo la dang / yungs kar rnams zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma char pa'i chu dang sbyar ba'i ril bu ni dug med par byed pa'i mchog pad+ma zhes bya ste/ thog mar grags pa dang dpal
112b3(rgyud 'bum): du byed/ nad thams cad sel ba dang rims nad thams cad nye bar sel bar byed do// brtsog shu dang / 'bras dang / me dpal dang / rkang shu dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / de thams cad la
112b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bskus na bde bar zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo / / nad de dag thams cad la khrus byas na sdig pa sel to zhes thub pas gsung ngo // tshe sbyin par byed/ rgyal po dag yul sbyin par byed do//
112b5(rgyud 'bum): thig le byas te g.yul ngor song na thams cad las rtag tu rgyal ba dang / bud med rnams dga' ba dang / dbang du 'gyur bar byed pa'i mchog yin no// byang 'joms shing dug dang / dbyig dang /
112b6(rgyud 'bum): phye ma'i dug dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba byas pa dag kyang de bzhin no// zas za ba dang khrus byed pa ni thig le'i byug pa rtag tu byas na de thams cad las 'gro ba rnams bde bar thar par 'gyur
112b7(rgyud 'bum): / / zhes 'jig rten dbang phyug gsung ngo // klad pa'i nang mi bzad pa la ni byug par bya'o// mig na ba la ni mig sman gyi thur mas so// so na ba la ni khar mur ro// ljo na pa la ni chu dron dang ngo //
113a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsib logs na ba la ni mar dang byug go/ yan lag dang nyin lag na ba la ni bsku bar bya'o// dbang du bya ba la ni lag mthil la bskubs so// nad tshabs po che la ni bsku mnye
113a2(rgyud 'bum): dang khrus bya'o/ / gnod sbyin gyi gdon bsal ba la ni sna nas gtang ba'i las bya'o// bdug pas ni gdon thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// rgyas thebs pa rnams la ni 'tshogs mar
113a3(rgyud 'bum): thig le bya'o/ / snying na ba la ni chu dron dang lan tshwa bsres pa'o// khyim zhi bar bya ba la ni 'bras yos dang gsum sbyar bas zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// thams cad du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas so//
113a4(rgyud 'bum): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la me tog bkram ste/ dri nus bkang ba bzhi gzhag cing 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod
113a5(rgyud 'bum): yon gyi snod bzhi dang / pog por bzhi gzhag ste/ a ka ru dang du ru kas bdug go/ gu gul la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te bdug par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la
113a6(rgyud 'bum): dri chab kyis mchod par bya'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig bzlas na 'thab
113a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rang gi dpung dang gzhan gyi dpung yan lag bzhi pa thams cad
113b1(rgyud 'bum): / las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gal te brgya byin rang dang lha ma yin lhan cig pas kyang ma yin na/ mi rnams kyis lta ci smos/ brgya byin dgug par 'dod na pad+ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te brgya byin gyi ming
113b2(rgyud 'bum): nas brjod la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la re re nas dbul bar bya zhing dri chab kyang dbul lo// gu gul dang / mar dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ shing arka'i me
113b3(rgyud 'bum): s+phaspar la tshes bcu bzhi la sbyin sreg bya'o/ / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang po dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa 'ongs nas mdun du 'dug ste/ bsgo ba bzhin byed cing thams cad dbang
113b4(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / brgya byin gyi go 'phang ma gtogs pa gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed de/ de ni sems mi zad do// tshangs pa rdog pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang tshangs pa rang gi
113b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis mdun du 'dug ste mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ / yid la ci 'dod pa sgrub par byed do// gu gul la lan dgu bcu bzlas te khyab 'jug la bdug cing chu dang yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
113b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te spyi bor gtor na/ khyab 'jug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs kyi bar du ston to// hi ran n+ya ka shi bu la'ang sbyin par byed cing khyab 'jug chen
113b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / dbang phyug chen po'i zhal mthong bar 'dod na rna ba g.yas par lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar la lam nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas spyi bor gtor ro// gu gul gyi
114a1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pas bdug cing arga'i chu la lan bdun bzlas te dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ngo // de nas dbang
114a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug par 'gyur zhing / rang gi tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do// mchog gang 'dod pa thams
114a3(rgyud 'bum): cad sbyin par byed do/ / nag po chen po dgug par 'dod pa gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ khrag dang chang dbul bar bya zhing yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas nag po chen po'i steng du gtor na khug
114a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing gar mngags pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad kyi sgo bya bar
114a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa byed do/ / thams cad byams par 'gyur zhing las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// mi smra bar mtshan mo'i dus 'tshams gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas na mtshan mo'i lha 'khor gyi tshogs
114a6(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba dang / nyin par rgyu ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma
114a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis rtag tu mdun na nye bar gnas so// mtshan mo longs spyad par gnal med khang thams cad sbyin
114b1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ khrus legs par byas nas bden par smra zhing byams pa'i sems nye bar bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la rtag tu brtse ba dang snying rje chen pos lhag par
114b2(rgyud 'bum): dmigs te bzlas brjod rtag tu bya'o/ / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// / de nas rtag tu las thams cad byed pa/ dge ba/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ drag shul spyod pa/ srung ba/ nang
114b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sel ba/ byad 'jig pa/ dbang du byed pa/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya'o// khyim srung bar 'dod pas arka'i yam sreg shing dang / pad+ma dang / yungs mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa
114b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na khyim chen po bsrungs par 'gyur ro// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag
114b5(rgyud 'bum): khrug thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang / mi ngas dang /
114b6(rgyud 'bum): mi ngas chen po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i mi ngas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang dbang
114b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen po'ang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phag pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sku ston bzhed par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg gi mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sbyin
115a1(rgyud 'bum): sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul dang / yul 'khor dang / grong khyer dang / yul gru dang / ri khrod dang / ljongs rnams zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
115a2(rgyud 'bum): phyuphyag gi spyan sngar zla ba nyal me tog dkar po dang / gan d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos rnams yungs mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa
115a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / yul gru dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rta dang / glang po che dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// shing a pa marga'i yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar
115a4(rgyud 'bum): bsres pa dang / me tog dkar po rnams la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin srog byas na yul gru stong thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres
115a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / pad+ma'i sdong po'i yam sreg shing rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo zad pa dang di na ra brgyad brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro// me tog ku mu da dang / pad+ma sdong bu dang / rtsa ba dang
115a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dab mar bcas pa dang / yungs kar bsres te shing seng ldeng gi me s+pha ra la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na log 'dren thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// zla ba yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la smyung ba
115a7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ gtsang mas khrus legs par byas la/ gos dkar po bgos te tsan dan dang / bri yang ku'i shing dang / 'bras yos dang / mar dang / yungs kar bsres pa'i sbyir sreg stong rtsa brgyang byas mamatha
115b1(rgyud 'bum): phyed kyi dus su gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas song lta sdong sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba mar gyi ngo ches bcu bzhi la nyin nag gcig spung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du song la shing bil ba'i me sbar/
115b2(rgyud 'bum): te/ bil ba'i me tog dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nam phyed na rin po che'i ba ma tog
115b3(rgyud 'bum): thogs nas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang des blang bar bya'o// gdong du mig blta bar mi bya'o// yang brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dang / rkang pa'i drung du sdong bor nas btung de rig sngags
115b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang 'gum mo zhes zer ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe nam phyed na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
115b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na gnod sbyin mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ dgos pa thams cad byed cing bran bzhin du las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la gang na gter yod pa der song ste/ stong rtsa brgyad
115b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma'i cho ga yang gzhag par bya zhing / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa la mchod pa byas la sna ma'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa
115b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams las sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas te/ chu dang yungs kar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas sa la brdabs na de'i 'og tu gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te blangs la/ dkon mchog
116a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi sku bskal dbul bar bya zhing lhag ma rang gis blang bar bya'o/ / ba ru ra'i shing gi me spar la til dang / 'bras so ba dang / mar bsres pa la sbyin sreg sdong rtsa brgyad byas/
116a2(rgyud 'bum): cha rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bcas pa dang / nor dang 'bru dang bcas pa dang / dbyig dang gser dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tshol
116a3(rgyud 'bum): bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / yungs kar dkar po dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pad+ma'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na yul thams cad
116a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur zhing / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// 'bras phub lan tshwa dang ldan pa las lan dgu bcu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang
116a5(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / a ga ti'i shing gis me sbar la sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres pa dang / arka'i me tog las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas na
116a6(rgyud 'bum): nyin re zhing di na ra brgya 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / pa la sha'i yam sreg shing dang 'bras yos las sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad byas na gser brgya phrag stong 'thob par 'gyur te/ dkon mchog gsum la
116a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bya zhing bgo bsha' byas na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la smyung ba byas te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam/ chu klung chen po'i nang rked pa nub tsam du zhugs te/ lan brgya rtsa
116b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas khros pas chu klung de la brdab par bya'o// de nas chu'i nang nas bu mo zhig byung nas rin po che mang po dag sbyin par byed de blangs la/
116b2(rgyud 'bum): phyed kyis dkon mchog gsum mchod par bya zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la yang mchod par bya'o// tshes bco lnga zla ba nya la spyang ba byas te/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das 'phags
116b3(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa byas nas a pa marga'i yam sreg shing dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / sra rtsi pog bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ rang gi ming gis sprin
116b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg stong byas na sdig pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing / nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba thams cad dang mi mdza' ba thams cad 'jigs
116b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / shing arga dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar bsres pa las sbyin sreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// 'bras yos dang / 'o ma dang / mar dang / yungs
116b6(rgyud 'bum): kar dang / tsan dan dkar po bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na rgyas pa dang mchog tu dge bar 'gyur ro// tshes bcu bzhi la ka ra wI ra'i me tog dang / lan tshwa sna bdun bsres pa dang /
116b7(rgyud 'bum): shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing yungs mar la bsres pas drag shul spyod pa bya'o// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe pad+ma dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / mar bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
117a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na khro bo'i gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas na ji srid 'dod pa de srid du char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur ro// thal ba de blangs la/
117a2(rgyud 'bum): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// sprin la mngon du phyogs te gtor na
117a3(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan gyi sde mnan pa ni til dang 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// pha rol gyi dpung zlog pa ni sa bon bdun gyi sbyin sreg gis so// /
117a4(rgyud 'bum): phug sgrub pa ni shing arka'i sbyin sreg gis so// arka'i lo ma dang mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg byas na phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ro// nags su 'gro ba ni tshe ku mu da dang / rgya spos dang /
117a5(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar dang / mar bsres pas nags kyi phug gi sgo thams cad 'byed par 'gyur zhing / sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro// shing pa la sha'i me spar te na le sham brgya
117a6(rgyud 'bum): stong sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nyi ma 'ongs nas mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro// na ma'i me tog dang / kar ni kA ri ka'i me tog
117a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / ut+pal rnams mar dang bsres pa las sbyin sreg brgyad stong byas na zla ba dang nyi mo 'ongs nas mchog sbyin zhing lus la 'od zer btang nas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// a shwad thas yam sreg
117b1(rgyud 'bum): shing byas la shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / arka dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang / nas dang / mar bsres pa las nyi ma bdun gyi dus 'tshams gsum du sbyin sreg nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na rgyal/
117b2(rgyud 'bum): po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// gdon dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad chad pas bcad na 'bras so ba dang / yungs kar dang / lan tsha'i sbyin sreg bgyis te thams
117b3(rgyud 'bum): cad la don yod pa'i zhags pa bcing bar bya zhing khro bo'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags lhan cig rjes su dran par bya'o/ / sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i
117b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i rgyal po chen po ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mnar med pa'i mthar thug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa byang bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ ras khru do gru bzhi lham pa/
117b5(rgyud 'bum): kha tshar ma chad pa/ skra med pa/ thags ran bzang ba/ shin tu dkar ba/ shin tu sbyangs pa la rin mo mkhan mi smra ba'i dka' thub can/ bsnyen gnas la gnas pa gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa/
117b6(rgyud 'bum): zas dkar gsum za ba/ dus gsum du khrus byas pa/ lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsi snod gsar par bzhag ste/ pir gsar pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa bzhengs pa
117b7(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ bzhugs pa 'am/ skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa bri bar bya ste/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ e n+ya la'i pags pa bsnams pa/ phyugs bdag gi cha lugs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgya
118a1(rgyud 'bum): pa phyag bcu drug pa/ zhal zhi ba/ spyan phye ba/ dbu rgyan la rgyal ba 'od dpag med bzhugs pa/ gzhal g.yas pa'i thor tshugs la bla tshes kyis brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis rdo rje'i thal/
118a2(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar ba las gyen du pad+ma'i tshul du bya'o// phyag gnyis thur du kun tu zhal gyi phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gnyis bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas la/ mdzub mo g.yas pa brkyang ste pad+ma'i tshul du byas la bar na bgrang
118a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng 'dzin par bya'o/ / phyag gnyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bya'o// phyag gcig na rtse gsum/ gnyis pa na pad+ma/ gsum pa na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gleg bam/ bzhi pa na don yod pa'i zhags
118a4(rgyud 'bum): pa zhags pa tha mal pa 'dra ba/ lnga pa na dbugs 'byin pa/ drug pa na ril ba spyi blugs/ bdun pa na rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i snod/ brgyad pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi snod thogs par bya zhing / 'od
118a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ sku me tog sna tshogs kyis bkra bas mdzes par bya'o// ri po Ta la'i khang pa brtsegs pa shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa/ khri 'phang stegs bu mdzes pa dang
118a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i 'phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang chu shing gi yal gas mdzes par byas pa/ g.yas logs
118a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi steng na nyi ma/ g.yon logs na zla ba/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag lag na me tog sna tshogs pa mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ri pad+ma 'dra ba zhig snying po
118b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par byas shing sdong po dang ldan pa/ mtshos mdzes par byas pa/ mtsho nyas gang zhing chu srin ma ka ra dang / bzhad dang / shang shang te'u dang / ngur pas brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis
118b2(rgyud 'bum): legs par brgyan pa'i r-i de'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan dang seng ge'i khri bya'o/ / g.yas phyogs kyi phyi rol khang pa'i gnas su dbang phyug bya'o// g.yon du dbang phyug chen po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par
118b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / nang gi gnas su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma lus btud de 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// g.yon du dri med 'gro lag pa dbugs 'byin
118b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / nor bzang bus mo btsugs pa bya'o// pad+ma'i snying po'i dbus kyi gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po khros pa'i gzugs can/ lag pa bzhi pa lag na mtshon cha thogs pa ste/ zhags pa dang / dbyug
118b5(rgyud 'bum): to dang / rtse gsum dang / pad+ma'o// pad+ma'i stan la skyil mo krung phyed bcas la/ lus cung zad btud pa mgo'i steng g.yas g.yon du drang srong bstod rabs byed pa bya'o// de nas 'og gi g.yas
118b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du rdo rje'i zom chen po lag na rdo rje'i tshogs mang po 'dug pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / dbang po dang / lha'i tshogs dag bya'o// g.yas phyogs kyi mtsho dang ri'i bar du
118b7(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin dang tshangs pa bya'o/ / g.yon phyogs su rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs mdzes ma lag pa brel ba bya'o// lha mo chen mo dpal dang / dbyangs
119a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma dang / 'jigs byed ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo bya'o// dbang phyug gi drung du khro gnyer can bya'o// dbang phyug chen po'i drung du gos
119a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo'o/ / ri dang pho nya mo'i bar du srin mo ral pa gcig ma'o// ri'i khor yug gru bzhi rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa bya zhing / ljon shing dang / lcug ma sna tshogs dang / me tog gis brgyan cing
119a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshe'u mdzes pa me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / seng ge dang stag gis gang ba dang / klu'i phrug gu dang grul bum dag bya'o// g.yon du gsang ba chen po lnga bya'o// 'og tu klu'i rgyal po chen po lnga bya'o// tham cad brag gi stan dpalag
119a4(rgyud 'bum): na rin po che'i me tog phor ba thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang bus mo btsugs te/ lag na me tog dang phog
119a5(rgyud 'bum): por thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya'o// steng gi bang rim du thub pa chen po rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang / shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong
119a6(rgyud 'bum): btsam gyi mod la tshe rabs brgya stong du mnar med pa bsags pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed pa de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur zhing / sems can de dag
119a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ sems can dag pa rnams lta ci smos/ dad pas mos pa rnams dang / dkon mchog gsum mchod pa don du gnyer ba de dag ni tshe 'di nyid la 'bras bu che
119b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / phan yon mang po dag tu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur zhing / de dag gi dge
119b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dngos su mthong ba yin no// ras kyi sku gzugs
119b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dgongs par 'gyur zhing sku'ang ston par 'gyur ro/ / nyam thag pa tsam gyi mod la sku ston par 'gyur zhing mchog thams cad sbyin
119b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs kyi snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// nad kyis thebs pa dang / nad tshabs chen pos gzer ba dang / nad sna tshogs dang / sdug bsngal brgya stong gis
119b5(rgyud 'bum): dkrugs pa de dag thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyi mong la nad thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa dang nang dang bral bar
119b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tha na dud 'gro'o skye gnas su gtogs pa dag kyang mthong ba tsam gyi mod la yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di 'khor mang pos mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po dang /
119b7(rgyud 'bum): sil snyan dkrol ba mang po dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis legs par brgyan par byas te/ grong khyer chen po 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ ljongs
120a1(rgyud 'bum): sam khyim mam/ grong du zhugs na ras kyi sku gzugs gzhug pa tsam gyi mod la 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / mu ge'i dgon pa dang /
120a2(rgyud 'bum): mi ngas dang / rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung gis 'jigs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed
120a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon zhi bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' ba dang / mi mang po bde ba mang por 'gyur ro// dga' ba dang / yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ro//
120a4(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'di mthong ba tsam gyis shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya stong phrag bdun cur tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran
120a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / pad+ma'i 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// pad+ma rab tu gnas pa
120a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / ri mo'i sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga dang cho ga zhib mo'o// / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
120a7(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i cho ga zhib mo chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ chu klung gi 'gram mam/ pad+ma'i mtshe'u 'am/ ut+pa la'i mtshe'u 'am/ me tog gi skyed mos tshal las 'bras bu'i kun dga' ra ba
120b1(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ khang bzang sa gzhi dag cing sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa rtswa dang / shing bal dang / skra dang / phub ma dang / thal ba dang / sol ba dang / phyag dar gyi phung po dang / gyo mo dang / shing dang / bong ba
120b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gseg ma dang / thod pa'i rus pas gang ba dang / shi ba'i ro rnams spangs pa'i sa gzhi'i phyogs na mtshe'u dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu byang phyogs nas 'bab pa dang nye ba na chu yod cing shin tu
120b3(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa/ lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / shar phyogs gang na ljon shing gis mdzes par byas pa/ gang nyams dga' ba/ kha dog dang gzi byin du ldan pa'i gnas de lta
120b4(rgyud 'bum): bu rnyed nas chu dang yungs kar la bzlas te kun tu gtor ro/ / sa gzhi de lta bu sbyang ba ni mchog yin no// khro ba'i rgyal pos yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na kun nas dpag
120b5(rgyud 'bum): tshad brgya tshun chad phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro// sdang ba thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang skad cig kyang mi gnas
120b6(rgyud 'bum): par phyogs bzhir byer te dong ngo / / srog chags sdang ba dang / sdang ba'i sems can dang / sdang ba'i gcan gzan khro bo gang yin pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing / lha thams cad srung bar 'gyur ro// /
120b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi phyogs der mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bya ste/ gru bzhi lham pa/ ngos re re zhing khru sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhal bar bya ste/ cha 'byes pa/ gru bzhi cha mnyam zhing mdzes la sgo bzhi dang rta babs bzhi ldan pa/
121a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras kyi phye ma'i tshon sna bzhir sbyar la/ de nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ tshon sna lnga'i thig skud kyis thig btab nas tsan dan dkar po'i phur bu btab ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes
121a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dam/ tshes bco lnga la tshes grangs dang rgyu skar bzang po gdams te/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// dang po ni dkar po'i bri'o// gnyis pa ni dmar pos so// gsum pa ni ser pos so// bzhi
121a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni nam mkha'i kha dog gis so/ / lnga pa ni mig sman gyi kha dog gis te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po 'jigs pa med par cha rnam par 'byes shing gsal bar pir gsar pa dang / tshon dang / snod gsar
121a4(rgyud 'bum): bas bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa kho ra khor yug stegs bu dang bcas pa bri zhing / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba tshon gyis mdzes pa bris la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
121a5(rgyud 'bum): thub pa chen po shAkya'i rgyal po dang / 'od dpag med dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal po gzhag go// g.yas su mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad 'chang ba gsang sngags kyi
121a6(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'brang bar bya'o/ / g.yon du phyag na rdo rje rnga yab dang rdo rje thogs pa/ bzhin khro gnyer can 'od 'bar bas bskor ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung du lha mo sgrol ma dang dri med
121a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen po dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo lag na dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo
121b1(rgyud 'bum): ral pa gcig pa pa che ba gtsigs pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba thogs pa/ sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na rdo rje dang / dgra snga dang / g.yas pa'i gung mo lha
121b2(rgyud 'bum): dang log 'dren la sdig pa bya'o/ / g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bram ze'i cha lugs 'chang ba ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis bzhugs pa/ 'od dpag med kyis thor tsugs brgyan pa bya'o//
121b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas g.yon du dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po bya'o// de'i 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / lha mo dbyangs can ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo dang / sa'i lha mo dang / lo tog gi lha mo dang / 'bras bu dang me tog gi
121b4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo bya'o/ / de'i 'og khor yug tu gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha la sogs pa bya'o// ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa'i drang srong gzhag par bya'o// grwar rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa
121b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus dang bar bar du lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dag bya'o// phyi rol tu tshangs pa dang / drag
121b6(rgyud 'bum): po dang / lha mo u ma dang / tshangs pa'i drung du lha mo dbyangs ldan ma khros pa'i gzugs can no// de gnyis kyi bar du dbyug pa dang ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o// grwa gcig tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i
121b7(rgyud 'bum): snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos kyi rnam grangs gzhag go/ / grwa gcig tu shi bA ba ha gzhag go// de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor khro bo rta mgrin 'jigs su rung ba'i mig can gzhag go// lho
122a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po ki li ki li zhes bya ba rdo rje rnam par 'dren pa lag na rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo pad+ma'i rigs
122a2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes ma lag pa pad+ma'i rtse mo nas 'dzin pa bya'o/ / byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po zom zhes bya ba'i tshogs lag na rdo rje dang zhags pa thogs pa bya'o// de nas 'jug pa'i sgo nas gser gyi bum pa spos
122a3(rgyud 'bum): chus bkang ste/ dar las bcings la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dar las g.yogs te me tog gi 'phreng bas brgyan nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag ste/ steng du sna ma'i
122a4(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi gdu bu gzhag par bya'o/ / tsan dan dang / gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / pog por bzhi gzhag cing / a ka ru'i bdug pas bdug go/ tshon sna lnga'i ras kyi srad bu mchod
122a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir gyi srad bu tshad du byas la/ gser gyi yang mig rtse gsum can gdags par bya zhing / thor to gcig tu me tog pad+ma'i gdub kor dang / mu tig dang / rin po ches spras pa zlum por bskyil ba bum pa'i
122a6(rgyud 'bum): steng du bzhag la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas te/ yungs kar la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o// tsan dan dang / ga bur dang / glar rtsi'i phye mas gos la
122a7(rgyud 'bum): bgo bar bya'o/ / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyis bkang ba'i bum pa dang zas dkar gsum gyi gtor ma gzhag par bya zhing / gser dngul gyi mchod yon gyi snod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / spos chus bkang ba
122b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dang / spos chu dkar pos bkang ba brgyad gzhag par bya'o// ro dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba brgyad dang / zho dang / 'o ma dang / spos chus bkang ba brgyad dang / gtor ma la sogs pa dbul
122b2(rgyud 'bum): ba sna brgyad dang / dbul ba sna drug cu rtsa bzhi pa rnams sha dang / khrag dang / kun dong dang / ke'u dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spangs te gtsang mas gtsang ma sbyar bar bya'o// me tog sna
122b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi gcal dgram par bya zhing / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lnga ldi dang / ba dan gyis brgyan par bya/ pog por sum cu rtsa gnyis gzhag par bya zhing / bdug spos sna tshogs mang pos bdug
122b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ spos sna brgyad rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa'i til mar gyis mar me bltam par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya
122b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/ gos gsum bgo bar bya/ grogs gtsang ma sgrub par bya'o// 'jug pa'i cho ga byas pa nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying pos dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba'i
122b6(rgyud 'bum): bar tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing / 'jig rten mgon pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang / pad+ma'i rigs pad+ma 'chang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
122b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i dngos grub la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang bsams pa thams cad de kho na bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad la don yod par 'gyur ro// chod nyid thams cad kyi rnam par grol
123a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos la dam tshig grub par 'gyur ro/ / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal
123a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs kyi bsgo skal la dbang bar 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor gyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang sngags la rten par 'gyur
123a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / brdeg pa dang / spro ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / bsreg pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / g.yeng ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du byas pas mi tshugs so// gang dag de lta bu byed pa de nyid kyi
123a4(rgyud 'bum): lus sam mgo la brgya phrag stong gyur tu 'bab par 'gyur zhing / gzhan gyis phyir bzlas shing dgrol bar mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chang des dgrol bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang des ri
123a5(rgyud 'bum): mo'i gzugs de dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcing bar bya zhing
123a6(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams las 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bum pa de'ang 'bar la/ ras kyi sku gzugs
123a7(rgyud 'bum): de'ang kha dog sde bdun du 'bar zhing shas cher 'gul bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang snying dga' bar 'gyur zhing / ras kyi sku gzugs las legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig
123b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ / khyod kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po grub cing / khyod kyis zhags pa 'di'ang grub/ khyod kyis yid bzhin
123b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi nor bu'i zhags pa'i mchog 'di'ang grub kyis/ khyod kyis las thams cad byos shig/ de dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa mchog grub nas bum pa spos chus bkang ba de blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad
123b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas te rgyu skar rgyal la khrus bya ba 'am/ zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes grangs shis pa la khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la lus thams cad dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing / dngos po lnga'i
123b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rna ba lnga yongs su dag pa dang / mig lnga yongs su dag pa dang / sna lnga yongs su dag pa dang / lce lnga yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa lnga

123b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhal ston par 'gyur ro// rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang de la srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur
123b7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po bzhi dpung gi 'khor dang bcas te sa'i phyogs der 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / rtag tu rgyun ma'i chad par srung ba dang / skyab
124a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gsang ba pa brgya stong phrag du ma srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sgrub
124a2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur ro/ / zhi ba dang legs su byed par 'gyur ro// shes pa don yod pa dang / shes rab don yod pa dang / thos pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus thob par 'gyur zhing / sbyin pa don
124a3(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i sbyin pa por 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po don yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa la
124a4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas par yang 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga zhib mo'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon par don yod par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
124a5(rgyud 'bum): bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sa ya snyed sa ya brgya phrag stong drug cu rtsa bzhi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag pa gzung bar
124a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa dang / bkur sti bya bar 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// mchod rten gyi snying po dang 'dra bar phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi
124a7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i cho ga zhib mo'o/ / / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhi mo'i rgyal po bam po dgu pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
124b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tug par nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde la
124b2(rgyud 'bum): su thal mo sbyar te btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
124b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag la pad+ma'i rigs la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga/ rig sngags chen po'i rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mchis
124b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'dus pa'i dbus dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de bdag gis yongs su bsgrag par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
124b5(rgyud 'bum): phyug bzhin 'dzum pas bcom ldan 'das la lta bzhin du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di smras so/ / na ma s+t+rai ya d+hA nu ga ta pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yaHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwe b+h+yaHna maHpra t+ye ka bud+hAr+ya shrA ba ka saM
124b6(rgyud 'bum): / g+he b+h+yaHa tI tA nu ga ta pra t+yud pan ne b+h+yaHna maHsa mya ka ga tA nAM/ na maHsa myaka pra ti pan nA nAM/ na maHshA ra dA ti pu tA ya ma hA ma ta ye/ na ma Ar+ya mai tre ya pra mu khe b+h+yoHma hA bo d+hi sa tA Ar+ya gaH
124b7(rgyud 'bum): bababere b+h+yaHna ma Ar+ya a mi tA b+hA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+tha te sa myaka saM bud+d+hA ya/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA ri Shi AH
125a1(rgyud 'bum): ga Na ba re b+h+yaHna mas+thi tA i dan Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra mu kho nIdz+dza/ a mo g+ha rA dza na nA ma hrid yan/ ta thA ga ta saM mu khaM b+hA Shi ta ma hA taM pan+d+han+yA r+b+he/ a ha mi da nI mA bar+t+ta lir+N+Na bisan+d+ha/
125a2(rgyud 'bum): tume man+t+ra pa dAHsar+b+ba kA r+ya Ni/ sar+b+ba b+ha ye b+h+yo ma ma sar+b+ba satwA nAny+tsa rak+Sha b+ha ba tu/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bai ri bi ri/ bi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bai ra ma ma hA ka ru Ni ka/
125a3(rgyud 'bum): si ri si ri/ pi ri pi raM/ tsi ri tsi ri/ ma hA pad+ma ha ste/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ ma hA shud d+ha satwa/ e h+ya hi/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ d+hU ba d+hU ba/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ kuN+ya ku N+ya/ pa ra ma shud
125a4(rgyud 'bum): d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA b+hU ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sany+tsa la/ bi tsa la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta e TaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ye hi/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka/
125a5(rgyud 'bum): ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa re tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ha hA ha hA/ hi hI hi hI/ hu hU hu hU/ oM ka ra ma hA brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ sa ra sa ra/
125a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ra pa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra da/ rash+mi sha ta sa ha sra pra ti maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga bAn/ so ma A di t+ya/ ya ma ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ brah+man+na/ ri Shi ga Na a b+h+ya rtsi ta
125a7(rgyud 'bum): tsa ra Na/ su ru su ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pu ru pu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sa nad ku mA ra/ ru dra/ bA sa ba/ biSh+Nu/ d+ha na da de ba ri ShaM/ nA ya ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ 18
125b1(rgyud 'bum): tar/ bar thar/ g+ha ra gyu ra/ sa ra la ra/ la rA lar/ bar har/ mar mar/ pA ra par/ bar bar/ bar d+ha sa ka sa man ta a ba lo kata/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ mud+ha su rba/ mu rba su ru/
125b2(rgyud 'bum): mu ya/ mur+tha muny+dza/ b+ha ga ban/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sar+b+ba satwAM sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba b+hA ye b+h+yaHsar+b+bo ba sarge b+h+yaHsar+b+ba gra he b+h+yaHsar+b+ba b+hU d+hi b+h+yaHsar+b+ba dzA re b+h+yaHe dza bad+ha/ bad+d+hA na/ tA Dan/
125b3(rgyud 'bum): tardza na/ rA dza tsau ra/ taska ra/ ag+ni/ u da ka/ bi Sha shas+t+ra/ pa ri mo tsa ka/ ka Na ka Na/ ki Ni ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ tsa ra tsa ra/ an dri ya/ ba la bo dz+yA ga/ tsa tur Ar+Ya sat+ya/ saM pra kA sha ka/ tama?
125b4(rgyud 'bum): ta ma/ da ma da ma/ sa ma sa ma/ ma sa ma sa/ ma hA ta mon d+ha kA ra/ bi d+ha ma na bi d+ha ma na/ ShaT pa ra mi tA pa ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ Ta Ta Ta Ta/ Sha Sha Sha Sha/ Ti Ti Ti Ti/ Tu Tu Tu Tu/ a Ne ya tsar+m+ma i
125b5(rgyud 'bum): ta pa ri ka ra/ e h+ye hi I shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ ma hA b+hU ta ga Na b+hany+dza ka/ ku ru ku ru/ pa ra ba ra/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ bi shud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya ni bA si na/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka shwe/ ta yadz+nyo ba bI ta/
125b6(rgyud 'bum): rat+na mu ku Ta/ mA lA d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba dz+nyA shi ra si kri ta mu ku Ta/ ma hA da b+hu ta/ ka ma la kri ta ka ra ta la/ d+h+ya na sa mA d+hi bi mok+Sha a pra kam+ma/ ba hu satwa san+na pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba kar+m+ma a ba ra/
125b7(rgyud 'bum): Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba byA d+hi pra mo tsa ka/ sar+b+ba A shA pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba satwa sa mA shA sa ka/ na mo stu te swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
126a1(rgyud 'bum): phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di bshad pa tsam gyis/ 'khor mang po ri dang nags tshal du bcas pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// 'jig rten du snang ba chen po
126a2(rgyud 'bum): byung bar gyur to/ / lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da ri ka dang / man da ra ba'i me tog gi char chen pos pus mo nub pa tsam bab par gyur to/ sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa'i sgra
126a3(rgyud 'bum): dag kyang byung bar gyur to/ / mtho ris kyi lha dag gis kyang nam mkha' las bcom ldan 'das la rgyan dang lhab lhub dag gi char phab po// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod
126a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gtsang ma de dag thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po lekra
126a5(rgyud 'bum): so legs so/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po mchog tu rnyed dka' ba 'di bshad cing / dngos grub mchog gi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di bshad pas rin po che'i char chen po
126a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bab bo zhes zer ro/ / de nas de'i phyir dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya zhing gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing zas dkar gsum za bas/ 'phags pa spyan ras
126a7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dpal lha mo bzhag ste mchod pa byas la/ yungs kar 'bru re re la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpal lha mo la bsnun pa byas na tshes bcu bzhi nas/ bco lnga'i bar du dpal
126b1(rgyud 'bum): b+ha mo 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / mtshams med pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad 'brang bar 'gyur ro// mtshamasadapa/
126b2(rgyud 'bum): dang zhi bar bya ba la/ a ka ru dang tsan dan gyi bdug spros bsregs la thal ba dang / yungs kar dang / seng ldeng gi phur bu gdab par bya'o// rims thams cad la bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad
126b3(rgyud 'bum): bu la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te btags na rims thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad la mar dang til mar la bzlas te zangs kyi snod du sangs
126b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas la phul ba'i sna ma'i me tog rnying pa dang pad+ma ze ba dang bcas pa btab ste btsos pa 'di ni grub pa yin te/ zas dang / skom dang / bsku ba dang / sna nas gtang ba'i las bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa

126b7(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ / srung ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa ga cig bzlas te de bzhin du mdud pa dor bar byas na srung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang /
127a1(rgyud 'bum): dngang ba thams cad dang / 'byung po'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// lto na pa la tshwa chu 'jam tsam la lan bdun bzlas te byin na lto ba'i nad 'jigs par

132b4(rgyud 'bum): gcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing ba bya ste/ srung ba mchog tu dkon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dang rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing go/

137b5(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi Shi ka te/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ba la ba la/ ma hI be ga d+ha ra/ bi kri tA na ya na/ daMSh+Ta ka rA la ma hA te dza/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi pu la dza na ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pa shu pa ti bi Sha d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra ba ra pu
137b6(rgyud 'bum): N+yan+ya saM b+ha ra/ su ga ta d+hA na sa mA d+hi/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki ta/ I shwa ra ma he shwa ra/ puny+dza da ma ka/ ro dra pra la da ma ka/ kro d+ha rA dza ma hA be gA d+ha re/ sa me sa ma/ ma hA s+thA ma prA b+ha/ tsan+na sUr+ya a ti re ka pra b+ha
137b7(rgyud 'bum): ma la ma la/ sar+b+ba ma la bi shro d+haka/ sar+b+ba r-i Shi ga Na sar+b+ba ti/ ma hA ma he shwa ra rU pa d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha dzi nA laM kri ta dza TA/ dak+Shi Na tsan drA laM kri ta shi ra/ ma tha ma tha/ sar+b+ba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hU ta ga na b+hany+dza ka/
138a1(rgyud 'bum): ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ga Na sa mA laM kr-i ta/ nak+Sha tra mA la sar+b+ba big+h+nAn bi nA sha na ka ra/ pa ra mai tri tsit+ta ma hA ka ru Ni ka/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ri pUr+Na maN+Da la/ sau mya mu kha/ ShaT pA ra mi tA pa/
138a2(rgyud 'bum): ri pU ra ka/ mi li mi li/ e Na ya tsarma ni bA sa na/ byA g+h+ra tsarmod ta ri ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ta/ tri nai tra tri shU la d+ha ra/ badz+ra dz+wA la d+ha ra/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra
138a3(rgyud 'bum): rU pa d+ha ra/ na ge na rba rU pa d+ha ra/ bi ma la bi shud d+ha de ha/ sar+b+ba pA pa shA ma ka sar+b+ba ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sar+b+ba ki la bi Sha nA sha ka/ swai lo kya ba shaM ka ra/ sar+b+ba satwAM bi sho d+ha ka/ bo d+hi satwA ba ra da/ sar+b+ba
138a4(rgyud 'bum): ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM pad+ma bi b+hu Shi ta shud d+he/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ a ba lo ki ya mAn/ sa ma sa ma sar+b+ba karma me sa d+ha ya/ a mo g+ha pA sha hri da ya sid d+he/ gu h+ya na pi si ni ba ra da hUM phaT/ na mo stu te swa hA/ grub pa don yod
