149b6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo chen mo ni don yod po zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od byed pa gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na dpal lha mo chen mo mchog tu bstan to/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma khrus legs par byas la/ dri chus
149b7(rgyud 'bum): bsangs shing ba las byung ba lngas byugs pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pas kha zas gtsang ma bza' bar bya zhing / chang dang / sha dang / beg btsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u rnams dang 'dres pa dang / 'phags
150a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams yongs su spang bar bya/ kha bas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa dang / gos ngan pa dang / dri ma can yongs su spang bar bya/ sems can ngan pa sten pa dang / ngan g.yo can
150a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsod skyon can dang / skye bo ngan pa dang / khrel med pa dang / snying rje med pa dang / byams pa dang bral ba dang / thub chod can gyi skye bo ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/ gnas ngan pa dang / gnas rten
150a3(rgyud 'bum): ngan pa dang / 'go mnyes dang / bza' nyes dang / grib ma ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya/ gcig gis gcig 'phags pa'i kha zas ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya zhing dri dang bdug spos kyis bsangs te/
150a4(rgyud 'bum): mi smra bar bzlas brjod bya/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / yid bde bar bya/ bkra shis tshang bar bya zhing / snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems su byas
150a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bzlas brjod bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la du ru ka'i bdug pa dbul bar bya/ dpal lha mo chen mo
150a6(rgyud 'bum): la tsan dan gyi bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing mchod yon snod kyang dbul bar bya'o/ / dus ji lta ba'i me tog dbul bar bya ste/ gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas te thams cad la dbul bar
150a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki ti shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya~M/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM puSh+pa bi lo ki te/ gan d+ha sa re/ a mo gA ra la saM b+ha raH/ baR+Sha
150b1(rgyud 'bum): sam b+hu ri ta ra ta ra/ mu di te b+huM swAhA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / mchod yon dbul lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung
150b2(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan bdun bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan gsum bzlas la a ka ru'i bdug spos dbul bar bya zhing / ci rnyed pa'i me tog dbul bar bya/
150b3(rgyud 'bum): spos dang ldan pa'i til mar gyi mar me bltam par bya zhing / de nyid kyi zhabs drung du skyil mo krung du 'dug la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bltas la snying po'i gzungs lan brgya
150b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas la bzlas brjod kyi phyag rgya byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan bdun bcing ba byas na bcings pa tsam gyis mod la sku gzugs g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sku thams cad 'bar
150b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ rang gi lus spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur/ tho rangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sku ston par 'gyur te/ yid la bsams pa thams cad bka' stsol bar 'gyur/ mchog
150b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur/ dbugs kyang 'byin par 'gyur/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshe 'di nyid la nad thams cad dang
150b7(rgyud 'bum): bral bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs
151a1(rgyud 'bum): su grol bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang dgra bo thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur zhing mi tshugs par 'gyur/ g.yul ngor 'jug pa'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yungs
151a2(rgyud 'bum): kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas dmag gi nang du gtor bar byas na/ thams cad rengs par byas pa dang rmugs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'di'i snying po dang gsang sngags ni 'di yin no// na mo
151a3(rgyud 'bum): rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ha thA/ oM a mo g+hA pA sha hr-i da ya/ pad+me ni ba ra de/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra sa ri ta pad+ma b+hu dze swAH
151a4(rgyud 'bum): snying za'i rig sngags so/ / oM a ba lo ki te/ pad+ma te/ be raM gi ni tu ru tu ru hUM swAhA/ nye ba'i snying po'i gzungs so// don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i nor bu pad+ma rnam par lte ba'i dpal dri ma med pa/
151a5(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i gzungs 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga zad par 'gyur/ lha mo dpal chen mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchog sbyin par
151a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dus kun tu sku ston par bzhed par 'gyur/ de'i lus la dug thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa
151a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ rims nad thams cad dang mang thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gdon tham cad la tshon sna snga'i srad bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te
151b1(rgyud 'bum): mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor la gu gul gyis bdugs te mgul tu btags na gdon thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te nag po chen po dang ma mo 'ongs te rgyas btab pa
151b2(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa'ang gdon thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / skud pa nag pos rims nyin gcig pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gzhan dag la ni thams cad du srad bu dkar
151b3(rgyud 'bum): pos bsal bar bya'o/ / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad la gi'u wang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te thig le byas na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// snying khar thig
151b4(rgyud 'bum): le byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil la thig le byas na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang /

151b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rkang pa'i rje ngar la byugs na dpag tshad brgyar ngal ba med par 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rkang mthil na bskus na chu klung chen po'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ning
152a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho'i bar du brgal bar 'gyur ro/ / dpung pa gnyis la byug na gyad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro// pus mo gnyis la byugs na me'i phung po chen po 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar
152a2(rgyud 'bum): bar zhugs na tsan dan dang pu shel tsi ji bzhin du bsil bar 'gyur ro/ / ba ser skya'i 'o ma dang sbyar te mig la bskus na mtshan mo'ang nyin mo bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// gter thams cad 'bar bar
152a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing gal te de bskal pa brgya stong du bzhag pa zhig na'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du lto ba la bskus ni ji srid du lho chus ma bkrus pa de srid du kha zas dang btung ba mi 'dod par 'gyur ro// pho

152a7(rgyud 'bum): ba rnams 'jigs par 'gyur/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug rnams kyi lan thebs par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur/ phas kyi rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba dang / pha rol gyi dpung gi
152b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig sbyar te tho rangs kyi dus su mi smra bar byas nas thos na bklags pas tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sbyor ba
152b2(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun du byas na bstan bcos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ / zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyor ba byas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye

152b5(rgyud 'bum): na ston ka'i zla ba nya dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhing / me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ lus thams cad la byugs na mar dang 'dra bar 'jam por 'gyur zhing / rkang lag shin tu gzhon sha
152b6(rgyud 'bum): can du 'gyur/ rna ba la byugs na rna ba ji tsam 'dod pa skye bar 'gyur/ sna nas btang na klad pa'i nad do cog 'jig par 'gyur zhing snabs dang mchil ma 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ lha'i spos kyi dri mnam par 'gyur
152b7(rgyud 'bum): zhing / nams kyang yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mnam par mi 'gyur/ gnyer ma dang sgra dkar spangs par 'gyur/ so brgal ba'ang gsar du skye bar 'gyur/ lce pad+ma'i lo ma ltar 'jam par 'gyur/ ming pa'i nang
153a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ske 'gags pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ 'jam tsam du byas te rna ba bkang na sim par byed cing lha'i rna ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ sgra yid du 'ong ba dang / bar
153a2(rgyud 'bum): shis pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na gi'u wang gi cho ga chen po bsgrub par bya'o// / de nas legs par grub pa/ mchog tu dge ba/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa grub par
153a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba/ dge bar 'gro ba mig rkang zhes bya ba bshad par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan bdun bzlas nas/ don yod pa'i rgya mtsho'i

153b1(rgyud 'bum): dang rab tu sdang ba dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dri des 'byer bar 'gyur zhing phyogs bzhir dpag tshad brgyar byer nas thag ring po na 'khod par 'gyur ro// phyir rgol ba dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang

153b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur/ nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la reg pa tsam gyis zad mi shes par 'gyur/ sa bon gdab pa dang brdza ba byas na zad mi shes pa 'phel bar

154a1(rgyud 'bum): bral bar 'gyur/ rims thams cad sel bar 'gyur/ 'bras dang / mdze dang / lhog pa dang / lu'u ta dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / g.ya' ba dang / phol mig la byug pa

154b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams dang / yi dgas dang / sha ba dang / skem byed thams cad 'byer bar byed pa/ sdang ba'i bdud rnams gsod pa/ nad thams cad bzlog pa/ gdug pa'i dug rnams bzlog pa/

154b5(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog tu mi bzad pa rnams dang / gal te klu 'jog pos zin na'ang bdugs pa tsam gyis dug thams cad med par 'gyur ro// nad kun 'phrog pa grub pa ste// sdig pa thams cad 'jig
154b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / bsod nams phung po che dang mnyam// grub pa lha rnams kun gyis mchod// brgya byin sum cu'i lha dang ni// lha min lhan cig g.yul 'gyed tshe// bdug pa 'di yis bdugs pa dang //

155a1(rgyud 'bum): pham byas 'khrugs par gyur/ / bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyad par gyis// mi'u thung ni kun las rgyal// sgyu ma byed pa stong phrag brgya// rtag tu rnam par rgyas par byed//
155a2(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa'i rgyal pos skya bseng rnams// rnam par pham par the tshom med// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya// 'dren pas byams pa'i stobs kyis btul// bdud ni bye ba stong phrag brgya/ bdug pa'i rgyal /
155a3(rgyud 'bum): mthu stobs kyis// sdang ba'i bdud ni yang dag zad// rgya mtsho rnam par bkrug byas pas// rgya mtshor gnas kun gcer bur 'gyur// snod gcig gis ni sum cha bskams// yid bzhin nor bu

155a5(rgyud 'bum): bdugs byas shing / / nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ni// rin chen bdun gyi char pa phab// de ltar bdug pa stobs ldan yin// las kyi don kun sgrub par byed// g.yul chen po lhung ba'i klu'i mchor
155a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo dang nye dga' bos rgya mtsho chen po la lhun po chen po'i ri rab kyis srubs pas/ dug mdzags pa mgrin sngon gyis dug 'thungs pa bdug pa'i rgyal pos bskor bas dug med par byas
155a7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di'i mthus bdud rtsir yongs su byas so// de ltar bdug pa'i rgyal pos dug thams cad 'joms par the tsom med do// gling bzhi pa yi drang srong gis// des ni
155b1(rgyud 'bum): maN+Da la pham par byas/ / gtan phyed la ni longs spyod pa'i// skra can dbang pos ltung bar byas// bdugs pa'i rgyal po bsams pa yis// brdzun du smra ba de rnams nyams// de phyir bden par// /
155b2(rgyud 'bum): smra ba'i phyir// bdug pa 'di ni bden par ldan// bden pa'i rgyal pos rab tu bsgrags// bden pa'i chos dang bden par smra// mtha' dag bsdus las byams pa'i sems// 'jig rten kun la rtag tu
155b3(rgyud 'bum): byams/ / snying rje dang ni dga' ba nyid// bdug pa gzhan gyis bdugs pa 'di// mtshon cha thams cad 'joms par byed// bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i bdug pa 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams

155b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'jig pa chen pos sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa chen po cher mi bzad pa/ rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas nyen
155b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kyi hud ces sgra sgrogs par byed pa'i skrag pa de la skyabs med do// sems can thams cad rjes su brtse ba la brtan par kun tu blta bar bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs su gsungs pa ni
155b7(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o/ / bdug pa 'dis bdugs te gang gi don du ming nas smos pa'ang ma rung ba 'am/ yang na byams pa'ang rung ste/ yid la bsams pa rnams sgrub par byed do//
156a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis bdugs te brjod pa tsam gyis mod la 'di rnams thams cad rtag tu 'grub par byed de// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gsung dge ba'o// gza' zla ba 'am gza'
156a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma rgyu skar nyam nga ba la gnas pa sgra gcan gyis zos pa rnams dang / mi gang yin pa skye ba'i gnod pa dang / rgyal po 'am/ yang na bud med dam/ blon po chen po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang /
156a3(rgyud 'bum): mdun na 'don dang / rgyal rigs dang / bram ze dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / skye bo gzhan dang 'grogs pas gnod pa dang / 'thab pa nyid dang / sdug bsngal mi bzang bas nye bar 'tshe ba la

162a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ rang gi dpung dang / gzhan gyi dpung dang ldan pa'i gdug pa'i sems can rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ dug mi bzad pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sha spang dang /

162a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / grang ba dang / rlung gis mi tshugs shing nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// bde ba dang / dga' ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo mang po dang / mi mang pos yongs su gang zhing 'byor par
162a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ chos 'dod cing chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang mgu bar 'gyur/ me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / zas dang / skom ro zhim pa dang / shin tu 'jam pa phun sum tshogs pa
162b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ thams cad du lha'i rig pa dang bcas pa'i baba' ba dang btung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / 'phra menas dang / yi dgas/
162b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / brjed byed dang / sbrul po dang / lus srul po dang / skem byed dang / grib ma dang / bza' nyes dang / 'go mnyes dang / blta nyes dang / grib ma ngan bzhi par 'gyur zhing mi tshul
162b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ sems can de dag thams cad phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/ mchog tu yid bde ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro// yon tan dang phan yon chen po de dag ni nor bu'i rgyal po
162b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par
162b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das grub pa'i rdzas kyi mchog nor bu gdags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing lung bstan pa/ bdag gi
162b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa rjes su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ / gser dang / na la da dang / gi'u wang dang / ba p+la dang / ldong ros
162b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / gur kum dang / nag pus pa dang / tA tsa dang / ta rag dang / tsan dan rnam gnyis dang / sprig ka dang / kA la ka dang / ru rta dang / shu ti dang / pri yang ku dang /
163a1(rgyud 'bum): ha re rtsa ke dang / sug smel dang / lo d+ha dang / dzA ta pa tri ka su man dang / sA ma ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang / shing arka'i 'o ma rnams bsags te cha mnyam par byas la gse/
163a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis 'gyur du byas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang tshes grangs shis shing dge ba la khrus legs par byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas nyin zhag gcig byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/
163a3(rgyud 'bum): phye ma zhib mor byas te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gtor la dri chab bzang pos spungs te sbyar la/ gsar
163a4(rgyud 'bum): dang bsres la ga pur dang gla rtsi'i bdug pas bdugs te/ nor bu zho gnyis pa'i tshad du byas nas phug la ras skud kyis btags te gser gyis g.yogs la/ yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
163a5(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar mi smra bar bsgrub par byas la/ de nyid kyi zhabs drung du grib ma la bskam
163a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ phyed dam bzhi cha gser gyis g.yog par bya zhing phyed g.yog par mi bya'o// gang la gser gyis g.yogs pa 'di ni gang la don yod pa'i zhags pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po dang 'dra ste/
163a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las chen po sgrub par byed do// gser gyis ma g.yogs pas ni 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed de/
163b1(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / lu ta dang / 'bras dang / 'gro ba'i nad dang / shu ba dang / ldog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / phol mig dang / sha bkra dang / mig nad dag
163b2(rgyud 'bum): klad nad dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / mgul ba 'gags pa dang / kha nad dang / sna nad dang / rna ba'i nad dang / so nad dang / rkan na ba dang / lcen pa dang / mchun pa dang / snying na pa dang / rtsib
163b3(rgyud 'bum): logs na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / gcin snyi ba dang / gzug gzer dang / 'khru ba dang / pho ba'i nad dang / gzhang 'brum thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing
163b4(rgyud 'bum): rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ rims nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams rab tu zhi bar
163b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lus kyi nang gi nad thams cad la chu dron dang lhan cig sbyin no// phyi rol gyi nad thams cad dang gnod pa thams cad la byugs pa tsam gyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du
163b6(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad la sbyar ba tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa 'gyur te/ the tsom mi bya'o// gser gyis g.yogs pa dpung pa la btags na thams cad du thogs pa med par 'gyur te/ stobs
163b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa phyag na rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa bla na med pa rnam pa gsum po 'di la sbyar bar bya ste/ thig le/
164a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gdong pa bkru ba dang / lus bsku ba'o// yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid 'grub pa ste/ the tsom mi bya'o// rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor
164a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa dang / skye bo dang blon por bcas pa rtag tu bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bran bzhin du dbang du 'gyur ro// nor bu spyi gtsug tu bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas na bgegs med par thams cad 'grub
164a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa g.yas pa la btags te rig sngags bzlas na bzlas brjod kyi cho ga stong phrag brgya 'gyur du byas par 'gyur te/ lan cig bzlas pas stong phrag brgyar rab tu 'phel bar
164a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mgul par btags te bcangs na khrus ma byas pa khrus byas par 'gyur/ mi gtsang ba gtsang bar 'gyur/ tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod par 'gyur/ thub par ma byas pa thub
164a5(rgyud 'bum): par byas par 'gyur/ smyung ba ma byas pa smyung ba byas par 'gyur/ tshig mi btsan pa tshig btsan par 'gyur/ ma grub pa grub par 'gyur/ dam tshig mi shes pa dam tshig shes par 'gyur/ byams
164a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur/ sbyin pa gang cung zad ci sbyin pa chung ngu'ang stong phrag brgya 'gyur du sbyin pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par 'gyur/ nor bu 'di lag
164a7(rgyud 'bum): mthil g.yas pa la btags na gang la reg pa de zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ / su la'ang brjod par mi bya ste/ de'i 'og tu de dag thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rked pa la btags te chu'i nang du
164b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs na chu klung chen po'i gting bslebs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas nor bu sgrub par 'dod pas dngul shin tu yongs su dag pa las pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa kha phye ba/ dbus kyi snying po dang ze ba
164b2(rgyud 'bum): za ma tog 'dra ba sor bcu drug pa'i tshad du byas la/ de'i dbus su gser gyi nor bu gzhag par bya'o// ba lang gi lci ba ba lang gi gcin dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la tshon sna tshogs
164b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis bri bar bya ste/ kho ra khor yug tu pad+ma bris la/ pad+ma'i dbus kyi ze bar dngul las byas pa'i pad+ma bzhag ste/ bum pa gang ba bzhi dang gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya zhing / me tog dgram
164b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ tshon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka'i bdug pas bdug cing gtor ma dkar po gzhag par bya/ 'phan gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par
164b5(rgyud 'bum): byamar gyi mar me sum cu rtsa gnyis bltam par bya/ 'bras bu dang me tog 'phreng sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon du phyogs par gzhag ste/ rig
164b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la nyin mtshan gcig smyung par byas la tshes bco lnga nas/ nyi shu dgu dang gnam stong gi bar dus 'tshams gsum du mchod par bya zhing / pad+ma za ma
164b7(rgyud 'bum): tog de dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la'ang mchod pa byas la dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te 'dug la bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po
165a1(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ yungs kar dang chus dbang bskur bar bya/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya lan stong rtsa brgyad bya/ de bzhin du khro bo'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya bya'o//
165a2(rgyud 'bum): mi smra bar dgos pa thams cad byas na de'i 'og tu tshes bco lnga zla ba nya'i nang par gyi dus 'tshams su nor bu'i rgyal po pad+ma dang bcas te gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras
165a3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang dga' bar 'gyur/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po
165a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis pad+ma 'bar ba de lag pa g.yas pas blang bar bya ste/ blangs pa tsam gyis mod la nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi
165a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser gyi mdog can blta na sdug pa chen po mdun na gnas par 'gyur/ sdang ba dang / phyir rgol ba dang / mi mdza' ba thams cad bzlog par byed//
165a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bye ba stong phrag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa stong thub par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i rnam par lta ba'i nor bu chen po rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo dang ldan pa zhes bya
165a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ don yod pa'i dri ma med pa 'bar ba'i rtse mo rnam par lta ba zhi bya ba'i don yod pa'i zhags pa 'thob par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
165b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing gi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ nor bu chen po yongs su dag pa rdo rje la rnam par lta ba'i 'od kyi lus rnam par
165b2(rgyud 'bum): dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams bgyi ba ci mchis shes dbang
165b3(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro bar 'gyur/ mgo'i spyi bor btags na nor bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nub phyogs su song nas bde ba can gyi rab tu dbye ba gzhal med khang dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ legs par brgyan
165b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag las chos snang ba'i sgo chos bshad pa chen po thos par 'gyur/ 'phags pa
165b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs dang / rgyan dang / gzhal med khang ston par 'gyur/ mgul du btags na phug gi gnas thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur/ thams cad du rgyal ba'i rje dpon
165b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ phug stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i sgo 'bye bar 'gyur/ dpung pa g.yas pa la btags na mi snang bar 'gyur zhing lus mi snang ba gang+gA'i klung bye ba stong phrag brgya
165b7(rgyud 'bum): snyed kyi lus mi snang ba rnams kyi mchog rje dpon dang rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po la sogs pa thams cad mi sdang bar byas par 'gyur/
166a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang sgo bye zhing 'dug par 'gyur ro// rked pa la btags na gter thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ pus mo g.yas pa dang brla g.yas pa la btags
166a2(rgyud 'bum): nanags kyi phug gi gzhal med khang gi gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye zhing / sman gyi dngos po thams cad rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na gnas par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rkang pa'i rje ngaral
166a3(rgyud 'bum): btags na rlung gi phung po dang po'i stobs kyi shugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / cung zad tsam song bas dpag tshad stong phrag bcur 'gro zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur/ nyin mtshan gcig gis stong gsum
166a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rlung chen po'i shugs kyi stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis song ste/ slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur/ thams cad du dgos pa sgrub pa thams
166a5(rgyud 'bum): cad grub par 'gyur ro/ / rkang mthil la btags na sa'i 'og gi dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur zhing / sa'i 'og phug gi sgo thams cad bye bar 'gyur te/ rang ji ltar 'dod pa der 'jug cing 'byung bar
166a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / khar bcug na nyi ma re re tshigs su bcad pa stong lobs par 'gyur ro// mid pa tsam gyis thos pa rgya mtsho bsags par 'gyur ro// lce'i rtse mor bzhag na lce pad+ma dang ku mu da ltar 'jam par 'gyur
166a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing thos pa mang po 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa la byugs na gang la reg pa de bgyi ba ci mchis shes bran bzhin du 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram
166b1(rgyud 'bum): be thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / nor bu sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
166b2(rgyud 'bum): phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod grub kyi bum pa rab mchog ces bgyi ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga chen po mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po
166b3(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi mthu bstan pa ji lta ba der/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das bum pa chen po mthu sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so// /
166b4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de kho na nyid yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba lags so// de nas gser ram/ dngul lam/ zangs sam/ kham pa'i bum pa tshad dang ldan zhing kun
166b5(rgyud 'bum): nas shin tu zlum pa/ mgo'am mgrim par phyin pa'i tshad shin tu 'jam zhing thag thug dang shang shong med pa/ dbyibs legs shing byi dor legs par byas pa/ kun nas yongs su gang ba la mtshal gyi
166b6(rgyud 'bum): tshon gyis pad+ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa bri bar bya ste/ mgrin par pad+ma'i snying po dang ze ba bri/ khor yug tu 'dab ma bri bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa bri bar bya ste/
166b7(rgyud 'bum): shar phyogs su zhal bri/ lhor mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag/ nub tu dbugs 'byin pa'i phyag/ byang du yid bzhin nor bu/ thams cad rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung du bzhugs par bya'o//
167a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i 'dab ma la dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / bram ze dang / lha dang / drang srong gi tshogs dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / rlung lha dang / khyab bdag dang /

167a3(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gzhon nu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug bri bar bya'o// pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i khor yug tu pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri'o// de nas bum pa tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya zhing
167a4(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya/ rim pa'i cha bkra zhing mdzes par bya'o// de nas thang shing las pad+ma'i gdan zlum po bum pa shong ba tsam gyi tshad du byas la de'i steng du bum pa bzhag la/
167a5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa de yungs kar dkar pos bkang ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya/ ras dkar pos bcing bar bya/ steng du yungs kar dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gi'u wang dang / ldong ros gzhag par
167a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ bum pa'i kha ras dmar pos g.yog par bya/ rin po che sna bdun bzhag par bya/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos la dkyil 'khor khru bzhi gru bzhi dang / 'phang du khru gang ba byas
167a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ ba lang gi lci ba dang sar bsres pas legs par byugs te grwa bzhi cha mnyam par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dri thams cad kyis byugs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i dbus su tsan dan
167b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar pos dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ gur kum dang me tog pad+mas mchod par byas te/ pad+ma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis babris la pad+ma'i le ba'i steng du bum pa gzhag ste/ 'phan gdugs/
167b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po khor yug tu spos dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / byug spos sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi snod sna tshogs dang / bum pa gang ba mdzes pa dang /
167b3(rgyud 'bum): bdug spos kyi phye ma rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang me tog 'phreng ci 'byor pa kun tu gzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me bzang po bcu drug bltam par bya/ phyi rol gyi dkyil
167b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri bar bya/ sgo bzhi shin tu 'byes par bri/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mtshan ma gsal bar bya/ mda' dang ba dan khor yug tu gzhag par bya/ tshon skud sna lngas bskor
167b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs dang dkar gsum ci 'byor pa gzhag par bya/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ me tog sna tshogs
167b6(rgyud 'bum): dgram par bya/ me tog 'phreng bzang po kun tu gzhag par bya/ bdug spos kyi snod dang bum pa gang ba kun tu gzhag par bya/ pog por bzhi bzhag par bya/ dri chab kyi phor bu bzhi gzhag par bya/ snod
167b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang kham phor brgyad gzhag par bya/ ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma dkar po rnam pa mang po gzhag par bya/ mar gyi mar me gang ba drug cu rtsa gcig dbul bar bya/ 'bras yos dang yungs kar dgram par
168a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / chang dang / sha dang / be gcong dang / ke'u dang / 'bags pa dang / kha zas ngan pa dang / btung ba ngan pa spang bar bya/ 'gomanyes spang bar bya ste/ gtsang mas gos//
168a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma gos la zla ba nya la bsgrub par bya'o// srung ba'i cho gas pa dag bsrung ba dang / thor tsugs bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / yul bcing ba dang / de bzhin du grogs bsrung ba dang /
168a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan bsrung ba'ang bya'o// gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / mar dang yungs kar gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o// tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun tu ru'i bdug pa 'di ni yang dag par
168a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan to/ / bum pa sgrub pa 'di ni mchog ste/ zhag lnga spyang ba byas nas gsang sngags bsgrub par bya ste/ dus 'tshams gsum du bum pa dang sangs rgyas la mchod par bya'o// mi smra bar dkyil
168a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ lag pa g.yas pa bum pa'i steng du bzhag la khro bo'i rgyal po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ chu dang yungs kar gyis dbang bskur la don yod pa'i
168a6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa'i snying po stong phrag bcu bzlas so/ / yid la byed pa rtse gcig pas sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje lhur len cing sangs rgyas yid la bya ba bsgoms la bzlas brjod bya'o//
168a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'og tu ches bco lnga nya'i thun tha ma'i nang par dbyig gi bum pa cher g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po'ang grag par 'gyur te/ bum pa chen po de'ang 'bar zhing 'od zer la

181a2(rgyud 'bum): pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang mthun par 'gyur ro// don
181a3(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par
181a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro// don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong zhing byin gyis
181a5(rgyud 'bum): rlob pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// don yod par rdo rje'i rigs la mnyam par rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// don yod
181a6(rgyud 'bum): par pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / don yod par nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// don yod par rgyal po'i rigs kyi dam tshig rjes su 'dzin
181a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyi rlob pas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// don yod par 'khor los sgyur ba'i
181b1(rgyud 'bum): rigs dbang du gyur nas rab tu gnas par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / don yod par rig sngags kyi dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa
181b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / don yod par phyag rgya chen po rim par phye ba dang gsang sngags kyi sgrub thabs la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// don
181b3(rgyud 'bum): yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur
181b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / don yod par chos kyi rnga bo che rdung bar 'gyur ro// don yod par chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur ro// don yod par pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// don yod par de bzhin
181b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi snying por 'gyur ro/ / don yod par thos pa zab mo chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// don yod par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
181b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi yan lag brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / don yod par 'jig rten pa dang thun mong ba'i chos cho ga zhib mo'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub chen po so sor thob bo// don yod par
181b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa'i lha'i dpal nyams su myong ngo / / don yod par sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu bla mar byed pa dang / gus par byed pa dang / spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du tshogs chen po'i
182a1(rgyud 'bum): yon tan dang ldan pa dang phan yon chen po rjes su son par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba dang bcas pa la phyag rgya dang / dkyil
182a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sgrub pa dang / zhags pa'i cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa gang yin pa 'di mnyan par 'gyur ba dang / 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'don par 'gyur ba dang / kun chub par 'gyur ba dang / tshul
182a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga byed par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom par 'gyur ba de dag skye ba 'di nyid la las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad
182a4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag cing bsal bar 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar
182a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang gang la la zhig sems can ches mang po la dbang byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi'o// sa bcu la rab tu gnas
182a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bcas par brjod par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig don yod pa'i
182a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i snying po 'di cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / ras ris yongs su dag nas dang pa dang gus pa yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag
182b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bsam pa rab tu dang bas 'dri bar 'gyur ro/ / 'dri mkhan dad pa dang / gus pa dang / byams pa yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis yo byad yongs su ma tshang ba med pa'i mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
182b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dri mkhan gyis 'dri ba 'am 'drir gzhug par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyi stobs dang mthus dris pa'i sems can de'ang phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang yid
182b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ / gzhan yang sems can 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las skyed pa'i sras su rig par bgyi/ zhal las skyes pa dang / chos las skyes pa dang //
182b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi sprul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur te/ sems can de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
182b5(rgyud 'bum): par lung bstan to/ / de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'i phyir/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du rig par bgyi'o// de'i phyir 'di'i phan yon dang yon tan chen po yongs su
182b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags so/ / de nas don yod pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi ste/ ras khru gnyis pa'i tshang du bgyi zhing / kun nas gru bzhi pa/ shin tu gsal ba/ shin tu btags
182b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ shin tu gsar pa/ legs par bcags pa la/ ri mo mkhan gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pas/ chang dang / sha dang / kun dong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa dang / spabs
183a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / kha zas ngan pa yongs su spungs pas tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'bar ba/ lhag ma ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag pas 'drir gzhug par bgyi ste/ 'phags
183a2(rgyud 'bum): baspyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan ri mo bgyi'o/ / don yod pa'i nags pa zhi pa'i zhal/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ zhal bcu gcig pa bgyi ste/ phyag sum
183a3(rgyud 'bum): cu so gnyis pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ phyag na tshon cha sna tshogs pa dang zhags pa thogs po/ pad+ma dkar po'i lus dang kha dog can/ sna tshogs pa'i gos 'chang ba/ zhal g.yas
183a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dbang phyug chen po'i zhal/ g.yon pa sred med kyi bu'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ dbang phyug chen po'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs/ sred med kyi bu'i steng du chu lha'i gzugs/ gshin rje'i steng du lus
183a5(rgyud 'bum): ngan gyi gzugs/ zhal khro gnyer can/ chu lha'i steng du gzhon nu zhal khro gnyer can/ lus ngan gyi steng du dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs drag po mche ba gtsigs pa'o// gzhon nu'i steng du dbang phyug
183a6(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i gzugs mche ba gcig pa'o/ / dbang phyug gi steng du nyi ma'i zhal/ dbang phyug chen po'i steng du zla ba'i zhal/ steng gi ral pa la 'phags pa 'od dpag med 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pa'i phyag brkyang bas dbugs 'byin
183a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / phyag g.yas pa dang sgra'i bar du rlung lha bya ste lus rdzogs pa'o// gzhogs g.yon du me'i lha ste lus phyed pa'o// sngar bshad pa'i phyag rgya dang mtshon cha lag na thogs pa bgyi'o// g.yas
183b1(rgyud 'bum): su 'phags pa khro bo'i rgyal po bgyi ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa khros pa'i gzugs so// g.yon du rig pa'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bgyi'o// khro bor
183b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po ni pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa'o/ / rig pa'i rgyal po ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / me tog gi phur ma thogs par bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ni zhal nas 'od zer
183b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phro bzhin pa bgyi ste/ pad+ma'i gdan dang / lus la pad+ma'i 'phreng ba 'phyang ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og gi pad+ma la dkyil 'khor gyi lha mo bgyi ste/ drag mo drag tu dgod
183b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / zhags pa dang / dgra lnga dang / ral gri thogs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bgyi'o// khro bo'i rgyal
183b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyab tu 'phags ma sgrol ma bgyi ste/ phyag na gos 'dzin pa/ dbu sprad pa/ rgyan thams cad rnam par brgyan pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu dkar sham chen mo bgyi ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
183b6(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan pa/ phyag thal mo sbyor zhing mgo smad pa'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag gi bar du/ g.yas ngos su rig sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bgyi ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
183b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug gi zhal la lta bzhin pa/ lag na me tog gi phog pa thogs pa bgyi'o// ngos bzhir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ri mo bgyi ste/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa
184a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad rnam par 'byes par bgyi'o/ / steng du son par drang srong rnams dang lha'i bu bgyi'o// grwa bzhi ru rgyal po chen po bzhi bgyi ste/ go cha dang ya lad bgos pa'o// zhabs dag
184a2(rgyud 'bum): gi 'og tu dpal lha mo dang / dbyangs can dang / 'jigs ma dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rnams bgyi'o// ras ris yongs su rdzogs pa legs par bgyis shing / las bgyis pa bris nas de'i 'og tu gas
184a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas su bzhag ste/ phyogs gtsang mar ba byung gi dkyil 'khor bgyi ste/ kun nas gru bzhi pa bgyi'o// de'i steng du dri sna tshogs kyi byug pa sbyin par bgyi/ me tog sna tshogs kyis gcal du dgram
184a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ gang ba'i bum pas spras par bgyi/ pog por gyis spras par bgyi'o// tsan dan dang / kun tu ru dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa sreg cing / mchod yon dang zhabs
184a5(rgyud 'bum): bsil yang gzhag par bgyi'o/ / ras ris dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas/ rig sngags 'chang gos gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa legs par khrus byas pas bgyi ste/ ras
184a6(rgyud 'bum): ris la mchod pa bgyi zhing mar me bcu drug sbar bar bgyi'o/ / de nas ras ris la mngon du phyogs nas/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug nas phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyi'o// don yod pa chen po'i snying po'i gsang
184a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig stong phrag bcur bzlas so/ / don yod rgyal po'i snying po dang / khro bo'i rgyal po dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bgyi'o// stong phrag bcu rdzogs pa dang /
184b1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang gi mgo la 'bar bar bgyid cing / ras ris de la'ang 'od sna tshogs pa rnams 'bar bar bgyid de/ tho rangs skya rengs ser po'i thun mtshams kyi dus tshod la ji lta ba bzhin du ras ris/
184b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par 'dri na/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha'i lus kyis mdun du 'dug ste/ rig sngags 'chang la dbugs 'byin par bgyid cing / de bzhin du smra bar bgyid de/ rig sngags
184b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang smros shig/ mchog sbyin par bya'o// yid la ji ltar 'dod pa de dag thams cad sbyin par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gnyis blang bar bya ste/ 'jig rten pa'i mchog gi dngos grub
184b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog sangs rgyas nyid do// gal te 'jig rten pa'i mchog slong bar byed na de thams cad sbyin par bgyid de/ don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil
184b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po mchog gi sgrub pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar grub pa'i dngos grub ji lta ba de bzhin du rig sngags
184b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang la mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par bgyid do/ / zhes bya ba'i dngos grub chen por 'gyur ro// dngos grub yangs par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'i dngos
184b7(rgyud 'bum): grub tu 'gyur ro/ / gzhan pa'i mchog thams cad mngon par bslangs na stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste/ sngags kyi dngos grub dang / mig 'phrul dang / 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / lha'i gzugs
185a1(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / khung bur 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / klu'i gnas su 'jug pa dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas su 'jug
185a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / chu la 'jug pa dang / nam mkhar 'jug pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / nor sgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing du smra ba dang / nor du smra ba dang / g.yul ngor 'jug pa dang / 'gugs pa dang /
185a3(rgyud 'bum): char 'bebs pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / gnod sbyin phyir 'byin pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba med par byed pa dang / chu klung chen po sgrol ba dang / rgyu skar smra ba dang /
185a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags smra ba dang / rdzas dang sman g.yo bar byed pa dang / bcud kyi len sgrub pa dang / 'pho bar byed pa dang / 'byin par byed pa dang / lo tog sgrub pa dang / gos 'dor bar byed pa dang / rgyal po dbang du
185a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub de thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// de nas 'jig rten pa gzhan don du gnyer cing 'dod na phyag g.yas pa spyi bo'i gtsug tu 'jog par byed de/ gzhag pa
185a6(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi mod la lus med pa dri ma dang bral ba yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su dag pa'i lus so sor thob ste/ sbrul gyi shun pa bzhin du lus 'dor bar bgyid do// bsams pa nyid kyi mod la/ de
185a7(rgyud 'bum): ma thag kho nar bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar bgyid do/ / skye ba bye ba brgya stong phrag gi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ma thag kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pas lung
185b1(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa thob pa'i mod nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / 'di nyid ni skye bar skyes pa'i tha ma'o zhes so// sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba don
185b2(rgyud 'bum): yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob cing / ting nge 'dzin gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag thob bo// phyogs bcu kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs
185b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing legs so zhes bya ba rjes su stsol bar mdzad do/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis kyang 'di la kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro//
185b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa dpa' jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog gnyis po 'di ni mthong ba'i chos nyid la rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro// bya ba gzhan mang zhing chos mang ba thams cad sgrub par bgyid do// /
185b5(rgyud 'bum): gdon grol bar byed pa dang / 'bebs par byed pa dang / mdo sde la rtog pa dang / tshe la rtog pa dang / nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'bras dang / pho la mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar
185b6(rgyud 'bum): rdol ba dang / rkab shu dang / sha bkra dang / mdzod pa/ 'brum bu phra mo dang / g.yan pa dang / me dpal dang / lto ba na ba dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na ba dang / zhogs phyed na ba dang / ma ro tsa
185b7(rgyud 'bum): ka dang / pho ba'i nad dang / so na ba dang / mgul ba na ba dang / lce dang rkan na pa dang / kha na pa dang / snun pa dang / rna ba na pa dang / snying na pa dang / lto ban pa dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / lag
186a1(rgyud 'bum): pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / sen mo na ba dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rtag pa'i
186a2(rgyud 'bum): rims pa dang / mtshan mo pa dang / nyin mo pa dang / 'dus pa ste/ 'di dag thams cad gsang sngags 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis rnam par nyams par bgyid do// sdig pa de rnams rnam par
186a3(rgyud 'bum): nyams par bgyid do/ / gdug pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rnam par nyams par bgyid do// de ltar gzungs kyi snying po 'di ni stobs chen po dang ldan pas te/
186a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas las byed par 'dod na/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos pa legs par khrus byas
186a5(rgyud 'bum): pas bgyi ste/ de nas don yod pa chen po'i snying po'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs 'di sgrub cing bzlas pas de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong phrag bco brgyad du bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad zhi
186a6(rgyud 'bum): zhing 'jig rten pa'i rig sngags chen grub par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad la lus thams cad du sgrub par byed do// de nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i cho ga sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig
186a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang des nyi ma re re zhing gzhi gtsang ma legs par khrus bgyis shing gos gtsang ma bgos pas bgyis te nyal tshe gcig nas brtsams te/ nyi ma re re zhing stong phrag bcur bzlas pa dbul
186b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / bcu gcig pa'i phyogs la tshes gsum gyi nyin mtshan nas bgyi ste/ nyi ma re re zhing stong phrag phyed dang gnyis bzlas pa dbul bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
186b2(rgyud 'bum): la mchod par bgyi/ bco lnga'i nya la dkar gsum gyi gtor ma dbul bar bgyi/ mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi/ de nas zas dkar gsum bza' bar bgyi zhing / bco lnga nya'i mtshan mo
186b3(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa dbul bar bgyi'o/ / thun tha ma la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'ongs te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so zhes smra bar bgyid cing / khyod kyis don yod rgyal po'i
186b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor grub bo// phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas pad+ma stsol bar bgyid de/ rig sngags 'chang gis blang bar bgyi'o//
186b5(rgyud 'bum): blangs pa tsam gyis mod la nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing gang du 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'gro'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par dbugs 'byin par bgyid do//
186b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyid par 'dod pas pad+ma'i snying po bza' bar bgyi/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi'o// dri zhim po'i shing
186b7(rgyud 'bum): la me sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / stong phrag brgyad rdzogs pa dang / dpal lha mo chen mo dngos su 'ongs te/ de la dri zhim po'i mchod yon phul bas rig sngags 'chang bgyi ba ci yod
188a1(rgyud 'bum): ces smra bar bgyi'o/ / des bcom ldan 'das ma bdag la nor mi zad pa rnyed pa dang / gter rnyed pa rab tu stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas khyod kyi de bzhin bya'o zhes
188a2(rgyud 'bum): dbugs 'byin par byed cing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der gter chen po mthong ste/ nam yang zad par nye bar mi 'gro'o// sbyin par bgyi/ longs spyad par
188a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bgyi/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod par bgyi/ dpal lha mo chen mo la nyi ma re re zhing so so'i cha shas dbul bar bgyi'o// ut+pa la sngon
188a4(rgyud 'bum): po dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / mar gsar bsres pas arka'i shing la me s+phar te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ras ris kyi mdun du zla phyed gcig tu sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ dpag
188a5(rgyud 'bum): tu med pa dbul bar bgyis na/ rdzogs pa na las thams cad la kun nas longs spyod pa thob bo// ras ris kyi mdun du shing kun dang / til mar dang / yungs kar bsres la pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang /
188a6(rgyud 'bum): thang shing gi yam shing gis zhag bdun du thun gsum du sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na grong brgya thob bo// shing mya ngan med pa'i yam shing mar la btags pas zla phyed gcig tu thun gsum du sbyin sreg
188a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad brgya byas na rgyal po nyid thob bo/ / mtshan mo mdun du thun gsum du yam shing gis sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na gnas nges par bstan pa'i tshi ga smra bar byed do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
188b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan la mtshan mo bcu gnyis su ma li ka'i me tog stong phrag brgyad kyis mchod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / lha dang klu

188b4(rgyud 'bum): de/ de'ang lhag ma med par zad par bgyi ste/ yang dang yang du stsol bar bgyid do// gang yin pa de dang de ma bgyis na phyis stsol bar mi bgyid do// 'phag pa spyan ras gzig dbang phyug la mngon du phyog par 'dug nas sam/ yang na ring bsrel

194b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams sbrang rtsi dang bsres la shing ka ra wI ra'i yam sreg shing gis me bus te/ nyin par dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na log 'dren gyi rigs thams cad bcom par 'gyur zhing

194b4(rgyud 'bum): mar brgyad brgya byas na dmag bcings par 'gyur ro/ / lan gnyis byas na nad chen po mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brgyad brgya bzlas brjod lan gsum byas na dmag thams cad zhig par 'gyur/
194b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing phyir yang lan 'ga' yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas dbyug pa sgrub par 'dod na dbyug pa seng ldeng las gshin rje'i dbyug pa'i tshad khru do ba bya'o// de nas 'phags pa sman ras gzigs
194b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang phyug gi spyan sngar zas dkar gsum zos te stong phrag bcur bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i tshe zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po brgya rtsa
194b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas na de nas dbyug pa 'bar ro// de nas grub pa yin par shes par bya'o// don yod pa'i dbyug pa zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung
195a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la mchod pa bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dbyug pa blangs te kun tu lan bdun bskor
195a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de nas dbyug pa des la brdab par bya'o// dbyug pas sa la gru bzhir gzhal bar byas na kun tu gru bzhi lham pa'i khyim chen po gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ phun sum chogs
195a3(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i skye bos gang bar 'gyur to// de nas lha mo rgyan
195a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta ba 'os pa zhig 'ongs nas rin po che bdun las byas pa'i snod bum pa gang ba zhig thogs shing sgo'i nang na 'dug go/ de nas lha mo de na
195a5(rgyud 'bum): re/ rig sngags 'chang rang gi khyim yin gyis nang du zhugs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bas snying po med par gyur pa'i khyim gzhal med khang 'dis ci zhig bya zhes brjod par
195a6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de na re/ snod gang ba 'di long zhig dang rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang bas d+hi ga d+hig ces khros pa byas pa dang / lha mo de ngus te ji ltar char pa babs
195a7(rgyud 'bum): cher 'bab pa de bzhin du 'di'i mig nas mchi ma byung ba dang / rig sngags 'chang bas blang bar bya zhing rang gi lus la bsku bar bya'o// bskus pa tsam gyis mod la 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser lta bu'i
195b1(rgyud 'bum): lus su 'gyur ro/ / tsan dan sbrul gyi snying so dang go shi sha'i dri lus las 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khar bcug na lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la'i dri kha nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchi ma de mig tu bskus na lha
195b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyi ut+pa la sngon po 'dra ba'o lha'i mig tu 'gyur ro/ / skra la bskus na lha'i rma bya'i mdog 'dra ba'i skar 'gyur zhing skra 'khyil la 'khyil bar yang 'gyur ro// rna ba'i bu gar blugA na lha'i snyan du
195b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag gsum du thos par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong phrag gsum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'thungs na bskal pa stong phrag bcu 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// bar gyi bskal pa stong
195b4(rgyud 'bum): rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ / gar thabs dang / to Ta ga dang / brda sprod pa dang / bstan bcos dang / b+ha ra ta dang / ra ma ya na dang / sngon gyi gtam rnying dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / skyes

195b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / theg pa chen po dang / de dag thams cad mngon du gyur par gnas so// thams cad du rtogs pa khong du chud pa chen por 'gyur ro// de nas bud med de na re/ rje btsun dam pa rang gi khab mchog
195b7(rgyud 'bum): tu gshegs su gsol zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang bas brjod par bya zhing rang gi rkang pa rim gyis 'jug par bya'o// de nas bud med de nu ma gnyis ston par byed na rig sngags 'chang bas
196a1(rgyud 'bum): nu ma gnyis bzung la btsir na de las 'o ma 'dzag par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang bas blang bar bya/ gtung bar bya/ rkang pa la bsku bar byas na bskus pa tsam gyis

196a3(rgyud 'bum): rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang dpon por 'gyur ro/ / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur/ de nyid rig 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga sgrub pa

196b1(rgyud 'bum): med par bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / gos dang / mal stan dang / chos gos dang / rgyan gyi rnam pa la sogs

200b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdag
200b4(rgyud 'bum): gi 'jig rten pa sgrub pa'i cho ga lags so/ / // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/ sems can chen po sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'jig rten las

200b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / bklags pa dang / dran pa tsam dang / sgrub par byed pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad grub pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa grub par 'gyur ba

207a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di dang / rmad du byung ba rnam par lta ba don yod pa'i snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rmad du byung ba'i

207a6(rgyud 'bum): nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro/ / gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
207a7(rgyud 'bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du mthong ba dang / mngon du chos thos pa dang / mngon du dbyangs thos pa dang / mngon du lung bstan pa thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can chen po de dag gis
207b1(rgyud 'bum): ni bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu che ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// sems can de gzungs gang yin pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga dang / ming sna tshogs da ltar
207b2(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dang / yang na klog pa dang / yang na lta ba tsam mthong ba ni de dang mnyam pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu pho 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur/
207b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang de dang mnyam pa yin na/ dka' ba byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid du thos pa dang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor 'bad de

207b7(rgyud 'bum): ma'am/ dge bsnyen pa 'am/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang yin pa 'am/ sems
208a1(rgyud 'bum): can gzhan gang yang rung ba'i gzungs 'di'i dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga stobs chen po dang / pha rol gnon pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sgrub par byed pa 'di ni 'jig rten las
208a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa'i cho ga tshol ba yin no/ / 'di lta ste/ 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor lta ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya
208a3(rgyud 'bum): bcings te sgrub pa dang / 'di lta ste/ thos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed par dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sems pa dang / dus gsum du lan gsum don yod/

208b1(rgyud 'bum): rten dbang phyug rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu phyag g.yas pa byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyi bo la 'jog par 'gyur ro// rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// rtag tu zhal mthong bar 'gyur
208b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ de ltar na yon tan rgya chen po brjod pa'i gzungs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga 'di ni mchog tu dkon pa yin no// gzungs dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di thos pa tsam dang / rna ba'i
208b3(rgyud 'bum): bu gar 'di'i sgra lan bdun du nges par lhung na/ de 'chi 'pho ba tsam dang bsams pa tsam gyis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du pad+ma la

209a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yer ka'i dra ba dang gser gyi dril bu 'khrol ba'i bla re dpyangs pa rnams dang / lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khri yongs su bshams pa rnams kyang re re zhing khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na/ seng ge'i khri bshams
209a7(rgyud 'bum): ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur rab tu byung bar gyur te/ seng ge'i khri thams cad la phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par byon te bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang

210a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dam pa la mchod pa'i don du char rab tu phab bo/ / de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes bzhin 'dzum zhing rdo rje bskor bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags
210a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di
210a6(rgyud 'bum): ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed par blta bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar blta bar bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa
210a7(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa nyid du blta bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na mchog tu dkon par blta bar bgyi ste/ 'di ni phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang /

210b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ma gtogs par/ sems can thams cad kyi nang na gzhan su'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

211a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gang na ba der dong ste lhag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag

211a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don yod pa dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting
211a4(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i mtshams su gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur to// /
211a5(rgyud 'bum): khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa byung ngo // 'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba des kyang nam mkha' mthil du rdzu 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to// 'od

211b1(rgyud 'bum): / dang phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di legs so legs so// 'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed pa'i

211b5(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ ngan song du 'gro bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar byed pa/ 'di ni byang chub chen po'i snying po'i sa bon dang 'bras bu rab tu ston par byed pa'o//

211b7(rgyud 'bum): dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas/
212a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
212a2(rgyud 'bum): sngar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang sgrub thabs gsungs so// gnas bzangs gzhi dge ba dang // sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u gsing la// ljon shing me tog
212a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bus khyab/ / me tog 'khri shing 'gram dang ni// sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang // gang du chu bo 'bab pa dang // gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba// sa gzhi sems ni dga' bar 'os// yid kyi shing rta
212a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas byed cing / / sgo skabs legs par gnas pa dang // shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral// rus pa gseg ma gyo mo dang // phub ma sol ba yongs su spangs// gtsang zhing gtsang la legs dag pa'i/
212a5(rgyud 'bum): sa gzhi yongs su zlum pa der// mkhas pas rgyar ni gzings tshad du// gzhal nas shin tu rnam 'byes shing // gtsang zhing mnyen la 'jam par phye// gnas der dkyil 'khor legs par bsgrubs//
212a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// 'jig rten las 'das khyad 'phags par// de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs// sa yi cha las dpangs su ni// mi gang tshad du brko bar bya// dmar po'am
212a7(rgyud 'bum): yang na gur kum kha dog dang / / sa rdul dkar po snum pa ni// mar gsar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin// sa yi khyad par dbye ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags// byang chub snying po sa der
212b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs/ / ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang // de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin// brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis// slar yang sa des dgang bar bya// ji srid dong bu mnyam par dgang /
212b2(rgyud 'bum): ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o// nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa min// 'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstan// khru ni sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag gdang/ yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / yang na khru ni
212b3(rgyud 'bum): bco lngar bya/ / mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par dbye// ba yi lci ba dag dang ni// sa dang bsres te bsku bya ba// shin tu zhen par bajig pa dang // 'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yin// de la dkyil 'khor thig
212b4(rgyud 'bum): gdab pa/ / sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu dbye// sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang // rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni// rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad// khru gsum yang ni
212b5(rgyud 'bum): khru bzhi ni/ / thig skud tshon gyis rnam par dbye// nang gi thig gi tshad dag tu// mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni// nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya// bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu// pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang // kun
212b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bri bar bya ba yin/ / phyi yi thig gi tshad dag tu// rdo rje'i rnam pa'i stegs bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang // stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya// pad+ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang // gzhal
212b7(rgyud 'bum): yas khang pa gnas par bya/ / dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad+ma la// rnam par snang mdza thub pa bya// g.yon du 'od ni dpag med pa// g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs// shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang
213a1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du// btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni// phyag bzhi par ni bya ba yin// phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i//
213a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya// 'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni// khro bo'i rgyal po phyag bzhi pa// btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang // lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs
213a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / lag pa gnyis na thogs pa dang // sna tshogs brgyan gyis brgyan par bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan// sna tshogs dar gyis mdzes par byas// don yod zhags pa'i phyag
213a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya che/ / pad+ma'i gdan dang rnam brgyan pa// 'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya// grwa bzhi dag ni byas na ni// gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste// dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs med pa// shar gyi gnas su
213a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ni/ / lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan// g.yas kyi gnas su gnas pa ni// gos dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan// nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni// lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan// byang gi
213a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas na gnas pa ni/ / lha mo pad+ma mdzes dwags brgyan// dkyil 'khor phyi rims grwa rnams su// rgyal chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya// bar gyi gnas su gzhag pa ni// ral pa gcig pa gtum mo
213a7(rgyud 'bum): shar/ / nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur ma// g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sgyur ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin// byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong // kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa med// dkyil 'khor dbus
213b1(rgyud 'bum): su dgod pa bzhin/ / phyi rol thig le pad+mo'i 'phreng // rdo rje rtse gsum gzhag pa ni// kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng bar bcas// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// bri bya rtags dang phyag rgya dang // lha
213b2(rgyud 'bum): ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang // chu lha dbang po lus ngan po// dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/ lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar// lha rnams bri bar bya ba
213b3(rgyud 'bum): yin/ sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang // rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // kun kyang pad+mo'i gdan la gnas// de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang // rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang // zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang //
213b4(rgyud 'bum): legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no// mdung rtse gsum dang pan+d+ha sa// ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang // rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i 'phreng // 'khor lo gdung dang dga' ba dang // ral gri dang ni to ma rab//
213b5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa gang ba dag dang ni// mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang // pad+ma dang ni ut+pa la// rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu dang // dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang // grwa bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin// nor bu rdo rje dag dang
213b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni// phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil// bya ma bum dang kun di dang // ring ba b+h+ring ga ri dang ni// ri dgas e n+ya'i pags pa la// mchod phyir thogs pa'i snam bu dang //
213b7(rgyud 'bum): steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi// zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no// kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug/ so sor cha ni dbye bar bya// mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ba// 'gying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung //
214a1(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med// rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar ba'i nang // ke la ke la gtum po che// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru gzhag/ nub tu rdo rje bingag la// mthong na 'jigs su rung ba yi//
214a2(rgyud 'bum): byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni// pad+ma'i 'phreng dang ut+pal 'phreng// grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su// klu yi rgyal po bzhi rnams bri// sgo srungs pa dag bri ba ni// nor bu
214a3(rgyud 'bum): bzang dang gang ba bzang / / stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin// sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu// chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba// gang+gA dang ni sI ta dang // pak+Sha dang ni sir d+hA yin// 'phreng ba'i nang rol thog thag tu//
214a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi lha mo ba san ti// dpe med ma dang sa yi lha// lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang // sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma// de bzhin me yi lha dag dang // 'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma// gtum mo
214a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni me tog so/ / de dag bri bar bya ba yin// khrus byas 'dri mkhan gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni// lhag ma min pas kun tu bri// zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya// khyad
214a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod pas zas ngan pa/ / spang bar bya ba nya sha dang // btsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams dang // 'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni// log 'dren glags tshol spang phyir ro// khrus byas gos ni gsar
214a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bgos/ / gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// kun tu brgyan par bya ba ni// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni//
214b1(rgyud 'bum): lngalha rdzas dar ni sbyang ba dang // ba dan yang ni spyang bar bya// tshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu yis// kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya// zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad// sor bzhi 'dab ma kha bye ba/
214b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su// pad+ma brgyad ni gzhag pa dag/ gser las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing // de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi// kun tu byu
214b3(rgyud 'bum): ru'i 'phreng ba dang / / mu tig 'phreng ba de bzhin no// kun tu gser gyi srad bu dang // rin chen sna tshogs bzhag par bya// snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du// gser gyi snod ni bzhi dag dang // dngul
214b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi gnod ni bzhi gzhag go/ / dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang / gser dang / zangs las byas pa'i me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa gzhag par bya'o// gser gyi bum pa gang
214b5(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhi bzhag pa la mu tig dang / byu ru dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mar gad dang / in+d+ra ni la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o// gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang /
214b6(rgyud 'bum): gur kum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing rin po che sna
214b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pas spras pa gzhag par bya/ / cod pan gyi rgyan mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ tshon sna tshogs can dang dar dmar po spyang bar bya/ dngul gyi pog por
215a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi gzhag ste/ tsan dan dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur kum gyi bdug pas bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pasnga
215a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis bkang ste/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par bgyis la/ bkang ba la dar gtsang mas bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas/

215a6(rgyud 'bum): tog gis gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug cu rtsa bzhi btsugs te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang nor bu'i 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o//

215b1(rgyud 'bum): bu tshang sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo/ / tshon sna lnga'i srang bus dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor bar bya'o// bum bu dang / brub pa dang / byam bum drug cus bani gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba
215b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag go/ / kham phor zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang ba gzhag go/ gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bani so sor gzhag go/ snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sA

218b1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi

219a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do/ / byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'bel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do// tha na dkyil 'khor chen por rol
