219a7(rgyud 'bum): bzad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o// 'phags pa
219b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no/ / rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu dbugs 'byin par mdzad par
219b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad do// sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag tham
219b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang /
219b4(rgyud 'bum): tha na sems can ngan pa'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
219b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyur ro// lha thams
219b6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam
219b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par
220a1(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/
220a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs sbyin sreg byas
220a3(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis mod la the tsom med par me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang /
220a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyis mod la thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// the tsom med par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi
220a5(rgyud 'bum): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do// de bzhin du
220a6(rgyud 'bum): nyin mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu'ang phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/ mi bsrun pa ma rungs pa
220a7(rgyud 'bum): sel cing dmyal ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do// de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i
220b1(rgyud 'bum): phung po bla na med skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tsan dan srang nyi shu dang / a ka ru srang lnga dang / du ru ka srang bdun dang / ga pur dang gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur kum srang gcig dang / lce pog kun tu
220b2(rgyud 'bum): ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang bdun dang / 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te phye mar byas la/ kha ra dkar po dang sbrang rtsi ril bu zho re'i tshad tsam du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang / yungs kar dang 'bras yos
220b3(rgyud 'bum): bsres te ril bu dang bsres nas mar gyi nang du bsnyungs te sprin sreg bya'o/ / shing su ra b+hi dang / shing arka dang / shing sha mya'i yam shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o// gang dang gang gi tshe
220b4(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro/ / de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// de dang de'i tshe gcod
220b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs
220b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang par 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / gyur thams cad dang / gnod pa thams
220b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / gshegs 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams
221a1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol ba dang / mi rgod dang / gcan gzan
221a2(rgyud 'bum): gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram
221a3(rgyud 'bum): ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
221a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ / tshe brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad+mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa
221a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing
221a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya'o/ / rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar de'i lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// stong rtsa brgyad tshang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar
221a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig sngags 'chang ba
221b1(rgyud 'bum): legs so legs so/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no// 'di ni bdud thams cad
221b2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ / 'di ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin
221b3(rgyud 'bum): no/ 'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po cho ga yin no// 'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis
221b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad
221b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lhung lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i
221b6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du bzhugs te bka' stsal pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs
221b7(rgyud 'bum): so legs so/ / zung zhig dang / mchog ji ltar ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//
222a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo bo'i spyi bo la phyag bzhag pa dang / phyag banag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang ba nam mkha'
222a2(rgyud 'bum): la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa dang phyir
222a3(rgyud 'bum): mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas
222a4(rgyud 'bum): nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du/
222a5(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ho khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa ni pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba
222a6(rgyud 'bum): bsres pa dang ldan par byas te/ pad+ma'i snying po la ho khung zabs su brko ba dang / thad ka kun tu khru gang ba brko bar bya'o// nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis pad+ma de brgyan
222a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / pad+ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang / mchod
222b1(rgyud 'bum): yon gyi chus bkang ba'i dngul gyi snod bzhi dang / rol mo dang dri sna tshogs kyis bkang ba'i gsar gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma bzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang
222b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bzhag pa dang / dri dang me tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs sbyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun tu tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa
222b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa bzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs su bkang ba bya'o// sgo bzhir chos smra ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222b4(rgyud 'bum): bklag par bya'o/ / grwa bzhir chos smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o// gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs
222b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas// gos gtsang ma bgos/ dri zhim pos bsgos te gtsang mar byas la/ ril bu la don yod pa'i
222b6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro// don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o//
222b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas don yod pa 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni mo smra bar byams pa'i sems dang / snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang / snying rje
223a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
223a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di lta ste/ oM pad+ma ma pA ni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU ta sha na/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bi mok+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ san+d+hu ma lA nau/ a mo g+ha pA Ni ba ra de/
223a3(rgyud 'bum): hU~MhUMhU nir da ha/ pA paM/ sha ma sha ma ni/ lo kot+tA ra Ni/ sa man+ta rash+mi ba ra te/ tu ru tu ru/ pra ba raM/ a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM b+hUR+ShA ba/ na po stu te swA hA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa
223a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i snying po dang gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o// thal ba
223a5(rgyud 'bum): des gang gi lus la byugs pa de ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar par 'gyur ro// zhag gnyis pa dang /
223a6(rgyud 'bum): zhag gsum pa dang / mtshan mo pa dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / grang ba'i rims lan 'ga'
223a7(rgyud 'bum): yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'tshog mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las thar bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyang phyog
223b1(rgyud 'bum): bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha ba dang / yi dgas dang /
223b2(rgyud 'bum): grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad 'bros so// phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// snying khar thig le byas na nang
223b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na lto ba'i nang gi nad thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro// dug gis
223b4(rgyud 'bum): myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyur ro/ / thal bas khrus byas na byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sha bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang /
223b5(rgyud 'bum): shu phran mched pa dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / 'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron mo dang sbyar te bskus la/ mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mod la nad
223b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / sprin logs su gtor na sad dang / rlung dang / ser ba thams cad mi 'bab bo// rlung ldang ba'i logs su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro//
223b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor kun tu gtor na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi yal ga dang / ldum ra dang /
224a1(rgyud 'bum): kun dga' ra ba dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya
224a2(rgyud 'bum): tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang /
224a3(rgyud 'bum): dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / ri dgas dang / bya de dag
224a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / 'gongs pa tsam gyis nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe yongs su brjes
224a5(rgyud 'bum): nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro// dur khrod dam ro bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas
224a6(rgyud 'bum): gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/ mngon par dga' ba 'am bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
224a7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na rgyal po dang
224b1(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor ba tsam gyis mod la skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
224b2(rgyud 'bum): nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags
224b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs ras la bri ba bshad par bya'o/ / dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do 'am/ khru gsum mam/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod
224b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ cod pan rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yas su zla ba tshes pa can gyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams
224b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo po Ta la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o// de'i steng du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
224b6(rgyud 'bum): ba seng ge'i khri bya'o/ / seng ge'i khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o// de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing
224b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs de phyag dbugs 'byin pa bya'o/ / dbu'i gong man chad gzhal med khang chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o// dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs
225a1(rgyud 'bum): pa bdun tshad dang 'thun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang /
225a2(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa
225a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od 'dom gang ba la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang
225a4(rgyud 'bum): mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba bya'o/ / de nyid kyi nye 'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis bya'o// gong gi dbus su rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can gtum po rdo rje gsor bar bya'o// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
225a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang / 'og min gnas kyi lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang /
225a6(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dang nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / me lha dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo
225a7(rgyud 'bum): dang stobs lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnam me tog sna tshogs dang /
225b1(rgyud 'bum): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam
225b2(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi pa/ / / lha rnams kyi pha rol thog thag tu pad+ma'i 'phreng ba rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad+ma'i 'phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma
225b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ut+pa la dang nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal tu blta bar bya'o//
225b4(rgyud 'bum): de'i rgyab tu khro gnyer ma me tog sna tshogs 'chang ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// g.yon du dkar mo zhes bya ba ni skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dang nor bu rin po che lag na thogs
225b5(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+ma mdzes dga' ma me tog sna tshogs thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa
225b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / lha mo sgrol ma dang dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza' dkar po gsol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhengs pa bya'o// g.yas
225b7(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
226a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ / g.yon du pho nya mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje dang / mdung
226a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o// ri bo po Ta la'i ngos kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'
226a3(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar bya'o// ri'i smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo bsan
226a4(rgyud 'bum): ti dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrogs ma dang / dung can ma bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang nor bu
226a5(rgyud 'bum): rin po che thogs pa bya'o/ / gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad 'phreng bar sbrengs la/ mchod rten gyi rgyan ji ltar brgyan pa de ltar brgyan par bya'o// mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du
226a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o/ / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu drang srong dang lha'i
226a7(rgyud 'bum): bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o/ / g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo rje 'chang ba la ga na rnga yab kyis bcom
226b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la mngon du g.yob par bya'o/ / g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o// g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i
226b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu drang srong dang lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das mchod pa byed pa bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog thag/
226b3(rgyud 'bum): tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji lta ba bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
226b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / pog por dang / bgrang 'phreng lag na thogs te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
226b5(rgyud 'bum): la mngon du blta bar bya'o/ / ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar byas la/ ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o// snod gsar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon
226b6(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o/ / 'di'ang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs dang gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongs su spang bar bya'o// tshig ngan pa dang sems ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o// chang dang /

227a1(rgyud 'bum): dang snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa lhag par bya ste/ ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o// ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs
227a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bri bar bya'o/ / dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang bar bya'o// rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spang bar bya'o// de ltar ra mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yin no// zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar
227a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rgyu skar shin tu bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o// rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa/
227a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba yin no// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
227a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags
227a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor
227a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyis mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam
227b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang
227b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba tsam la sogs pas sdig pa thams cad phyi mar rlog go/ rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum
227b3(rgyud 'bum): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o// ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong
227b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ni gzhal med khang gnas dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta la na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la
227b5(rgyud 'bum): the tsom mi bya'o/ / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// sems kyi skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang
227b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// lus dang sems
227b7(rgyud 'bum): yid las byung ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / dbang po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa thams cad dga'
228a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bla mar lta bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe ring por 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur
228a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di
228a3(rgyud 'bum): gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/ / 'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rig pa'i mun pa'i nang du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro//
228a4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no// de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub
228a5(rgyud 'bum): ba brjod par bya'o/ / gang gis dran pa tsam gyis mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang /
228a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis mngon du srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor
228a7(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs
228b1(rgyud 'bum): shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil
228b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki te ma hA maN+Dal pad+ma sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwA na maskr-i te/ b+ha ra b+hA ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+ha ma hA brah+ma/
228b3(rgyud 'bum): be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma hA bo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ pad+ma bi bo d+ha ni/ sar+b+be pA pa an d+ha ka ra/ pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba durga ti/ b+hA ra ka/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ba hu bi bi d+ha/ beSha
228b4(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/ hu ru hu ru/ a mo g+ha gar+b+be/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha haste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ sar+b+ba A ba ra Na bi shud+d+hi/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ pa re pU ra Ni/
228b5(rgyud 'bum): tar ta ra/ tA ra ya mAn/ a ba lo kA ya/ pad+ma b+hu dza/ ma Ni ka na ka/ bi b+hU Shi ta/ bA hu/ da ma da ma/ dur dAn tA nAn/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ sar+b+ba de ba ga Na na mo s+tha ta/ ri Shi ga Na/
228b6(rgyud 'bum): sta bi ta/ sha ta sa ha sra tsan+na sUr+ya/ a ti re ka/ rash+mi/ a ba b+hA si ta/ ma hA ma shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ pa ra ma/ shud+d+ha satwa/ a ba lo ki te/ lo kai shwa ra/ pa ra ma/ kA ru Ni ka/ maN+Da le shA ra/ supra
228b7(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha/ ma hA pad+ma/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hA bi d+yA d+ha re shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA bi mok+Sha/ man+ta la d+ha ra sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ gu h+ya/ mu dra sa ma ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ba la bid+yA dA ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ mau li d+ha ra/
229a1(rgyud 'bum): a mi tA b+ha/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pA sha d+ha re shwa ra/ pa ra ba ra/ pa ra ma/ ma hA me tri/ a ba lo ki ta/ sar+b+ba satwAM san+ta rA
229a2(rgyud 'bum): ga sid+ha sid+h+ya sha/ ba ri pU ra ke/ ma hA ba ra/ pra mo da nan mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs
229a3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog gsang ba/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong

229a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / oM bI ra bI ra/ ma hA maN+Da la/ bi shwa rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka/ sar+b+ba bo d+hi satwa/ na mas+thi ta/ pa ra ma bi pu la/ bi mok+Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha/ bi lo ki ta/ a mo g+ha pA sha dzA li ta/ mahA
229a6(rgyud 'bum): dzAdz+wa la a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA ma Ni/ biSh+Ta d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hU si ta/ dzA la dzA la/ ma hA gam b+hI ra/ bi mok+Sha pA sha d+ha ra/ ba la bo d+h+yang ga/ A kaR+Sha ka/ oM brah+ma rU pa/ ma hA a mo g+ha pA sha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/
229a7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba satwa/ bi lo ki ta/ ba ra pra da/ na mo sU te swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la
229b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM bi bu d+d+ha/ bi bu d+h+ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ta ra ta ra/
229b2(rgyud 'bum): ta rA ya/ ma hA ar+N+Na ba pA raM/ ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags

229b4(rgyud 'bum): / ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ pU dzA me g+ha/ pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang

230a1(rgyud 'bum): mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o/ / de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la tshul khrims yongs

230b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa ri dgas dang bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzung

230b6(rgyud 'bum): thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ ka ru Na/ d+h+yan sa mA d+hi/ sar+b+ba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra kaM pya ka/ tsu ru tsu ru hUM phaT swAhA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras
230b7(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang nying '
231a1(rgyud 'bum): dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs pa 'gyur ro// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin
231a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thug
231a3(rgyud 'bum): rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM a mo g+ha/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ a ba b+hA sa/ s+pha ra Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki te/ b+ha ga bAn pradz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu ShA ma hA
231a4(rgyud 'bum): pradz+nyA/ ba ra da/ pA Ni/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ pad+ma d+hA ra Ni/ b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs dang shes
231a5(rgyud 'bum): rab sna tshogs kyi dge ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
231a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes rab dang blor 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sbyin pa
231a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub la thug gi bar du rab tu rmongs par mi 'gyur ro// don
231b1(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
231b2(rgyud 'bum): / thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha gi mo k+Sha/ maN+Da la ma hAd b+hu ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hAd b+hU ta/ a mi tA b+hA/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra hUM phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor der
231b3(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar dang dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas chus kun tu chag chag btab na/ chag chag btab pa tsam gyis mod la dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad gcig gi nang du sa spyang
231b4(rgyud 'bum): te yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar shel gong rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro// shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu nyams
231b5(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro// shin tu sa gzhi dpa' bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal
231b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can
231b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
232a1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/ / gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ri dgas dang bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongs
232a2(rgyud 'bum): su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// gang gis de'i sa lag par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang
232a3(rgyud 'bum): bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// de dag phyis lus la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// sa yongs su sbyong ba'i rig

232a5(rgyud 'bum): g+ha dru ma/ la ta brik+Sha/ shaM kha pa tra/ puSh+pa pha la/ bi Ta pa a ro ha/ na hi DA ga/ pushwa ri Na/ ud sa hri da/ sun+da ra pra sra pa Ni/ bi bi d+ha/ bi tsi tra/ pa ri shA d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+te na/ pa
232a6(rgyud 'bum): ri maN+Da la/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la ni rma la su pa ri shud d+ha/ pad+ma ud pa lip+ta/ dza la ma lAd bi shud d+ha/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ ba ra ma ma hA shud d+hA ya/ satwa hUM phaT swAhA/ na maH
232a7(rgyud 'bum): tri b+hu ba ne hUM phaT swA hA/ 'dis tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / chu dang / yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te/ ljon pa'i sdong po dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang /
232b1(rgyud 'bum): rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / chu klung dang / mtsho phran dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / 'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnams thams cad la bdud rtsi blug par 'gyur ro//
232b2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro// tha na lha'i rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// gang la reg pa tsam gyis reg pa de thams cad

232b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / zhags pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / rtag tu kha nas ut+pa la'i dri bro bar 'gyur ro// ngag 'jam zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing ngag mnyen par yang 'gyur ro//
233a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing skye bo thams cad yid dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// mi 'am ci'i dbyangs su'ang 'gyur ro// bstan bcos dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang

233a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang / byang chub yan lag gi me tog gi 'phreng ba bcings par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// sna tshogs su dag par yang 'gyur te/

233a6(rgyud 'bum): par yang 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/ / 'bras bu dang / me tog dang / chu dang / nags kyi bdag po dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// dkon mchog gsum la phyag

233b1(rgyud 'bum): ngidi bya ba ri shud+d+he sar+b+ba ma lo pa kaR+Shi ma ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra de pra ba ra pa ri shud+d+he/ ma hA ma Ni rat+na kA ya pa ri shud+d+he/ ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni ma hA a mo g+ha tsin+tan+tA ma Ni shud+d+he/ hr-i da ya shud+d+he/ kA ya nirma la ma hA Ni
233b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ri shud+d+he/ hu ru hu ru pra ba ra pA Ni mahA b+hu dza ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA satwa bta sa le/ pa ri sho d+ha ya mAM sarba pA su bi shud+d+ha ma le swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis rig sngags 'chang gis bdag nyid kyi lus

234a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams cad spangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang

234b1(rgyud 'bum): d+hahUM/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o// oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta/ da sha dig ma hA sI man/ ban d+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru hUM phaT swA hA/ yungs kar dang chu

237a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing / mod la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bla na med pa yin no// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'pham
237a3(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / oM a ba lo ki ta/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa sa ra sa ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa/ kuN+Da la/ d+ha la/ a mi tA b+hU/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra
237a4(rgyud 'bum): / dzA Ta ma ku Ta/ na ba badz+ren+ma/ maN+Di ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM b+ha ra/ b+hu ba Ne shwa ra pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston
237a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma'i 'jig rten mgon po'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba yin no/ / phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po
237a6(rgyud 'bum): bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog bzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun brgya bcings par 'gyur ro/ / bzung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byas
237a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bstod par 'gyur ro// ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun tu las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// thams
237b1(rgyud 'bum): cad byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no/ / gang zhing phyag rgya de dag bcings mthong zhing khrus legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror
237b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ / sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du
237b3(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun tu bzung bar 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro//
237b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis
237b5(rgyud 'bum): ci ste phyag rgya bzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam gyis mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar
237b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang /
237b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur
238a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang / lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ltar mthes
238a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ / dug gis mi tshugs/ mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis pa yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyig dug gi 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan gzan gtum pos ma yin/
238a3(rgyud 'bum): dug mi bzad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdib pas ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur/ nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus
238a4(rgyud 'bum): la dug sbyar ma dang / byang dang / spod gtong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur
238a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun
238a6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'chad par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro// dpal gyis lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'di mchod par
238a7(rgyud 'bum): 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar
238b1(rgyud 'bum): du'ang dgyes par 'gyur te mchod par byed do/ / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang /
238b2(rgyud 'bum): lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro// rtag tu
238b3(rgyud 'bum): dgyes par ston par bzhed par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis
238b4(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa byas la/ tsan dan dkar po dang / gur kum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/ ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras ris kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ sangs
238b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o// mchod
238b6(rgyud 'bum): rten ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ / sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o// byams dang dang snying rje'i sems su bya'o// sems
238b7(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ / sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
239a1(rgyud 'bum): yid la dran par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcings par 'gyur ro//
239a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas mthu brjod par bya'o// mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi sku mngon du mthong ba yin no// rgyal po 'am/
239a3(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo'i nang du 'am/ skye bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa'am/ dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du 'am/ 'khor du bcas pa'i nang du'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang /
239a4(rgyud 'bum): bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul
239a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu
239a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug po 'am/ dbul po 'am/ rgyal po thob pa 'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
239a7(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams
239b1(rgyud 'bum): med pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam/ gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon sum du mthong
239b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / mi ngas dang /
239b3(rgyud 'bum): yams kyi nang dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram/ rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / nad 'byung ba dang /
239b4(rgyud 'bum): nad med pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / shin tu char 'bab pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin par 'bab pa dang / dar ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'byor pa dang / mi 'byor pa dang / 'ong
239b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / 'gro ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnyed pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bri ba dang / lo nyes pa mthong ba dang / 'khor ba na da ltar gyi las gang cung zad legs par byed pa dang / nyes par byed pa dang /
239b6(rgyud 'bum): dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'am/ 'bri ba 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ skye ba legs par skye ba 'am/ ngan par skye ba 'am/ bu 'byung ba bu pho 'am/ bu mo 'am/ bu bzang po 'am/ bu ngan pa 'am/ bsod
239b7(rgyud 'bum): nams can nam/ bsod nams med pa mngal na gnas pa de dag bden pa nyid du mthong ste/ las kyi cho ga legs par byas pas the tsom mi bya'o// tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / nyin mtshan
240a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya mi dgos kyi/ bzlas brjod dang / gtor ma dang / gtsang sbra dang / bkru ba shal dang / shin tu khrus bya ba dang / gos gtsang ma bcang ba dang / bden par smra/
240a2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang / bla ma lA legs par mnyan pa de gzung ba kho nar bya'o// zas dang / skom gtsang ma dang / chang dang / sha dang / beg tsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / 'dres
240a3(rgyud 'bum): par byas pa'i 'dres pa'i zas yongs su spang ba dang / shin tu 'bags pa dang / de dag ni khyad par 'dod pas yongs su spang bar byas nas/ las 'di ni mod la thams cad mngon du mthong
240a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / dka' thub spyod pa la bsnyas sems mi bya/ ma gus pa mi bya'i/ lkog tu'ang mi bya'o// rjes su bstan pa de dag ni mchog yin no// bsgrub par bya ba mchog de dag ni 'jig rten dbang
240a5(rgyud 'bum): phyug mgon pos bka' stsal pa yin no/ / dngul las me long chu zheng du sor bcu drug pa byas la/ zangs las pad+mo'i gdan khru gang gi tshad sdong bu dang bcas par bya'o// me long gi gong du dngul lam
240a6(rgyud 'bum): gser las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ste/ tshad sor bzhi pa/ gdan pad+mo/ phyag bzhi la mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad+ma dang / nor bu ring po che
240a7(rgyud 'bum): thogs par bya ba ni 'jog sbyong legs par byas pa/ 'jam po 'od phyin pa tsam du skrang bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long gi gong gi 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku la ring bsrel gzhag par
240b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / ga pur dang gla rtsis sku la mchod par bya'o// me long gi nye 'khor thog thag tu dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i 'phreng ba gdags par bya'o//
240b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i dar gdags par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas me long de la nyi ma re re zhing dus gsum du don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste/ ji tsam brgyad
240b3(rgyud 'bum): stong tshang gi bar du bya'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur bar bya'o// de nas me long 'bar bar 'gyur ro// gcig kho nar kha dog sna tshogs pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi
240b4(rgyud 'bum): sku gzugs de las lha rdzas kyi chu 'dzag go/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro// don yod par dga' ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba
240b5(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / lus shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas 'jig rten thams cad kyi
240b6(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam par 'phrul pa 'grub pa bstan par bya dgos pas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang bas sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyar khru bzhi/ 'phang du khru
240b7(rgyud 'bum): do pa byas pa/ shin tu mkhregs pa/ shin tu 'jam par bya'o// thig skud kyis rnam par phye zhing tshon sna tshogs rnam par dbye zhing sgo bzhi rnam par phye nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying po rnam par
241a1(rgyud 'bum): phye ste/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad tshon gyis gsal bar bri zhing pad+ma'i dkyil du ge sar dang ze ba bya'o// stegs bu gru bzhi la rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang /
241a2(rgyud 'bum): stegs bu'i grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi go cha bgos pa/ gtum pa/ 'jigs pa byed pa'i gzugs bri bar bya'o// stegs bu'i dbus kyi gnas par bar du lha dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen
241a3(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / lus ngan po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha dbang phyug chen po dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / ral pa gcig pa
241a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / sgrol ma dang / dkar po dang / khro gnyer ma dang / rdo rje pho nya po rnams tshon sna tshogs kyis bri zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa bya'o// stegs bu'i phyi rol du
241a5(rgyud 'bum): mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i 'phreng ba dang / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba kun tu bya'o// 'phreng ba'i bar dbus dang grwa'i bar du lha mo brgyad bya ste/ 'jigs byed ma dang / dpe med pa dang / ba
241a6(rgyud 'bum): san ti dang / dpal dang / sgra dbyangs dang / sa'i lha mo dang / dung can pa dang / pus pa dan ti rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang rin po che'i snod thogs par bya'o//
241a7(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol thog thag tu 'phreng ba'i bar bar du dri sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor bsku zhing tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis mchod pa sna tshogs bya'o// ga pur dang gla rtsis mchod cing dkyil 'khor kun
241b1(rgyud 'bum): tu dar sna tshon sna lnga'i rgyal mtshan dang / mda' dang / rta babs kyis brgyan par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi cung beng gis bkang ste gzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi snod bzhi gtor ma dkar gsum gyis
241b2(rgyud 'bum): dgang bar bya'o/ / dngul gyi snod bzhir mchod yon gyi chu gzhag par bya'o// snod brgyang ro sna tshogs kyi gtor mas dgang bar bya'o// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o// kha bas
241b3(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba dang gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ / dri sna tshogs dang byug pas dngul gyi snod bkang ste gzhag par bya'o// dngul gyi pog por brgyad tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du
241b4(rgyud 'bum): ru ka dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur kum dang / sra rtsi pog dang / pog gis gang bar bya zhing bdug spos sna tshogs pas bsreg go/ dngul dang / zangs dang / gser gyi me tog gi snying
241b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i dkyil 'khor du gcal du dgram mo/ / phyi'i dkyil 'khor du ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog gcal du dgram par bya ste/ 'phreng ba rnams khor yug tu bskor nas bzhag ste/ de la'ang me long legs
241b6(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan par byas nas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma'i ge sar dang ze'u 'bru la shar du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mkhrus byas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya ste/
241b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi las dang bya ba thams cad byas nas/ me long la mngon du phyogs te skyil mo krung du 'dug par gyur nas/ 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i bzlas brjod dbul
242a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ste/ bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / khro bo'i rgyal pos dbang bskur ro// dbang bsgyur ba tsam gyis mod la 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum dang
242a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i dbus su me long gi dbus der/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mthong ste/ me long gi dbus de nas rig sngags 'chang de la legs so zhes bya ba
242a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par mdzad do/ / rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so// bdag la don yod pa'i me long la 'bebs pa'i de kho na nyid dam par gyur pa 'di thams cad yang dag par mthong ste/ 'jig
242a4(rgyud 'bum): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa zhes bya ba yongs su dag pa nyid do/ / rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mtshungs pa
242a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa thob bo/ / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya grub po// rig sngags
242a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog gang 'dod pa smros shig/ de thams cad sbyin par bya'o zhes so// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchog gang don du gnyer ba de blangs ma thams
242a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'phral nyid du sbyin par byed do/ / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa der kun nas 'ongs pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs
242b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dmangs rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / btsun mo'i 'khor du kun 'ongs pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa 'am/
242b2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams dang mi ldan pa 'am/ yongs su dag pa 'am/ lta ba ngan pa 'am/ gzhan dmyal ba pa'i sems can gti mug gi mun pa la lhung ba/ mnar med pa la gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa
242b3(rgyud 'bum): lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad la'ang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus de la ston par byed/ thams
242b4(rgyud 'bum): cad du smra bar byed/ yang dag par dbugs 'byin par byed/ thams cad du rang gi las dge ba'am mi dge ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa de thams cad ston par byed do// rig sngags kyis chom rkun
242b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / gdol pa dang / rig sngag spong zhing nyam par byed pa dang / rig sngag sun 'byin par byed pa dang / rig sngag la ma dad cing gus pas mi nyan pa de'i mi mthong ba ni ma gtogs te/ gzhan du na rang gi las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal
242b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa sna tshogs nges par 'byung bar mthong ngo / / de nas sems can de rnams gang 'dod pa'i don yid la byed pa 'jug ste/ 'jig rten pa 'am 'jig rten las 'das pa de thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil
242b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen por rang rang gi 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba/ bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i 'bras bu mthong bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo //
243a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen po dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang bcas pa'i gzhal yas khang mthong ngo // po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal yas khang rnams bcom ldan 'das
243a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa gzhal yas khang na lha dang klus yongs su bskor ba mthong ngo // gzhan ji ltar da ltar gyi
243a3(rgyud 'bum): dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / nad dang / 'chi ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / g.yul dang /
243a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrug pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / rgyal ba 'am/ 'pham pa 'am/ brlag pa'am/ ma brlag pa'am/ yams sam/ char ches pa 'am/ dus ma yin pa'i char ram/ char med pa 'am/ rlung
243a5(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ sad dam/ tshad pa'ang rung ste/ de dag thams cad mthong ngo // nor dang ldan pa'am/ nyams pa 'am/ 'phel ba 'am/ lo tog gam/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu 'phel ba'ang rung ste/ de dag
243a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthong ngo / / chom rkun dang / kun po dang / dug dang / mtshon cha'i 'jigs pa 'am/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang /
243a7(rgyud 'bum): brjed byed kyi 'jigs pa de thams cad mthong ngo // nor chen po 'am nor med pa de thams cad mthong ngo // 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mthong ngo // bu thob pa dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul dang / ljongs
243b1(rgyud 'bum): thob pa dang / bud med thob pa de thams cad mthong ste/ 'di la dogs pa dang / yid gnyis dang / the tsom bskyed par mi bya zhing / mchog tu dang ba dang gus pas shin tu 'bad de cho ga 'di bsgrub par
243b2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
243b3(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa'i nags
243b4(rgyud 'bum): paba'i snying po gsungs pa cho ga zhib mo'i nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / ras ris shin tu zab pa/ shin tu gting dpag dka' zhing / shin tu rgya che
243b5(rgyud 'bum): la shin tu sgrub dka' ba dang / dkyil 'khor mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / ras ris mang po yongs su bsgrags pa rnams ni rab rib dang 'bral bar mthong ste/
243b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po dug can pa zab pa lta bu/ lhun po chen po dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ smig rgyu lta bu/ rdul phra rab lta bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa lta bu/ bgrang
243b7(rgyud 'bum): ba las yang dag par 'das pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ tshad med pa/ bskal pa'i grangs kyis bgrang bar bya ba med pa'i bskal pa'i tshad ma dang / bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
244a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshad ma dang / lha'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / klu'i yul gyi tshad ma dang / sems can gyi tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chad ma dang / de bzhin
244a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i spyan la snang ba'i tshad ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la kun tu snang ba'i tshad ma dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshad ma dang / bdud kyi yul gyi tshad ma rnams

249b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bstan pa ni shin tu ya mtshan no/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag

249b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje dogs pa bsal ba dang the tsom gcod pa la rjes su gzung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'

253a1(rgyud 'bum): pa de rnams thams cad sa chen po brgyad pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur to/ / des kyang 'khor chen po kun tu 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de rnams thams

255b1(rgyud 'bum): A kaR+Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba karma sid+d+hiM pra yats+tsha me a ba lo ki te shwa rad+d+hA hUM/ mahA pad+moSh+NI Sha b+hu dze swA hA/ rigs kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags so// oM ma hA tsaN+Da pad+me shwa ra bi bi d+ha rU pa/ bi kA Ta/ par+b+ba
255b2(rgyud 'bum): daMr+dz+dza ka rA la b+hI ShaN/ pak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta hri ya~M/ khA da ya/ biSh+Ta/ pad+ma d+hI/ Ta~M/ dr-i Ti hU~M swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i rigs kyi snying po'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i las rnams so// oM a mo
255b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+meSh+Ti Sha pad+me pA sha kro d+ha kA mA ya kar+sa pra be sha ya maN+Da shu ba ti/ ye ma/ bcu mgu be+e ma prAng+ga beSh+Ta d+hA re/ ma hA tsaN+Da be ga a mo g+ha ku la sa ma ya/ pad+me ts+tsha nAM/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod zhags pa'i pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying
255b4(rgyud 'bum): bo'o/ / de nas don yod pa'i snying po'i las rnams su 'gyur te/ dran pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pas gcig tu mtshungs par 'gyur ro// tshe dpags

261a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po re re bo 'di dag ni bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang ches ngal zhing dub par bzlas brjod sgrub pa

261b1(rgyud 'bum): bskal par gnas pa'ang des thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur la/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bsags pa rnams zad par 'gyur/ lus yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang sdig pa dang 'bral

261b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis su nor bu dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/ bskal pa khri brgyad stong 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas ri gru 'dzin du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa brgya
261b6(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad nur dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi
261b7(rgyud 'bum): nang du brgya byin nyid byed par 'gyur/ bskal pa 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa gnyis su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su 'jug par 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la spyod
262a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ nams kyang mi'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba thams cad du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur/ thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ lagan
262a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de ltar rig sngags lan cig dran pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje gal te gang zhig zhag gcig gam/ lan cig smyung ba la gnas te bzlas
262a3(rgyud 'bum): brjod dang bcas pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje de ni tshe 'di nyid la mi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo nyid sgrib pa dang bral nas don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa bkod pa'i ting
262a4(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ / pad+ma gsal ba rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa rnam par gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya
262a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ / pad+ma gtsug tor mthar phyin pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo// don yod pa 'bar ba'i gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba grub pa 'thob po// de bzhin gshegs pa
262a6(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas
262a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du pad+ma dag la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
262b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi cho ga mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa cho ga zhib mo mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du lobs par 'gyur zhing / don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// don
262b2(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po pad+ma gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po gsang sngags sgrub pa'i cho ga ste/ sgrub pa'i cho ga gnyis pa'o// / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na

262b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho gar bcas pa bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang kun gyis 'grub pa/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i cho ga de kho na
262b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na
262b6(rgyud 'bum): rdorje bya ba'i cho ga dang sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje gas sngags rtsa ba don yod pa'o zhags pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi snying po gsang ba 'di'i rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu 'am/
262b7(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma lan cig tsam dran pa yid la byed pa yongs su dag pa'i bdag nyid snying rje chen po dang byams
263a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i sems can gang yang rung ba ngan song gsum du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ sems can dmyal ba 'am//
263a2(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams kyi gnas de dag med de/ de ltar sems can thams cad sgrub pa dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lan gnyis brjod pa tsam gyi nad thams cad
263a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ dug dang / 'brum bu dang / 'bras dang / lhog pa dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa la sogs pa thams cad

263a7(rgyud 'bum): gang la la sems can dmyal bar gzhol ba shi ba dang / dge slong gang la la bslab pa'i sdom pa dang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa ral ba dang / mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus par ma byas pa shi ba de'i don du bye ma gtsang ma
263b1(rgyud 'bum): blangs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ dur khrod dam/ ro bsregs pa 'am/ ma chad pa der bye ma gtor bar bya'o// gang dang gang na sems can gang dag gi rus pa yod sar bye ma gtor ma thag tu de dang der
263b2(rgyud 'bum): bye ma bab pa'i sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha zar skyes pa 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i skye gnas su skyes na/ de de'i mod la tshe brjes nas thams cad mtho ris su
263b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhol bar 'gyur zhing / nams kyang sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar mi 'gyur ro// yang na gro ga la bris nas mchod rten gyi nang du bcug pa'i gnas der rkang pa gnyis pa 'am/ rkang pa bzhi pa gang dag nye bar
263b4(rgyud 'bum): 'ongs pa de dag thams cad grib ma phog pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag cing thams cad mtho ris su gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / tha na ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na ldang sgo skra dang / ne

263b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ / dung la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas gnas mthon por bus na sems can gang dag dung de'i sgra thos pa skyes pa dang / bud med dang /

264a1(rgyud 'bum): sems can gang dag sbyin pa la dga' ba dang / gang dag bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas pa dang / gang dag skyabs gsum bzung ba dang / gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa
