267b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs g.yul gyi nang du zhugs na/ bdag nyid gcig pus dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa las rgyal bar 'gyur/ 'dis thams cad du zhugs pa tsam gyis pham pa byas par 'gyur zhing /
267b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bcur 'bros la thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur ro// thig le'i byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas nye bar 'khor ro//
267b3(rgyud 'bum): srid 'tsho'i bar du mchod gnas su 'gyur ro// dpung pa g.yas par nor bu btags la yan lag dang yan lag dag tu thig le byas na thams cad du rgyal ba 'thob cing reg pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur la/
267b4(rgyud 'bum): don gang dang gang bsgrubs pa de dang de thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// ril bu dag ni khar bcug nas// lhan cig 'dug la smras na ni// thams cad dbang du 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyal po dang ni btsun mo 'am//
267b5(rgyud 'bum): dge sbyong dang ni bram ze dang // rgyal rigs dang ni dam ngas rigs nyid// skyes pa dang ni bud med dang // khye'u dang bu mo rnams kyang rung // de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// kun tu mngags pa'i las rnams
267b6(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / ril bu thos pa tsam gyis ni// nad rnams thams cad rnams par 'jig/ gang gi nyin bzhi pa yi rims// gang dag khong skem nad kyis nyams// gang zhig rtag pa'i rims kyis btab// gang du
267b7(rgyud 'bum): 'thab mo 'byung ba dang / / de bzhin skye bo sdang sems can// bdag la grib gnon gzhan grib gnon// skem byed skem pa brjed byed dang // gang zhig gdon gzhan mi bzad pa// sdig pa'i las ni kun
268a1(rgyud 'bum): tu spyod/ sngon gyi las ni mi bzad pa// de kun skad cig tsam gyis 'jigs// ril bus khrus byas tsam gyis ni// 'bras dang shu bar gyur rnams dang // ldog pa dang mi chang cu
268a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / mtshan par rdol dang mi dpal dang // khyi rngo mdze dang rkang pa'i nad// mi bzad de rnams kun dang ni// gang dag nor rgyas sdang bas zin// byugs pa tsam gyis mod la ni// thams cad dug med zhe
268a3(rgyud 'bum): pabar 'gyur/ / ril bu thams cad las byed pa// lha rdzas shi ba sos par byed// ril bu dag ni 'chang byed cing // thig le dag ni byas pa yis// tham cad du ni mchod pa 'thob// thams cad du ni nor dag 'du/ dpal 'dod pa ni
268a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'thob cing / 'bru 'dod 'bru yi phung po 'phel// lha rnams dag ni dga' 'gyur zhing // klu rnams kyang ni dga' dang bcas// gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang // lha min mkha' lding mi 'am ci// lto 'phye
268a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po thams cad dang / / 'byung po rnams kyang dga' dang bcas// rtag tu phyag bya'i gnas 'gyur zhing // thams cad dbang du gyur nas 'khod// 'khod kun dran bya ci bya zer// gang zhig ril bu de dag
268a6(rgyud 'bum): bsten/ / ril bu thig le rtag byed la// de bzhin gshegs kun dgongs pa mdzad// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // de nyid rig la rtag tu ni// mchog sbyin dus kun gzigs par mdzad//
268a7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams phung po stong dag ni// nyi ma re re ba sogs par byed// 'jig rten pa yi bde spyad cing / 'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde// tshe brje ba ni 'phos nas su// bde ba can du mod la 'gro// gang dang
268b1(rgyud 'bum): gang du skye bar ni/ / tshe rabs rtag tu tshe rabs dran// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing // g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// dus kun tu ni srung ba dang // skyo ba dang sbed
268b2(rgyud 'bum): dang srung bar byed/ / gang zhig bu ni med pa dang // bud med bu ni 'dod pa la// ril bu gcig cig sbyar nas su// mnyam par bzhag pas gsang sngags ni// mkhas pas zla ba yar gyi nger// 'bum
268b3(rgyud 'bum): ni tshang bar bzlas nas su/ / zla ba nya ste bco lnga la// skyes pa bud med khrus bya zhing // yan lag yan lag thig le bya// dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod cing // bram ze dag kyang mchod ston byed//
268b4(rgyud 'bum): srung ba'i cho ga byas nas su// gtor ma dkar gsum mang po bsham// bdag nyid rgyan gyis brgyan nas su// gos gtsang rnams ni bgo bar bya// byams pa'i sems la yang dag gnas// snying rje
268b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can sdug par byed/ / bsam pa dag cing des pa dang // bla mar rtag tu gus par bya// me tog sna tshogs rab dgang zhing // spos dang byug pa sna tshogs dang // du rus tsan dan sa la ki/ lha yi
268b6(rgyud 'bum): bdug pas bdug bya zhing / / bu ram 'o ma bdun dang ni// ril bu legs sbyar bza' bar bya// gsang ba 'di 'thungs mod la ni// btung dang kha zas bza' bar bya// mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi
268b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang / / mchog sbyin mdzad par mchod par bya// byams mdzad de yi zhabs drung du// mtshan mo nyal dang nang par ni// mthong ba mchog 'di thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang //
269a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod sbyin rang gzugs ston mdzad cing // mchog nyid dam pa sbyin par mdzad// bud med de ni bu skyed cing // gzugs bzang mchog tu lta na sdug/ stobs ldan gzugs ni
269a2(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs/ / lha yi dpal gyi rjes su 'gro// chos ldan mkhas shing gsal ba dang // tshe ring dbang phyug tshad med 'gyur// dpa' bo dgra las rgyal ba dang // sdang ba thams cad 'joms par
269a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / yang na dran pa'i blo skyed par 'dod pas thos pa la brten nas 'dug cing // rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma zhag bdun du nyin re zhing mar dang 'o ma bskol ba der ril bu bdun bcug ste/ zan ma zos
269a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngon rol du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas 'jam tsam pa 'thungs la phyis kha zas bza' bar bya/ zhag bdun gyis thos pa'i rgya mtsho chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ bstan bcos
269a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / chos lugs dang / 'dul ba dang / snyan dngags dang / brda sprod pa dang / mdo'i sde dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang / tshogs su bcad pa'i sde dang / gleng gzhi'i sde dang /
269a6(rgyud 'bum): ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / chos mngon pa dang / rtsis dang / cho gzhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya thams cad dang / theg pa chen po
269a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kha ton du lobs par 'gyur ro/ / zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig tu sbyar ba byas na stobs chen po'i brtson 'grus kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur te/ glang po che khri'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig tsam
269b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba byas na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho zhing gnyer ma dang sgra dkar spangs la/ sgra lcang lo 'khril zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ba dang / lus kyi mdog pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro// lo gcig tu sbyar na lha'i sman
269b2(rgyud 'bum): bcud kyis len mchog la 'jug cing nam mkha'i steng du lha rnams dang lhan cig mthun par 'gyur la/ brgya byin dang yang lhan cig 'gran par 'gyur/ lha rnams kyi lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i gzhal med
269b3(rgyud 'bum): med khang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang gi gnas na 'dug par 'gyur/ nyi ma lta bur 'od gtong zhing rgyu la gnas pa bzang po rnams kyis 'gro bar byed/ gzi brjid
269b4(rgyud 'bum): shin tu gsal ba mi bzod cing rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la the tsom mi bya'o/ / las thams cad sgrub pa'i thig le dang / ril bu sgrub pa'i cho ga bzhi pa'o// // de nas mi snang bar
269b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba sman gyi mchog don yod pa'i mthus grub par bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de kho na yin no// sman dngul chu dang / brah+ma kI ra dang /
269b6(rgyud 'bum): su bar+Na k+Shi ra dang / shel bsngo bsangs dang / ku k+Shi dang / su gan d+hi dang / ki kuSh+pa skyon med pa dang / ut+pa la bzang po dang / pad+ma k+Sha dang / gu gul dang / phe lu pata tra dang / gur kum dang / nA gi puSh+pa dpa
269b7(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa dang / spang spos dang / shi ri Sha'i me tog dang / tsan dan dkar po dang bcas pa bsres nas zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma la don yod pa pad+ma gtsug tor gyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi rgyal po'i sngags kyis
270a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu brtson par lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya zhing / khro bo'i gsang sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbang bskur la/ yi ge gcig pa
270a2(rgyud 'bum): lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya/ de'i tshe gsang sngags bcu po so sor lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod bya ste/ gsang sngags thams cad rdzogs par bzlas brjod byas nas sman don yod pa rgya che ba gsal ba
270a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba sman gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du bzhag la grib ma la bskam par bya'o// yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gtsug tor gyis
270a4(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas snod gtsang ma'i nang du bcug la/ nam dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe thams cad du sgrub pa'i dgos pa thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang
270a5(rgyud 'bum): gtsang mar gyur pas lus legs par khrus byas la spos chus byugs te gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ sman gyi mchog 'di yungs mar gyis sbrus la rang gi lus la byug par bya ste/ lan cig bskus
270a6(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur la/ gnas gsang bar bya ba'i sgo bcad pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'jug par 'gyur/ don thams cad byed par
270a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gtso bo rgyal por 'gyur zhing / de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas nas las
270b1(rgyud 'bum): su bya ba'i dgos pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i gnas kyi sgo bcad pa thams cad na 'dug la/ klu 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad mdun du 'khod nas bya ba thams cad la ci bgyi zhes bya ba
270b2(rgyud 'bum): byed par 'gyur zhing / las su bya ba dang dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'khod cing nyin mtshan du gnas la/ de nas klu thams cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro//
270b3(rgyud 'bum): sman la sing ha dzi hA dang ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bas mgo kun byugs na ji lta ba yid la byas pa dang / rang gi blos 'dod pa'i ngo bo sna tshogs ston par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad ji ltar 'dug pa bzhin ston
270b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ gnas su gtogs pa thams cad 'khor gyi nang na ji ltar rnam par sprul pa'i gzugs sna tshogs ston par byed/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'phel ba rnams ston par byed cing bya ba thams cad byed do// spros
270b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi til mar dang spras nas byin pa dang rkang pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing / nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur la/ gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu'i steng du 'gro zhing nams kyang phyir
270b6(rgyud 'bum): sa la rkang pa 'jog par mi 'gyur/ lag pa g.yas pa la bskus na gang dang gang la lag pa reg pa de 'ong bar 'gyur la sus kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur/ bud med gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang bsres nas mig la bskus
270b7(rgyud 'bum): nas rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mthong bar mi 'gyur zhing don 'dod pa gang yin pa byed do/ / don gyi rdzas gang yin pa blangs kyang sus kyang mi mthong ngo // bud med gang dang phrad na sus kyang ming mthong la/ ji srid
271a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho'i bar du 'dug kyang sus kyang mi shes so/ / khar byugs nas gang dang gang na bro gar byed pa dang / bzhad gad byed pa nyid kyi nang du zhugs na bya ba thams cad byed la lus ni sus kyang
271a2(rgyud 'bum): mi mthong ngo / / bum pa la byugs nas chus bkang na chu'i rgyun snang la bum pa de ni mi mngon no// gzhong pa chus bkang ba de'i dbus byugs na chu de gang bar snang la bum pa de ni mi snang ngo // bdag nyid la byugs
271a3(rgyud 'bum): nas bum pa chus bkang ba lag na thogs na bum pa las chus 'byung ba ni snang la mi de'i lus ni mi snang ngo / / mig la bskas nas skye bo mang po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/ de'i sgra ni thos shing rang
271a4(rgyud 'bum): gi lus ni mi mngon no/ / gnas su gtogs pa thams cad du zhugs na rang gi lus khrus ma byas kyi bar du mi mthong ngo // su 'ang rung ba'i mig la bskus la lus la'ang bskus na de dag thams cad mi mthong
271a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur zhing / gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der mi snang bar 'gyur la/ khrus byas pa tsam gyis phyir snang bar 'gyur ro// lus kun la bskus nas mdzod chen po'i nang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur la/
271a6(rgyud 'bum): gser dang / dngul dang / 'phra men dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / b+hu ru dang / dung dang / man shel dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / marga dang / mthon kha dang / gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab
271a7(rgyud 'bum): lhub gang yang rung ba nyid 'dod na thams cad blangs nas song na sus kyang mi mthong la gar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / ji srid du khrus ma byas pa de srid du rang gis mi mthong la/ khrus byas na thams cad
271b1(rgyud 'bum): du mthong ngo / / rig sngags 'chang bud med kyi nang du 'jug par 'dod pa gtsang bar khrus bya'o// de nas spos chus khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu ba gcin gyis khrus bya'o// yang gur kum gyis khrus bya'o//
271b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'og tu ba'i rnam lngas khrus bya'o// de'i 'og tu til mar dang lhan cig bsres pa'i ril bu des lus bsku bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med gzhon nu'i mu no dang sbyar bas mig la bskus la/ de nas ril bu
271b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dpung pa g.yas pa la gdags par bya'o/ / de nas gos gtsang ma bgos nas gsang sngags brjod cing dran par byas la/ rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na mi mthong bar 'gyur te/ lus sus kyang mi
271b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo / / nyi ma gcig gam/ nyi ma gnyis sam/ nyi ma bdun nam/ nyi ma bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu khrus byas la bud med de dag gi nang na rtse zhing dga' bar byed la/ yongs su spyod par byed kyang
271b5(rgyud 'bum): sus kyis mi shes la 'jug cing phyir 'gro ba na sus kyang glags mi rnyed de/ ji srid du khrus ma byas pa'i bar du rang gi lus mi snang bar 'gyur ro// phug tu 'jug na lus kun spos kyi til mar gyis byug/
271b6(rgyud 'bum): la phug tu zhugs na phug gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur gyis/ gnas de'i nang du zhugs la ji lta ji ltar las su byas pa de lta de ltar gyis shig/ chu'i nang du zhugs na ji ltar khyim gyi nang na 'dug bzhin du
271b7(rgyud 'bum): chus mi rlan la/ chus gos par yang mi 'gyur ro// me'i nang du zhugs nems lus la mi reg cing tsan dan ltar bsil bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas mtshor zhugs na gnas na 'khod pa rnams kyis de mi mthong
272a1(rgyud 'bum): gis/ ji ltar rang gi yid la las su bya bar 'dod pa'i las kyi rnam pa gzhan dag kyang gyis shig/ mi snang bar bya ba ril bu'i sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//
272a2(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu drug pa// / de nas sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ las thams cad kyi don sgrub par byed
272a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa/ gnod sbyin thams cad
272a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs par rgyal ba sbyin pa/ dgra thams cad zlog par byed pa/ 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa nyid dang / 'gyed
272a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mtshon cha'i dra ba thams cad las sgrol bar byed pa/ grub pa don yod pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad du gsang sngags dang dkyil 'khor gyi
272a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub/ phyag rgya 'pho ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi rim par phye ba'i sgrub pa las thams cad du mchog gi dngos grub kyang 'grub ste 'di la the tsom med do// bde ba thams cad rtag tu rab tu sbyin pa dang /
272a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ma yin pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / lha dang klu thams cad spyan 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / bdud dang / 'byung po dang /
272b1(rgyud 'bum): sha za dang / gdon mi bzad pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad thams cad du sgrol bar byed par grub pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i dus rtag tu tshar gcod par
272b2(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med do/ / rims thams cad rtag tu rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dug thams cad gsod par byed pa/ 'phral du sreg blugs byin pa tsam gyis thams cad du rtag tu gnang chen
272b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / thams cad du mthong na dga' ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar mchod par bya ba dang / thams cad du stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu
272b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba'ang sbyin par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom med do// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu kun tu snang ba dang / dus thams cad kyi tshe las thams cad la shin tu dga' ba dang / skye ba nas skye bar tshig btsun
272b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du bla ma la sri zhu che ba dang / thams cad du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma'o// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pas rtag tu'ang srung ba dang / yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang / rgyal po chen
272b6(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha nyid kyis kyang dus rtag tu srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar byed par the tsom med do// dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang /
272b7(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyis srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar byed cing rtag tu legs par kha los sgyur bar gnas par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / drag
273a1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gzhon nu dang / nor bu bzang po dang / stobs kyi lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / lngas rtsen dang / gar mkhan mchog ste/ 'di rnams kyis rtag tu srung ba dang / skyab pa dang /
273a2(rgyud 'bum): sba bar byed cing gnas te 'di la the tsom med do// me'i lha gzi brjid chen po dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / rgyu skar gyi lha rnams kyis srung ba dang / skyab pa dang / sba bar byed cing mchog tu mchod pa byas pas
273a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ / sbyin sreg tsam 'di ni bya ba thams cad bla na med pa'i dngos grub rnams la'o// 'bras thug po che dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi bsres pas sbyin sreg
273a4(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag brgyad byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thams cad mchog sbyin par 'gyur te/ bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dang / pad+ma'i chu ba dang / 'bras
273a5(rgyud 'bum): yos dang / yungs kar dang / a ka ru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pas sa mI'i shing gis zhi ba'i me sbar te stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
273a6(rgyud 'bum): phyug rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du nye bar gnas te/ mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// bya ba thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang
273a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// thams cad du don yod pa thogs pa med pa'i dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro// bsod nams thams cad 'gugs pa'i dngos grub tu'ang
273b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par bye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam
273b2(rgyud 'bum): / tshig gsang ba la rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// seng ldeng dang nim pa'i shing gi yam shing gis 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yung kar dang / zho dang / mar dang / lan tshwa dang bsres pas sbyin sreg stong phrag
273b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad byas na/ bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon thams cad dang / gdug pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang /
273b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyed pa thams cad las sgrol bar byed do// mtshon cha thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// tsan dan
273b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'bras yos dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsres pa'i pad+ma'i sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na/ yul 'khor dang / ri brag dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs rnams su kun nas dpag
273b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad stong phrag gcig kho ra khor yug tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bsrung ba dang bskyab pa'i ched du yang dag par
273b7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad thams cad du rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// gcan gzan gtam po thams cad dang / sbal gdug pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad byams par 'gyur ro// rgyal po
274a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / yul 'khor dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba thams cad shis pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// ma tam ga dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang / klu shing gi me
274a2(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / 'bras yos rnams bsres pas arga'i shing gi yam shing gis me sbar la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na char mi 'bab par byed pa la/ de nas klu chen po rnams kyis char gyi rgyun 'byin par
274a3(rgyud 'bum): byed de/ ji srid char pa 'bab par 'dod pa'i bar du'o// lo tog dang / shing dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman gyi rdzas dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// legs
274a4(rgyud 'bum): papar yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i rgyal po chen po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi dga' ba chen por 'gyur zhing / dus dus su ji lta ba bzhin du char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do// ha cang char ches na

292a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la bdugs na sdang ba dang / bdud dang / bar chad byed pa gzhan gang yin pa de dag thams cad bcings par 'gyur zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po'i

292a6(rgyud 'bum): zin pa 'am ma zin pa la bdugs na mod la 'ong ngo // dur khrod kyi mi ro la bdugs na ro langs lhung bar 'gyur ro// thod pa la bdugs na bab cing gar byed/ glu len rgyug par byed cing spod
292a7(rgyud 'bum): gtong byed do/ / rdo rje la bdugs na 'bar ro// mdung rtse gsum pa la bdugs na 'bab par byed do// 'khor lo la bdugs na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// thag pa la bdugs na sbrul bzhin
292b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khril bar byed do/ / rdza ma dang / bum pa dang / bum bu la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing rang nyid 'gyur bar byed la phan tshun 'gro bar byed do// lhung bzed la bdugs na rang nyid 'gro bar
292b2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / ral gri la bdugs na 'bab par byed cing 'bar bar byed la rang nyid 'gro bar byed do// dung la bdugs nas bus na sgra gang du grag pa de dag thams cad du 'thab pa dang / 'thab

292b7(rgyud 'bum): gi bar du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ / ri mthon po'i rtser bdugs na phyogs bzhi thams cad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad dang /

293a6(rgyud 'bum): pa rdo rje 'chang ston par mdzad la dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad do/ / gnod sbyin mo'i gzugs bris pa la bdugs la gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas na/ gnod sbyin mo 'ongs nas 'dod

293b1(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar 'dug go/ / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can ma la bdugs na 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can ma 'ongs nas chung mar bya'o zhes smra na/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad
293b2(rgyud 'bum): dang longs spyod du bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed la/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtse bas dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / rnam thos kyi bu la 'gran par 'gyur ro// dril bu la bdugs nas sgra dkrol na

298a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas/ sa'i 'og tu gtogs pa 'og na gnas pa thams cad snang bar byas/ bar snang gi gnas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams snang bar byas shing / stong gsum gyi stong
298a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas g.yo ba chen por gyur pa dang / g.yo ba'i mthu des de dag thams cad bskul bar gyur to// bskul ba tsam gyis mong nyid la de dag thams cad lhags te/ ri gru
298b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin na 'khor mang po 'dus par mthun par lhag nas 'khod do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor mang po 'dus par mkhyen nas/ don yod
298b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhags pa'i cha byad du zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad du rigs spyi'i dam tshig gi tshul du zhugs la/ ral pa'i thor tsugs
298b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal ba 'od dpag med thor tsugs su thogs pa/ tshangs pa'i gzugs can/ phyag bco brgyad la rang gi ngo bo zhags pa thogs pa/ thal mo sbyar ba/ sku phyed na phyag g.yon pa brten pa/ mdung rtse gsum
298b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bsnams pa/ ril ba spyi blugs dang bgrang 'phreng bsnams pa/ pad+ma bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i phyag rgya bsnams pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang rgyal mtshan bsnams pa/ me tog gi phur ma dang bi dza pu ra bsnams
298b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par mdzad pa/ thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ spyi bor phyag rgya mdzad pa/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ pad+ma yang pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/
298b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang nor bu'i phyag rgya mdzad pa/ gzugs zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ gdan pad+ma/ sku 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar
298b7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ sgrol ma bdun rjes su 'brang ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcus bskor ba/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan pos bskor ba/ dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po
299a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang chen dang / rgya mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar
299a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khod nas mig mi 'dzums shing bzhin 'dzum pas/ me tog sna tshogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la 'thor te/ 'di lta ste/ me tog shA la dang / ta ma la dang / tsam pa ka dang / o ti muk+ta ka/
299a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sho kA brta dang / kha bye 'khyil ba dang / gan d+ha bArI ka dang / mthon kha dang / mthon kha chen po dang / ka dam pa dang / mdog mdzes pa dang / su ma n+ya ka dang / skya snar dang / cher gsal
299a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / dri dga' dang / rab sim dang / pa la sha dang / za ba dang / mA raN+Da ka dang / gzi brjid bsil dang / dri med dang / gzi yangs ldan dang / shin tu bstan dang /
299a5(rgyud 'bum): lha dga' dang / yid dga' dang / yu thi ka dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pa la dang / ut+pa la dmar po dang / ta ra Na gu h+ya dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rin po
299a6(rgyud 'bum): che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa ni mngon sum du rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa'i rgyal po 'di smras so/ / dus gsum du gshegs
299a7(rgyud 'bum): shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rigs kyi dam tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags kyi
299b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po don yod pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rigs dang phyag rgya thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
299b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / yang dag par rtogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// blo gros chen po dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal
299b3(rgyud 'bum): lo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
299b4(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa sman ras
299b5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / drang srong chen po de dag dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi mchog de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal nas byung ba/
299b6(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum du gsungs pa 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du bdag gis da bzlas kyis/ bdag gi dgos pa thams cad
299b7(rgyud 'bum): grub par gyur cig/ 'jigs pa thams cad du srung bar gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ bi ri bi ri/ pi ri pi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ pa ra ma ma hA kA ru
300a1(rgyud 'bum): Ni ka/ si ri sa rba/ ra cir/ pi ri thaM ra/ bi ri bI rI/ mu hA pad+mA hastA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ kA lu ku lu/ ma hA shud+d+ha satwa/ e he hi/ bud d+ha budad+d+ha/ d+hU bad+hA ba
300a2(rgyud 'bum): ka Na ka Na/ ki NI ki Ni/ ku Nu ku Nu/ pa ra ma shud+d+ha satwa/ ka ra ka ra/ kI ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ma hA s+thA ma prAp+ta/ tsa la tsa la/ sany+tsa la sargya la/ bi tsA la bi tsa la/ e Ta Ta I Ta Ta/ d+ha
300a3(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ e h+ya hi ma hA kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA pa shu pa ti be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ tsa ra tsa rA/ ha ra ha ra/ hA hA hA hA/ hI hI hI hI/ hU hU hU hU/ oM kA ra drah+ma ba Sha
300a4(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ta ra ta rA/ sa ra sa ra/ ba ra ba ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ra sh+tsi sha ta/ sa ha sra pra ti/ maN+Di ta sha rI ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ta pa ta pa/ b+ha ga ban/ so ma A dit+ta/

300b6(rgyud 'bum): ma ku Ta/ mA la d+ha ra/ sarba dz+nyA shi ra si kr-i taM/ dza TA ma ku Ta ma hAd b+hU ta/ ka ma la kr-i ta/ ka ra ta la/ d+hu na sa mA d+hi/ bi mok+Sha/ a pra kam+b+ha/ ba hu satwa/ san+ta ti pa ri pA tsa ka/ ma hA kA r+ra
300b7(rgyud 'bum): Ni ka/ sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ka/ sarba bI d+hi pa ri mo tsa ka/ sarba A Sha pa ri pU ra ka/ sarba satwa sa mA shA sa ka ra na mo stu te swAhA/ oM brah+ma be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/
301a1(rgyud 'bum): sa man+ta/ dz+wA la a mo g+ha hUM/ don yod pa'i snying po/ a/ yi ge gcig pu ni kun nas gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang / pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil
301a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du zhugs pa/ rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i yin te bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po yi ge
301a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig pu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba spyi'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor smras pa tsam gyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
301a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing / lha'i me tog gi char rab tu ba ba la/ kun nas rin po che'i char rab tu bab po// de bzhin gshegs pa ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong
301a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kun nas gshegs nas nam mkha'i dkyil la rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhugs so/ / don yod pa'i rim par phye ba'i sprin lha'i rin po che sna bdun phab la 'bab pas khebs pa dang / lha'i rin po che
301a6(rgyud 'bum): sna bdun gyi me tog rnams dang / lha'i rgyan dang / gos sna tshogs pa'i char bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs don yod pa'i rgyal po'i tshul du zhugs pa la mchod pa dang
301a7(rgyud 'bum): bkur sti bya ba'i phyir rab tu phab po/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par mdzad de/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba
301b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog bstan pa legs so legs so/ / 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / rig sngags kyi gnas rim par phye ba rnam
301b2(rgyud 'bum): par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / yi ge gcig pa'i rjes su zhugs pa ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su nyi ma gcig shar ba yin no// gang 'das pa dang / ma'o/
301b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul phra mo snyed kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba rdzogs par sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig gi
301b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa yin zhing / snying po yi ge gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin la/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / dam tshig gcig gis rjes su zhugs pa yin no//
301b5(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa rna par 'phrul pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bzang po 'di ni don yod pa'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas drangs shing sku gcig gi dam tshig la bkod pa
301b6(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes bya bar byin gyis brlabs so// snying po yi ge gcig pa'i gzungs sngags ni rtag tu bklags pas grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin
301b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs pa yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba
302a1(rgyud 'bum): byin ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa legs so legs so// de kho na nyid bsgrub pa grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs spyi'i dam tshig thams cad grub pa/ don yod pa'i zhags
302a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di ni mchog tu bzang ba yin gyis/ yon tan gyi phung po shod cig/ snying po yi ge gcig pa 'di ni don yod pa'i zhags pa bsgrub pa'i cho ga sgrub pa bde ba/
302a3(rgyud 'bum): bklags pas grub pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sku gzugs ri mo dang bcas pa sgrub pa'i cho ga bla na med pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
302a4(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+ma'i rigs kyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor
302a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig gi snying po gsang ba chen po dang / rigs spyi'i sgrub pa bklags pas 'grub pa 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad par bgyi yis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab du gsol/
302a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang gis dran pa tsam gyis bdag mdun na nye bar mchis shing bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// /
302a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so// de ltar khyod kyis sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya zhing / rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dngos
302b1(rgyud 'bum): grub dam pa mchog de khyod kyis rab tu sbyin par gyis shig/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / yi ge gcig pu rigs spyi'i rjes su zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pas byin
302b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis brlabs kyis/ yo byad dang sgrub pa'i cho ga shod cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba dag thos
302b3(rgyud 'bum): nas snying shin tu dga' ste/ yo byad dang cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid du sdig pa sreg cing ma lu so bzad par bgyid pa/ sems can dmyal ba rtse ba nas 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga smras
302b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas su/ dbus su pad+ma'i 'khor lo bya/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par dbye// pad+ma ze ba'i dbus su ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhugs par bya// bum pa bkang
302b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'phan rnams kyis/ / dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya// me tog sna tshogs legs par dgram// spos dri bzang pos bsgos pa yi// mar me'i 'phreng ba kun tu bud// mchod yon chu dag
302b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / gu gul dang ni sa la la ki/ a ka ru dang du ru kas// bdug spos snod ba'i dag nas bdug/ rig sngags 'chang ba khrus byas nas// gos gtsang bgos te smyung ba la// nye bar
302b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas tshes brgyad dam/ / bcu bzhi'am tshes ni bco lnga ste// zla ba yar gyi ngo la sgrub// shar du kha bltas 'dug nas su// don yod zhags pa dus gsum du// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya/
303a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po'ang brgyas brgyad du bzas// yi ge gcig pu 'bum du ni// mtshan mo bar chad med par bzlas// skya rengs shar nas 'jig rten dbang // ze ba'i dbus na 'bar
303a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / / 'gul 'gyur 'gul ba de yis ni// dmyal ba chen po bcu drug gi/ sgo rnams dag ni bye bar 'gyur// dmyal ba'i gnas nas shugs chen gyis// g.yo la g.yos pa tsam des ni// /
303a3(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba'i tsher kun rnam par 'jig/ dmyal ba de'i yang rnam par 'joms// sems can dmyal ba de dag ni// thar nas phyogs bcur rgyug pa yi// dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal kun las grol//
303a4(rgyud 'bum): mtho ris lam du zhugs par 'gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad dud 'gro rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / sdug bsngal mi
303a5(rgyud 'bum): bzad pa thams cad mthar gtugs par yongs su zad par 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par gyur na/
303a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi mdog can du ston par mdzad la/ mchog thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// don yod pa'i dri mad pa'i ye shes rgya
303a7(rgyud 'bum): mtsho bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur/ sgrib pa dang bral ba sems kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid kyi ngo bo thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa gad+hA'i klung gi byes
303b1(rgyud 'bum): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu po rnams mod nyid la mngon sum du ston par mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa mgo'i spyi bor 'jog par mdzad//
303b2(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten pa kun gyis gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas par 'gyur/ gshin rje
303b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / tshang pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mngon sum du ston cing / nye 'khor la kun nas
303b4(rgyud 'bum): srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur/ dngos grub dang dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te sdig pa thams cad zad par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan
303b5(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dpa 'a phyug gi sku mdog gser gyi kha dog can du mi mthong / des sgrib pa dang sdig pa lhag ma lus par shes par bya ste/ de nyid du bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gnyis pa byas pa dang /
303b6(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rtsa ba dang bcas pa thams cad phyung bar 'gyur ro// gal te bzlas brjod kyi cho ga smyung ba gsum pa byed na dazlas brjod kyi cho ga gsum rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan
303b7(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas rig sngags 'chang bteg ste/ mod la 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar 'jog par mdzad la mngon sum du bzhugs so//
304a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing phyag spyi bor 'jog par mdzad de/ tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// gal te sems can gzhan
304a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba gang zhig sdig pa
304a3(rgyud 'bum): dang sgrib pa zad par 'dod na rigs sngags 'chang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos/ smyung ba byas pa des dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang cho ga byed pas gsang
304a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags rjes su dran par byas nas rma bya'i sgros byab par bya'o/ / de tsam gyis yon tan gyi khyad par thob par 'gyur te/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / gdug
304a5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang / na ba thams cad dang / mtshams med pa thams cad zad par 'gyur te the tshom med do// sgrib pa dang bral ba nyid thob par 'gyur zhing tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ lha thams
304a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis gzung zhing kun nas srung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzigs bzhed par 'gyur/ tshe ring dang / sgrib pa dang /
304a7(rgyud 'bum): nad dang bral bar 'gyur/ tshe 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs su tshe 'bos dran par 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan par
304b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ snying rje dang byams pa chen po yid la bya ba rtse gcig tu bya zhing smyung ba dang bzlas brjod bya'o// sdig pa dang sgrib pa zad par bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//
304b2(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bcu bdun pa// / de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor
304b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du legs par phye ba/ gru bzhi pa/ rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyis shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ dri'i tshon rtsi rnam par bkra ba kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang rdo rje'i ge sar la brten pa'i
304b4(rgyud 'bum): dbus su pad+ma bya'o/ / rdo rje'i thig skud kyis kun nas bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug tshangs pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa dgod par bya'o// nyi ma re re zhing me tog
304b5(rgyud 'bum): dang bdug pa dbul bar bya zhing / nyi ma re re zhing a ka ru'i bdug pa dang khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ don yod rgyal po'i bzlas brjod dang phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// yi ge gcig pa'i snying po'i
304b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod thun gsum du lan gsum mam/ lan bdun nam/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas so// zas ngan pa bcu yongs su spang bar bya zhing / sems can ngan pa'ang spang bar bya'o// sgrub thabs
304b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi de kho na nyid las thams cad du 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub po/ / 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa brgyad po de rnams las grol lo// don yod pa'i rgyal po dran pas nad thams cad rnam par
305a1(rgyud 'bum): nyams par byed do/ / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / byad snyems dang / gdon thams cad dang / 'jigs pa dang / sdang ba dang / skrag pa dang / rims dang / nad thams cad dang
305a2(rgyud 'bum): phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan mar rdol ba dang / g.yan pa dang / rkang shra dang / mdze dang / mgo bo na pa dang / mig na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / snan pa dang / kha na pa dang / rkan na ba dang /
305a3(rgyud 'bum): mgul na ba dang / snying na ba dang / lto na pa dang / so dang mchun pa dang / lag pa na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / chu so na pa dang / pho ba'i nad dang / ma zhu ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / rgyaban pa dang /
305a4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag dang nying lag thams cad na ba dang / tshad pa dang / gzhang nad dang / gcin nad dang / gsung pa dang / 'khogs pa la lan cig brjod de byabs pa tsam gyis thams cad sel bar byed de/ myur
305a5(rgyud 'bum): du rab tu zhi bar byed cing skad cig de nyid la'ang yang dag par gnas par byed do/ / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba gzhan thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig
305a6(rgyud 'bum): brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyi ma re re zhing skyed par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi tha
305a7(rgyud 'bum): mar yang 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// don che zhing che ba dag 'ong bar 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang khon po lhun gyis grub pa nyid du rnyed do// rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang
305b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yog tu bcas pas gcig tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma re re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba
305b2(rgyud 'bum): so sor thob bo/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par brgyan pa mthong ngo // tshes brgyad dang bco lnga la po Ta la ka'i ri bo'i gzhal med khang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas na/
305b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs te/ 'khor chen po la chos ston par mdzad bzhin pa dang / 'od dpag med bde ba can gyi gnas na bzhugs pa mthong ste/ ji srid byang chub snying
305b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i bar du mthong ngo / / 'chi 'phos pa na bsams pa nyid kyi mod la bde ba can gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang
305b5(rgyud 'bum): bral zhing rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pa don yod pa'i 'od zar zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob po/ / ting nge 'dzin gang zhig thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya
305b6(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag skad las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon par phyag byas nas/ se gol gtogs pa tsam nyid la slar yang 'ong ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// ting nge
305b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gzhan khrag khrig brgya stong phrag so sor thob cing / bzlas pa'i cho ga gcig pus las thams cad sgrub par 'gyur ro zhes so// bzlas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga'o//
306a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas khrus kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ khrus byed pa la mkhas pa gang gis dri ma thams cad sel bar byed cing mdzes pa/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed
306a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i de kho na nyid bsod nams dang gzi brjid rab tu 'phel bar byed pa/ nad thams cad sel bar grub pa/ sdig pa dang sdig to nyams par byed pa/ de bzhin du zad
306a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang nyams pa bcom pa/ dug dang byad stems nyams pa/ nad yun ring po yongs su spangs pa/ de bzhin du gcong yun ring po dang rims yongs su spangs pa ste/ 'di dag khrus kyis 'grub ste/
306a4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags dang yin pa des 'grub par don yod pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yongs su bsgrags so// bgegs kyis reg pa gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon mi bzad pas reg pa gang
306a5(rgyud 'bum): yin pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa la'ang dgra rnams kyis pham pa dang / skye bo sdang ba dang / gang gi 'khrug pa'i g.yul du song ba dang /
306a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu skar gyis bcom pa gang yin pa dang / blo'i skye ba zad pa dang / ma ni nga dang / nyams pa'i ma ning dang / dbang po nyams pa'i bar gang yin pa rnams dang / bu mi 'tsho ba gang yin pa rnams kyi bu mthun
306a7(rgyud 'bum): par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / gsad cing gzhom pa thob pa gang yin pa dang / 'ching ba dang gsod par song ba gang yin pa dang / chom rkun nam/ rkun mo'i nang ngam/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'i nang du song
306b1(rgyud 'bum): ba gang yin pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / mche ba gdug pa dang / dug gi khrod du song bas dug 'jigs pa mi bzad pa zos pa gang yin pa dang / khyim rdib pa dang /
306b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yang sa dang / byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa rnams dang / mi mngon par sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / mtshams med pa byed pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang /
306b3(rgyud 'bum): dam pa'i chos spong ba 'di rnams dkyil 'khor du khrus byas pas thams cad yang dag par zad par 'gro zhing / myur du thams cad rnam par nyams par byed de/ rtswa rnams mes sreg pa bzhin du sngon
306b4(rgyud 'bum): bsags pa'i mi bzad pa'i las 'di dag thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ / 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla ma dang rtag tu mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// tshe yun ring por gnas te/ rtag tu bde
306b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang dga' bar byed do/ / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nad med cing rims med pa nyid du gnas so// bde blag tu bya ba byed cing / de'i skye ba bdun dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag tu srung bar byed
306b6(rgyud 'bum): cing / mthar thug rtag tu dpal 'bar bar byed do// sangs rgyas rnams rtag tu mthong ba dang / rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug gis mchog sbyin par byed pa dang / rtag tu mthong bar 'dod pa'ang thun mtshams
306b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu mngon sum du mthong bas gnas par byed do/ / rtag tu rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang / rig sngags kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ rtag tu dkyil 'khor gyi mchog gang yin pa'ang sgrub
307a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ mtshon sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi mchog bri bar bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshog
307a2(rgyud 'bum): pas bkra ba/ sgo bzhi kun nas rnam par phye ba dang / las rnams legs par zin nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'khor lo yang dag par bri'o// pad+ma'i lte ba dang snying po nyid kyang 'bar bar bya'o//
307a3(rgyud 'bum): zur dang zur rnams su zhags pa 'bar ba pad+ma la gnas par bya'o// rig sngags 'dod pas khrus dang gtor ma dkar po'ang 'dir dgod par bya'o// a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul zhing / dkyil 'khor gyi
307a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o/ / las gzhan sgrub pa ni ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor mas mchod par bya zhing / sna tshogs pa'i bdug spos dbul lo// bum pa chus bkang
307a5(rgyud 'bum): nas rdzas kyi phye ma rnams der gzhug cing / rin chen sna bdun bcug ste/ de la rgya dar gyis bcings la/ don yod zhags pa lan brgya dang / snying po nyid kyang lan brgyar bzlas so// yi ge gcig pa
307a6(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so/ / tsan dan dang / sa mI dang / si ri Sha dang / ha ba shang tsi'u dang / gur kum dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma ga sar rnams legs par btags nas bum pa bkang
307a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ste/ 'di rnams kyis khrus bya'o// nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / bil ba ste/ 'di rnams kyis nyed pa dang / rtag tu sngon du byab par byas la/ de nas mkhas pas khrus bya'o// de nas srung
307b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dom dang / gcig dang / dred dang / khyi dang / bag dang / lce sbyang rnams las nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i mod la tham cad du sgrol bar byed do// dug dang / sbrul thams cad dam/
307b2(rgyud 'bum): mche ba gdug pa dang / sbrul go na sa dang / bta sa nA b+ha dang / dug nyid dang / dug shring ga dang / dug musta ka nyid dang / dar da'i dug dang / lus la byas pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dug dang / dug ha
307b3(rgyud 'bum): la ha la dang / sdig pa la sogs pa gang yin pa dang / mthong ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug 'jigs pa dang / 'jog pos kyang zin pa dang /
307b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang srog chags mi bzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dug mi bzad pa rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu reg pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad 'phral du dug med par 'gyur ro//
307b5(rgyud 'bum): gal te gang gar 'bab pa'i dug 'thungs kyang 'phral du 'joms par byed do// nam mkha' lding gis sbrul nyid dang klu bzhin no// mes mi 'tshig go// slar yang rgyas 'byor bar mi 'gyur ro/
307b6(rgyud 'bum): bye ba la gdug pa'i 'jigs pa myi 'drude la rgyal po khro bar mi byed do// nam yang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / 'thab mo dang / 'khrul 'khor byed pa dang / snang ba gang yin
307b7(rgyud 'bum): pa re rnams med de/ cho ga 'di ni mchog go// dug dang / byang sems dang / bye ma'i sbyor ba la sogs pa thams cad skad cig de la nyams par byed do// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'brung
308a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par byed pa/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed pa ste/ mdor na thams cad du dngos grub so sor rnyed cing / dpal chen
308a2(rgyud 'bum): por lhag par 'gro'o/ / rig sngags don du gnyer ba thob ste/ rig sngags don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid las bu 'dod pas ni bu thob bo// nor 'dod pas ni nor thob po// dbang
308a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'dod pas ni dbang phyag thob po/ / myur du dpal 'dod pas ni dpal thob po// mngon par 'dod pa thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes so// khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// /
308a4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas nor bu'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i sgrub pa rmad du byung ba don yod pa'i nor bu'i dngos grub dang bya ba thams
308a5(rgyud 'bum): cad sgrub par byed pa/ thams cad du lhung ba'i sdug bsngal las byung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob par byed pa/ gsod thob pa mngon par thar par byed pa/ mtshon cha dang / khong bsgril
308a6(rgyud 'bum): gcog par byed par the tsom med do/ / sdig pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed pa/ mtshams med pa zad par byed pa/ rtag tu gsod pa med pa'i gnas thams cad du son par byed pa/
308a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'khrugs pa dang g.yul ngo las rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi nang nas grol bar 'gyur zhing / rkun mo las kyang sgrol bar byed do// gcan gzan gtum po seng ge dang / glang po che
308b1(rgyud 'bum): bu'i cho ga ni don yod rgyal pos bya'o/ / de nas rtswa dur ba bting nas/ de sa skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bum pa'i nus khrus bya zhing / pang+gA'i phyag rgya'ang byed du gzhag s+ho/ de nas gsung mas
308b2(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgos te/ gtsug tor bcing bar bya zhing / sngon du bzlas pa 'bul ba dang bskor ba byas nas sgo dang ske nas phyag bya'o// shAr gyi sgor zhugs la dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying
308b3(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung gis 'dug la/ don yod pa'i rgyal pos lan bdun du grub par bya'o// lag tu rdo rje dang bgrang 'breng gis mngon par dbang bskur zhing / chu dang / yungs kar dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur
308b4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de nas dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o// 'di ni khrus kyi gtso bor 'jig rten dbang phyug gis gsungs so// sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don gyi ched dang / rig sngags
308b5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang rnams la khyad par du sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang / lha thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / don yod pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gdon mi za bar byed do// gang dang gang du las
308b6(rgyud 'bum): la nges par sbyar ba thams cad du don yod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad du 'di yi tshom med do// sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa ma grub pa'ang grub par 'gyur te/ don yod
308b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub thob cing 'phral nyid du 'bras bu mthong ba yin no/ / lus yongs su dag cing shin tu dri ma med pa dang / legs par khrus byas par de brjod par bya'o// sdig pa thams cad nyam
309a1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / yi dgas dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren rnams dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam dang / nor bu gzung ba nyid
309a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis thams cad 'bros par byed de 'di la the tsom med do/ / 'di thams cad kyis thun mong du nor bu'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba la bsam pa gang yin pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yid la don du gnyer
309a3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba gang yin pa rnams kyang / nor bu gzung ba nyid la thams cad myur du phun sum tshogs par byed do// tshe 'phel ba dang sngags kyi dngos grub bla na med pa grub po// bkra shis pa dang / dam
309a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa nyams pa dang / 'phral du rmi lam bzang por byed pa nyid dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
309a5(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang / rtag tu lha rnams 'gugs pa nyid dang / rtag tu 'byor pa thams cad byed pa dang / rtag tu zla ba nye ba ltar 'od zer 'bar bas rnam par mdzes pa dang / tshig btsun pa dang / rtag tu
309a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba dang / thams cad du mchod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rdzas kyi sbyor ba bya ste/ cha mnyam par legs par phye la gtso bo'i rjes su 'brang bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ rgyal ba
309a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / nA ku li dang / dri'i nA ku li dang / a ru ra dang / lag pa dang / dbang po lag pa dang / dri'i pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang / 'khor lo dang / 'khor lo chen
309b1(rgyud 'bum): po dang / khyab 'jug gnon pa dang / so ma rA dza dang / su nan da dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / ma la ya'i tsan dan dang / na la da dang / gur kum dang / ba p+la dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / klu shing gi ma
309b2(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / pa DA dang / brag skyes dang / spang spos dang / sA ma ka rnams mnyam par byas te phye ma zhib mor legs par btags la/ pu shel tsi dang tsan dan gyi chus sbrus
309b3(rgyud 'bum): te zangs kyi snod du gzhag la/ khrus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bkod de/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad nyid dang / yi ge gcig pa 'bum du bzlas pas
309b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyi snod 'bar bar byed do/ / de nas nor bu mgo bo la bcings pa 'am/ lag pa la bcings la gzung bar bya ste/ mchog tu skal ba bzang po thob cing / dbang phyug gi mchog dang dpon po thob bo//
309b5(rgyud 'bum): rje'u rigs bu med pas kyang mi dang nor 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang dgra rab tu 'joms shing / srung ba'i mchog tu rnyed par bka' bas te/ nor bu gang du gnas pa der glog gi gnod pa med
309b6(rgyud 'bum): do/ der byi ba kha gdug pa'i 'jigs pa dang g.yo ba mi 'byung ngo // nor bu'i rgyal po gang du gnas pa'i gnas 'di mchod rten du bskur ro// sum cu rtsa gsum na gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis rtag
309b7(rgyud 'bum): tu srung bar byed cing / rtag tu'ang rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rtag tu'ang srung zhing / dus rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur te the tsom med do// dkyil 'khor bshad par
310a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ rgyar gzings kyi tshad kyi logs bzhi pa/ zur bzhi pa/ shin tu bcags pa/ legs par sbyar ba/ mchog tu mdzes pa bya'o// khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs kyi
310a2(rgyud 'bum): mgo lcogs kyis bkra ba bris la/ shar gyi sgo rnam par phye ste/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi pad+ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'i dbus kyi pad+ma'i ge sar la yang / 'jig rten
310a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dgod par bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du rdzas kyi snod gzhag par bya zhing / me tog gcal du bkram par byas la/ dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya ste/
310a4(rgyud 'bum): dri dang yon chab dbul bar bya zhing / tsan dan gyi bdug pa sreg go// nyin mtshan du gos gtsang ma bgo zhing bcang bar bya/ shin tu dri ma med pa'i sems su 'gyur bar bya/ byams pa dang snying rje mchog
310a5(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur bar bya zhing / de nas nor bu'i rdzas sgrub bo zhes so// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas ldong ros kyi mig sman gyi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rgyar
310a6(rgyud 'bum): gzings kyi cha'i mthar thug pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ dri sna tshogs dang rnam par bkra ba'i rig sngags 'chang ni grwa rnams su mkhas pas bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying
310a7(rgyud 'bum): por pad+ma 'dab ma phyed kha bye ba'o/ / lag pa gnyis kyi dbus su pad+ma ga sar rgyas pa 'chang ba'o// shar gyi sgo rnam par bya ba bya ste/ ldong ros dngul gyi snod du gzhag nas dkyil 'khor du pad+ma'i
310b1(rgyud 'bum): steng du dgod par bya'o/ / snod kyi khor yug tu dar dmar po'i gos bzang pos g.yog par bya'o// yang na pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'am/ yang na byang chub shing gi 'dab ma 'am/ yang na shing 'dzam bu'i 'dab
310b2(rgyud 'bum): mas g.yog par bya'o/ / a ka ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod zhags pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i drung du dgod par bya'o// me tog
310b3(rgyud 'bum): dang dris mchod par bya/ rig sngags 'chang gis dkar gsum zos la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi bsnyen gnas su 'gyur bar bya'o// yang na nyin mtshan du smyung bar gnas par bya/ zla ba yar
310b4(rgyud 'bum): ngo 'am/ tshes bco lnga'i nya 'am/ tshes bcu bzhi 'am/ tshes brgyad la gtsang mar khrus byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing / snying po brgya
310b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad kyang bzlas par bya/ yi ge gcig pa stong phrag bcur bzlas la/ dkyil 'khor nye ba'i spras shing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / gtor ma dbul bar bya'o//
310b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi steng du 'phang bar bya'o// 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lus las
310b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin par byed do/ / ldong ros kyi snod de'ang 'bar bar byed de/ 'bar ba tsam gyis mod la mig la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro'o// don yod pa'i ye shes yangs pa yid
311a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob po/ / don yod pa'i 'khor lo kun nas rnam par gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags
311a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro//
311a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du gnas kyi mnga' bdag rgyal por 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro zhing / tshe bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi
311a4(rgyud 'bum): cod pan 'chang bar 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i rdzu 'phrul so sor thob ste/ rdzu 'phrul gang gis se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA ra
311a5(rgyud 'bum): klung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dngos grub yangs pa'i mchod pa byed par 'gyur zhing / skad
311a6(rgyud 'bum): cig gis slar yang 'ong bar byed do/ / rang gi lus la 'od zer brgya stong phrag du ma 'bar bar byed do// gang 'dod pa de thams cad byed do// de nas du ba 'thul bzhin pa ni bskus na mi snang
311a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te/ mi snang ba'i reg pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po
311b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye nas gnas te/ gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par byed do// gnas thams cad
311b2(rgyud 'bum): na gnas pa rnams 'bangs su gyur nas gnas te ci bsgo ba byed do/ / sems can thams cad kyang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pas mchod
311b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bla mar bya ba'i gnas gcig pur 'gyur ro// bka' bsgo ba'ang bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang byed cing gnas so// dbu ba 'byung bzhin pa bskus na cho ga zhib mo dang / phyag rgya dang /
311b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig mngon du gyur nas gnas te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
311b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rnams sngon du gyur nas gnas so/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad yang dag par rjes su 'brang
311b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i ched du rtag pa kho nar rjes su 'gro'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur ro//
311b7(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i 'od zer dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob ste/ sa'i steng nas sor bzhi'i tshad du 'phags pa'i nam mkha' la gnas so// ldong ros la bzlas nas mig la
312a1(rgyud 'bum): bskus na mig gis gang mthong ba de dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don dang / dpung
312a2(rgyud 'bum): gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs rnams
312a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur nas gnas so/ / tha na ri dgas dang bya'ang lta bar byed bzhin du dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so// 'dis byugs pa'i mig gis nad dang / gnod pa dang / sdig pa dang //
312a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// lus kyi gdung ba dang / sems kyi gdung ba thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis par gyur pa
312a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ / skye ba brjes nas kyang spyan lnga yongs su dag pa so sor thob bo// tshe rabs dran par yang skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang sgrib pa dang
312a6(rgyud 'bum): bral zhing / don yod pa legs par rab tu gnas par kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i lus dag pa so sor thob po// kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs
312a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig so sor thob po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba so sor thob po//
312b1(rgyud 'bum): sprin 'khrigs pas kun nas g.yogs par 'dod pa dang / dri sna tshogs pa'i char 'bebs par byed par 'dod pa des/ bdug pa'i rgyal pos bdug pa de rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu rgyun mi
312b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chad par mngon par brtson par bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor
312b3(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ me tog gcal du bkram par bya'o// mchod yon dang zhabs bsil yang gzhag par bya/ bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bdug par bya zhing / don yod pa'i rgyal po dus gcig tu
312b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcur bdug pa'i pog por dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang / sems can 'byung po thams cad la byams
312b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bsgom par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa thams cad dri ma med pa'i sems kyi yid la bsgom par bya/ dkyil 'khor la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang /
312b6(rgyud 'bum): zhabs bsil phul te yi ge gcig pa yid la brjod cing / phyag rgya'ang lan cig bcings la phyag bya'o zhes so// phul ba tsam gyis mod la phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag
312b7(rgyud 'bum): khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bye ba la dris khyab par byed cing / bdug pa chen po 'khrigs pas nam mkha'i mthil du khyab par 'gyur ro// dri sna tshogs kyi char 'bab
313a1(rgyud 'bum): khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze nyid dang / de bzhin du dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / rgyal po dang /
313a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal phran dang / de bzhin du rgyal mo dang / btsun mo'i 'khor yang rung ste/ legs par khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos nas bdug spos 'dis bdugs na/ gang gis bdugs pa'i dri
313a3(rgyud 'bum): mnams pa dang / de lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol lo// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom med do// /
313a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnams 'phral du thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes so// bdug pa 'di gdugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
313a5(rgyud 'bum): dris kun tu 'gengs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas nas ji srid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar dris kun tu 'gengs so// stobs dang shugs chen pos lha'i gnas thams cad
313a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gul bar byed cing spyod par byed do/ / chu rgyun gyi klu rnams 'gul bar byed cing / ri rab las gzhan pa'i ri gang yin pa 'dar med yod byed do// gsang bar gnas pa rnams rnam par skrag
313a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / dmyal ba bcu drug gi 'jigs pa rnams rnam par zhig par byed do// de bzhin du sa'i mthil thams cad kyang dkar bsil du snang bar 'gyur ro// dmyal ba pa'i sems can
313b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams shin tu sbyangs pa dang / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa de rnams thams cad yongs su grol te/ bde ba can du'ang 'gro'o// mtho ris thams cad du ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// dmyal ba thams
313b2(rgyud 'bum): cad nyams te pad+ma can du rab tu 'gyur ro/ / nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhan rnams dang / sa 'og gi nang du song ba gang yin pa dang / dgon pa dang / ri dang / tshang tshing dang
313b3(rgyud 'bum): dgon dung dang / g.yang sar gnas pa'i dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba gang yin pa rnams thams cad bdug pa'i dris yongs su grol lo// mi gtsang ba za ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /
313b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po dang / sha za gang yin pa rnams dang / bshang ba dang gci ba za ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mchil ma dang snabs za ba gang yin pa rnams dang / 'dres pa za ba gang yin pa de rnams
313b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bdug pa'i dri mnams pa tsam gyis yongs su grol nas 'phral nyid du lha'i 'jig rten du skye'o/ / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ro bro ba'i mchog dang / dri zhim po'i kha zas rnyed par
313b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags ri dgas dang / bya rnams thams cad dril mnams pa tsam gyis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// bdug pa mnams
313b7(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam 'dis nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo/ / rims thams cad las yongs su grol lo// na ba thams cad las yongs su grol lo// 'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhon
314a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / g.yan pa dang / mig na ba dang / mgo bo na pa dang / gzhogs byed na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / snun pa dang / son pa dang /
314a2(rgyud 'bum): kha na ba dang / lba ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad bdug pa'i dri bsnams pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar byed do// 'phags spyan
314a3(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug de dang / don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'i mthus sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing / rnam par grol te mi
314a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdzas rnams kyi rang gi cha shas rnam par phye ba dang ldan pa bshad par bya ste/ tsan dan srang gsum dang / a ka ru srang gsum dang /
314a5(rgyud 'bum): tu ru ka srang lnga dang / gur kum srang bcu dang / smi ka srang gnyis dang / na lan da srang gnyis dang / me he'i mig srang nyi shu dang / sra rtsi pog srang bcu dang / bo la srang gsum dang / sa wa
314a6(rgyud 'bum): kI srang brgyad dang / rgya spos srang gnyis dang / spang spos srang gcig dang / shA ma ka sra ba gcig dang / gan+d+ha pa tra srang gcig dang / pad+ma ge sar srang gcig dang / shri rI ma'i me tog srang
314a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig dang / li kha ra dkar po srang bcu dang / dri'i pri yang ku srang gcig dang / pu shel ci srang lnga dang / stag sen srang gcig dang / sug smel srang gsum dang / gA la ka srang lnga dang /
314b1(rgyud 'bum): gur kum dang gla rtsi tshor ba ste/ thams cad legs par rnam par dbye bar byas nas/ phye mar byas la mthar thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te sbrang rtsis slu bar bya'o// tshes bco lnga la rgyu skar dang
314b2(rgyud 'bum): tshes grangs kyi lha dge ba la/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ legs par khrus byas par gyur pas brtul zhugs spyad pas bdug pa'i mchog sbyar bar bya'o//
314b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bdug pa'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa tshad shin tu rnam par phye ba bya ste/ gzings kyi tshad kyi shin tu bcags pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa la tshon rnam pa sna tshogs pas
314b4(rgyud 'bum): sgo bzhi shin tu rnam par phye ba/ mdzes par bri bar bya'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por pad+ma'i 'phreng ba bri'o// dbus kyi pad+ma phyed kha bye ba'i 'phreng ba bri ste/ lag pa gnyis
314b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thon nas sna tshogs pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa 'dzin par byed pa'o/ / de'i steng du bdug pa'i snod bkod nas/ me'i kha dog can gyi gos kyis g.yogs la/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhi rnams
314b6(rgyud 'bum): su rlung gi rgyal po bri'o/ / sgo bzhir zhags pa bris nas khor yug tu lag pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i 'phreng ba las nges par 'thon pa'o// bdug spos 'khyil pa 'chang bar byed pa dkyil
314b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi steng du spras par bya'o/ / ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma dang me tog dbul bar bya/ mchod yon gyi snod dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / ba dan dang / rgyan dang / skud pa dmar pos
315a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor la dngul dang gser gzhag cing / khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang dri sna tshogs rgya chen po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
315a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug bkod nas kha shar du phyogs nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba la nye bar dgod par bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bdug pa'i rgyal po la yongs su bzlas par bya ste/ nyi ma bdun la thun
315a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum du don yod pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shing snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ / don yod pa'i snying po yi ge gcig pa'i bzlas brjod 'bum rdzogs pa ste/ stong phrag brgya rdzogs pa
315a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bzlas brjod kyi cho ga'o/ / // de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / slar yang don yod pa'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig dang /
315a5(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i rgyal po'i bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya'o// de nas thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bdug pa dbul bar bya/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug
315a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dbul lo/ / 'di ni bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga grub par 'gyur ro// bdug pa'i rgyal po 'dis bya ba de sgrub par 'gyur ro// gal te rig sngags 'chang gis yungs kar gyi 'bras bu gcig
315a7(rgyud 'bum): gi tshad tsam gyi bdug pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'dod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dri gcig gis rgyas par 'dod pa dang / bdug pa'i
315b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rtag tu'ang 'grogs shing gnas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes so// mig sman gyi dkyil
315b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / / de nas bdug pa rim par phye ba'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
315b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa'i don dang / de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten gsum po thams cad 'gugs pa grub pa dang / lha thams cad spyan drang ba dang / dbang po dang / tshangs

315b6(rgyud 'bum): dang nying lag rnam par 'thor bar byed do/ / rang gi dmag dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / shin tu 'gras pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / de bzhin du dgra bo nyid dang / skye bo sdang ba dang /
315b7(rgyud 'bum): gang du 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul nyid kyang bdug pa'i dris thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur bar the tshom med do// gal te skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/
316a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i las sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i sangs rgyas bcom
316a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la mchod par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la dus dus su don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par
316a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa srung ba'i don dang / phyag rgya 'ching bar byed pa de srung ba'i don du legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa rgyas par byed pa de bzhin
316a4(rgyud 'bum): du bya'o/ / don yod pa chen po'i dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po nye bar sogs par byed do// de bzhin gshegs
316a5(rgyud 'bum): pa re re zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar sogs par byed do// ji ltar rig sngags 'chang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i cho ga byed
316a6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa de bzhin du/ rnam pa du ma de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing gi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang nyi ma bdun du rab tu brtson pas/ de bzhin gshegs
316a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang bla ma mchod do/ / phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba stsol bar byed do// de rnams thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed la/ mchog
316b1(rgyud 'bum): rab tu stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i dngos grub rjes su sgrol bar 'gyur ro// phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// sa bcu yang dag par gnon te mngon par shes
316b2(rgyud 'bum): pa lngar 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga'o// // de bzhin nyid du 'jig rten las 'das pa la 'chi 'pho ba na de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar zhas

316b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pas rig sngags 'chang la lung ston par 'gyur ro/ / phyis kyang skye ba gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// lus 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsnyen bkur nas//
316b5(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu
316b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'di'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i khyad par so sor thob bo// 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i khyad par ro// de nas 'jig rten
316b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdug pa sgrub pa'i cho ga brgya stong phrag du ma 'grub par byed do/ / ji lta ji ltar bdug pa nyid yid la byed pa de lta de ltar thams cad yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// klu'i gnas sa
317a1(rgyud 'bum): bdugs na bdugs pa tsam gyis mod la klu'i rgyal pos char rgyun chen po 'byin par byed do/ / rgyal po'i sgor bdug na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa
317a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang du gyur nas gnas so/ / skye bo mang po'i dbus su bdugs na rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten dbang du gyur nas gnas so// bdag nyid la bdugs na thams cad du mchod pa'i 'os chen
317a3(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / nad thams cad la bdugs na nad thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// dug la bdugs na dug med par 'gyur ro// mtshams kyi nang du bdugs na me tog dang
317a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu thams cad ro zhim pa dang / legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// lo tog la bdugs na 'bru'i phung po chen por 'gyur ro// khyim mam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam
317a5(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer la bdugs na dug dang / sbyar dug dang / dug dang bcas pa'i srog chags thams cad nam yang mi 'byung ngo // g.yul gyi dbus su bdugs na cher rgyal bar 'gyur ro//
317a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid dam/ gzhan rnams sam/ don mthun pa rnams la bdugs nas lam du 'gro ba na tshem rkun dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa
317a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / bde ba dang legs pas rang gi khyim du 'ong ngo // dpag tshad stong du 'gro'ang ngal ba med cing / slar yang 'ong bar byed do// dung la bdug
317b1(rgyud 'bum): nas mthon por bus na ji srid dung gi sgra thos pa de srid du gnod pa thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / mtshon cha dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab
317b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// yams thams cad dang //
317b3(rgyud 'bum): nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba thams cad dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'os par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i
317b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba thams cad 'dod par 'gyur ro/ / nad med pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang / rims med pa dang / thang chad pa med par ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas so// khang pa'i steng mthon por
317b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir bdugs na rlung dang / sad dang / sprin gyi ser ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur te/ ji srid yid la byed pa nar mar yod pa de srid du mtshams bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro//
317b6(rgyud 'bum): khyim gyi nang du bdugs na bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran po dang / bran mo thams cad dang / ji srid du rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa thams cad byams pa'i
