324a7(rgyud 'bum): ma thams cad mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas 'khod do/ / rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa'i mchod gnas chen por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang dang gang du sbyar ba rang gi rlom
324b1(rgyud 'bum): bye ba phrag 'bum sbyar nas las sgrub par byed de/ sman gyi mchog shin tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya'o// sman gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas de'i phyir gser gyi ri lu'i
324b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i snying po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i rnam par gzigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma
324b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor gyi rgyal po zhes bya bra byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snying pos byin gyis brlabs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
324b4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'jig rten dbang phyug 'od kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing bsngags
324b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba/ rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad pa/ lung bstan pa/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gtsug gi nor bu'i cod pan
324b6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba/ rgyal ba 'od dpag med kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid kyi thig le yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal mtshan gyi nor gyi chen po'i rgyal po mchog tu grub ga/ rig sngag dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang /
324b7(rgyud 'bum): cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi gsang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi/ sku'i snying po gang gis mthong ba tsam la sogs pa 'dir tshad bstan par lta su zhig gis
325a1(rgyud 'bum): nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba dang / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs par mngon sum du mthong ba dang 'drags
325a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gsheg pa de dag nyid mngon sum du mchod par gzung ba dang / lung ston pa thob par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mngon sum du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi
325a3(rgyud 'bum): phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / nor bu gser gyi kha dog tu bstan pa'i ril bu 'di gang gis mthong zhing 'chang ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod nams kyi phung po chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ril
325a4(rgyud 'bum): bu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'deb
325a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / sngon gyi tshe rabs nas bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs cing spangs par 'gyur/ rims dang nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ gang gi lag na sman
325a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di yod par gyur pa'i sems can de ni lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / ril bu gang la yod pa ni/ phyir mi ldog par lung bstan cing // mgon pos bcu dag la gnas// rtag tu mchod rten gyur
325a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ sku gdung snying po'i bdag nyid can// rtag tu sangs rgyas bdag nyid 'gyur// dus gsum dag la bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa gang // sangs rgyas dpa po de kun
325b1(rgyud 'bum): gyisras gcig tu ni brjod pa yin/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras// thugs las skyes dang zhal las skyes// chos kyi dbyings sprul chos las skyes// 'jig rten dbang phyug mchog
325b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin mgon/ / rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur// phyag g.yas rtag tu spyi bor ni// 'jog mdzad 'di ni the tshom med// ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis ni// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu 'grol//
325b3(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa thams cad lhag par 'tshed// sgrib pa thamacad rnam par bdag/ de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur// phyir zhing gnas mchog zhi ba 'thob// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'od dpag med// mgon
325b4(rgyud 'bum): po rtag tu mngon sum mthong / / bde ba can du 'jug par byed// gang na de yi mngon dga' ba// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa// rtag tu mi 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing // de bzhin mi g.yo mi
325b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gul te/ / sems dpa' ri rab che dang mnyam// gzung du med pas mtsho dang 'dra// de la bgegs dang log 'dren dag/ nams kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur la// sems dpa' phyag bya'i gnas su 'gyur//
325b6(rgyud 'bum): gang la nor rgyal 'di yod la// rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ dpung dang bcas pa bkol dang bcas// rtag tu srung phyir gnas byed de// 'dir ni nyin mtshan de bzhin no// lha tshogs thams cad srung bar
325b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ the tsom med par byed par 'gyur// gzi brjid dpal yang rab tu 'phel// de la legs par 'jug par 'gyur// 'jigs med rtag tu rmi lam ni// dngos po chen po sna tshogs mthong //
326a1(rgyud 'bum): gru 'dzin ril gzhal med khang // tshul dang bcas shing rin chen bcas// gnas dang bcas pa mthong bar 'gyur// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha min gsang ba
326a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci// de bzhin lto 'phye 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ni// kun nas bskor ba mthong bar 'gyur// rin chen lha yi seng ge'i gdan//
326a3(rgyud 'bum): khang pa brtsegs pa rin chen dang // nor bu chen pos brgyan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug thub pa'i gtso// pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs nas// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor bcas pa'i
326a4(rgyud 'bum): chos bstan to/ / gsung kun thob par gyur nas ni// thub pa rang gi ngo bo mthong // de ltar rmi lam bzang rmi ba// nyin gcig bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur// nor bu rgyal po'i mthu ni de 'dra bas// de bas
326a5(rgyud 'bum): mi yis 'bad pa chen pos gzung / / dge sbyong bram ze nyid dang rgyal rigs dang // dmangs rigs nyid dam yang na rgyal po 'am// btsun mo smras sam dpung gi gtso bo 'am// skyes pa 'am bud med khye'u dang bu
326a6(rgyud 'bum): mo dag/ nor bu'i rgyal po rtag tu 'chang byed pa// de ni ston pa nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// chom rkun gyis ni mi slu zhing // gnod byed kyis ni 'jigs mi 'gyur// 'jigs pa mi bzad brgyud las mthar//
326a7(rgyud 'bum): de la dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ sbyar dug drags pos mi tshugs shing // de la byad kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// gang la nor bu'i rgyal po yod// de la nad kyis mi tshugs shing // na bas ma yin sdig pas min//
326b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma chu yis mi chags ltar// rtag tu chags pa med par gnas// g.yul 'gyed pa yi nang na 'am// 'thab bam 'gyed dam rtsod pa na// lan thebs rtag tu rgyal bar ni// thob par 'gyur te the tsom med// de nas
326b2(rgyud 'bum): rdzas ni bshad bya ste/ / sman ni bkra shis dang ldan pa// grub pa'i mtha' ste mchog tu gtsang // 'jig rten mgon dang mnyam par gsungs// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang / shi ri'i
326b3(rgyud 'bum): sha'i me tog dang / a pa marga dang / me ru dang / na la da dang / chu srin gyi sen mo dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu dang / tsan dan gyi 'bras bu dang / pad+ma'i 'bras bu dang / rdo dreg dang / me dang / btsod dang / sU ka
326b4(rgyud 'bum): ri dang / ma ka TI dang / dza ya dang / bi dza ya dang / pa ri pa la ba dang / ra sa dang / bI rA dang / d+h+ya ma ka dang / rgya spos dang / bu sA dang / a brta ka dang / ru rta dang / bya gra na kha dang / pata tra dang / tra tsa dang /
326b5(rgyud 'bum): ka dam b+ha rA dang / pri yang ku dang / gi'u wang dang / spri ka dang / smyig rkang dang / yungs kar dang / na ga puSh+pa dang / e la dang / ldong ros dang / gur kum dang / ga pur dang / gla rtsi dang / spang spos dang
326b6(rgyud 'bum): na le sham dkar po dang / su ma dang / nye'u shing dang / shu ti dang / sbrang rtsi dang / tsam pa ka staM/ de bzhin rdzas ni de dag kun// su bar+Na ni dkar po sbyar// ril bu nam cig tsam du ni// skyes bu mkhas pa
326b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba yin/ / su baNas ni bkab nas su// rdzas rnams bsres nas sbyar bar bya// cha rnams 'phel bar bya ba ste// gla rtsi yis ni dri skyed do// bye ma zhib mor btags nas su// tsan dan dkar po'i chus sbyar nas/
327a1(rgyud 'bum): grib ma la ni bskam par bya// tshes brgyad dag nas brtsams nas ni// tshes ni bco lnga nya yi bar// nyin gcig bzhin du don yod pa'i// rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas/
327a2(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin// lan bdun bar du dbang bskur ro// phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar yang bya// de nas tshes ni bco lnga ste// nya la chu dang yungs kar dag/ dkyil 'khor du ni gzhag par bya//
327a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas nor bu'i rgyal po ni// gzhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// cha rnams ma nor legs par dbye// rgyar ni ko la'i tshad du bya// shin tu 'jam la byi bdar legs// tshon rtsi sna tshogs mdzes
327a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / dkyil 'khor mchog ni thig gdab bo// sgo bzhi dod cing glu bzhi dod// kun nas shin tu chaphye zhing // dkyil 'khor snying po che phye ba// tshad dang shin tu ldan par bya// pad+ma chen po bzhi dag dang //
327a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin phyag dang spyan du bcas// don yod dngos grub bri bar bya// nor bu'i rgyal po 'chang ba yis// phyag rgyar bcas pa bri bar bya// chu yi rgya mtsho'i nang du ni// las kyi rdo rje legs par bri// dkyil 'khor
327a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po dam pa la/ / kun nas kha khyer rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs pa dag bri// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// nor bu pad+ma legs par bri// sgo bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// pad+ma zhags pa mdud
327a7(rgyud 'bum): ce gsum/ / rdo rje'i tshul mchog legs par bri// grwa bzhi yi ni gnas rnams su// lag na nor bu yod pa bri// pad+ma'i steng na rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor bzang po phan phran dang // bum pa bkang dang ma
327b1(rgyud 'bum): tog dang / / bdug pa 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan// gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ ci bdog bungs cher gzhag par bya// kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang // mchod yon chu dang a ka ru// tsan dan bdug spos
327b2(rgyud 'bum): dbul bar bya/ / nor bu'i rgyal po 'jigs med pa// snod bzang legs par bkang nas su// rgya dar la yis kha g.yogs te// dkyil 'khor de nyid rig pas gzhag/ dkyil 'khor snying por 'jig rten dbang //
327b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag ste de nas las rdo rje// snod kyi steng du gzhag pa ni// nor bu'i dkyil 'khor bya ba yin// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal
327b4(rgyud 'bum): pos lan bdun dbang bskur bar bya/ / de nas gsang sngags yi ge gcig pu 'bum tshang bar bzlas brjod bya ste/ 'bum bzlas brjod byas na nor bu'i rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur/ de nas rig sngags 'chad
327b5(rgyud 'bum): gi lag/ g.yas dang ldan pas bzung nas ni// chang pa dam du bsdam par bya// bsdams pa tsam gyis mod dag la// rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro// nor bu dri ma med pa don yod pa'i rnam par
327b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba 'thob la/ 'khor rig sngags 'chang 'khor los sgyur ba bye ba phrag 'bum yod par 'gyur/ lung gi sgo thams cad phye bar 'gyur/
327b7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad phye bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dag kha ton du lobs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
328a1(rgyud 'bum): du 'jug par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang bdud pa dag gis gsong por smra bar byed/ thams cad du'ang don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par thar
328a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba thob par 'gyur/ tshe bskal pa 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su ring bar 'gyur/ don yod pa'i pad+ma'i 'khor lo mdun nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'bar bar ma gyur na sngar/
328a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams thob par 'gyur la/ mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rgyal po'i ril bu ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las nas sgrub pa yin no// tshe brjes
328a4(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur la/ gang dang gang du skye ba'i tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ nor bu'i ril bu 'di mthong ba tsam gyis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa

328a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i rings srel gyi snying po mchod rten dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ste/ 'di la som nyi dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// mthong ba dang reg pa tsam gyi mod la sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa grangs dang bgrang
328a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i tshul gyi bskal pa 'bum du bsags pa mnar med pa'i gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ dam pa'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad dus gsum
328b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mthu dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi nor bu'i rgyal po'i mthus thams cad zad par 'gyur/
328b2(rgyud 'bum): sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dag las yongs su thar bar 'gyur/ bde 'gro'i lam la gzhol bar 'gyur/ tshe brjes nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// de lta bas na legs par sgrub pa'i
328b3(rgyud 'bum): mthar thug par bya zhing bsgrub par bya/ mthu stobs kyis sbyar bar bya/ shin tu gsal zhing rab tu gsal ba'i bsam pas 'bad pas sbyar bar bya/ rang gau sha dang khrag kyang yongs su btang nas btsal bar bya zhing /
328b4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po yongs su btsal bar bya ba yin/ phyi rol gyi dngos po nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / dngul dang / gos dang / rgyan rnams yongs su btang nas yongs su btsal bar bya ba
328b5(rgyud 'bum): lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ srog gtang bar bya'i/ de gtang bar mi bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba sgrub pa 'di btsal bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o//
328b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag pa nyid kyi dad pas sangs rgyas nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
328b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / nams kyang ngan 'gro log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu'i ril bu sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas de'i phyir don yod pa yangs pa'i dkyil
329a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub kyi sman nor bu dang gsang sngags rnams bshad par bya ste/ sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang /
329a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i mthu des phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa yang
329a3(rgyud 'bum): dag par bstan pa yang dag par ston par mdzad/ bklags pas grub pa/ rigs kyi dam tshig spyi'i gsang ba thams cad du nye bar ston par mdzad do// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi ngal ba 'bras bu med pa
329a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ / ngal ba dang / dub pa dang / 'bad pa'i bzlas brjod kyi cho ga 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems kyi rgyud dad pa dang / gus pa dang / gsang chen dang / gsang
329a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba gzhan la bstan par mi bya ste/ dngos grub med par mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na gsang sngags sgrub pa ni shin tu gsang bar bya zhing legs par smyung ba byas pa la 'bad par bya/ kha zas ngan pa spang bar
329a6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ gos ngan pa dang sems can ngan pa'ang yongs su spang bar bya/ mi bsrun pa dang / mi bden pa dang / phra ma dang / sems can sun par byed pa dang / gsang sngags rku ba dang / cho ga zhib mo rku bar byed pa
329a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rku bar byed pa de dag gis rtogs pa ni gang na'ang med de/ dus gsum gyi mgon pos spad cing byang chub sems dpas kyang spad la/ mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzis
329b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gis kyang smad pa yin no/ / sems can sdong dum bsregs pa 'di// gsang ba sun 'byin ma rungs pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rtag tu smad par bya ba yin// lha rnams kyis
329b2(rgyud 'bum): ni yongs su btang / / ma rungs pas ni bdud kyis zos// ma rungs pas ni bgegs kyis zos// bslab gzhi tshul khrims nyams pa dang // mgon po'i bstan pa sun 'byin pa// de la dngos grub ji ltar
329b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / de la skyob pa gang yang med// mgon med kun tu smad pa yin// de bas de la dngos grub ni// chung ngu'ang med la nyes pa yis// gsang sngags dang ni sman mi 'grub// nyes pa de dag rang gis byas//
329b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang ma rungs byed pa yin// de bas sems can mkhas la sbyin// slob pa 'dod cing yon tan dga'// snying rje'i bdag nyid byams la gnas// sems can kun la brtse ba'i mchog/ de yi lag tu sbyin bya ste// de yi
329b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub bla na med/ / gsang ba 'di ni shin tu gsang ba yin te// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi snying po gsang ba de'ang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya sgrub sla ste/ bkras
329b6(rgyud 'bum): pas 'grub pa de bzhin du sman nor bu 'di la rtag tu 'jug cing dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid rab tu ston par byed pa yin no/ / rig sngags 'chang ni bdag nyid kyis// mchog tu gsang ba bsgrub bya ba// rig sngags 'chang ni gtsang ma
329b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / khrus byas gos gtsang gyon byed la// 'dir ni nyin zhag sbyang ba dang // dad dang gus pas mchod pa dang // don yod 'khor lo sgrub byed pas// dngos grub dkyil 'khor dam pa sgrub// sman s+thi ka dang / tsan dan gyi
330a1(rgyud 'bum): @#bye ma dang / a ka tsu dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma'i ldum bu dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / de bzhin du giru wang dang / sdong ros dang / tsam pa ka dang / su ma na ste/ de bzhin cha ni
330a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam sbyar te/ / phye ma dag tu byas nas ni// de nas don yod rgyal po yis// tshes brgyad dang ni bco lnga'i bar// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya// khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad// bzlas brjod byas nas dbang
330a3(rgyud 'bum): bskur ro/ / de'i 'og tu cha lngar bya ste// mig bsku ba dang / ril bu dang / phye ma dang / til mar tshos pa dang / kha dong bkru zhing khrus bya'o// mig sman ni so'u byi re dang lhan cig sbrus la don yod pa'i rgyal
330a4(rgyud 'bum): pos brgya stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ / ril bu ni sbrang rtsi dkar po dang lhan cig spu'o// phye ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug la phul ba'i me tog dang lhan cig spu'o// til mar bcos pa ni brah+ma ti la ste/ shing ba la sha'i
330a5(rgyud 'bum): mar dang lhan cig spu'o/ / kha gdong bkru ba ni tsan dan dkar po'i chu dang lhan cig sbu zhing // su ma na dang / gur kum dang / spos chus lhan cig sbrus la so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal
330a6(rgyud 'bum): pos nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas pas gcig tu sbrus te/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang du bcug la/ so sor brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
330a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas nas shar phyogs kyi sgo nas dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor mchog la phyag dang bskor ba byas la/ de nas so sor dar gyis kha gcad de dkyil 'khor gyi snying por gzhag la/ don yod
330b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas dbang bskur bar bya/ dbang bskur bar byas nas kyang rig sngags 'chang gis dbang bskur bar bya/ de nas dkyil
330b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor snying por ni/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug mchod bya ste// bdug spros lnga dag dbul bya bar// a ka ru dang tsan dan dang // spri ka gu gul du ru ka/ mchod yon snod ni lnga dbul zhing // gtor ma lnga ni dgang
330b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / ro ldan sna tshogs dag gis dgang // ro ldan 'bras bu sna tshogs pa'i// gtor ma cha lnga dbul bar bya// kun tu 'phreng ba nyi shu dang // mar me nyi shu lnga dag dang // spos kyi phye ma lnga dag dang // spos
330b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi cha lngar phye bas byug/ 'phan phran nyi shu rtsa lnga gdags// tshon rtsi lnga yis mdzes par bya// gser dang dngul gyis g.yogs pa yi// bum pa gang ba nyi shu lnga// rin po che ni lnga gzhug go/ sgo bzhi grwa bzhir
330b5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa brgyad/ / brgya dang nyi shu rtsa lnga nyid// dkyil 'khor me tog 'bras yos dang // yungs kar nyid kyis mngon par dgram// slob dpon bla ma mchod pa ni// gos dang snod dang yon gyis so// thub pa 'jig
330b6(rgyud 'bum): rten dbang phyug ltar/ / ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas su// dkyil 'khor slob dpon mchod byas nas// de nas dkyil 'khor gshegs par gsol// de nas las rnams bya ba ni// ji ltar yid la sna tshog
330b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / don yod chen po'i gzhal med khang // rig sngags 'chang gis rtag tu gsang // de nyid dngos grub sgrub sla ba// de bzhin nor bu sman sngags so// don 'di shin tu bkra shis so// mkhas pa mi b
331a1(rgyud 'bum): ya ba yin/ / phra ma'i tshig kyang mi bsten te// brdzun ni rnams kyang sgra mi bya// 'di ni sgrub pa'i de nyid de// de la 'grub pa the tsom med// 'dir ni dkyil 'khor bshad par bya/
331a2(rgyud 'bum): kun nas gru bzhi lham pa ste// grwa bzhi cha ni legs par byed// ko la'i tshad de lags pa dang // sna tshogs mtshon gyi thig skud kyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying por
331a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / 'khor lo bzang po bri bar bya// dbus kyi lte bar pad+mo yi// 'khor lo gsal ba bri bar bya// pad+ma'i snying po'i gser dang ni// dngul lam tsan dan las byas pa// 'bar bar 'jig rten dbang phyug bcu
331a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo kun tu rtsibs dang ni/ / mu khyud dag gis cha dbye'o// dkyil 'khor snying po'i grwa rnams der// lha'i dbang po tshangs pa dang // khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po bri// kun tu kha khyer rnam pa dang //
331a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'phreng ba rnams bya'o// dkyil 'khor phyi rol kun tu ni// rtag tu phyag rgya rnams bri ste// rdo rje dgra sta mdung rtse gsum// ral gri zhags pa tho ba dang // gshin rje be con pad+ma gdugs// dbyug to mda'
331a6(rgyud 'bum): po che rnams so/ / sgra rnams kun tu 'phreng ba dang // me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dgram// sgo s+tho de ni dkyil 'khor gyi// lha ste gshin rje nu lnga dang // lus ngan dang ni gzhon nu bri// dkyil 'khor gA ba'i rnams
331a7(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag/ go cha legs par bgos pa dang // khro bar lta ba 'jigs byed bri// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dgos pa rnams// legs pa yongs su rdzos
331b1(rgyud 'bum): ba ra ni/ / rig sngags ji bzhin bstan pa yin// de nas legs par khrus byas la// gos gtsang bgos pa 'jigs med pas// sman mchog gzung ste las bya'o// rmongs pa'i dra ba sna tshogs dang /
331b2(rgyud 'bum): sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam sprul pa// gang gis ngan 'gro thar 'gyur ba// sems can kun la bstan par bya// rtag tu dga' dang dad pa dang // gus pas de nyid thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gis sgrub pa'i
331b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dngos grub de nyid thob par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang gis sngar khrus byas la rdzas kyi dri chab gtsang ma don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ tsan dan gyi chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
331b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas nas sgra yan chad tsam byug la tshod zin par bskus nas kha gdong bkru bar bya'o/ / mig sman la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas bskus na mig bzang bar 'gyur ro// brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas
331b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas nas bdag nyid dang phyogs bcur gtor ro/ / de bzhin du til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas sgra yan chad bsku ba dang / tshod zin par bslu ba dang / lus rkang mthil yan chad bsku'o//
331b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gcig pu yid la bya ba la sems byams pa nyid la gnas nas rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i sgo 'am/ skye bo'i nang ngam/ 'dus pa chen po 'am/ dge 'dun gyi nang ngam/ tshogs dang phrad pa 'am/ de bzhin
331b7(rgyud 'bum): du gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ de dag thams cad kyis 'jig rten mgon po'i gzugs dang kha dog tu mthong zhing sa'i steng nas rkang pa khru gang tsam gyis spags te 'dug la/ ji lta ji ltar 'dul ba rnams kyi dang
332a1(rgyud 'bum): pa de lta de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed de/ rgyal po 'am/ 'khor los sgyur ba 'am/ mi'i seng ge 'am/ bag gam/ sred med kyi bur ston pa 'am/ tshangs pa 'am/ sum cu rtsa
332a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi dbang po 'am/ dbang phyug chen po mig gsum pa 'am/ gzhon nu 'am/ chu lha 'am/ gshin rje 'am/ rnam thos kyi bu 'am/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi 'am/ nag po chen po 'am/ dga' byed
332a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gam/ ser skya 'am/ gsang ba pa 'am/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che 'am/ nor bu bzang po'i bu 'am/ gang ba bzang po 'am/ stobs kyi lha 'am/ gar mkhan mchog gam/ rlung lha 'am/ drang
332a4(rgyud 'bum): slong nyid de/ ji ltar gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs yid la byas pa thams cad ston par byed do// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa nyid 'byung bar byed do// de bzhin du dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na de sangs rgyas
332a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su snang zhing gzhal med khang gi rnam pa dag kyang ston par byed do// ji ltar 'dod par 'gyur ba yid la byas pa de ltar gzugs rnams ston par byed do// 'khor tshogs
332a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ dgon pa 'am/ 'chag sa dag kyang sman nor bu dang / gsang sngags kyi mthus gzugs sna tshogs su ston par byed do// 'gron po 'brog gi nang du phyin pa nyam thag pa/ 'jigs pa mi bzang ba
332a7(rgyud 'bum): chu med pa/ mu ge'i dgon par mgon med pa/ sdug bsngal drag po de lta bu'i nang du chud pa'i skye bo sdug par gyur pa/ skyabs med pa/ mgon med par gyur pa/ skyob pa med pa/ dpung gnyen med par
332b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa na de la rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma 'dis phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad par bya/ phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du ri mo bris la ril bu lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag go// yungs kar la
332b2(rgyud 'bum): til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dbang bskur nas/ khro bo'i rgyal pos hUM zhes bya bas phyag
332b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya bcings la/ sa la bsnun cing phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan par byas pa tsam gyis chu bzang po rnam pa sna tshogs 'bab cing rdzing 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshal dang / nye ba'i tshal dang /
332b4(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gzhal med khang 'byung bar 'gyur/ phye ma'i dkyil 'khor de las grong khyer dang khang bzang 'byung bar 'gyur/ khyim gyi gnas lnga stong 'byung bar 'gyur
332b5(rgyud 'bum): zhing / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba 'byung bar 'gyur/ nyo tshong dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / rta dang / glang po'i gnas dag 'byung bar
332b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / tshong pa dang / khyim dang / khang pa bzang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du bsams pa de srid du 'dug go// chu dang yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
332b7(rgyud 'bum): nas phyogs bzhir gtor na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / yungs ka la de yul 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /
333a1(rgyud 'bum): dgras 'jigs shing 'joms par byed pa las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na gtor ba tsam gyi mod la 'obs bcad cing ra ba kha khyer gyis bskor la/
333a2(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer kun tu skyes bu go cha bgos pa dag snang bas grong khyer mnan pa 'am gtse bar sus kyang mi nus so// mtshan mo'i dri'i til mar de nyid yungs kar la bskus te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
333a3(rgyud 'bum): nas chang pa gang mo'i nang du gtor/ chang pa gang grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor na kun nas mar me'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ ji srid dgos pa de srid du 'bar ro// gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon
333a4(rgyud 'bum): pa 'am/ ri 'am/ phug gam/ 'chag sa'i gnas sam/ khyim du gtor na mar me'i 'phreng ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chu dang yungs kar gyis mi snang bar 'gyur/ grong khyer gyi sgor yungs kar gtor na
333a5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ba tsam gyi mod la dgra thams cad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis grong khyer mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gang na phyir rgol ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs gnas pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/
333a6(rgyud 'bum): tshal gyi nang ngam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gtor na 'brog dgon pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/ thams cad phan tshun ngo mi shes nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen pos rab tu 'bros par byed do// dgra'i tshogs kyi nang du
333a7(rgyud 'bum): gtor na mtshon cha thams cad dang / 'gyed pa'i go cha thams cad mi snang zhing gcer bur 'gyur ro// zhal che 'gyed pa'i nang du gtor na 'gyed zla gtso bo de gcer bur 'gyur ro// dgra'i steng du gtor na me 'bar
333b1(rgyud 'bum): ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag la sogs pa yid la ji ltar byas pa'i las 'bum snyed byed do// de nas las rgya chen po byed par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma legs par khrus byas pa spos
333b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis lus bskus pa des/ yungs kar dang til mar gyi rgyal pos bskus pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la gtor bar bya/ khro bo'i rgyal pos lan
333b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun dbang bskur nas phyag rgya bcas pa'i lag pas ril bu spyi bor bzhag la phye mas gdab par bya/ til mar gyi rgyal pos rkang pa la byug par bya/ don yod pa'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya ste/
333b4(rgyud 'bum): yongs su sbyang ba'i las lhan cig bya ba legs par byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs g.yo ste gar dga' bar 'gro la/ gzugs brnyan gang du 'gro ba de nyid du rang 'gro/
333b5(rgyud 'bum): lha'i steng du gtor na lha lha'i gnas nas 'pho zhing gar dga' ba der 'gro'o// phye mas lha'i steng du gtor na khro bo'i rgyal po hUM zhes bya ba mi snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar gyi rgyal po la lan brgya brgya
333b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas la bdag nyid kyi pus mo dang byin pa la bskus na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / rkang mthil la bskus na sa'i steng na rkang pa sor bzhi tsam mi reg go// rdo'i steng du
333b7(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa gzhag pa dang / rkang rjes byung ba'i steng du rdza ma dang / bum dang / bum pa gzhag pa'i rku ba la bskus na sor bzhi tsam gyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'du'o// yungs kar la bzlas brjod
334a1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas mes sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de blangs nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ til mar gyis smras pa la khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyar dbang bskur nas
334a2(rgyud 'bum): mig la bskus na mig gsum ston cing dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ / thal bas lus la byugs na tshangs pa'i gzugs su ston to// shing pa la sha dang parna Sha bsres pas lus
334a3(rgyud 'bum): byugs na sred med kyi bu'i stobs dang / shugs dang / gzugs su ston to// til mar chen pos khar bskus la thal bas dpral bar thig le byas na gzhon nu'i gzugs su ston to// yungs kar
334a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'bru kha dog sna tshogs can la til mar chen po byugs pas bskus la don yod pa'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya/ phyag rgyas brgya rtsa brgyad dbang bskur cing khro bo'i rgyal pos brgya rtsa brgyad
334a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur la/ de nas dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gzhag/ de nas las thams cad byed de nam mkha' la gtor na nor bu dang rin po che'i char 'bab par ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i tshe nam
334a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la gtor na me tog gi char sna tshogs 'bab par 'gyur/ 'dus pa'i nang du nam mkha' la gtor na 'bras bu dang nor gyi rgyun sna tshogs pa ston to// tshal gyi nang du gtor na me tog dang 'bras bu swa
334a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pa ston to/ / ri bug tu gtor na rdzas dang sman sna tshogs ston to// mchod rten rnying pa 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas su gtor na yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang zhing rdzogs pa'ang
334b1(rgyud 'bum): ba bzang po yangs pa gnas kyi mchog ston to/ / grong khyer stong par gtor na 'tsho ba'i yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yul rgyal po dang / slas dang / bkrabs pa dang /

334b3(rgyud 'bum): khrod kyi nang du gtor na shi ba'i rus pa gang dang gang la bab pa de dang de gang du sems can dmyal ba 'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha'

334b5(rgyud 'bum): bod pa las tshig 'byung bar 'gyur la/ gang du skyes pa de'i gtam yang smra'o// gang dang gang gi skye gnas su skyes pa de thams cad smra la/ thabs ji ltar bya ba de smra'o// yungs kar des kyang rus gong
334b6(rgyud 'bum): 'brel bar ram/ shi ba'i ro 'am/ rus pa 'thor ba la bab na bab pa tsam gyis mod la sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// zong bkram

335a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nang du gtor na thams cad bro rdung bar byed do/ / dge 'dun gyi nang du gtor na dge slong thams cad bsam gtan 'thob par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyi gtso bo la gtor na rnal 'byor

335a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po bco brgyad pa/ / / de nas de'i phyir 'gugs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bstan pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ gang gis lha rnams myur du 'ong ba dang /
335a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs myur du ston to// rdo rje'i sku dang stobs po che// ta mgrin dang ni mgul sngon dang // de bzhin rta ni rgod ma'i kha// bdud rtsi 'khyil ldan gzugs po che// log 'dren rnams ni rab
335b1(rgyud 'bum): 'joms dang / / khro rgyal de bzhin 'jigs byed spyan// ke le'i ke li'i rgyal po che// khro bo tshol pa stobs po che// de bzhin rdo rjes 'og gzugs// rdo rje rtse mo de nyid dang // klu chen rab 'joms spyan

335b7(rgyud 'bum): dpon de bzhin khyim bdag dang / / bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs dang // dge sbyong stag dang seng ge dang // khyu mchog de bzhin nags kyi lha// shing lha de bzhin lo tog lha// gad+hA sI ta ya mu na// thab
336a1(rgyud 'bum): nam ldan rus sbal nya/ / lag 'gro dang ni bod pa can// skal sod de bzhin 'bras bu dang // me tog rgya rlabs chen po dang // sku tshogs gzugs dang rnam sna tshogs// de ltar
336a2(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa bstan pa dang / / de ltar slar gshegs gsol ba nyid// sbyin sreg dra ba 'di nyid kyis// spu 'phrul rmad byung gsang sngags grub// rdzas grub nor bu ti la mar grub// don yod zhags pa bsrub

336a4(rgyud 'bum): char 'bab dang / / 'brug sgrogs dang ni glog 'bru dang // gzhan yang me ni 'bar ba dang // dud pa'i phung po bde 'gyed dang // skyes bu go cha gyon pa dang // de bzhin mtshon cha sna tshogs mthong // khyu mthong grub

336a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang rnams bklags pas 'grub/ / dbul po rnams ni nor 'thob cing // sdang ba rnams ni byams par bgyid// mu stegs gzhan rnams dad par bgyid// mkhas pa rnams ni dga' bar bgyid//
336a7(rgyud 'bum): gdul dka' rnams ni thar bar 'tshal// dge slong rnams ni bsam gtan thob// ting 'dzin bla na med pa thob// chos 'dod rnams ni sangs rgyas mthong // sdig pa byed rnams sdig pa 'jig/ mi rigra
336b1(rgyud 'bum): byas rnams thar pa thob/ / mtshams med lnga rnams rnam dag don// dbugs ma phyin rnams dbugs 'byin mchog/ ma dul ba rnams de bzhin 'dul// ma brgal ba rnams sgrol ba'i gru// thar pa'i
336b2(rgyud 'bum): lam du 'gro bar gnas/ / ma grol ngan 'gro kun las 'grol// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// lung ma bstan pa lung ston byed// skyon dang dri ma sdig pa rnams// thams cad mod la spong
336b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyid du/ / de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni// bklags pas grub pa bgyid pa lags// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// don gyi dngos grub bla na med// gang dang gang du sbyor ba bgyid//
336b4(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// yid la bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dir ni yid kyis rnam bsam pa// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa dang // ji ltar ngo bo kun bsams pa// de ltar rnam
336b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul ston par bgyi/ / tshes grangs rgyu skar sbyar mi 'tshal// smyung ba bgyi ba mi 'tshal te// cho ga ji bzhin dus ji bzhin// cho ga rig sngags rgyal po bzlas// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang gyur
336b6(rgyud 'bum): cing / / legs par khrus bgyis gos gtsang dag/ bgos pa bden par smra ba dang // bla ma la ni gus byed pa// rtag tu byams pa'i sems la gnas// sems can la ni brtse ba'i mchog/ sdom
336b7(rgyud 'bum): la gnas shing tshangs par spyod/ / chos ma yin pa spong byed pa// gal te de nyid grub 'dod na// chang dang sha dang kun dong dang // 'dres dang za 'phro sbags pa spangs// sems can ngan pa sun 'byin
337a1(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / rig sngags chu dang cho ga chu/ chos chu gsang sngags chub dang // de bzhin rkun mo chom rkun dang // ser sna rtag tu spang bar gyis// de dag la ni dngos grub med// ma rba
337a2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni dam tshig nyams/ / yid gcugs pas ni med par byed// sdig pa'i chos ni kun tu spyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis spad// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis smad// rtag tu chos kyi
337a3(rgyud 'bum): sdong du ma 'gyur/ / shi nas sems can dmyal bar gzhol// rtag tu smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// dbul po lus ni bskams pa dang // mdze dang khyi rjes 'debs pa dang // sdug bsngal rkun ma chos

337a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya zhing / rtag tu dkon mchog gsum dang / pa dang / ma dang / bla ma dang / ston pa ni skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / dpung mnyen mdzad pa/ ston pa/ mchog sbyin pa/

337a7(rgyud 'bum): phyug/ dbang phyug chen po/ dbang phyug mgon po/ mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/ gzugs sna tshogs ston par mdzad pa/ dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par bgyid pa/ mgon po sdug bsngal sna tshogs yongs

338a1(rgyud 'bum): ni mahA ru ti ras 'grub ste brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ / khro bo'i rgyal pos bzhi stong ngo // nor bu sbrul gyi khrag gis spras te khri chig stong bzlas brjod bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal pos lnga stong lnga brgya'o

342a6(rgyud 'bum): nyam chung bar snang ngo / / mal stan gyi steng du yungs kar gtor ba gal te mtshan thog thag bzhag na gzugs gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// lug gi steng na snod yod pa la gtor na de thur ma'i gze ba dang /
342a7(rgyud 'bum): sbrul nag por snang ngo // snod kyi steng du gtor na lam por bu snang bar 'gyur ro// btung ba'i sdod sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i steng du gtor na phyag dar gyi phung por snang ngo // grong khyer gyi sgo 'grong khyer kun
342b1(rgyud 'bum): tu gtor na grong khyer kun nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / grong khyer kun la yungs kar dang pad+ma'i phye ma gtor na skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mi snang ba thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// seng
342b2(rgyud 'bum): ga'i khrag dang sbyar nas bdud 'gro'i skyes nas kyi steng du gtor na lam gyi bzhi mdo thams cad du seng ge'i gzugs su ston to/ / sde drag cing gtum la yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa'i steng du
342b3(rgyud 'bum): gtor na thams cad wa'i gzugs su snang la phyogs bcur rgyug go/ / g.yul 'gyed sar gtor na thams cad nyid log par byas par 'gyur la/ mtshon cha thams cad dang go cha thams cad mi snang bar
342b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / me'i nang du gtor na mi snang ba rnams snang bar 'gyur ro// til mar dang sbyar nas me'i nang du gtor na rtag tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu'i nang du gtor na chu mi mngon par 'gyur ro//

343a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi bzo bzang po ji lta ba bzhin ston par 'dod na las kyi snod de dang de dag nyid g.yo la/ las kyi bzo'i tshul bzang pos mthar phyin pa rnam pa du ma dag ston par byed la nyo tshong byed pa 'byung ste/ gal te phyir
343a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa ma byas na rin ji lta ji lta ba de lta de ltar nyo tshong byed do/ / chu dang yungs kar gyis bzlog pa byas na mi snang bar 'gyur la/ dpag tshad brgya stong tsam gyi bar du khrid na de dang de nyid du mi snang bar

344a2(rgyud 'bum): na dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ spos sna tshogs kyis bris nas me tog sna tshogs yang dgram par yang bya/ gu gul gyi bdug pas kyang bdugs nas 'khor lo la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
