348b7(rgyud 'bum): bgrod par mi nus pa'i ri'i rtse mo na seng ge dang stag gis gang ba 'am/ lcug ma dang tsher ma can gyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba 'am/ rtsub pa 'am/ dum bu 'am/ khong stong du snang bar 'gyur ro//
349a1(rgyud 'bum): ci ste rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pho brang ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'dod na/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag bdun gyi bar du ras
349a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'o thug gi zas zos te gtsang ma shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas ri'i gseb tu zhugs la/ sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas der shing dri zhim po'i me sbar ba la yungs kar phye ma dang bsres pa 'bru
349a3(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi rgyal po dang sbyar la 'bras so ba dang bsres pa stong rtsa brgyad zhag bdun du dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o/ / lha bshos dang gtor ma dkar po 'bul lo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes brgyad la nyin zhag
349a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas spos sna tshogs kyis lus bskus/ gos bzang po gtsang ma bgos te/ 'bru mar gyi rgyal pos rang gis lus bskus/ phye mas lus byugs/ mig sman gyis
349a5(rgyud 'bum): mig bskus/ thig le byas la nor bus mgo bcing zhing / mgul pa dang / lag pa dang / dpung pa dang / rked par yang bcings la/ yungs kar dang mtshal bsres pas ri'i phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya/ pad+ma chen
349a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i phye ma de'ang phyogs bzhir gtor/ rang gi lag pa g.yon pas zhags pa dang pad+ma gzung zhing / lag pa g.yas pas rnam par lta ba snang ba dang / don yod pa chen po dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya gzung ste/ don yod pa'i
349a7(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa'i mdo lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ ji ltar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bshad pa las bstan pa de ltar ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngag 'chang de'ang 'phags pa spyan ngas
349b1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs su snang bar 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar ri po Ta la'i gzhal med khang bzhin du ri de la'ang / zhal med khang snang ste/ ri de la rin po che'i shing ljon pa sna tshogs snang ngo // me tog sna tshogs kyi
349b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhal med khang snang ngo / / sA la dang / tA la dang / ta mA la dang / tsam ba ka dang / a sho ka dang / a ka dang / a sho d+hi muk+ti ka dang / ba ri sha ka dang / ka dam pa dang / nI la dang / ba Ta la dang / pa lA
349b3(rgyud 'bum): sha dang / u dum wa ra dang / dong ka'i me tog sna tshogs dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / tog dang / twa ra Na dang / na ba ma li ka dang / kub pya sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// bya'i tshogs sna tshogs kyis
349b4(rgyud 'bum): legs par brgyan pa dang / ri dgas kyi tshogs sna tshogs kyis gang ba snang bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phyir bsdu ba byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe gnas gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o// gzhan yang dgos
349b5(rgyud 'bum): pa sna tshogs la rang gi blo gros la ji ltar snang ba bzhin bya'o/ / dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar ba ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i zhags pa chen po'i dkyil
349b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi rig sngags 'chang gi cho ga gsang ba'o/ / / don yod pa'i sgyu ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/ de nas de'i 'og tu phyag rgya bri ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/
349b7(rgyud 'bum): rtags mtshon phyag rgya'i de nyid ni// pad+ma rgyas dang sna tshogs mtshon// pad+ma kha ni phyed bye ba// phyag dag na ni rab tu 'dzin// phyag gnyis phyung zhing brkyang nas kyang // bskum pa'am 'dzin stangs de nyid kyis//
350a1(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'phreng ba 'bar ba'i rtags// mtshon cha phyag rgya bsnams pa ni// 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang / mdung thung dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / yid bzhin gyi
350a2(rgyud 'bum): nor bu dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'phreng zlum dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / zur gsum ma zhes bya ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dung dang / tho ba dang / zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / dbyug
350a3(rgyud 'bum): to dang / me tog gi thum po dang / bum pa gang ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang / rdo rje'i 'phreng zlum dang / ut+pa la'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pal dang /
350a4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dang / ri rab dang / me long dang / klu dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / be con dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / chu srin gyi kha dang /
350a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags de'i 'phreng ba dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng zlum dang / bsdigs pa dang / bsgyings pa dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mchog sbyin pa dang / thal mo sbyar ba dang /
350a6(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam bsnams pa dang / 'khar gsil dang / lhung bzad dang / gdugs dang / dbu rgyan dang / nor bu brgyus pa dang / gsar skud dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba dang / gdu bu dang / dpung
350a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan dang / rna cha dang / me'i thab khung ngo // kun nas 'bar 'phreng phyag rgya de// sna tshogs rmad du byung bas spras// mtshon cha sna tshogs bsdams pa yi// pad+ma 'dzin la rab tu gnas// ras la
350b1(rgyud 'bum): bris pa 'am dkyil 'khor rab/ / rtsig pa 'am gang yang rung ba la// tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// gang du bris pa mthong ba de// ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar ni// phyir yang 'gro bar
350b2(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten dbang gis rtag mchog sbyin// sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig nyes byas mi bzad pa// mtshams med lnga po byed pa nyid// mnar med pa'i gnas dang ni// /
350b3(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba gzhan du gzhol ba gang // phyag rgya de dag mthong tsam gyis// 'gro ba thams cad zad par 'gyur// skye dang 'chi las rnam par grol// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho brgal bar 'gyur// de dag skye ba phyi
350b4(rgyud 'bum): mar ni/ / phyir yang mngal gyis mi gos te// yang dang yang du pad+ma las// rdzus te skye ba dag tu 'gyur// rtag tu bde ba can du 'gro// gang na 'dren pa tshe dpag med// bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar rtag tu der//
350b5(rgyud 'bum): skyes 'gyur the tsom mi za zhing // don rnams bde bar 'grub 'gyur zhing // rig sngags sna tshogs bde bar 'grub// bde bar dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mi ldogs nas 'gyur//
350b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di dag mthong tsam gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub dang mnyam 'gyur// dus gsum gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la// bla med dge rtsa bskyed par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// bsod nams
350b7(rgyud 'bum): phung po chen po 'thob/ / de nas dkyil 'khor rab bshad pa// de nyid 'grub pa'i phyag rgya rnams// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel//
351a1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig mtshams med byed pa dag/ mi bzad mnar med gnas pa yis// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad nas ni// mtho ris sgo phye the tsom
351a2(rgyud 'bum): med/ / sgo phye gyur pa rnams la ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams snang bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ mgon po 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam
351a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis sems can phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong na shi 'bos pa'i mod la bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis gang na thub pa 'dren pa
351a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpag med bzhugs pa'i pho brang du myur du 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa la// kun nas cha ni mdzes par bya// gru bzhi go la'i tshad tsam la// sgo bzhi them skas bzhi yis
351a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / shin tu legs par bskus dang ldan// 'jam zhing mnyen la mnyam pa yi// sa yi cha dang ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis dbye// dkyil 'khor de nyid thig btab la// phyag rgya
351a6(rgyud 'bum): bri ba rnam par dbye/ / phyogs bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa yi// dbus na dkyil 'khor snying po yin// gru bzhi pa la kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba rnam par dbye'o// gru bzhi pa'i
351a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su phyag rgya don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba bla na med pa dang / phyag rgyan gyis brgyan pa tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri'o// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyag rgya bri ba'ang
351b1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu 'byes par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor kun nas gos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan la kun tu yungs kar pos gtor ro// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi gnas su phyogs bzhi kun
351b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bya ba ni ba lang gi lci ba sa dang bsres pas shin tu legs par byugs pa dang ldan pa la tshon rtsi'i phye mas kha khyer gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas pad+ma'i 'breng ba rgya chen po dang / mtshon cha bris la 'di'i sgo
351b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'ang rnam par 'byes par bri'o/ / ji ltar phyag rgya dang mthun pa'i ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag par bya ste/ phyag rgya re re la'ang mchod yon phul la/ dbyib mo dang / phru ba dang / bum pa dang /
351b4(rgyud 'bum): khams por dang / rdze'u gtor mas bkang la gzhag go/ kun tu bum pa gang ba dang // bdug spos kyi ni snod dag dang // me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs dang // gtor ma dkar po dag gis bkang /
351b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog rnam par bkram byas la// kun tu 'phreng bas gzhag par bya// 'phreng ba bzang po gzhag nas kyang // de bzhin kun tu bdug spos dbul// a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru ka dang / sa la ki dang /
351b6(rgyud 'bum): sprik+ka dang / gu gul dang / sra rtsi pog dang / sgron shing dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyi bdug pa 'di dag gis bdugs la/ gtor ma dang / me tog dang / lha bshos dbul lo// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du
351b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pas don yod pa'i rgyal po dran par byas te bskor la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la phyag bya zhing phyag rgya thams cad la me tog bkram zhing me tog gtor ro// gang phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid gsang ba 'di dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil
352a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'di sgrub pa gang dgos pa la sngar dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa la mchog tu mdzes par byas la/ phyis las thams cad bya'o// rig sngags 'chang ba gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma
352a2(rgyud 'bum): yi ni gos bgos la/ / ji ltar dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin// dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug par bya// ji ltar dkyil 'khor la dgos pa// de bzhin du ni las bya'o// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la med pa// dkyil
352a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor 'dir ni zhugs tsam gyis/ / thub pa snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa'i// spyi yi rigs ni thams cad du// phyag rgya dkrigs dang gtams rnams kyis// dam tshigs kun tu shes par 'gyur// spyi rigs
352a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi cho ga yis/ / dam tshig rjes zhugs de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa dang // rgyal bas lung ni bstan par 'gyur// kun gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa yis// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par
352a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / chos kyi ro ni bdud rtsi yi// gzi brjid mod la 'jug par 'gyur// rnam snang mdzad gsungs dkyil 'khor du// don yod dngos grub stsol ba mdzad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gang bzhugs pa//
352a6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu spyi yi rigs rnams kyi// don yod dngos grub mchog myur thob// sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
352a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yon tan gyi phan yon 'di dag ni tshe 'di yin par khong du chud par bya'o// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar
352b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran zhing 'od zer bye ba 'bar ba'i lus dang ldan zhing / tshe bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad dri ma med par snang ba don yod pa'i rnam par
352b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa bstan pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ gang ting nge 'dzin thob pas sgyu ma chen po lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ston par byed do// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lha'i
352b3(rgyud 'bum): spyi'i rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci
352b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / lto 'phya chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor rnams
352b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor par gzigs nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur ro// rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor dang
352b6(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ / sem+ba can thams cad gcig tu bla mar byed par 'gyur ro// nad tham cad med par 'gyur ro// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// mtshan ma bri
352b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / / de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba rnam dag gi/ de nyid sgrub pa bsgrub pa'i phyir// spyi yi rigs
353a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad kyi/ / cho ga zhib mo bla med yin// gang gi sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// phyogs kun rnam par gzigs pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams byon 'gyur zhing //
353a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dgongs par 'gyur// rig sngags dngos grub rjes stsol cing // rtag tu srung ba mdzad par 'gyur// mgon po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs// the tsom med par myur du byon//
353a3(rgyud 'bum): mgon po 'khor bcas gnas nyid na// rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu stsol// rtag tu mchog ni stsol ba nyid// nyin dang mtshan du rtag par ni// rnam par gzigs
353a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur the tsom med/ / dkyil 'khor bshad par bya ste// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni rgya chen po ko la'i tshad tsam la// legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa/ shin tu gsal ba/
353a5(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang / tham skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ rnam par 'byes pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang bya'o// me yi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ni// gru bzhi nyid kyi rnam pa la//
353a6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas them skas bzhi dag dang // steng du grwa ni bzhi pa bya// rtag tu pad+ma'i snying po dang // snying po rgyas pa'i stang du yang // kun nas 'dab ma mdzes par bya// grwa bzhir pad+ma'i 'phreng
353a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bya/ / de bzhin du grwa gnyis kar rdo rje pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// gsum par mdung rtse gsum pa pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// bzhi par 'khor lo pad+ma dang bcas pa'o// lnga par bum pa gang ba bzhag go//
353b1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs tshon gyis rnam mdzes pa'i// kun nas 'dab ma'i myugu bya// rin chen snod ni bkang ba dang // me tog 'phreng dang ngang pa dang // bye ma bad+mar bcas pa dang // de bzhin me tog rigs dag nyis
353b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan brgyan pa'o/ / nub kyi gnas dang grwa dag tu// pad+ma'i 'dab ma ut+pal bcas// bum pa dur rabs bkang ba bri// rtsa ba'i bum pa dbu ma la// 'dir ni kha khyer thig kyang gdang /
353b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor mdzes bya ba// thig gis kun nas cha mnyam zhing // sgo bzhi mdzes par bya ba ni// tshon sna lnga yi skud pas gdab// me 'bar mdog can bri ba ni// kun nas 'bar ba'i 'breng ba
353b4(rgyud 'bum): can/ / grwa dang grwa ra ni me lha bri// lus ni me mdog 'bar ba dang // lag nam 'bar 'dzin pa dang // mtshan ma sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang // cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni cho ga
353b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / ba dan mda' dang sna lnga yi// srud pas bum pa gang dkris dang // de bzhin bdug spos snod dag gis// kun nas dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya// sna tshogs gzugs can rgya che yis// snaH
353b6(rgyud 'bum): royi gtor ma gzhag/ rdze'u dang kham por rnam gsum gyi// dkar pos bkang ba gzhag par bya'o// rdze'u dang dbyib mo bum pa ni// gtor mas bkang ba kun tu gzhag/ 'bras bu rnam pa sna
353b7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs gzhag/ kun nas me tog dgram bya zhing // 'phreng ba sna tshogs gzhag par bya// 'bras yos yungs kar gtor nas ni// kun tu mar me 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang de bzhin
354a1(rgyud 'bum): du/ dri yi phye ma lha bshos dang // dkyil 'khor kun la gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la// blugs gzar du ra ba rtag tu gzhag/ shing ni arga shi mi
354a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / yungs kar 'bras ni so ba dang // zhu mar dang ni mar dkar dang // kun du ru ka tsan dan dkar// sbyin sreg cho gar 'dir bzhag ste// dus gsum rtag tu rig 'dzin gyi// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad
354a3(rgyud 'bum): du bya/ / rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang ma yis// gtsang ma yi ni gos bgos la// dkar gsum gyi ni zas bza' zhing // gzhan ni bza' dang bca' mi bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni nub sgo nas// dkyil
354a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor shes pa 'jug bya zhing / / d+ha ra b+ha'i stan la skyil krung du// shar phyogs kha bltas 'dug par bya// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag ste// don yod rgyal po dran bya zhing // snga dro'i dus
354a5(rgyud 'bum): su sbyin sreg bya/ / gung la slob ma gzhug bya zhing // spyi yi rigs kyi sreg blugs ni// phyi 'phreng dus su bya ba'o// gang zhig dkyil 'khor du zhugs la// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid dang // grub pa kun
354a6(rgyud 'bum): tu cho ga yi/ / bdag nyid dbang bskur med kun gyi// sbyin sreg byed pa'i mchog tu gsungs// kun tu gnas ni thams cad na// rgyas pa gnas mchog rwa gcig dang // gar ge de bzhin phur bu dang // mdun na
354a7(rgyud 'bum): don pa me lha ni/ / sbyin sreg byed pa 'jig rten par// mtshungs shes ston pas lung bstan to// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las sgrub pa// rig 'dzin dbang po chen po dang // phyag na rdo rje tshangs pa dang //
354b1(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug dbang phyug chen po dang // mnyam pa bas kyang lhag pa nyid// me yi sbyin sreg byed pa la// de bzhin gshegs kun byin gyis rlob// gal te zhag bdun dus gsum du// de la sogs pa'i
354b2(rgyud 'bum): las rnams ni/ / ma la sbyin sreg byed pa la// mod la sngon shes lnga thob ces// de skad 'jig rten 'dren pa gsung // las ni byas nas de nas ni// sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya// sreg blug
354b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis/ / las rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// lha rnams rtags tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // de bzhin gshegs kun dgyes par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' byon nas ni// /
354b4(rgyud 'bum): mod la mthong ba'i sbyin par mdzad// sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur// shin tu mi bzad sngon gyi las// sreg blugs tsam gyis mod la sreg/ 'bar ba me yis phye leb bzhin// de la sogs
354b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sdig pa ni/ / sreg 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// sdang ba'i phyir ni rgol nyid dang // mi bzad phas kyi dgra rnams dang // pha rol dpung gis 'jigs pa nyid// de bzhin du yang rgyal po'i dpung // /
354b6(rgyud 'bum): de kun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// mi gnang bar 'gyur the tsom med// de bzhin mi ngas gcong kun dang // nad kun rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// mu ga'i dgon pa'i 'jigs nyid kyang // sbyin sreg
354b7(rgyud 'bum): byas pa tsam gyis 'jig/ gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang // de bzhin bgegs dang log 'dran dang // sha za brjed byed yi dgas dang // de bzhin rnam pa sna tshogs gdon// 'di kun sbyin sreg
355a1(rgyud 'bum): byas tsam gyis/ / 'jig par 'gyur ba the tsom med// rtag tu 'jigs med lo legs shing // gling dang bde bar 'gyur ba yin// rtag tu sems can thams cad ni// kun
355a2(rgyud 'bum): tu rgyal bar 'gyur pa yin/ / rgyal po dpung dang bcas pa nyid// btsun mor bcas pa nyid kyang ni// rtag par kun tu gsal bar ni// mi 'jigs sbyin par the tsom med// rtag tu nad med 'gyur
355a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / dga' zhing yid ni bde ba dang // lus can dag ni thams cad la// rtag tu dga' bar byed cing gnas// rtag tu ma yi lha nyid ni// rgyun du mthong bar 'dod pa yi// mo la sbyin sreg byas
355a4(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis/ / me lha nyid ni bzhugs 'gyur te// rtag tu las ni thams cad mdzad// rgyun du phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// lha ni rtag tu 'ong 'gyur zhing // thams cad du ni mthong ba ster// rgyu skar zla ba/
355a5(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma dang // gshin rje dang ni chu lha dang // rgyal po chen po bzhi po dang // dpung bcas bzhon par bcas pa yang // nyin dang mtshan du rtag pa ni// rjes 'brang bsrung 'gyur the tsom med// ci ste rig sngags 'chang
355a6(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ nyin zhag gcig smyung pa bya zhing / shing arga'i yam sreg shing gis ma spar la
355a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dang / zhun mar dang / 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas nas sreg zugs lan cig byas pas/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//
355b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des byang chub kyi shing gis me sbar la rigs spyir pad+ma dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / yungs kar dkar po dang / zhun mar
355b2(rgyud 'bum): bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgyad brgya byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi'i rigs kyi dngos grub 'thob ste/ thams cad cho ga chen po zhib mo dang / sbyin sreg chen po'i cho gar 'gyur ro// de nas pha rol gyi
355b3(rgyud 'bum): dmag tshogs gzhom par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des shin tu khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te/ seng ldeng gi me spar la/ zho dang / zhun mar dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul gyi sreg blugs kyi sbyin
355b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg brgyad stong byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra gzhom par 'dod pa dang / dpung gzhig par 'dod na/ de nas rig
355b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gis shing ka ra wI ra'i me spar la/ sbrul gyi pags pa rjes pa dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / lan tshwa 'bras sA lu dang bsres pa yungs mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyi
355b6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dgra la gnam lcags chen po dang / rlung grang mo 'bab pas 'phongs pa dang / yid mi bde ba skyed par 'gyur/ dgra thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// klus char
355b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba byas la shin tu khrus byas pa gtsang mas dri sna tshogs dang / me tog 'phreng ba dang / yungs kar dang / sha ta pus pa zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i
356a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg mtshan gcig la dus gsum du byas na klu'i rgyal pos char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag tu zhag bdun gyi bar du char 'bab par 'gyur ro// char de
356a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid ha cang ches na thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na ha cang char ches pa 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / yang me lha 'ong bar 'dod cing rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma des gos
356a3(rgyud 'bum): ga tsang ma bgos la/ nyin zhag gcig gnas par gyur pa sa shing sna ma'i ma spar la 'bras so ba dang / zhun mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sha kha ra dang / bu ram dang bcas pa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sna ma'i
356a4(rgyud 'bum): me tog bsres pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ / brgyad stong tshang ba dang / me lha me'i nang nas lus phyed phyung ste 'dug nas/ rig sngags 'chang la ci bgyi bka' stsol cig ces zer zhing / ji ltar rig sngags
356a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi cho ga'i don du 'gyur ba de bzhin du smra'o/ / thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba/ mchos thams par phyin pa zhes byab/ bdud kyi pa ne rgya ma pa chos sbyin par byed do// gang bdud rtsi 'bar ba me'i kha thob pas gang du dbug
356a6(rgyud 'bum): phyung ba dang brngubs pa der ma 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / gang du phu zhes byas pas me 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mun gnag tu dbugs phyung na me 'bar te snang bar 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg
356a7(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad byas pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs ston par mdzad do/ / sa bon brgyan gyi sbyin sreg gis nad thams cad zhi bar byed do// 'bras so ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni rgyal po dbang
356b1(rgyud 'bum): du byed do/ / phub ma dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg gis ni zhes 'gras par byed do// 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg gis ni sems can thams cad dbang du byed do// yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zhun mar
356b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sbyin sreg gis ni gnod sbyin 'gugs so/ / ka ra wI ra'i me tog dang gu gul zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg gis ni srin mo 'gugs so// de bzhin du 'dir las thams cad byed do// sbyin sreg gis
356b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / / ri mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste/ kun tu thun mong sgrub pa'i mchog/ dge ba'i las kun byed pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad
356b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong 'gyur zhing / / bla med bsod nams chen po sogs// don yod rgyal po de nyid ni// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu// 'jig rten 'dren pa snang bar bya// mthu dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa'i//
356b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'dren pa'i gzugs bya ba// grub pa sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas// so so'i gzugs su bya ba ni// ras sam yang na dar dag la// 'jigs pa med pa'i gzugs bya'o// don yod pa'i rgyal po ni
356b6(rgyud 'bum): khru gang tsam gyi tshad dam/ yang na tshad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ pad+ma'i mdog lta bu/ phyag brgyad pa/ dbu gsum pa/ de bzhin du spyan gsum pa/ zhi ba'i zhal du bri bar bya ste/ de bzhin du zhags pa
356b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / mdung me gsum pa dang / ril ba spyi blugs 'dzin pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / be con dang / dbugs 'byin pa dang / bgra ba 'phreng dang / me tog thum po 'dzin
357a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / g.yon du ni dkar mo'o// g.yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma thal mo sbyar la dbu yid tsam 'dud pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
357a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug ni ral pa'i thor tsugs can/ dbu rgyan 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ g.yas phyogs kyi dbu zla ba ches pas brgyan pa/ ri dgas kyi pags pa bsnams pa/ mchod phyir thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad
357a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang dang ldan pa'o// nang rim du pad+ma'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa gnyis par rdo rje 'phreng ba lcags kyu dang bcas par bya'o// rim pa gsum par nor bu rim po che'i 'phreng ba dang rin po che sna tshogs
357a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes pa'o/ / rim pa bzhi par mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'o// rim pa lnga par kun nas 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'o// steng dang g.yas phyogs kyi gnas su dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /
357a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o// g.yon du gzhon nu dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu rnams bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs thogs par bya'o//
357a6(rgyud 'bum): lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa bya ba ni khros pa/ gtum pa'i gzugs 'chang ba/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs pa/ sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral
357a7(rgyud 'bum): pa 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas pa zla bas brgyan cing ral gri 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa dang / dgra sta 'dzin par
357b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dkar mo'i rgyab tu rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbu gsum pa bya ba ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dbu rgyan rgyal ba 'od dpag med can thogs pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ nor bu rin
357b2(rgyud 'bum): po che chen po 'dzin par bya'o/ / 'og tu pho nya mo dang / dbyangs can dang / dung can ma dang / dpal mo dang / gnas ma dang / dpe med ma dang / ral pa gcig ma dang / pho nya mo zhi ba dang / lo tog gi lha
357b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / sa'i lha dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o// steng dang g.yas g.yon du sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs skyil mo krung bcas pa sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam bya'o// nyi ma dang zla ba'i lha rgyu skar dang bcas
357b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bya'o/ / ri mo'i gzugs kyi phyi rol gyi// rnam pa kun tu phyag rgya dang // phyag mtshan sna tshogs rdzogs par bri'o// klu brgyad bya zhing kun nas 'khor ba dang bcas par bya'o// rig sngags dngos grub
357b5(rgyud 'bum): bla med pa'i/ / ri mo'i cho ga'i gnas 'di ni// sdig pa thams cad mod la sel// mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar byed// phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i ri mo'i gzugs grub pa 'di ni spyi'i
357b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs thams cad du 'jug pa ston pa yin no/ / spyi'i rigs thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas
357b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / don yod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ri mo 'di ni thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i de kho na nyid snying por gyur pa de kho na nyid
358a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba 'di mthong ba tsam gyis rnam par thar pa thob cing lung bstan par 'gyur ro/ / mthong ba tsam gyis cho ga zhib mo bla na med pa thams cad 'grub po// rnam par snang mdzad
358a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang ldan par snang ba bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / dkyil 'khor chen po 'khor bcas kyi/
358a3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags cho ga bla med pa// spyi rigs yang dag 'byung ba ni// thub pa rnam snang mdzad kyis bstan// de bzhin gshegs rigs grub pa dang // gang yang pad+ma'i rigs de bzhin// nor rigs de nyid
358a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba dang / / rdo rje'i rigs gang bla med pa// spyi rigs 'di nyid mthong ba ni// ri mo mthong ba'i khyad par yin// phyir yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing // dmyal ba ngan 'gro'i sgo bcad de// mtho rigs kyi
358a5(rgyud 'bum): nisgo yang phye/ / bla na med pa ston pa yi// phyag rgya'i ri mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di// bsod nams bla na med pa yin// ci ste don yod pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs mthong bar 'dod na// rig sngas
358a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang des tsan dan dkar po las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam la/ gnad kyi gnas kyi cha'i sor tshad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ dbu dang
358a7(rgyud 'bum): mgur dang / rked pa dang / pus mo dang / yan lag dang / zhabs kyi tshigs dang / phyag sor dang / phyag sor gyi tshigs dang / sen mo thams cad mnyam zhing mdzes pa dang / ral pa dang sen mo tshad
358b1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu 'byes shing cod pan gyi rgyal ba'i g.yas phyogs na zla gam zhi ba'i gzugs can/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi shin tu mdzes pa dang / dbu skra shin mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i
358b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang ldan pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa 'od dpag med can/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa dang / dbugs 'byin cing rtag tu mchog sbyin par mdzad pa/
358b3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// sgrol ma dang dkar mo 'ang 'od 'dom gang dang bcas par dgod do// mgon po shin tu mdzes pa nor bu dang mu tig gi rgyan gyi mtshams su gser gyi rgyan gyis g.yog
358b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cod pan nam/ yang na spyi gtsug tu ring bsrel bzhag par byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing / gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ga pur gyis mchod la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po
358b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i dbus su pad+ma ge sar dang bcas pa 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ de'i dbus su 'jigs pa med pas 'jig rten dbang phyug dar gyi cod pan gyis bcings pa bzhag la/ a ka ru dang
358b6(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan gyi bdug pa dbul zhing me tog dgram par bya/ mo tog gi 'phreng bas mchod par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus byas pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas smyung ba byas la/
358b7(rgyud 'bum): mgon mo 'jig rten dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/ mchod yon dang lha bshos phul la byams pa'i sems la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
359a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom mo/ / sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang bsgom zhing / gtam gzhan la mi smra bar shin tu yongs su sbyang ba legs par spyod cing / gzhan
359a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa med pas bdag bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba bsrung ba dang bcas pa'ang byas la/ bzlas brjod de nyid stong rtsa brgyad dang / phyag rgya rang stong rtsa brgyad brtsa
359a3(rgyud 'bum): na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'bar zhing g.yo ba dang / bdag kyang 'bar ba dang snying dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mchog sbyin par mdzad
359a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag brkyang nas spyi bor bzhag ste legs so legs so/ / rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis mchod pa dam pa dang gsang sngags kyi cho ga chen po byas so// sgrub pa dam pa byas so// de bzhin gshes
359a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i spyi'i rigs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi cho ga zhib mo gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dang / thams cad du spyi'i dngos grub rig sngags 'chang
359a6(rgyud 'bum): khyod la 'grub kyis/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rjes su zung zhig dang / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa de ltar 'dod pa dang / mchog thams cad ji ltar yid la bsams pade
359a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rjes su sbyin no/ / 'di ni khyod kyi skye ba'i 'khor ba tha ma yin te/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mngal du gnas pa las yongs su grol ba 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas
359b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// mngon sum du chos nyan par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying
359b2(rgyud 'bum): po la gnas kyi bar tshe'i tshad bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med grangs med bgrang du med par 'gyur ro zhes tshig tu gsung ngo / / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis khro bo'i rgyal po gang la khro bo'i rgyal pos me tog gam/
359b3(rgyud 'bum): cod pan la mngon par gtor na/ des na 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi skur bzhugs te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro zhing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
359b4(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin 'thob po/ / yangs pa chen pos rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// sku gzugs sgrub pa de kho na nyid ces pa 'di gal te rig sngags 'chang skal
359b5(rgyud 'bum): ba chung ba/ mnar med par gzhol ba/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa des lan cig nges par bsgrubs pa tsam gyis mdun du rang gi gzugs kyis nges par mchis par bgyi'o// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams
359b6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas la sdang bas khrag dbyung bar sems bskyed pa des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i dam
359b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs te rig sngags 'chang sgrub na rmi lam du bdag gis gzugs mthong ba sral bar bgyi zhing / yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// mchog thams cad
360a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su stsal bar bgyi zhing / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par bgyi'o// dri ma med par rnam par thar pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge
360a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'thob po/ / sad nas 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'os chen po gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye bo thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba chen por 'gyur ro// sgrib pa dang bral zhing rnam par dag pasgo
360a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu dri ma med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i lus yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / sems can gang dag gis de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang
360a4(rgyud 'bum): bral zhing nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / gdol pas kyang dad pa dang gus pas sgrub pa rnam pa gsum dang / cho ga gzhan gyis kyang nges par yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi/ rang
360a5(rgyud 'bum): gi gzugs kyis mthong ba stsal bar bgyi na/ mir gyur pa dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba sdom brtson can gyis lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ dran pa tsam gyis bdag rang gi gzugs kyis mdun du mchis par bgyi zhing /
360a6(rgyud 'bum): yid la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ste/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis skyed par mi bya'o// de lta mod kyi bcom ldan 'das sems can tshe gcig pu pa de la rig sngags sgrub pa'i dngos
360a7(rgyud 'bum): grub rjes su stsal bar bdag gis rngo mi thogs lags so/ / gang yang phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang ba'i sems can ser sna can/ sems gya gyu ba/ yid gnyis su
360b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ ngo gnyis can/ ser sna can/ byas pa mi gzo ba/ pha rol gyi rdzas la brkam chags can/ gsang sngags rku ba/ yi ge rku ba/ gdug pa/ phrag dog che ba/ khengs pa/ gzhan gyi rdzas 'phrog pa/
360b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhan po dang slob dpon phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor bla ma la ma gus pa/ rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di ston pa la ma gus pa nyid brkam chags can/ byas pa mi gzo ba nyid dag 'byung ste/ sems can de dag la
360b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyang bar bstan pa 'am/ dngos grub bstan par rngo mi thogs lags so// bdag la'ang brnyas par bgyid pa'i sems can de lta bu mang du 'byung ste/ bdag la'ang sun par bgyid pa/ bdag la'ang ma
360b4(rgyud 'bum): gus par bgyid pa/ kun nas mnar sems dang sdang bas khrag 'byin par bgyid pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdag la'ang 'khu bar bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor /
360b5(rgyud 'bum): spyi'i rigs kyi dam tshig sun 'byin par bgyid pa'i sems can de ni smad par 'os pa zhes brjod par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo dang / dam tshig kun nas 'joms par bgyid pa'i gdol pa zhes
360b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po dang / gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor kun
360b7(rgyud 'bum): nas 'joms pa zhes rig par bgyi'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya kun nas 'joms pa zhes rig par
361a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de dag gis bdag la smad pas sems can de dag sdig pa gdol pa zhes bgyi ste/ dge slong dag dang / rig sngags 'chang de dag ni smad par 'os par rig par bgyi'o//
361a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig pa ka ba tshig pa lta bu/ rig sngags nyams pa/ log 'dren gyis zin pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad kyis smad pa zhes bgyi'o// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa chud gzan pa/
361a3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags nyams pa/ dmyal bar gzhol ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/ bdag gis yongs su spangs pa ma lags so// de lta mod kyi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su
361a4(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spangs pa/ rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya thams cad spangs pa/ thub pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam
361a5(rgyud 'bum): tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig yongs su spangs pas/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang sdang ba thams cad kyis zin cing nad kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag gis ma nongs te/
361a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis yongs su ma spangs so// de lta mod kyi rig sngags bsregs pa/ dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig bsregs pa/ phyag rgya byed pa dang bcas par bsregs pa/ gsang ba bsregs pa/ de bzhin gshes
361a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig dang rigs sun par byed pa/ sdig pa'i dge slong mang po de dag ni des na bskal pa mang po rdul phra mo bsags pa'i bskal par sdug bsngal nyams su myong ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig
361b1(rgyud 'bum): rten pha rol gyi bde ba can med do/ / de lta bas na sems can rig sngags kyi ched du rig sngags rjes su sems pas byams pa'i sems su bya'o// gang gi drung du phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye/
361b2(rgyud 'bum): pab dang / rig sngags gsang ba rnyed par 'gyur ba de la des gus pa chen po dang / bla mar bgyi ba chen po bskyed par bgyi/ pa dang ma dang 'dra ba'i sems bskyed par bgyi/ pha dang ma'i gus par bgyi/
361b3(rgyud 'bum): ston pa'i gus pa bgyi/ rang gi sha dang / khrag dang / rkang yang gtang bar bgyi/ gos dang / rgyan dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / stan dang / bgo bas rim gro dang mchod pa bgyi ste/ de la ni
361b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis mchod par bgyi/ rje dpon dang bla mar bgyi'o// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag gis gzugs mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rgyun du rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/
361b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba ni/ ji ltar chab kyi nang du til mar gyi thigs pa stsal ba ltar dngos grub kun tu mchi bar bgyi/ rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs bzhin du thams cad du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag gis
361b6(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa dang lcags kyus dmyal ba thams cad drang bar bgyi/ bde bar gshegs pa'i lam la so sor gzhag par bgyi/ stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid chen po 'jug par bgyi/
361b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du sgrub pa dang / dngos grub dang / mchog stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas tsan dan gyi gzugs 'di mthong bas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi gzugs mthong ste/ de mtshungs
362a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ bdag rang gi gzugs kyis rgyun kho nar gnas par bgyi'o// gang na cho ga 'di gnas pa de mchod rten dang bcas pa der mtshungs par rig par bgyi'o//
362a2(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs de ni ston pa bla ma bzhugs pa'i gnas su rig par bgyi'o// gang na dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i dam tshig gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi gnas so zhes rig par
362a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rmad du byung ba zhes rig par gagyi'o// lha thams cad kyi gnas dang dam tshig go zhes rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi gnas byang chub kyi snying
362a4(rgyud 'bum): po dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang dag par ston pa'i gnas so zhes rig par bgyi'o// sa phyogs 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal
362a5(rgyud 'bum): med khang gi gnas bkod pas brgyan par rig par bgyi ste/ de la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas de'i 'og tu gnas thams cad du gtogs pa'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma chen po'i rnam par
362a6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa'i gnas byed par 'dod pa dang / dgos pa thams cad byed par 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des dri sna tshogs las 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs sor bcu drug pa shin tu mdzes pa/
362a7(rgyud 'bum): sku shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ phyag drug pa/ de bzhin du zhal gsum pa bya ste/ dang po ni zhi ba'i zhal ras can/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med
362b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam can no// zhal g.yas pa ni khro bo'i rgyal po'i gzugs can khros pa/ gzugs bsgyur ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs can gyi steng gi ral pa la 'od dpag med pa'i
362b2(rgyud 'bum): dbu rgyan 'chang ba/ zla gam g.yas phyogs na gnas pa'o// g.yon pa ni zhal khro gnyer can/ khros pa'i lta stangs su lta ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tsugs 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyan 'chang
362b3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ g.yas phyogs bla gam can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis legs par brgyan pa/ zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma thogs pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs pa/ dgra sta thogs pa/ dbus
362b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byin pa/ rin po che'i dbyug pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma thal mo sbyar cing 'dud pa'o// g.yon na dkar mo thal mo sbyar te yid tsam du 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad
362b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bya'o// zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag na me tog thogs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
362b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag la kha bltas nas pus mo btsugs te 'dug par bya'o/ / lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon rtsis tshud dang tshad ma 'dres par spyan dang / smin ma dang / mchu dang / sen mo'i gnas kyi gnas su sbyang bar
362b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / / 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu pa// de nas rdzas bshad par bya ste/ 'jigs pa med pas spos kyi
363a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs tsan dang / ta ga ra dang / pu shel ci dang / li shi dang / nag puSh+pa dang / sbri ka dang / rgya skegs dang / kha bar+Ni kha dang / spang spos dang / na lad dang / gur kum dang
363a2(rgyud 'bum): gla rtsi dang / ka pur dang / smon shing dang / gnad s+thi yang ku dang / kun tu ru dang / sha kha ra dang / pad+ma ge sar dang / du ru ka dang / til mar dang / spra tshil dang lhan cig sbyar ba'i bye ma zhib mo shin tu
363a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jam pa/ shin tu gnyen pa/ mchog 'di gtsang ba gtsang sbra spyod pas thub pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dges shing shin tu dul ba/ rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par shin tu mdzes par bya'o//
363a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas lan gcig bsgrubs pa ni mchog yin te/ 'di yongs su rdzogs nas khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad la mngon du gtor te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis las
363a5(rgyud 'bum): brtsam mo/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ shin tu khrus byas la dris byugs pas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi shin tu mdzes pa gsal ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam gyi dkyil
363a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzang po legs par byugs pa shin tu gsal bar bya'o/ / dri sna tshogs kyis byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa la tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis dbus su las kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bri bar
363a7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'dir pad+ma'ang bya ste/ 'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa ges ra dang snying por bcas pa/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu bzang ba tsan dan dang gur kum gyis bri bar bya ste/ der tshon rtsi gzhan ni spyad par mi bya'o//
363b1(rgyud 'bum): bum pa spos chus bkang ba dang / de bzhin du dri chu dang gtor ma thams cad dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa dang / ci yod pa'i gtor ma bzhag ste/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba ni gnas sam/ dgon pa 'am/
363b2(rgyud 'bum): khyim mam/ gang du gnas par gyur pa der khru gang tshad dam/ khru do 'am/ khru gsum mam/ lhag par yang bya'o// de bzhin du bdug spos dang / tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / du ru ka dang / kun tu ru'o//
363b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dan kha dog sna tshogs pas dkyil 'khor kun nas brgyan par bya'o// me tog 'phreng ba dgram bya zhing // dri dang byug pa de nyid dang // kun tu mar me'i 'phreng bya'o// de nas dri las byas pa'i 'phags pa spyan
363b4(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su pad+ma'i ge sar gyi steng du bzhag pa la/ rig sngags 'chang mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas gzhan mi smra bar bzlas brjod brgyad stong
363b5(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya'o/ / brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku las 'od zer sna tshogs 'byung zhing sa cher g.yo bar 'gyur// rang gi lag pa g.yas pa 'bar bar 'gyur ro//
363b6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan las rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so// khyod kyis 'dod pa'i las thams cad grub pa'o// don yod pa chen po'i 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul ba'i dngos grub dang / thams cad du dgos pa grub
363b7(rgyud 'bum): pa de kho na nyid grub po/ / khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di mchog tu grub pa'o// khyod kyis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgya cher mchog tu grub po zhes sgra 'byung ngo // de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dgos pa yongs su
364a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ji ltar dgos par bya ste/ slob ma gzhug pa dang dam tshig ni 'dir dgos pa zhes bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe dri
364a2(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa'i mgon po la sngar mchod pa bya ste/ de nas dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mdun du bzhag la/ bzlas brjod brgyad brgya byas na dgos pa sna
364a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rmi lam du ston cing / ji ltar bsams pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ de'i mdun du tsan dan dkar po las dkyil 'khor byas la/ tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// de nas thal ba la bzlas
364a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ rang gi lus mtha' dag khyab par bsku zhing / thal ba de nyid dang yungs kar gyi byugs pa phyogs bzhir gtor na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs ji lta ba de ltar 'jig rten thams cad
364a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis mngon sum du mthong ste/ ji srid du phyir bsdu ba ma byas pa de srid du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugasu snang bar 'gyur ro// dri chu dang yungs kar gyis mngon du phyogs par gtor na phyir bsdu ba byas par 'gyur ro//
364a6(rgyud 'bum): thal ba des rab tu bdugs te/ dur khrod kyi nang du zhugs na 'byung po'i bdag po dpung dang 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za
364a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mdun na nye bar gnas shing dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag dang nor gyis bgyi ba ci mchis zhes bya ba byed do// rang la byugs te tshogs kyi nang ngam/ dge 'dun gyi nang du zhugs na ston pa
364b1(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba ji lta ba de ltar de rig sngags 'chang snang zhing mthong ste/ mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro// phyag bya ba'i 'os su 'gyur ro// don dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// thal bas lus
364b2(rgyud 'bum): bskus te klu'i mtshor zhugs na klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur zhing / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur/ rang la byugs
364b3(rgyud 'bum): te rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs na/ rgyal po'i btsun mo dang 'khor du bcas pa rnams dbang du 'gyur te/ ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed cing mdun na nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi bla ma ji lta ba de bzhin du
364b4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ don chen po dang mchod pa chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ ston pa dang / 'dren pa ji lta ba bzhin no// gang dang gang la thal
364b5(rgyud 'bum): bas reg pa tsam gyis de dang de'i nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad bcad par 'gyur/ mchog tu bde ba dang ldan
364b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// byas pa mi gzo ba/ gsang sngags kyi gdol pa/ ma gus pa/ bla mar mi byed pa/ rlom sems can/ nga rgyal
364b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi phyogs pa/ skyes bu gti mug can bsogs pa la zhen pa/ khengs pa/ nga rgyal can de dag gis gang du'ang dngos grub yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de dag yun ring por thar pa
365a1(rgyud 'bum): mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / gang yang rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis spang ba/ skye ba brgyud pa
365a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rgyud la dngos grub bsregs pa/ 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol chud gson pa dag ni ma gtogs te/ de lta mod kyi 'dir bdag gis cung zad kyang ma nongs te/ sdug bsngal mang po dang chen po'i sems
365a3(rgyud 'bum): can dgrol bar rngo mi thogs lags so/ / sangs rgyas thugs rje chen pos bka' stsal pa'i yid la bgyi ba bskal pa grangs par yid la bgyis pas dgrol bar rngo thogs lags so// de lta mod kyi
365a4(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal mang po brgyud par nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / dngos grub ni byams pas 'thob ste/ byams pa dang gsang sngags kyi go cha bgos pa/ byams pa'i ral gri thogs pa/ sems can thams cad
365a5(rgyud 'bum): la phan zhing mnyes gshin pa la de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag 'jig rten 'dren pas rjes su gnang ngo / / mgon po 'di mthong ba tsam gyis spos kyis gzugs kyi 'jig rten mgon po mthong ba dang
365a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'dren pa rang gi gzugs su mngon sum du mthong ba mtshungs pa nyid du khong du chud par bgyi'o/ / sangs rgyas bye ba gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa mngon sum du mthong ba kho na dang / 'jig rten gyi
365a7(rgyud 'bum): mgon po mthong ba mtshungs pa kho nar khong du chud par bgyi ste/ 'di ltar shes par bya'o// de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags
365b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po chen po 'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba'i rig sngags 'chang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas
365b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thob par 'dod pa dang / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gnas mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dkyil

365b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ snying po dang bcas/ bya ba dang bcas pa des myur ba dang / shin tu myur ba dang / mgyogs par 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba gsang ba bstan par mthong
365b5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'di la som nyi dang nem nur bskyed par mi bya'o// the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gser gyi mdog can
365b6(rgyud 'bum): sor bzhi'i tshad tsam tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa bya ste/ shin tu tshad dang ldan pa/ cha byad mdzes pa/ cha shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ phyag gnyis pa/ sman
365b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa/ 'od dpag med pa'i dbu rgyam can/ g.yas na zla ba tshes pa/ phyag gson na pad+ma dang ril ba spyi thugs bsdams pa/ phyag g.yas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ sku'i nang ga pur dang / rma rtsi
366a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / ring bsrel gyis bkang ba/ g.yas na lha mo sgrol ma dngul las byas pa thal mo sbyar te yid tsam 'dud pa/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / g.yon na dngul las dkar
366a2(rgyud 'bum): mo thal mo sbyar te/ yid tsam 'dud pa pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par bya'o// steng gi g.yas phyogs na 'od dpag med skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa dang / g.yon na shAkya'i rgyal po skyil mo krung bcas te
366a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o/ / 'od 'dom gang dang bcas pas legs par brgyan par bya zhing / gnad dang gnad shin tu rnam par 'byes pa/ skra dang / dpral ba dang / smin ma dang / shangs dang / snyan
366a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhal dang / mgul pa dang / dpung pa dang / nu ma dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang / zhabs dang / phyag gi sor mo mnyam zhing thams cad mdzes pa/ sku chu zheng gab
366a5(rgyud 'bum): cing mtho dman ran pa/ mchod phyir thogs dkar 'chang bar bya'o// las shin tu yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu mthar phyin pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs zin par rig
366a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rgyu skar bzang po'i zla ba nya'am/ tshes brgyad dam/ bco lnga 'am/ bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ rgyu skar bkra shis pa rgyal gyi nyis dang mthun pa rnyed nas dkyil
366a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bsgrub par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor shin tu mdzes par bya ba ni gru bzhi la cha legs par phye ba/ ko la'i tshad tsam la them skas bzhis brgyan pa/ khru gsum par rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ chung bar
366b1(rgyud 'bum): dang lhag par ni mi bya'o/ / legs par byugs pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ snyi ba/ mnyen pa/ dbyibs legs pa la tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye zhing dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab pa ni shin tu
366b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'byes pa/ sgo bzhi pa la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi snying por pad+ma'i rig kyi dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su cha rnam pa dbyel
366b3(rgyud 'bum): lho'i grwa'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshon sna tshogs kyi bri'o/ / de nas byang gi grwar bri ba ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o// de nas nub kyi glar bri ba
366b4(rgyud 'bum): ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyis rnam par bkra bar bri'o/ / de nas shar gyi grwar glang po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rtag tu shin tu mdzes pa dang / shin tu gsal
366b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bri'o/ / shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor ri bo bo Ta la me tog dang shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa ri'i lha dang bcas pa bri'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ri rab klu'i rgyal po dga' bo
366b6(rgyud 'bum): dang nye dga' bos kun nas dkris pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha bri'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor ni spos kyi ngad ldang dri za'i tshogs kyis gang ba/ shing ljon pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu mdzes pa
366b7(rgyud 'bum): bri'o/ / nub phyogs kyi sgor ri ti se lha rnams kyi gnas me tog sna tshogs dang / 'khri shing dang / shing ljon pa sna tshogs mchog gis rtag tu gang ba bri'o// legs par zin nas kun tu ni// mdung rtse
367a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i 'bar 'phreng ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje'i rigs nyid bzhag go// nor bu'i rigs su de bzhin gshegs pa bzhag cing /
367a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / thams cad du rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhag na spyi'i rigs 'grub po// lha mo sgrol ma ni ri bo po Ta la la bzhag go/ ri rab la ni gos dkar mo'o// dpe med ma ni ti se'i rtse mor ro//
367a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrol ma bdun ni spos kyi ngad ldang la bzhag go/ shar phyogs kyi sgor pho nya mo zhi ba mo pho nya mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor ni srin mo ral pa gcig ma srin mo bdun gyis yongs su bskor
367a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / nub phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje lu gu rgyud yugu rgyad bdun gyis yong su bskor ba'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor khro gnyer can gyi rgyal po khro gnyer can bdun gyi yongs su bskor ba'o// de nas 'jigs pa med pra
367a5(rgyud 'bum): mgon po 'jig rten gyi bla ma'i gzugs gser gyi mdog can ring bsrel dang ldan pas don yod pa'i rgyal po rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag par bya'o/ /

373a4(rgyud 'bum): a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM/ sarba ta thA ga tA bi She kai ra/ b+ha ga bAn/ a mo g+ha rA dza hUM phaT/ na mo sU te swAhA/ khro bo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// oM bi kri ta doSh+Te/ a mo g+ha sa ma ye a b+hi Shiny+tsa mAM/ sarba
373a5(rgyud 'bum): bid+yA a mo g+ha a b+hi She kai ra hUM mi li mi li swA hA/ de khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa chen po'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu/ de nas ri
373a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po po Ta la rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yo bar brtsam te klu'i tshogs ni 'khrugs so/ / lha'i tshogs thams cad ni dga' bar gyur to// sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log
373a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren ni 'bar bar gyur to/ / bdud la sogs pa sdang ba ni yang dag par rab tu zhi bar gyur to// ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad ni mchog tu dga'
373b1(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur to/ / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad dang / gdon thams cad ni mi snang bar gyur to// nad thams cad ni rab tu zhi'o// rims thams cad las ni rnam par grol lo// nyon mong
373b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo/ / me tog gi char chen po rab tu bab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyur to// sems can thams cad ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las
373b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su grol bar gyur to/ / de nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor la brten pa'i lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag
373b4(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la tshig gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin te legs so legs so/ / snying rje chen po can mchog tu don yod pa'i rig sngags 'di smras zin gyis// de bzhin gshegs
373b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs tham cad dang / rigs spyi'i dam tshig dang / snying po dang / khro bo'i de kho na nyid gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga don yod pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor rab tu smros shig/
373b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bshad
373b7(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa shin tu mdzes pa/ ko la'i tshad tsam shin tu 'byes pa'i grwa bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang / them skas bzhi dang / rta babs dang / mda'i kha khyer dang / kun nas rdo rje'i rnam
374a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dag kyang bya ste/ tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa'i thig skud kyis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o// ri mo mkhan gtsang mas snod gsar pa dang pir gtsang mas dkyil
374a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dam pa legs par bri'o/ / dkyil 'khor snying po rnams dbye ba// dbus su legs par rnam phye la// kun nas pad+ma'i 'phreng ba dang // rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa dgod// dbus su 'khor
374a3(rgyud 'bum): lo rtag bri ba/ / shin tu blta sdug 'khor lo dgod// dbus der rgyal ba gzhag par bya// shAkya'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// g.yas su khro bo'i rgyal po yi// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'dren pa po//
374a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du rdo rje 'dzin gzhag pa// rnga yab rdo rje lag thogs gzhag/ de'i 'og tu 'od zer dang ldan par bya ba ni lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / go cha dang / dbyug pa dang / zhags pa dang / ragra sta
374a5(rgyud 'bum): gu rgyud can dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / glegs bam mo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu dkar sham chen mo dang / gos dkar mo dang / dkar mo chen mo ral pa can dang /
374a6(rgyud 'bum): dbyug pa dang / ril ba skyi blugs phyag na thogs pa bya'o// de'i 'og tu srin mo ralnga pa gcig ma zhes bya ba ni mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'jigs su rung zhing mi sdug pa/ sbrul se ral khar thogs pa
374a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas pa na rdo rje dang dgra sta/ g.yon pa'i sor mo gcig lha ma yin dang log 'dren la bsdigs shing khrag 'dzag pa'i mgo'i tso to nas 'dzin pa dang / khrag gi snod yongs su 'dzin pa/ glang
374b1(rgyud 'bum): po che'i pags pa rlon pa'i stod g.yogs 'phyang ba dang smad g.yogs can bya'o/ / mtha'i grwar pad+ma dang rdo rje gzhag pa ni 'bar ba'i 'breng ba can shin tu bzang po gzhag par bya'o// shar phyogs kyi sgor
374b2(rgyud 'bum): rje 'jigs byed mig de'i sku 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can gzhag par bya'o/ / lho phyogs kyi sgor ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i log 'dren de nyid rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa phyag na thogs par bya'o//
374b3(rgyud 'bum): nuchu phyogs kyi sgor pad+ma chen po'i rigs mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i log so bya ba ni phyag na pad+ma thogs par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo zhes bya ba'i tshogs rdo rje dang zhags pa phyag na thogs pa'o//
374b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'jug pa'i sgor tsan dan gyi chu gur kum dang / gla rtsi dang / ka pur gyis bsgos pa'i chus bum pa bkang la ras dkar pos dkris shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa rin po che sna bdun can rtag tu gzhag par bya'o//
374b5(rgyud 'bum): ji snyed pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs yongs su bshams pas kyang mchod par bya/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor legs par brgyan par bya'o// bdug spos kyis bkang ba dang / mar me'i 'phreng ba dang /
374b6(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / pri dang / byug pas mchod par bya'o// ji srid 'jug gi bar du slob ma rnams tshogs bsrungs la/ de nas don yod pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya zhing don yod pa'i khro bo'i dbang bskur bar bya'o//
374b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba tsam gyis kyang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi mgon po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad
375a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dam tshig gi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang dngos grub thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// gang bsam pa dgang bcol ba de thams
375a2(rgyud 'bum): cad 'byor par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du dam tshig thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du
375a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa dang / gdug pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha dang / lha ma yin dang /
375a4(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / gsang ba pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi gnas phug dri ma med pa dang / nam mkha'i rjes su rgyu ba dang / chu na rgyu ba dang / nags dang skyed mos tshal dang na spyod pa'i
375a5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i drug cha la thams cad du dbang bar 'gyur ro/ / gsang ba pa thams cad kyang 'di'i mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// gang zhig de la mi phan par 'dod pa'i lha dang /
375a6(rgyud 'bum): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang rig sngags 'chang la mi phan par sems pa de thams cad
375a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi de dag gi gnas dang lus nyid rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir sdig pa rnams 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / de nas dngul las khro bo'i rgyal po sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam byas te/ shin tu mdzes pa/ shin tu tshad dang
375b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs bcings pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu brgyan can/ zla ba dbu la thogs pa/ zhal dang po khro bo'i gzugs/ g.yon pa dang
375b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa zhi ba'i gzugs/ zhal cung bad 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa/ zhags pa 'dzin pa/ ral gri dang mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su lha mo sgrol ma me tog
375b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ / g.yon du lha mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo nor bu rin po che chen po 'bul ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi drung du rig
375b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang pus mo btsugs pa/ lag na pog por dang bgrang 'phreng thogs te bcom ldan 'das la lta ba'o// gzugs brnyan de nyid kyi mdun na tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bya zhing gur kum gyi
375b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khro bo'i rgyal po bzhag ste/ de'i spyan sngar bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// de nas gzugs brnyan de 'gul zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// 'chag par 'gyur/
375b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur/ tshig 'byin par 'gyur/ legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur/ phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur/ yid la bsams pa dang mchog thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
375b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang de'ang bdag nyid 'bar bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur zhing don yod par yangs par snang ba/ dngos grub dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngag
376a1(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi 'khor los sbyar bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad po rnams kyi gtso bo dang rgyal por 'gyur ro// tshe lha'i bskal
376a2(rgyud 'bum): ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/ / bskal pa'i mjug rdzogs te de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ji ltar bde ba can bzhin du
376a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhal med khang gi rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur zhing / tshe'i tshad bskal pa dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / cho ga
376a4(rgyud 'bum): zhib mo thams cad kyi chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa ni de nyid kyi spyan sngar bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o// bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i mod la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
376a5(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug khro bo'i rgyal po rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten pa'i cho ga zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / mig 'phrul dang /
376a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhad gang dang / phu rabs gdab pa dang / bsreg pa dang / 'phang ba dang / gsad pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgyu ma bstan pa dang / bdag bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / mi snang ba'i cho ga
376a7(rgyud 'bum): sba ba dang / nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / sa ga'i sba ba dang / rgya ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / chu ba rgal ba dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las brgal ba dang / rmongs byed dang /
376b1(rgyud 'bum): rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / bcing ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po bskyod pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / shi ba gso ba dang / zla ba dang nyi ma dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / bden pa bstan pa
376b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / nad la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dgug pa dang / srin po dgug pa dang / 'byung po dgug pa dang / k+Sha dang lnga dkrug
376b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dgug pa dang / gtang ba dang / dgos pa la sogs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mod la dngos grub tham
376b4(rgyud 'bum): cad thob par 'gyur/ las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// bklag pa tsam gyis las dang / dngos grub dang / sgrub pa thams cad ston par 'gyur/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol
376b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / sdang ba'i sems can thams cad phyir zlog par 'gyur ro// dran pa tsam gyis mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur te/
376b6(rgyud 'bum): skal ba ngan pa dang / nor chung za ba dang / mi 'grub pa dang / sdig pa'i rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa gzhig par bya ba la mchog tu grub pa yin no//
376b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal po'i zhabs nas bzung ste/ bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ sngon bsags pa'i bsod nams dang gal ba mngon du 'gyur te/ tshe'i mthar thug gi bar da dpal chen po dang che ba nyams
377a1(rgyud 'bum): su myong bar 'gyur ro/ / zhal du bltas te bzlas brjod stongs brgyad byas nas dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// rked pa'i gnas nas bzung ste bzlas brjod
377a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad byas na sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/ rgyal po btsun mo dang 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ bdag nyid dang nor gyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par
377a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / cod pan la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dbu la bcing na nges par dbang bskur ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o//
377a4(rgyud 'bum): / 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po bam po nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// / de nas phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i
377a5(rgyud 'bum): cho 'phrul gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der nam mkha' las babs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po dang bkur sti mngon du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la
377a6(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas phyag 'tshal te song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
377a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la lha rdzas kyi
377b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa chen pos mchod pa byas so/ / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / rbi dang / 'breng ba dang / thug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lbab lhab dang / sil san dang / reg rdob pa rnam pa su chom
377b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchod nas lan bdun bskor ba byas so/ / ri bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
377b3(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye chen po de dag gis kyang mchod pa byas so// dkyil 'khor gyi lha de dag la'ang mchod pa byas so// 'khor chen po de dag la'ang mchod pa byas so// lhan cig lhags pa'i 'khor de dag
377b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la'ang mchod pa dang / mngon du bstod pa dang / phyag byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yud tsam zhig ci yang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
377b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po lag na rdo rje 'gying bag dang brjid pag gi 'gros kyi langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su song ste phyin nas rdo rje gsor zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
377b6(rgyud 'bum): nas zhabs gnyis mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
377b7(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yong ba'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di shin tu zab pa/
378a1(rgyud 'bum): shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ rgya mtsho chen po lta bu shin tu phab pa/ ri rab chen po lta bur shin tu mi g.yo zhing mi bskul ba/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ shin tu gzung bar
378a2(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba'i phyag rgya mang po dang / gsang sngags mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ri mo'i sku gzugs bri ba mang po dang / sgrub pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
378a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa mang po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur ba mang po la bcom ldan 'das bdag mchog tu ya mtshan du 'gyur na/
378a4(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'gyur bar rngo thogs/ ji ltar nges par gzung bar rngo thogs lags/ gsang sngags tha dad pa dang / phyag rgya tha dad pa dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa tha dad pa dang / ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs tha dad
378a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gtor ma tha dad pa dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang
378a6(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus dang / smyung ba dang / phyag rgya bcing ba dang / rab tu 'jug pa dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / slar gshegs su gsol ba 'am/ nges par gzung ba 'ag/
378a7(rgyud 'bum): dran par bgyi bar rngo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa chen po sems kyi spyod pa rmugs par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams sam/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams sam/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/
378b1(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen nas/ dge bsnyen ma la/ dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'dis
378b2(rgyud 'bum): par gzung bar ji ltar rdo thogs/ rig sngags 'chang de rnams kyis ji ltar sgrub par rngo thogs/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying la mchog tu ya mtshan skyes pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis the tsom gcad ba'i
378b3(rgyud 'bum): slad du bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das the tsom gcod pa'i slad du zhus pa lung bstan tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje
378b4(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / lag na rdo rje dngos grub kyi spyod pa dang gsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs gsang sngags sgrub pa po sgrub pa bsgrub pa la/ gang gi tshe dngos grub las dbugs phyung ba de'i tshe blo gros chen
378b5(rgyud 'bum): bo'i chen por 'bogs par 'gyur/ / dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'grub par 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i chen po dang ldan par 'gyur
378b6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dngos grub chen po'i chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dngos grub gang gis sgrub pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub
378b7(rgyud 'bum): dam pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang la yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gyi byang chub kyi sa bon gyi 'bras bu thob pa yod pa de la lag na rdo rje dngos grub dam pa mchog
379a1(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong sa 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/
379a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan gang su'ang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang gi lag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ring bsrel yungs kar
379a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi 'bru tsam zhig thob par 'gyur la/ des ring bsrel de za ma tog gi nang du bcug ste nyin gcig bzhin du mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / khrus la sogs pa byed cing bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'breng ba dang /
379a4(rgyud 'bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ngag gis mchod pa byed na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub dam pa dang / mchog dang / bla na med pa 'thob par
379a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang dang gang du dgos par sbyar ba de dang der dngos grub chen po mchog tu 'gyur ro// ring bsrel sungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byas pa de rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge sbyong
379a6(rgyud 'bum): ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan bud med dang / skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong phrag gad+hA'i
379a7(rgyud 'bum): klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa la skad cig gcig gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ rjed pa dang / gus pa dang / bstod pa dang / phyag byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
379b1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ de dag gi drung du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi drung du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/
379b2(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan gang su'ang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo de dag de bzhin gshes
379b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan par 'gyur ro// shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//
379b4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang chen po'i dngos grub dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// don yod
379b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rig sngags rim par phye ba'i dngos grub dpag tu med pa 'thob par
379b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje de ltar ring bsrel yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gcig la mchod pa byed pa de yon tan chen po'i chen por brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob par
