380a1(rgyud 'bum): su dris shig dang / dris pa de'i lan ldon par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yid rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba
380a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gangan pa de logs su
380a3(rgyud 'bum): song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bzhin 'dzum pa dang /
380a4(rgyud 'bum): gdong khro gnyer med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mig mi 'dzum par blta zhing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du 'dug nas rdo rje gsor zhing gdong du bltas te rtog cing
380a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dug go/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje khyod
380a6(rgyud 'bum): mi gso bar mdun du 'dug ste rdo rje gsor zhing ngal ci zhig blta/ ci zhig yongs su dri bar 'dod/ tso zhig gsol ba 'debs par 'dod/ lag na rdo rje nga la spros shig/ lag na rdo rje khyod la skabs phyes
380a7(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dris shig dang / dris pa de thams cad lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po 'phags pa
380b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba/ shin tu zab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bam
380b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang sngags mang po dang / phyag rgya mang po dang / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa mang po dang / ras kyi sku gzugs bri ba mang po yongs su bsgrags
380b3(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nges par gzung bar nus/ dngos grub ji ltar shes par bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar zabs che ba/ ri rab dang mtshungs par mi g.yo ba/ nam mkha' ltar mthar thug pa
380b4(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis pa/ shin tu rtogs par dka' ba 'di ji ltar shes par bgyi/ gnas ni gang / 'gro ba ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang / sgrub pa'i gnas ni gang / dngos grub dam pa'i gnas ni ga / snga ma ni
380b5(rgyud 'bum): gang phyi ma ni gang / dbus ni gang / tha ma ni gang lags/ mang du yongs su zhu'o// dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga dang / dam tshig so so
380b6(rgyud 'bum): tha dad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga zhib mo/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa
380b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ste rjes su gzung ba de nges par gzung bar ji ltar nus/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi the tsom chen po dang / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pa de thugs rje chen
381a1(rgyud 'bum): bos bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ ji ltar grub na phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga mtha' dag nges par gzung
381a2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba the tsom gcad pa'i slad du'o/ / sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod
381a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lag na rdo rje yun ring po zhig nas spobs pa gang zhig skyes te nga la yongs su 'dri/ lag na rdo rje nyon gcig dang bshad par bya'o//
381a4(rgyud 'bum): gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni kha dog gcig pa/ rtags gcig pa/ chos gcig la zhugs pa/ dbyings dang / khams dang / snying po
381a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba gcig pa'o// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
381a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sku tshe'i 'du byed sna tshogs pa nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin par
381a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / lung bstan pa sna tshogs pa nyid dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun sna tshogs pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs sna tshogs pa nyid dang /
381b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa nyid du yang dag par shes so// de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje de bzhin du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa byang chub sem
381b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di'ang gcig nyid las de thams cad rjes su 'gro'o// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis rnam
381b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'phrul pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub kyi gnas dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i gnas/ bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la ji lta ji ltar 'dul bar byed pa de lta de ltar dngos
381b4(rgyud 'bum): grub rjes su 'thob cing / de lta de ltar bsam pa dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyu
381b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
381b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de lta de ltar gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin yong su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de lta de ltar dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
381b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rkyen gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug gis ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
382a1(rgyud 'bum): zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge
382a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma rab tu grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i snying po'i
382a3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul la rnam par
382a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa kun tu bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin
382a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shin tu rab tu sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gro ba yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid gnyis yang dag
382a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu phyag rgya'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid la kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil
382a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor yongs su dag pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba 'od zer gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don mad pa kun tu lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / der sod pa drim med
382b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya chen po dbugs 'byin pa don yod pa rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rgyan gyi rgyal
382b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung brgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma'i
382b3(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'dren pa'i lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta
382b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pa dri ma med pa thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu lta ba'i rab tu gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
382b5(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi gtso bo lnga bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin re re la'ang 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa de thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro//

382b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ching bas yon tan de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'chang ba dang / rjod pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum dran
383a1(rgyud 'bum): par byed na/ lag na rdo rje sems can de dngos grub don yod pa 'thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba don yod pa 'thob pa dang / gzungs
383a2(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin don yod pa 'thob pa dang / bsod nams sogs pa don yod pa 'thob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la rnam par 'phrul pa don yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

383a5(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa don yod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bla ma la gus par bya ba don yod pa de'i phyir/ lag na rdo
383a6(rgyud 'bum): rje don yod pa'i zhags pa zhes ming du gdags pa byas na/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang rnams la ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ sems 'khrug par 'gyur/ dran pa dang blo gros rmongs par 'gyur te/
383a7(rgyud 'bum): de'i gnas na mi snang na su zhig smra bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de don yod pa zhags pa'i ming du dmigs so// byang
383b1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes ni don yod pa ste/ ye shes don yod pa gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i ming du dmigs so// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' sems
383b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa ni don yod pa ste/ sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa'o// ye shes gang yin pa de zhags pa'o// de'i snying po'o//

383b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas 'di ni mi snang ngo // lag na rdo rje gzhan yang gzungs kyi sgo du ma 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs 'thob pa des dong yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cha ga zhib mo 'di gas sngags mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /

384a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod
384a2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa lhun po'i snying po yangs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i
384a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don
384a4(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa yangadra ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /
384a5(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i dngos grub ces bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa dri ma med pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i blo rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa'i 'bar ba'i phyag rgya
384a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba don yod pa zhes bya ba'i gzu
384a7(rgyud 'bum): 'thob ste/ gang gis gzungs de rnams thob pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang /
384b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / cho ga zhib mo rgya chen po kha ton du gnas shing thams cad so sor yang dag par shes te/
384b2(rgyud 'bum): gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa la rmongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur/ dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa rmugs par mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'khums par mi 'gyur/ dran
384b3(rgyud 'bum): pa mi brtan par mi 'gyur/ dran pa gzhan du rgyu bar mi 'gyur/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog gi rjes su 'gro bar mi 'gyur/
384b4(rgyud 'bum): dran pa sdig pa can du mi 'gyur/ dran pa 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba byed par mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu blo yangs shing rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i dran pa
384b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / blo rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ro// rtag tu dran pa zab cing rgya mtsho chen po bsags pa lta bur 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs cho ga zhib mo
384b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po de ltar go skabs yangs pa la/ gang gis gzungs 'di thob pa de/ lag na rdo rje ji ltar dran pa rmongs par 'gyur/ gzhan yang tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i lus yongs su dag
384b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / yid yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mdangs yongs su dag pa dang / mig yongs su dag pa dang / rna ba yongs su dag pa dang / sna yongs su dag pa dang /
385a1(rgyud 'bum): lce yongs su dag pa dang / dbang po yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// don mong zhags pa'i snying po bklags pa tsam dang / mnyan pa tsam dang / mthong ba tsam dang / lhag pa'i #
385a2(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis de rnams yon tan gyi phan yon chen po'i chen po 'di 'thob ste/ gang gis mthu 'di rab tu thob pa de la/ lag na rdo rje ji ltar rmongs pa skye bar 'gyur/ de lta mod kyi lag na rdo rje yud tsam
385a3(rgyud 'bum): zhig sdong cig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor mang po 'di'i dbus su ji ltar mngon sum du 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bab par bstan par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying
385a4(rgyud 'bum): po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rdzu 'phrul dam pa'i yul gyi mthu chen po'i chen po bstan par bya'o//
385a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi drung nas don yod pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i
385a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang /
385a7(rgyud 'bum): yid bde ba skyes te/ snying dga' bas dga' ba chen po nyid thob par gyur nas smras pa/ bdag lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pas/ yongs su dga' ba yid la bgyid pas nges par gnas par bgyi'o/
385b1(rgyud 'bum): yid la bgyid pa mchog tu dag pa dang / ngo mtshar du gyur pa dang / som nyid du gyur pa dang bral ba dang / 'gyod pa ma mchis pas gnas par bgyi'o// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub
385b2(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i mthu'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'o//
385b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dri ma med par kun tu snang ba'i nor bu rin po
385b4(rgyud 'bum): che chen po chos kyi dgrub par phul nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas song ste tshad du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing / 'gying bag dang brjid bag gi 'gros
385b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis song nas rang gi stan la 'dug ste bzhin 'dzum pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas snying yongs su dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go// de nas byang chub
385b6(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ngo mtshar mchog tu rmad du byung ba/ snying rje dam pa rgya chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i dmigs pas sems can
385b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/ 'od zer dri ma med par snang ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phul te nam mkha' la 'phags so// byang chub
386a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis nor bu rin po che de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen/
386a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di cher g.yos par gyur to// 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer byung bar gyur to// snang ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems
386a3(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad kyi lus la reg pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs
386a4(rgyud 'bum): su grol bar gyur to/ / gang yang gling bzhi pa'i yi dgas dang dmyal ba de dag la'ang snang ba de snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang
386a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba nyam par skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer
386a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su bar nas rgyan thams kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal
386a7(rgyud 'bum): pa mnyam par pad+ma las rdzus te skyes so/ / grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to// tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur ci
386b1(rgyud 'bum): reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur to// gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dgas dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas
386b2(rgyud 'bum): su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ / sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur
386b3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / su mi 'dod pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcings pa de dag kyang dum bur gyur to// gang snod ma yin pa de'ang 'od zer de phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob bo//
386b4(rgyud 'bum): gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna ma tshangs pa'ang 'od zer de phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag par gyur to// gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dang /
386b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog gi shing ljon pa'i shing ljon pa yongs su bskams par gyur pa'ang 'od zer de reg pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs
386b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed
386b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng ge'i khri dang bcas pa'i zhal med khang byung bar gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'ong
387a1(rgyud 'bum): zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcu kun tu rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshom
387a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / gser gyi spang ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo//
387a3(rgyud 'bum): tshon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po// lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu
387a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bab po/ / lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu 'bab po// tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab po// lha rdzas
387a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ba Ta sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a d+hi muk+ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / s+ya snar dang / ka dam pa dang /

387a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi khang pa rtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa/ ka ba bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ shin tu 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan gyis yongs su bskor cing mu//
387b1(rgyud 'bum): gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa// gser gyi dril bu sgo rdzom 'phyang gagos sna tshon kyi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ g+hur lha rdzas kyi rdzal pa
387b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo // nam mkha'i dkyil na'ang lha rnams lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang /
387b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdog pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa
387b4(rgyud 'bum): byed cing 'khod do/ / de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen
387b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i chen po sngar bstan to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul
387b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong bumar bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon sum
387b7(rgyud 'bum): du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
388a1(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/
388a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang /
388a3(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor
388a4(rgyud 'bum): mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ / gang gis dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag
388a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te/ thams cad som nyidar gnas so// gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thas cad du mngon du gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sem
388a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i sngags kyu
388a7(rgyud 'bum): smras pa legs so legs so/ / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes nad smos shig/ de ma bya
388b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba logs su mngon
388b2(rgyud 'bum): du phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so// dus gsum du gshegs shing so
388b3(rgyud 'bum): so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo//

388b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal

388b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
389a1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgra sems can thams cad la
389a2(rgyud 'bum): byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa'
389a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po mchog sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ oM A kaR+Sha ya/ pad+ma hasta/ ma hA a mo g+ha a~M ku shi/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ sany+tsa ra/ sa man+te na/ ma hA pA sha/ aM ku sha b+hu dza ba ra
389a4(rgyud 'bum): da b+hu dza aM ku sha pA sha d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu dra/ man+t+ra maN+Da la/ pa Ta la/ d+ha ra aM ku sha/ pA she na/ d+ha ra ya hUM hUM/ ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra a mo g+ha rU pa/ aM ku sha d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/
389a5(rgyud 'bum): ta ta ra/ sa man+ta rA ya/ ma hA mu drA/ maN+Da la/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra d+ha/ mahA kA r+ra Ni ka/ tri lo tsa na/ pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ I shwa rA/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka/ ma hA b+hu te/
389a6(rgyud 'bum): shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na mas+thi ta/ ku mA ra/ tAM lo kya ba ra da ma hA ka sha ma ka/ shAs ka/ rak+Sha ka/ mahA bid+yA/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Da la/ b+hu dzi ta/ rat+na mu kuT/ mA lA d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma
389a7(rgyud 'bum): oM kra sha ak+Sha d+ha ts+tshats+tsha/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu drA/ man tA la maN+Da la~M mA ra ya/ hU~M trA~M/ tha~M pa oM ku shi/ a ba mo ka ya/ mAnas b+h+ra ma sid d+hi / a kauR+Sha sa~M/ mu
389b1(rgyud 'bum): man+t+ra/ maN+Da la/ pa Ta lam/ sa ma ya/ big+h+nAn prA sA d+ha ya mA raM/ hA ra ha rA/ sarba pA pa kil+li ShA ma / mAd sar+ya/ hu ru tsu ru/ ma hA aM ku shi/ hU~M hUM bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo rna ma bo d+hA ya/ tu ru tu ma
389b2(rgyud 'bum): ma hA bo d+hi satwa aM ku sha rat+na pa sha d+ha ra/ nA nA bo tsi tra/ A b+ha ra Na bi b+hU Shi ta/ a mi tA b+hA/ dzi na mu ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma pA sha aM ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bi d+yA mu trA maN+Da la/ pra ba ra sA d+ha
389b3(rgyud 'bum): ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ sa ha sra b+hu dza/ sra ha sra nai tra/ sau mya mu khaM pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka satwa ba ta sa la/ sarba man+ta mu drA pra sa ha ka/ ma hA ba ra da satwa na mo stu te/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha/ pad+ma b+hu dza

389b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo 'di'ang so sor le'ur bye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so/ / gang gsang sngag
389b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi yi ka 'bru'ang gser la bai DUR+Yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge'i 'phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi 'phreng ba gshibs pas brgyan pa snang ngo //
390a1(rgyud 'bum): gang lag pa'i phyag rgya rang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so// gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya 'ang rin po che sna bdun
390a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to/ / gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba/ cho ga dang yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba
390a3(rgyud 'bum): bris pa'ang nam mkha' la gnas so/ / gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/ grwa bzhi cha mnyam pa/ rnam par bye ba/ dkyil 'khor shin tu spras

390b1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa/ gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gas
390b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so// 'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na
390b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/

390b7(rgyud 'bum): zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya
391a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro// nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing / nam yang brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
391a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad+ma mchog tu
391a3(rgyud 'bum): snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas
391a4(rgyud 'bum): dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba thob po/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor
391a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di'i nang bu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i zhags pa zhes bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do/ / bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan
391a6(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di sgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigra

397b2(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo

397b4(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i rigapa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang /

403a1(rgyud 'bum): srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o/ / bya ba shin tu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas kyang las zas cad bgyi de/ nyin

403b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba de'i tshe yungs kar dang gu gul la yongs su bzlas nas mer gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur// dbyig stong stsol bar
403b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ ji srid mtsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi

403b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyi ba gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi
403b5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ / don yod pa'i lcags kyu bzlas brjod yungs dkar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan stong rtsa brgyad brdeg par bgyi'o// las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu
403b6(rgyud 'bum): mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du mchis par 'gyur//
403b7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// ci ste srin po dang srin mo dgug par 'tshal na gu gul dang ba glang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
404a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pas/ dur khrod du mtshan thog tha ga bdugs na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te/ srin po dang srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i
404a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// gdugs gcig bzhin du dngul srang khri stsol bar bgyid do//
404a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o// cha gnyis pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo // srin po rnams la zan dang
404a4(rgyud 'bum): tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro// de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos
404a5(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad sgrub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ / gtor ma gtsang ma stsal bar bgyi'o// ci ste sha za dang sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba glang gi mkhris pa dang / de'i so
404a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / gu gul dang / shing arga'i 'o ma sbyar te lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du mchis
404a7(rgyud 'bum): ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o// dgos pa thams cad sgrub
404b1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyid do/ / dus gsum du gtor ma'i lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar bgyi'o// nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi dong tshe brgya sngas su 'jog par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par
404b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des yungs kar dkar po
404b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gi'u wang dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / rgyam tshwa dang / lan tshwa bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la/ yungs kar dang /
404b4(rgyud 'bum): ske tshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan cig mnyes la/ yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ rgyal po'i sgo 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ lam po che 'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor
404b5(rgyud 'bum): gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do/ / rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug cing dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya/
404b6(rgyud 'bum): ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang bslangs pa de ster te dngul dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lbub dang / spud pa dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / 'bru
404b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa stsol bar bgyid do/ / gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyur ro// de'i yul gcig tu'ang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing
405a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang des nas dang / til dang / 'bras sA lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi
405a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod
405a3(rgyud 'bum): pa bgyid par 'gyur zhing / bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// rgyal rig dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na til dang / 'bras thug chen po dang / sran mung
405a4(rgyud 'bum): ga dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad gyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro//

405a7(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro// dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang nges shing mngar gyi shing gis me sbar la sa bon 'dun dang

406a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du ni rigs pa ste// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon// gang dgas steng / gnas pa rnams// bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing // mi bzad
406a2(rgyud 'bum): gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ / phyogs bcu dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing // sum cu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo// gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag dang // sdang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig/
406a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang sna tshogs dug bcas pa'i// srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba// dri tsam gyis ni dog pa med// bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na// der ni rims nad mi gnas te//

410a3(rgyud 'bum): bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o/ / zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o// mdung rtse gsum pa'i 'phreng ba'i
410a4(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs par bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang me tog rnams so// kun la 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba dang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o// phyag gi
410a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o/ / stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi skal bu ni 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa ni rgyal po chen po bzhi
410a6(rgyud 'bum): go bgos pa/ lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o//
410a7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+ma la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi
410b1(rgyud 'bum): sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi skal bu ni me tog gi
410b2(rgyud 'bum): stegs bu 'dra bar bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun ba'i lci bas bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor kun bum pa gang ba dang / dar
410b3(rgyud 'bum): btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug pa'i chu dgang ba dang / bdug spos kyi snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dri chab dang / mchod
410b4(rgyud 'bum): yon gyis chab dang / 'bras bu dang / yon chab dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog gis 'jigs pa med par brgyan par bya'o// mu tig dang /
410b5(rgyud 'bum): byu ru dang / rin po che bai DUR+Ya sngon po dang / mar gang dang / pad+ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to// dkyil 'khor kun tu dung dang / dril ba dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / gser dang /
410b6(rgyud 'bum): dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o//
410b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum bu dang / bya ma bum dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham por dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te
411a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhag go/ / bog por dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs bkram par bya/ 'phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags/
411a2(rgyud 'bum): tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur pa la btags pa gzugs par bya'o// kun tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang mar me'i sdong po bzhi'ang de bzhin no// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul
411a3(rgyud 'bum): ba ni a ka ru dang / tsan dang / du rus ka dang / spri ka rnams kyi bdug pa ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang / sa la li ka dang / kun tu ru'i
411a4(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos gsar pa bgos te gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma
411a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen mo ni thams cad la sbyar
411a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag
411a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la sbyar ba bya'o/ / sbyin sreg dang bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par sprul
411b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs par 'chang zhing / des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro// bgrang 'phreng dang / khrig ma'i gdu bu dang /
411b2(rgyud 'bum): srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsre ba dang / rtswa dar b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te skyil mo krung bcas nas las bya zhing / pad+ma dang mchod yon gyis
411b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thas cad du nges par bya'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub pa mchog dang / las thams cad sgrub pa
411b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o// gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo// gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo
411b5(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu bklags pas grub pa'i mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlab
411b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin par byed pa yin no// don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dag cing / sgrib pa dang sdig
411b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa sngar bsags pa rnams rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i
412a1(rgyud 'bum): nus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chad pa ni de bzhin
412a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing spyi bor
412a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// 'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub
412a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/ gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing / bla ma dang / chos can dang / nor gyis mchod pa dang / sems can kun gyis
412a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ / nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang / gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod
412a6(rgyud 'bum): ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing / rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang //
412a7(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / byams par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi
412b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro// sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro// dpal gyis dus
412b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'bar zhing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung
412b3(rgyud 'bum): nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu

412b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ / bdug pa mang po rnam par bye ba'i sprin las tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang go shir sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
412b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sprin rim par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro/ / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so//
413a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no// de dag gis me tog dang bdug pas dkyil 'khor mchod pa ni bsod nams
413a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan rag gzigs
413a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa 'grub par

413a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ / de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag de la lta ba'i phyir song
413a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa dang / rims dang / mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro//

413b3(rgyud 'bum): bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ / tha na ri dgas dang bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags
413b4(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag lhag ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mtha' byang chub la thug
413b5(rgyud 'bum): gi bar du'o/ / de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa 'grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par byed pa dang /
413b6(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa/ sems can thams cad la phan
413b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor chen por kun tu lung bstan pa/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa/ yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra
414a1(rgyud 'bum): shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag par grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags
414a2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod

414a4(rgyud 'bum): chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing / sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams
414a5(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar par 'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi bzad pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// tshe rabs kun tu bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dgon pa'i
414a6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba lhun gyis grub thob par 'gyur ro/ / bkren pa'ang longs spyod dang phyug po mtshungs pa med pa mchog mod la thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// 'khor bzang po

414b2(rgyud 'bum): khyon kun khru gang ngam/ khru do pa la legs par btags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po gnyen po shin tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa 'am/ yang na dar yug gam/ yang na mon dang
414b3(rgyud 'bum): ram/ shun phrags la zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o// snod gtsang ma gsar pa'i nang du tshon lhag pa pa yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs
414b4(rgyud 'bum): gsal bar bri ba ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ / dbus su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum

414b6(rgyud 'bum): bababacings par bya'o/ / 'phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag mad bya'o// cod pan la zla ba phyed pa dang 'od 'dom gang ba bya'o// kun tu lcags kyu bya'o// kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba bya'o// phyag bzhi la
414b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yon na pad+ma'i lcags kyu/ g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i waH/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o// gdan seng ge'i
415a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+mo bya'o/ / g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o// g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal lta ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/
415a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po che'i shing lkug phran dang / yal ga dang chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par

415a4(rgyud 'bum): gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o// g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i
415a5(rgyud 'bum): gad mo 'byin pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/ nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o// smad du gshin rje dang /

415b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ / g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

415b7(rgyud 'bum): pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rnam 'jig par 'gyur ro// dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro//
416a1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang log par ltung bar 'gro
416a2(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrungs shing rjes
416a3(rgyud 'bum): su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / ras kyi sku gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig

416a5(rgyud 'bum): dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshes
416a6(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par
416a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dge ba bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
416b1(rgyud 'bum): gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde
416b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar bgyi ba'i phyir/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so// bcom
416b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa
416b4(rgyud 'bum): dang yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa/ brtson pa med pa dang / brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / 'byung po dang /
416b5(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad zag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab
416b6(rgyud 'bum): tu dul bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang /

417a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro ba'i ljags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil
417a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa/ 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa/ gnas thams cad la rjes su sbyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub par byed pa'i
417a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos byin gyis brlabs shing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams

422b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhig ste tshig cing zhu bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la skyob pa su lags//
422b6(rgyud 'bum): dpung gnyen du 'gyur pa su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig go// dus kyi zhags pas bcings so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ bde bar gshegs

429b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ ril bu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam
429b5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro// rma dang / nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag grugs dang / bgegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag shas zin pa de dag
429b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te dogs par mi bya'o/ / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig
429b7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te/ gsang sngags bsten pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdug par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o// mnar med pa dang / mi bzad pa'i
430a1(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa dang / dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro// mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du/
430a2(rgyud 'bum): sreg par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis bdugs na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro// thams cad du sbyar ba la dog par mi bya'o//
430a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyis khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang sgo chen por nam langs ka dang mun pa sros khar bdug cing gsang sngags
430a4(rgyud 'bum): lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon
430a5(rgyud 'bum): ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung zhing ngus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sa 'byin par 'gyur ro// khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams
430a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bar 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslad par 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
430a7(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro// bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar
430b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'khrul pa dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// g.yul 'gyed pa
430b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal
430b3(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rjes su skyong
430b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / dus thams cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do// khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu bla na med pa 'grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o// thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ lha yi nyi ma bzhin
430b5(rgyud 'bum): du dpa'/ / nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs// bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar// mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du// mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur// tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa
430b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin// bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang // dpag med gzhal du med pa yis// lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur// mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong
430b7(rgyud 'bum): ltar/ / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// ril bu bsten pa byas na ni// lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed// gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang // shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur//
431a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu// phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad// rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang // kun tu bla med grub par 'gyur// cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang /
431a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang // dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi// rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te// kun tu 'grub pa bla na med// gi'u wang dang / gur kum dang /
431a3(rgyud 'bum): ru rta cha bskams te sbyar la khro bo'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par bzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos
431a4(rgyud 'bum): shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams pa la/ gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa
431a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu la lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o/ / smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
431a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le
431a7(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang / rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig ma nyam pa dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang btsun mo'i
431b1(rgyud 'bum): nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro// sems can kun gus pa dang dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa la bya ba bzhin byed do//
431b2(rgyud 'bum): nor dang / 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig
431b3(rgyud 'bum): rten skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
431b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro// dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ro// nad med pa dang /
431b5(rgyud 'bum): rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms
431b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro// dgra dang phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun tu rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/
431b7(rgyud 'bum): thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la/ yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdang par 'gyur ro// ji ltar
432a1(rgyud 'bum): dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro/ / lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha'i bu mo can/
432a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta bar 'os pa/ mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'khrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu dpa' zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa
432a3(rgyud 'bum): lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do// rig
432a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o/ / rin po che'i snod kyang blangs par mi bya'o// gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o// ci ste
432a5(rgyud 'bum): mi sdug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba/ khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la/ ral pa cod pan gyis brgyan par ston na/ rig sngags
432a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o/ / khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o// yang yungs kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ ro'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te
432a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dre ldog cing / kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra 'byin to// de nas rig sngags 'chang bas rjes su brtag
432b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ gal te la chu dbu bar 'byung na rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung po bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags
432b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba 'khor lo sgyur bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro// skad cig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
432b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing sgra yid tsam 'khril zhing 'khyil ba rna chag du bu dri ma med cing spen
432b4(rgyud 'bum): tog 'phyang ba dang / mkhrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/ lus pad+ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyur ro// tsha bskal pa stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang
432b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro// gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na
432b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyis khyim gyi sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba cimachi
432b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go/ / mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por
433a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal te 'tshogs mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi bdag po'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris
433a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan
433a3(rgyud 'bum): cig tu rtsa dga' kun tu spyod par 'gyur ro/ / tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thub par 'gyur ro// lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang g.yog tu
433a4(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ chung ma dang bu mo gzhon nu ma 'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam
433a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ / yo byad thams cad kyis mi bral bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas rtse bar bgyi'o// lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su
433a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas par bgyi'o/ / nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byu ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gser

433b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o/ / shin tu char ches pa gcad par bgyi'o// char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o// dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o// dus su char dbab pa
433b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dus su char pa'i rgyun 'byung bar bgyi'o// lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur

433b7(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas la/ yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro//
434a1(rgyud 'bum): sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu sker lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / sdud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal
434a2(rgyud 'bum): bo dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlas brjod
434a3(rgyud 'bum): byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi
434a4(rgyud 'bum): sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te mdun na gnas shing / de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro// grong de na skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med

434a6(rgyud 'bum): dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa g.yon pa la bskus te rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas pa
434a7(rgyud 'bum): la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing / khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go//
434b1(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod du song na/ dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun na gnas shing
434b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro// brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na

435a1(rgyud 'bum): mchu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing / gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur

435a4(rgyud 'bum): la thig le byas na yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / phrag pa gnyis la thig le bya zhing khro bo lan cig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro// mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres
435a5(rgyud 'bum): nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas pu zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod kyi bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mchu la bsku zhing
435a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro// chu dang
435a7(rgyud 'bum): nyungs kar gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro// ral gri dang / gtun shing dang /
435b1(rgyud 'bum): dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo che dang / mdu la bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro//
435b2(rgyud 'bum): lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyur ro// mgo la bskus na sgra 'bar bar 'gyur ro// dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams
435b3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / ngan pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// sprin logs su bus na rlung sprin dang ser ba thams cad
