436a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / ba lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang /
436a2(rgyud 'bum): rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byur dang / lo zhes pa dang / nad dang / mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung sgra 'bud cing bzlas brjod byas
436a3(rgyud 'bum): na/ bus pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// char mi 'bab pa'i tshe klu'i gnas 'tsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char ba'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro//
436a4(rgyud 'bum): char ches pa'i tshe sprin logs su bus na shin tu char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshams chen po gcad na
436a5(rgyud 'bum): ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi
436a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams bcad par byas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la/ sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni nas dang nyungs kar mar
436a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bsres la shing arga'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun tu zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab
436b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro// rgyas pa byas
436b2(rgyud 'bum): na yungs kar dang / 'bras sA lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa
436b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun tu rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro// shing dri mi zhim pa'i
436b4(rgyud 'bum): me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang / lan tshwa dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya
436b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ / gsang sngags sgrub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang / nyungs kar dang / zho dang /
436b6(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi khro bo'i gsang sngags sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan bcu bzhi byas na
436b7(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro// lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
437a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang /
437a2(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnams so// gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro// til dang / 'bras so ba dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang
437a3(rgyud 'bum): mar rnams sbyar te chang ba bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'ang
437a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ / nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin dang
437a5(rgyud 'bum): srin po dbang du byas na 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang srin
437a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ / klu char 'bebs par bya na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / nA ka puSh+pa dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams pa mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
437a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na/ des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod par char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so// shin tu char che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam
437b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la gtor na shin tu char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ / pha rol gyi g.yul bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o//
437b2(rgyud 'bum): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed cing mtshang 'dru ba thams cad la pri yang ku'i me tog dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal
437b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / 'thab rtsod dang 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la sran ma ku lan tha dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sprin
437b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med dbang du byas na su ma na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang
437b5(rgyud 'bum): du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas sdig pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs
437b6(rgyud 'bum): kar dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 'on te tshwa
437b7(rgyud 'bum): bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par
438a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / khro bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs par 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib chos
438a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po bam po nyi shu rtsa lnga pa rdzogs so/ / / de nas hUM zhes bya ba dran pas khro bo'i rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur ro// las 'grub pa ston pa dang / mthong ba
438a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa dang / 'dod pa'i mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin par 'gyur ro// 'on te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po spyan drang bar 'dod na/ shing su ra bis
438a4(rgyud 'bum): me sbar la/ 'bras yos dang / pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang / yungs kar dang / tsan dan dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// rig sngag
438a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang bas khrus legs par bya zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang bar bya'o/ / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang khro bo'i rgyal po'i sku mdun na bzhugs shing
438a6(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang ba la dbugs 'byin par mdzad do/ / mchog gang ci 'dod cing gsol ba'i mchog de thams cad sbyin par mdzad do// phyag g.yas pa mgo bo'i spyi bor 'jog par
438a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad do/ / gal te skal ba chung ba zhig ste mngon du zhal mi mthong na de'i tshe rmi lam du bstan te// thams cad bka' stsol cing ji ltar 'dod pa'i mchog sbyin te/ gsang sngags grub
438b1(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po dang / cho ga zhib mo grub pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba grub par sbyin no// dam tshig grub pa chen po rab tu ston to// dbang phyug thob par bya na
438b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras so ba sU ra sa dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnam mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang phyug so sor thob par 'gyur ro// grong thob par bya na tan tu li ya kha dang / zho dang /
438b3(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na grong thob par 'gyur ro// yul gyi bdag por bya na 'bras sA lu dang ras bal gyi sa bon rnams mar dang bsres te brgya rtsa
438b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad sbyin sreg byas na yul thob par 'gyur ro/ / mi snang bar bya na ske tshe dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// nam mkha' la 'gro bar bya na sha ta pad tri ka'i me tog gi sbyin sreg bya'o//
438b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar bya na shing li dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / du ru ka rnams til dang sbyar te lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po mthong bar 'gyur ro//
438b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba legs so legs so zhes gsung zhing dbugs 'byin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis mgo'i spyi bor phyag 'jog cing mchog
438b7(rgyud 'bum): grub pa chen po stsol bar mdzad do/ / thams cad du mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro// shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
439a1(rgyud 'bum): dran par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten kun gyi bla mar 'gyur ro// dgra thams cad gzhom par 'dod na 'bras ma grugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// gter bskul na de nas don
439a2(rgyud 'bum): yod pa chen po'i spyan brjod par bya te/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub chen po sgyu ma'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ bklags pas grub pa/ so sor bstan pa'i dngos grub bla na med pa/ grub pa rig
439a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gi rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa lhur len pa/ bde ba skyed pa la mkhas pa rnams kyi rig sngags 'chang gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
439a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog tu gsang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ngogs su zhugs pa rnams kyi rab tu sgrub pa/ dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyi rnam par
439a5(rgyud 'bum): sel ba/ don gyi stegs mchog tu grub pa/ mal cha dang stan med pa rnams kyi gos/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod par bya ba chen po/ thams cang du las thams cad legs par
439a6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ gdug pa thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po mnyes par byed pa/ rnam par thar pa dang dul ba'i grong khyer nyid de dge bsnyen rnams kyi mchog
439a7(rgyud 'bum): tu skyid pa/ dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi dga' ba 'phel bar byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i yod pa yang du byung ba'i de kho na nyid sgrub pa grub pa rnams gtsang ma gtsang sbrar spyod pa/ gos gtsang
439b1(rgyud 'bum): ma bgos te bza' ba mchog shin tu gsang ba dang bag yod cing bden par smra ba/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu dad pa/ bla ma la gus pa/ rtag par rgyun du byams pa'i sems la
439b2(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par bzhag pa/ sems can thams cad la brtse bar gyur pa/ sbyin pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid can/ 'byung po thams cad la brtse ba'i sems dang byams pas bla na med pa'i
439b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa 'di bya'o/ / bslab pa dang sdom pa blangs pa/ don yod pa chen po'i sgyu ma bla na med pa ni 'di'o// gi'u wang dang / sprika dang / pu shel ci dang / tsan dan dang / ldong ros dang /
439b4(rgyud 'bum): shing kun dang / spang spos dang / na la da dang / ru rta dang bcas pa dang / de bzhin du 'bras dgang ste/ 'di rnams thams cad cha mnyam ste phye mar byas nas thams cad zhib mor btags la/
439b5(rgyud 'bum): ga pur dang gla rtsis bsgos te snyigs ma 'di dag tsha ba'i til mar gyis btsos pa/ nye'u shing dang / bil ba dang / me tog brgya pa dang / puSh+ka ra dang / gan+d+ha pri yang ku dang / rgya spos dang /
439b6(rgyud 'bum): sa mu sta dang / pra puN+Da rI ka dang / shing mngar rnams chu bre bdun gang bar sbyin par bya ste/ drug cha lhag mar lus pa dang / snyigra ma bre gang dang / 'o ma'i snyigs ma bor te til mar srang
439b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis la rtag tu btso bar bya'o/ / legs par grub pa'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas la gtor ma dang / dkyil 'khor du me tog dang / dri bzang po'i bdug pa dang / til mar btso ba'i
440a1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bzhin du rab tu sbyar la/ gang las grub pa khyad par du bskyed cing babs pa'i til mar byas pa bsrung ba'i cho ga bya ste/ snod gtsang ma bkang nas slar yang
440a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas nas gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas las thams cad byad du gzhug ste/ rig sngags 'chang khrus legs par
440a3(rgyud 'bum): byas pa/ dris bsgos pa'i til mar rtag tu lus la byugs pa 'dis lus de mi snang zhing dngos po med par ston par byed do// ngag thos la legs par mi byed do// gang gis lus khrus ma
440a4(rgyud 'bum): byas kyi bar de srid du bag nyid mi snang ste lus mi mthong ngo / / dpral bar thig le byas nas yan lag dang nying lag rnams la reg ste/ gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na nam mkha' la
440a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bar 'gyur te/ skad cig la dga' bar byed pa dang / lha dang bcas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi dbang po mkha' la spyod pa rnams kyis lhan cig tu til mar mgo la byugs pas mdog
440a6(rgyud 'bum): sngo ba dang / sgra cung zad le zhing 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// til mar grub pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i mnga' bdag tu 'gyur ro// reg pa tsam gyis tshe
440a7(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa khri thub par 'gyur ro/ / lus pad+ma dkar sham lta bur 'gyur ro// lus rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang / gnas kyi sgo thams cad bye ste 'dug go// gang du 'dod par 'jug par
440b1(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i dus su rig sngags 'chang la thig le byas nas lag tu rdo rje dang nor bu byas na nam mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ mod la dkyil 'khor grub
440b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ston par byed do/ / til mar gyis rkang pa la byugs na nam mkha' la 'ong bar byed do// lus la byugs na mi snang bar ston par byed do// mtshal dang til mar lhan cig sbyar
440b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ yan lag dang nying lag la thig le byas na lus 'bar ba'i snying po mthong bar byed do// 'di dag rig sngags 'chang gi rnam 'phrul so sor bstan pa'o// yungs kar la

440b5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa gang ba rnams sor mo brgyad kyi tshad du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug go// rang nyid se gol gyi sgras yongs su 'don par byed na slar yang snod nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug

440b7(rgyud 'bum): lus la byugs na mi'i seng ge chen po'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid lus khrus ma byas pa de srid du mi'i seng ger kun tu gnas so// gzhan yang ji ltar bsams pa bzhin
441a1(rgyud 'bum): du nam mkha' la 'phags te 'dug pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / me 'bar ba ston par byed do// phag gi khrag dang sbyar na phag gi gzugs su ston
441a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed de/ shugs dang stobs chen por ston par byed do// glang po che'i khrag dang sbyar bas tshogs kyi dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su ston par byed do// rta'i khrag dang sngon po lhan
441a3(rgyud 'bum): cig sbyar ba lus la byugs pa tsam gyis rta mgrin gyi gzugs su ston par byed do/ / ji srid khrus ma byas pa de srid du mthong bar byed do// ba lang gi mkhris pa dang lhan cig sbyar na

442a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhag pa de dang de nyid du rkang pa'i rjes 'jog par byed de/ mar gsar la nye bar 'jog pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ mar gsar mnyen pa bzhin du rdo ba'ang 'dra bar 'gyur

442a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar nas so so'i gdong la byugs na lha de dang de lta bu'i gzugs su ston par byed do/ / gzhan yang dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams rang gi 'dod pa'i blos las bya'o// de nas blo
442a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phel bar byed pa ni til mar dang 'o ma lhan cig zos na blo dang dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ / nub gsum gyi sbyor bas tshigs su bcad pa stong klog par byed cing 'dzin par byed de//
442a5(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun gyi sbyor bas blo gros rgya mtsho chen po lta bu 'phel bar byed cing sogs par byed do// zhag bcu bzhi'i sbyor bas tshe lha'i lo stong du 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi sbyor bas
442a6(rgyud 'bum): bcud len sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gnyer ma dang skra dkar spangs pa dang / skra cung zad 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// lus 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang pad+ma'i kha dog
442a7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ / skyes nas lo bcu lon pa dang 'dra bar gzugs dang lang tsho dang ldan par 'gyur ro// glang po che stong phrag bcu'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zhag nyi shu
442b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad kyi sbyor bas glang po che sa srungs kyi stobs su 'gyur ro/ / zhag sum cu so lnga'i sbyor bas nam mkha' lding chen po'i stobs su 'gyur ro// zhag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sbyor bas
442b2(rgyud 'bum): lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang 'dra bar brtson 'grus dang stobs chen por 'gyur ro/ / zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i sbyor bas ri rab lhun po chen po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar 'gyur
442b3(rgyud 'bum): te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos yongs su bskor ba/ mi g.yo zhing mi bskul ba/ reg par bya ba ma yin zhing mi mthong ba/ mi ma yin pa rnams kun tu
442b4(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa/ lha rnams thams cad kyi phyag byas shing phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ drang srong rnams kyis bstod pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po rnams kyis phyag
442b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i 'os
442b6(rgyud 'bum): su gyur pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i dbang po thams cad kyis gsang ba'i dam tshig sgrub pa/ lha'i dbang po rnams kyis lhan cig 'gran pa'i 'os su gyur pa/ tshangs pa dang /
442b7(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mngon du smra ba'i 'os su gyur pa/ klu'i dbang po thams cad kyis nye bar bgrod par bya ba ste/ de ltar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro ba'i
443a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba til mar gyi rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yon tan chen po rmad du byung ba brgya stong phrag gis gang ba'o/ / til mar gyi rgyal po'i rig sngags 'chang
443a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dis til mar gyi rgyal po ral gri la byugs na byugs pa tsam gyis ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ ral gri'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor
443a3(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje la byugs na rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba nam mkha' la 'gro zhing / rdo rje'i rig sngags 'chang gi
443a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ / 'khor lo la byugs na 'khor lo 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// blta na sdug pa'i 'dor lo'i rig sngas
443a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar mod la 'gyur ro/ / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms so// mdung rtse gsum pa la byugs na 'bar bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur
443a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te nam mkha' la gnas par byed do/ / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa dbang phyug chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// 'bras dang / phol mig dang
443a7(rgyud 'bum): lhog pa dang / me dpal dang / shu ba dang / mdze dang / rkang shu dang / rtsa'i rma dang / mgul pa 'gags pa dang / rna ba'i rtsa nang dang / mtshan par rdol pa dang / dmu chu dang / sman dang /
443b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / 'dus pa nyid la'ang mkhas pas chu dron mo 'thungs pa tsam dang / byugra pa tsam gyis nad thams cad sel lo// til mar gyis nad thams cad
443b2(rgyud 'bum): sel ba de bzhin du rtsib logs na ba dang / tshad pa dang / snying na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / bshang ba 'khyim pa dang / pho ba'i nad kyi nyes pa de rnams thams cad 'thungs pa tsam gyis rnam
443b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'jig par the tsom med do/ / nyams pa dang / zad pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i dpal bcom pa dang / gsos spyad ngan pa rnams bskus pa tsam mam zos pa tsam gyis stobs dang
443b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lus rnams rgyas pa dang / mgu ba dang / spro ba chen por 'gyur ro// gdon rnam pa sna tshogs par gsungs pa dang / brjed byed mi bzad pa la'ang reg pa
443b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis de dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par the tsom med do/ / byad mi bzad pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / dug dang / sbyar dug nyid kyang reg pa tsam gyis rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro//
443b6(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang mche ba 'am/ sbrul go rdzas dang sdig pa'ang rung / srin bu dang phye ma leb gdug pa 'am/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang 'jog po 'am/ sbrul gyis mthong
443b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dug gam/ dbugs kyi dug mi bzad pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa'i dug gang yin pa dang / hA lA ha lA'i gdug pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan da ra da'i dug gang yin pa dang / rtsa ba'i dug
444a1(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa dang / sdong po'i dug dang / 'dab ma'i dug dang / me tog gi dug dang / mdangs kyi dug gang yin pa dang / gzhan dug rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams thams
444a2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / til mar reg pa tsam gyis lam mchog dang lam gol bar song ba rnams dang / rgyal po'i sgo drung du song ba'ang rung / gsad par 'os par gyur pa
444a3(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa dang / bcings par gyur pa gang yin pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa gang yin pa dang / gzhan yang dgra'i gze ba dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi
444a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa nyid dang / mi mdza' ba dang / phyir rgol ba gang yin pa'ang til mar 'di mngon par sbyar bas skad cig de la thams cad 'joms so// rgyal po khros pa gang yin pa
444a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzum bzhin du bka' stsol to/ / g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du 'am phan tshun 'thab bzhin pa thams cad la til mar rgyal po bla na med pas rtag tu rgyal ba ster ro// mkhas pas mig
444a6(rgyud 'bum): la byugs na/ mi thub cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gzhan gyis kyang dgos pa thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya ste/ dngos grub kyi gnas thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i
444a7(rgyud 'bum): phyir ro/ / de nas khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ mod la thams cad
444b1(rgyud 'bum): du grub pa bla na med pa/ nad thams cad zhi ba/ de kho na nyid khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa'i ras ris kyi sku gzugs brjod par bya ste/ ras ris kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa 'di mthong ba tsam
444b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis mod la bsod nams kyi phung po chen po thob pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / rig pa'i gnas thams cad rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin
444b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mthong ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya
444b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / zhe sar bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi spyan sngar bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ras ris kyi sku
444b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs gang yin pa 'di mthong ba tsam gyis mod la mthas klas pa tsam dang 'di mtshungs par 'gyur te/ 'di dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/
444b6(rgyud 'bum): ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// ras gru bzhi pa gru bzhir cha mnyam pa/ shin tu thags
444b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang ba/ shin tu gsar ba/ shin tu 'jam pa/ mchog tu mdzes pa/ khru gnyis pa'i tshad kha tshar ma bcad pa sgra dang bral ba 'am/ yang na dar gtsang ma gru bzhi shin tu rnam par
445a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byes pa la ri mo mkhan gcang ya smyung bar gnas pas lhag ma ma yin pa'i tshon snod gsar par bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs rnam par 'byes pa 'phags pa don yod zhag
445a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khro bo lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal bzhi pa/ zhal dang po ni zhi ba/ spyan gsum pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ 'od dpag
445a3(rgyud 'bum): med cod pan du 'chang ba/ zla bas nye bar mdzes pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal drag po'i gzugs can/ 'jigs par byed pa/
445a4(rgyud 'bum): tshems kyis ma mchu mnan pa/ dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan pa/ g.yon pa drag po chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ zhal rnam par 'gyur ba/ dbu skra 'khyil
445a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing gyen du brdzes pa'i ral pa kun tu bcings pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ drag tu bzhad pa'o// zhi ba'i zhal ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa'i steng du sku phyed pa'i khro bo'i
445a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po 'bar ba'i snying por chud par bya ste/ sku ut+pa la sngon po'i kha dog can/ dbu skra dmar po cung zad 'khyil pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par
445a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa/ phyag gnyis kyi gcig gis ral gri dang / gnyis pas tho ba 'bar ba can bya'o// phyag gnyis gcig gis pad+ma 'chang ba ste/ pad+ma'i ge sa ra'ayang ba'i snying po can no//
445b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas lcags kyu dang mdung rtse gsum ste/ g.yas pa na'o// g.yon pas khro bo chen po drag po drag tu rgod pa'i gzugs can/ don yod pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa'o// g.yas pa dbugs
445b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byin pa'i rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs pa/ phyag thams cad 'bar ba'i snying po 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa bya ste/ pad+ma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa bya'o// rgya mtsho'i
445b3(rgyud 'bum): snying por ri rab la gnas pa/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos dkris pa bya'o// nya dang / chu srin dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis dkris pa/ pad+ma dang / ut+pa la dang /
445b4(rgyud 'bum): ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar pos gcal du bkram pa/ ngang pa dang / bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang te'us khyab par bya'o// g.yas logs su lha mo sgrol ma dbu cung zad 'dud
445b5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa'o// dkar sham chen mo thal mo sbyar te cung ca 'dud pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam
445b6(rgyud 'bum): pabar brgyan pa/ 'dzem bag dang bcas pa bya'o// srin mo chen mo ral pa gcig ma khrag 'dzag pa'i thod pa dang / drag mo drag tu rgod pa bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying por khro bor lcags kyu
445b7(rgyud 'bum): la lha bzhin pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / rdo rje thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya'o// g.yon phyogs su
446a1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bya ste/ zhal khro gnyer can drag po'o// dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa/ 'jigs par byed pa/ 'bar ba'i snying po'i pus mo g.yas pa
446a2(rgyud 'bum): btsugs pa/ ral gri dang dgra sta thogs pa/ phyag gnyis thal mo sbyar ba 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po lcags kyu la nges par blta
446a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pa/ kho ra khor yug tu 'od 'dom gang pa/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar bar bya'o// lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i kho ra khor yug gi steng du tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang
446a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs kyi phur ma thogs te mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po don yod lcags kyu'i
446a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i shing ljon pa bya ste/ yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rnam par bkra ba bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po'i zhabs kyi drung du rig sngags 'chang bya ste/
446a6(rgyud 'bum): pus mo btsugs pa/ me togs sna tshogs thogs shing / lag na bgrang 'phreng 'dzin pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po la steng du blta bzhin pa bya'o// zhabs gnyis pa'i drung gi gnas su pho nyam
446a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ zur mig can/ drag mo lag na ral gri thogs pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba/ phyag thal mo sbyar ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa bya'o// ras ris kyi sku gzugs kyi bya ba yongs
446b1(rgyud 'bum): su mthar phyin nas byin gyis brlabs te/ de'i 'og tu gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya'o// de'i drung du gtsang mas zas mi bza' bar de'i spyan mngar khro bo lcags kyu brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
446b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya'o// ras ris kyi sku gzugs sgrub pa'i cho ga 'dis sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gzhan yang bya'o//
446b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma re rer ras ris kyi mdun du gtsang mas zas mi za bar de'i spyan sngar me tog dang bdug spos phul nas/ khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas par bya'o//
446b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas las thams cad dang dgos pa thams cad bya'o// 'di ni de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub bklags pas 'grub pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis gsang ba mchog gi las bsgrub pa
446b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas sku gzugs mthong ba tsam la sogs pas mtshams med pa lnga dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams 'di mthong ba tsam gyis thams
446b6(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa bsags pa dang bcas pa/ bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i sdig pa de
446b7(rgyud 'bum): dag thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / nad dang 'jig pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad dang / dgra thams cad dang / phyir
447a1(rgyud 'bum): rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyi sku gzugs shin tu chung ba byed pa gang yin pa de'ang phan pa byed par
447a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ dri 'am byug pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa byed pa 'am/ khrus kyi bum pa gang ba bkod pa 'am/ rdul sel bar byed pa tsam yang rung
447a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rig sngags 'chang de'i rig kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi
447a4(rgyud 'bum): bye ma snyed bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po skyed par 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
447a5(rgyud 'bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga rnam par sbyang shing bskal pa'i mthar thug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
447a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyis gzigs 'dod par 'gyur ro/ / skye ba brjes nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro//
447a7(rgyud 'bum): skye ba'i skye ba dran par yang 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad+ma yang ba'i dkyil 'khor/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po// don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcag
447b1(rgyud 'bum): kyu'i gzungs 'di'ang mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba rnams dang /
447b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
447b3(rgyud 'bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
447b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sdud par yang 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten tham
447b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bla mar yang 'gyur ro/ / tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du mchod par 'os par yang 'gyur ro//
447b6(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// yid la bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad grub par yang 'gyur ro// thams cad
447b7(rgyud 'bum): du thogs pa med pa mkhas pa'i blo ru 'gyur ro/ / de nas khro bo'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor cho ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang gsang ba'i phyag rgya bla na med pa bshad
448a1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / khor yug tu them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ sa dang ba byung bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bya ste/ gzings kyi rgyu dang tshad mnyam pa
448a2(rgyud 'bum): shin tu tshad la bab cing legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang ldan pa'o// tshon sna tshogs pra rnam par phye ba dang /
448a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig btab la/ sna tshogs tshon rtsis rnam par dbye/ sgo bzhi shin tu rnam 'byes pa// khor yug them skas bzhi dang ldan// rta bab bzhi yis brgyan
448a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor snying por yang // shin tu rnam 'byes tshad la bab// khru yi tshad du bya ba'o// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mnyam pa yi// snying po'i dkyil 'khor
448a5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su yang / / mkhas pas shin tu rnam 'byes pa'i// pad+ma 'dab ma bcu gnyis bya// lcags kyu phyogs dang rtse gsum dang // ge sar pad+ma'i khor yug tu// snying
448a6(rgyud 'bum): por gyur pa'i dbu mchog la/ / khro bo zhags pa yang bya'o// drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// ral gri dang ni dgra sta'i phyag/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing //
448a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus phyed pa dang / zhags pas kun nas dkris pa// mdung rtse gsum pa/ nam mkha' la phyir phyogs pa/ pad+ma dang bcas pa byas pa
448b1(rgyud 'bum): la/ grA grwar 'bar ba'i gdong bya'o// mdung rtse gsum dang pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa/ drag po'i zhal 'jigs par byed pa chen po mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ zhal 'jigs su
448b2(rgyud 'bum): rung ba 'bar ba'i snying por chud pa'o/ / nang gi ri mo la lcags sgrogs dang mdung rtse gsum pa'i gdong bri bar bya ste/ 'bar ba'i snying po dang bcas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i tshon
448b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsi bya'o/ / ri mo gnyis pa'i nang du pad+ma kha phyed bye ba ge sar 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya'o// ri mo gsum pa'i nang du 'khor lo'i rnam pa bya'o// mu khyud kyi phyi rol tu lag
448b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyag rgya rang bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa'o// ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rtsa ba la dang / mdung rtse gnyis dang / dung dang /
448b5(rgyud 'bum): tid+ya dang / 'khor lo dang / rtse gsum kha gdengs dang / tho ba dang / mdung dang / ral gri dang / nor bu dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / mda' bo che dang / las kyi rdo rje dang / rtse lnga dang /
448b6(rgyud 'bum): baR+sha s+phu la dang / rdo rje zur gsum dang / pad+ma dang / rtse gsum dag kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba khor yug tu yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o// kha khyer gyi rnam pas brgyan pa la kha khyer gyi phyi
448b7(rgyud 'bum): rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su mtshan ma sna tshogs bri bar bya ste/ rigs chen po bzhi thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// shar gyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa'i
449a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang bri bar bya'o/ / lhor pad+ma yangs pa'i mtshan ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// nub kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du nor bu'i rigs kyi
449a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams kyang bri bar bya'o/ / byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang yang dag par bri'o// shar gyi sgor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi khro bo'i rgyal po sgor bri bar
449a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / lhor pad+ma yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khro bo rnams so// nub tu nor bu'i rigs kyi khro bo'o// byang du rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo bri bar bya'o// khro bo thams cad kyi gzugs 'bar ba'i
449a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin pa bya'o// ri rab la gnas pa/ skyil mo krung phyed pa/ lus cung zad bskum pa bya'o// phyi'i ri mo'i
449a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du nor bu dang / rdo rje dang / me tog dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dag go// khor yug tu kha khyer 'bar bas dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu brgyan pa'o// lhab lhub dang / ba dan dang / rgyal
449a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dang / tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas kun nas dkyil 'khor la yang dag par brgyan pa'o// ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i gtor mas gang ba'i snod ci 'byor pa dang / gtor ma'i las kyi cho gas
449a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa dang / rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o// bum pa gang ba dang / pog por dang / bum bu dang / bum pa dang / gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa
449b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog kun nas gcal du dgram mo// 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o// snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar mchod
449b2(rgyud 'bum): yon dang / zhabs bsil gyi snod dang / rin po che sna bdun rab tu dgram mo// dri'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i bum pa byas nas/ mkhas pas dang bzang pos
449b3(rgyud 'bum): bcings te dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya'o/ / sgo bzhir dri chab kyis gang ba'i bum pa dar gyis bcings pa gzhag par bya'o// mkhas pas sgo dang sgo ru ni/ bu ram dang / sha la
449b4(rgyud 'bum): ra dang / sbrang rtsi'i ro dang / gtor ma gzhag par bya'o// mdung rtse gsum la zho dang / 'o ma dang / zan dang / mchog gi bza' ba ma nyams pas shin tu mdzes pa'i gtor ma gzhag
449b5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de bzhin du 'khur ba dang / 'khur ba zlum po nyid dang / snum 'khur dang / be Ti ma ka dang / sa rA'i la du dang / mung ge'i la du dang / hwags dang / kham+b+ha ni bzang po
449b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams gzhag par bya'o/ / gtor ma'i las la khor yug tu me tog bzang po dgram zhing 'phreng bas brgyan par bya'o// 'bru'i rnam pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag par bya'o// 'bras bu'i
449b7(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ne'u gsing sngo bsangs dang / lo ma mdzes pa bkram ste gzhag par bya'o// kho ra yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / de bzhin du a ka ru dang / tsan dan dang
450a1(rgyud 'bum): sprik+ka dang / tu ruSh+ka dang / dpal gyis dkris pa dang / gu gul dang / kun tu ru dang / sbrang rtsi dang / hwags sbyar ba'i bdug pa dang ste/ bdug pa 'di dag dbul
450a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu bdug pa 'thul ba'i pog por gzhag par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha la bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// phyogs bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor bcing ba
450a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ gtsug tor bcing zhing bdag bsrung ba dang gzhan bsrung ba bya'o// de'i 'og tu 'jug par bya'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor mchog mthong ba dang / phyag bya zhing bskor ba nyid dang /
450a4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig kyang sbyin par bya'o// rtag tu gsang ba'i las byas te/ de kho na bzhin du gsang sngags bzlas pa'ang bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga tshad ma las dgos pa 'di dag thams cad byas
450a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis las thams cad kyi dngos grub bla na med pa'o// rgyal ba rigs bzhi'i yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni 'gro ba bzang
450a6(rgyud 'bum): por skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du bde ba can du 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar the tsom med do// lha'i gzugs shin tu 'dzes pa/ rgya ma thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/
450a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub bla na med pa dang / cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub dang /
450b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i dngos grub dang / khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad sel ba dang / mod la gdug pa thams cad 'jig pa dang / dgra thams cad zlog pa dang /
450b2(rgyud 'bum): mod la nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / thams cad du dngos grub bla na med pa gang yin pa grub par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dang rtag tu dga'
450b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu rgyal po dang blon por bcas pa rnams kyis dus rgyun du bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ljongs
450b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad blta zhing mchod pas rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin nyid du 'ang dge sbyongs rnams dang / bram ze rnams dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang /

450b6(rgyud 'bum): dbang po dang / rdo rje 'chang ba nyid dang / rdo rje snying po bdag nyid chen po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gzhon nu dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin

451a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur te the tsom mi bya'o/ / yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/ rtag tu smra ba nyung zhing mkhas pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang
451a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa la dga' bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang dgyes pa dang bcas pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa
451a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs las skyes pa'i sras ji lta ba bzhin no// 'di ni de rnams kyi mngal gyi gnas su skye ba'i tha ma yin no// rtag/
451a4(rgyud 'bum): tu skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom mi bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'gro ba dang / rtag tu rgyal ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon sum

452a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po bdag gis ltad mo'i mchog mthong lags so/ / sems dpa' dag pa chen po khyod kyis bdag gi ltad mo'i the tsom med par mdzod cig ces so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
452a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje bdag la don yod pa pad+ma dri

453a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor mthong ba kun tu gnas par byed do/ / cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang / gsang sngags dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya rnams rjes su mthun par phyogs te

454a3(rgyud 'bum): bo d+hi satwA a b+hi She tsA ne sarba ta thA ga ta a mo g+ha i b+hi Shik+ti a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya maM sarba bid+yA man+da la ku la sa ma ya b+hi She kaMHsarba ta thA ga ta pA Ni ba ra de/ pad+ma gau re pad+ma pra b+he/ pad+ma bi ka tsam+bu dza gar+the/
454a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM hUM/ badz+re badz+re/ badz+re pad+ma ta thA ga ta ku la a d+hiSh+Tha te/ a mo g+ha ba ra de/ sarba sA pa ri pU ra Ni sarba pA pa duHkha pra sha ma ni/ a mo g+ha hr-i da ya sid+d+hi sA d+hA ya bi ma le hUM phaT/ oM ba ra re
454a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma b+hu dze na mo stu te pad+ma su te swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ don yod pa dri ma med pa pad+mo'i chu skyes kyi pad+ma'i lcags kyu don yod zhag

455a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mchog tu lung bstan no/ / ngas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dam
455a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar lung bstan no/ / tur+N+Na dang / dkar sham dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / pad+ma rigs mdzes ma dang / lha mo chen mo ki lI ki lI dang /

461b4(rgyud 'bum): tshim pa dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi
461b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyi mchog sbyin par byed pa 'di ni shin tu dkon no/ / bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsod nams kyi tshog
461b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi dngos grub bla na med pa thams cad yang dag par rdzogs par byed pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog tu dkon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang
461b7(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par blta bar bgyi'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags pa spyan sa
462a1(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gi dpral ba'i bar nas nges par byung ba ni/ rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / dngos grub mthong ba'i de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa grub pa'i ched
462a2(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu nye bar bsags par 'gyur ba las gzhan ma yin no// rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
462a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / grangs med pa nye bar bsags par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das nyin mtshan du'ang rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dran par bgyi ba skad cig
462a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang mi brjed par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ci ste slar yang snga dro'am/ nyin mo 'am/ mtshan mo 'am/ zla ba 'am/ sor yang rung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjed na/ sangs rgyas dang byang
462a5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad brjed par 'gyur/ / yongs su dor bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su dor bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
462a6(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod kyis smras pa de de bzhin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lag tu son par 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu skyed pa ma yin no//
462a7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma mthong ba dang / bsnyen bkur ma byas pa dang / phyag rgya dang /
462b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ma thos shing ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des ni/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di de'i
462b2(rgyud 'bum): lag tu phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ / mi thos shing mi mthong la/ ming gi sgra grags pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son par 'gyur ba des ni/ lag
462b3(rgyud 'bum): n a rdo rje gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams de'i lag tu son par
462b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi drung du rigs kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / snying po dang / gsang ba'i cho ga zhib mo thams cad lag
462b5(rgyud 'bum): tu son par 'gyur ro/ / gnas thams cad du song zhing rjes su zhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad rjes su so bzhing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ro// rig sngags thams cad dang / gsang sngags rim
462b6(rgyud 'bum): par phye ba dang / phyag rgya yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mchog dang / gtso bo dang / thu bor 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi drung na
462b7(rgyud 'bum): sras kyi gtso bor dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis lung ston par 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar ston pa dang bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
463a1(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gi lag tu son cing thob par 'gyur ba'i sems can gang yin pa de ni de'i yon tan dang phan yon gzhal du med pa thob par 'gyur ro//
463a2(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gang gis lag tu son par 'gyur ba de/ sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad so sor rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
463a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras nas/ rang gi gzugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru'i dbus su rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'phags par
463a4(rgyud 'bum): bltas nas/ don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba nor bu rin po che chen po rig sngags kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phul bar gyur to// oM a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni ba ra da pad+me dz+wa la dz+wa la na b+hU dze
463a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ 'di ni don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi zhags pa'i rtsa ba'i snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das phul ba'i do ma thag/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyag
463a6(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi 'dzum par blta zhing 'khod do/ / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od rig sngags kyi rgyal
463a7(rgyud 'bum): po nor bu rin po che chen po de la'ang rig sngags kyi rgyal pos spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis dbang bskur ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
463b1(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams ri dang / nak+sha dang / 'brog dkon par bcas pa rnams rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so// phyogs bcu kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur to// des na dus
463b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum du bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings su rdzu 'phrul gyi bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
463b3(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shAkya thub pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i mngon par dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po 'dis mngon par dbang bskur ba ni legs so legs so// dus gsum du gsheg
463b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa snga ma rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dbang bskur ro/ / nged thams cad kyis kyang tshig gcig tu mthun pas don yod pa yid bzhin nor bu'i 'od la rig sngags kyi
463b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ro/ / dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang nas/ de rnams thams cad la rig pa'i rgyal po'i spyi bo'i
463b6(rgyud 'bum): gtsug nas mngon par dbang bskur ro/ / 'di ni mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya mngon par dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'o// oM a mo g+ha bai ro tsa na ma hA su drA ma Ni pad+d+ha dz+wA la pra pad+hA ya hU~M/ phyag rgya chen pos
463b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin to/ / rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs nas mi snang bar 'gyur to// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po de de bzhin gsheg pa tham cad kyi bya
464a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas su bskor ba gsum byas nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyag byas nas spyan sngar 'dug ste sems par gyur to// de nas
464a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang de'i rig pa'i rgyal po sems par gzigs nas/ ji ltar da ltar yid la byed pa yang dag par rab tu gsal bar mdzad do// oM a mo g+ha maN+Da la pad+ma a b+hi Sha
464a3(rgyud 'bum): kaM ma Ni badz+ra sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ke hUM/ rig pa'i rgyal po des dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil
464a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rigs thun mong ba'i dam tshig rdo rje chen po'i tshul gyis sa gzhi byin gyis brlabs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs
464a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par thar pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar cher 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo / / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil
464a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i lha thams cad mthong ngo / / rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul che zhing che ba dag byung ngo // don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu ngo mtshar ba dag mthong ngo // de nas byang chub
464a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu mthong nas/ don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i rdo rje
464b1(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis rlob pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba dang ldan pa'o/ / oM a mo g+hu pU dza ma Ni pad+ma badz+re ta thA ga ta bi lo ki te sa man+ta prA sa
464b2(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po byin ma thag tu mchod pa rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa du ma rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar rang rang gi cho ga ji
464b3(rgyud 'bum): lta ba bzhin du mchod pa chen po rnams rab tu byung ngo / / lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba yangs pa rgya chen po go skabs kun tu gnas par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
464b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa che zhing che ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi bkod pa rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag par mthong ngo / / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa pad+ma dri ma med pas bcom ldan
464b5(rgyud 'bum): 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das las ring por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du phyogs nas
464b6(rgyud 'bum): stan la 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul
464b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs byin gyis rlob pa'i khyad par phyag rgya chen po dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo'i mthu stobs pad+ma yangs pa chen po'i gsang ba don yod zhags
465a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i de kho na nyid kyi snying po grub pa/ dam tshig dang rjes su 'thun pa/ mthu stobs dang 'on sa 'byung ba la phan pa/ de bzhin gshes
465a2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rnam par 'phrul pa yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad kyi mchog rab tu sbyin pa la ltos/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis re ba thams cad yongs su
465a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs par rjes su sbyin te/ rig pa'i rgyal po 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di sems can thams cad kyi snang ba byed par
465a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / 'khras dang / yid kyi shing rta re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// dgra thams cad
465a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'dul bar byed do/ / bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed do// char tshas pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// char med na char 'babs so// rlung dang / sad dang /
465a6(rgyud 'bum): ser ba zlog par byed do// mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar byed do// nad thams cad zlog par byed do// gdug pa thams rab tu zhi bar byed do// tshe dang nad med pa 'phel bar byed do//
465a7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams sbyin pa dang / dbang phyug sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / 'bru 'phel bar byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
465b1(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa dri ma med pa'i chu skyes kyi gzungs kyi snying po'i yo byad dang / cho ga bklags pas 'grub pa'i dngos grub gsungs so// de nas snying po 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig pa'i
465b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po bklags pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro/ / stong phrag brgya bzlas pas pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan mtha' dag dang / rig pa'i
465b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzhal med khang dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gzhal med khang mtha'
465b4(rgyud 'bum): dag mthong ngo / / de la lha rnams rab tu 'jug par byed do// dam tshig shes par yang 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// phyag rgya rim par
465b5(rgyud 'bum): phye ba dang rjes su mthun par yang 'gyur ro/ / dang po rmi lam mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro'o// gnyis par rmi lam mthong ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ngo // de bzhin gshes
465b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis rang gi rgyan dang dkyil 'khor du brtags pa mthong ngo // gzhal yas khang rgya chen po dang bcas pa'ang
465b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ngo / / der yang rab tu 'jug par byed de dam tshig kyang 'dzin par byed do// phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba'ang so sor thob bo// rig sngags
466a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa'i dngos grub rab tu thob bo/ / gsum par rmi lam mthong na rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs

466a4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub chen po dang / mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// rdo rje'i rigs kyi dngos grub chen po dang dam tshig thams cad so sor thob bo// bzhi par rmi lam mthong ba na nor bu'i

466a7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dbang bskur ba'ang rab tu thob po// dngos grub chen po dang mchog sbyin pa'ang so sor thob cing thams cad du mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro// lnga par rmi lam mthong ba na rnam par thar
466b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor du brtags pa dang / po Ta la ka'i ri'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems

466b3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'jug par byed do/ / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs kyi dngos grub so sor thob bo// rang nyid kyang don yod pa'i rig sngags kyi dbang
466b4(rgyud 'bum): gis mngon par dbang bskur te mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ / cho ga zhib mo thams cad dang dngos grub kyang rjes su stsol bar byed do// mchog thams cad rab tu sbyin pa so sor thob po//
466b5(rgyud 'bum): drug par rmi lam mthong ba na dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag stong pa mthong ngo // gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang
466b6(rgyud 'bum): g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po mthong ste/ de la'ang rab tu 'jug par byed do// phyag rgya dang /
466b7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags dang / dam tshig dang / mngon par dbang bskur ba so sor thob ste/ rig sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa so sor thob po// bdun par rmi lam chen po mthong bas
467a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying por gshegs nas rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bdud 'dul ba mthong ngo // de la'ang de bzhin
467a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad phyag gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ rang nyid kyi phyag gis bzung nas rab tu 'jug par byed do// rang nyid mngon par dbang bskur zhing mngon par dbang bskur
467a3(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sbyin pa rjes su stsol bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
467a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston par byed do/ / nad sna tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten pa thams cad rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po gcig pur 'gyur ro// skye ba brje ba 'chi 'pho ba'i dus su dran pa
467a5(rgyud 'bum): nye bar gnas shing dus byed par 'gyur ro/ / bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su pad+ma las rdzus te skye ba'i skal ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar skye bar
467a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus mchod par byed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong nas nye bar ston par byed do// thams
467a7(rgyud 'bum): cad du'ang de rnams rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nye bar ston par byed do/ / thams cad du'ang rang gi gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig nye bar ston par byed do// bskal
467b1(rgyud 'bum): pa brgya stong phrag gi bar du'ang sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang ba'i dam
467b2(rgyud 'bum): tshig dang / dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs sngags rnams la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// skye ba skye bar yang rang gi bsod nams kyi las kyi tshogs dge ba'i
467b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du gnas thams cad du yongs su dag pa'i las kyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes pa rtsa ba'i snying po'i dngos grub bla ni med
467b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bklags pas 'grub pa'o/ / de nas 'di'i yo byad dang cho ga sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg pa la brgya rtsa
467b5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas pas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do/ / gang dang gang gi las kyi sgrib pa rnams rjes su bcings par 'gyur ro// de'ang nyi ma bdun gyis rang gi lus de'ang rang
467b6(rgyud 'bum): gi gzugs kyis nges par 'gro ste mdun du nye bar 'dug ste sbyin par byed pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa nye bar bsags pa 'di dang / sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
467b7(rgyud 'bum): cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / bdag zhum pa dang / 'khrug pa mtha' dag bzlas pa tsam gyis yang dag par smra bar byed cing mi snang bar byed do// rims thams cad la srud pa dkar po la mdud
468a1(rgyud 'bum): pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas rims thams cad yongs su grol bar byed do// nad thams cad la byabs pas yongs su grol bar byed do// mtshon chas
468a2(rgyud 'bum): sam/ rma bya'i sgros sam/ mdas kyang rung ste nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do// gdon thams cad la tshon skud sna lnga'i skud pa la 'dud pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas te/ bzlas brjod
468a3(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas te gdon gyis zin pa de'i mgul par bcing te lan bdun du byab par bya'o/ / gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin par bya/ bzlas brjod lan bdun bya bzhin pa dang bcas pas gang dang gang gi gdon
468a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis zin par gyur pa de'ang rang gi lus kyis nges par 'gro ba ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du nye bar 'dug nas thams cad smra bar byed do// rang gis dris pa de thams cad smra bar byed do// bka'
468a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ / 'thab pa dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams thams cad la smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsam gtan dang sbyin sreg gis
468a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su grol lo/ / khar mur te rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs na rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du gyur nas gnas so// dug 'thungs pas chu la yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro//
468a7(rgyud 'bum): dug gi zos pa la khyab par bya ste dug med par 'gyur ro// dug dang / byad stems dang / gsang sngags dang / bye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad la dri dang bsros pa'i bum pa la stong phrag brgyad
468b1(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bzlas pa byas la bkru bar bya ste/ bkrus pa tsam gyis mod la thams cad nyams par byed do// gang yang lus zad pa dang / nyams pa dang / bskams pa dang / rgyal po'i dpal med pa
468b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / lus yongs su gdungs pa la rig sngags 'chang des ma reg pas dri'i chus yongs su gang ba'i bum pa dgu yungs kar gyis gtor te stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas
468b3(rgyud 'bum): An+ta ra sap+pa dang / bI ka dang / A Ta dang / bi la ba dang / shu ti dang / nye'u shing dang / e kas thA na dang / mo lo kya dang / lus kyi mar gyis bsku mnye byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
468b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te A Ta byug par bya'o/ / gzugs brnyan bya ste gong bu de mtshon chas dum bu brgyad du bya ste/ snod yongs su gang pa bzhi mtshams bzhir 'phang bar bya zhing / snod gang pa bzhi mtsham
468b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhir 'phang bar bya'o/ / de nas snying pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab par bya'o// de nas ne'u gsing sngon po gang du ru rgyun 'bab par dri'i chu'i bum pas khrus byas zhing gos dkar po dgus
468b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yogs par bya'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa bya zhing / dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa'i bram ze'i ston mo yon dang bcas pa bya'o//
468b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rang nyid byams pa dang ldan par bya'o// ji ltar 'byor pa gya nom pa gya nom pas dkar ba'i zas kyi bza' ba dang btung bas tshim par bya'o// de nas dpal med pa thams cad dang / nad tham
469a1(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / bgegs dang log par 'dren pa thams cad kyis mi reg pa dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed dang / gza'
469a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / log 'dren gyis zin pa las yongs su grol lo// bza' nyes dang / 'gom nyes dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar byed do// lus kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
469a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / thams cad du 'jigs pa 'jigs par byed pa'i 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro// sdig pa dang / sgribs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// /
469a4(rgyud 'bum): ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// skye ba brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// de
469a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rtag tu'ang dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' dang lha thams cad kyis ji srid byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du de 'dzin par
469a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / mig nabs la A sha'i chu dang / shing mngar gyi chu dang / dri ma med pa'i chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyar bar bya ste mig nad 'phral du zhi bar byed do// mgo bo'i zug rngu
469a7(rgyud 'bum): dang gzhogs phyed na ba la mar dang til mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas 'jam par bsros pas sngan shu ti la bsgos nas mgo la bsku mnye byas na/ mgo bo'i nang thams cad dang gzhogs
469b1(rgyud 'bum): byed na pa'i nad thams cad las yongs su grol mo/ / so'i zug rdul me tog ska ma dang so shing la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas bza' bar byas na so'i drun tu yongs su grol lo// rna ba'i
469b2(rgyud 'bum): zug rdul shu ti dang til mar la brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas bkang bar bya ste/ rna ba'i zug rngu thams cad yongs su grol lo// kha na ba la sman ma shU ro'o chu dang mar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
469b3(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jam par bsros pa btung bar bya ste/ kha'i nad thams cad las yongs su grol lo// lto ba'i zug rdul lan tshwa dang chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas btung bar bya ste/ lto ba'i zug
469b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzu yongs su grol lo/ / snying gi zug rngu la so so rtsa lam dang / go snyod dang / pu ska ra'i rtsa ba rnams bzhi 'gyur gyi chus sum cha lhag mar lus kyi bar du bskol bar byas nas btung bar bya'o//
469b5(rgyud 'bum): lan brgyad bzlas pas snying gi zug rngu dang / gzhogs na ba dang / mchin pa na ba dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / gsung pa dang / smyug bro ba dang / gcin nad rnams te/ de bzhin du nang
469b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'phral du sel bar 'jig rten gyi mgon pos 'di gsungs so/ / rgyal po'i 'jigs pas 'jigs pa rnams kyis yungs kar la yongs su bzlas nas rgyal po rnam kyi sgor gtor bar bya
469b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ thams cad du'ang rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur ro// na le sham la stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te
470a1(rgyud 'bum): nA le sham kyi 'bras bu la'i rtse sor bcug ste bcangs na gang smras pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gang blangs pa de so sor rnyed do// gnas thams cad du 'gro ba rnams
470a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i mchog chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / klu'i char 'bebs pa la bal po se'u'i lcug ma bya ste gang du 'dod pa der klu'i char 'bebs so// klu'i mtshor song nas mtshan mo bdun du zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang /
470a3(rgyud 'bum): mar dang / yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad du byas na gter chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// dbang phyug thob pa la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / mar dang bsres pas sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa
470a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad du byas na dbang phyug chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ / dgra 'joms pa la sA lu'i phub ma dang / lan tsha dang / cha ba'i til mar dang bsres pas lan stong rtsa brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na dgra rnams
470a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ / dgra rnams thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// smod par 'dod pas de nyid kyi thal ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas te dgra'i sgor gtor bar bya ste/ mtshan mo
470a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu mi gnas te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do/ / 'khrug pa'i g.yul ngor 'jug par 'dod pas yungs kar la lan stong phrag brgyad du yongs su bzlas te 'khrug
470a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i g.yul ngo'i dbus su gtor bar bya ste/ thams cad du rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par 'gyur te/ thams cad du rgyal ba ster bar 'gyur zhing / thams cad phyogs dang phyogs
470b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams rnams su 'bros par byed do/ / gnas na gnas pa thams cad kyi'ang rgyal bster bar 'gyur ro// thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon
470b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / ldong ros la lan stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ mig gi mig sman du byas na mi snang bar 'gyur te/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad kyis mi mthong bar
470b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gi haM la lan stong phrag brgyad yongs su bzlas te thig le byas na bu ga thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed cing / bu ga'i sgo thams cad bye ste sgor gnas par byed do// gang du 'dod pa
470b4(rgyud 'bum): der 'jug par byed do/ / gi haM gi snying khar thig le byas na gang du 'jug par byed pa de dang de nyid du mchod pa chen por 'gyur te/ nor che ba dang 'bru 'phel ba 'thob po// lag pa gnyis la byugs pas
470b5(rgyud 'bum): gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur te/ gang blangs pa de thams cad so sor rnyed do// rgyal po dbang du byed par 'dod pas lag pa g.yas pa la gi haM gis byugs nas lan stong rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te/
470b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i sgo la thal lcag sbyin par bya ste/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo sras dang / 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byed pa la me tog dang 'bras bu
470b7(rgyud 'bum): la lan stong phrag brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya/ yang na mngag par bya ste 'phral nyid du dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa de dang de nyid du 'gro'o// slar yang 'ong ngo // yang
471a1(rgyud 'bum): na ming smos pas nam mkha' la 'bang bar bya ste/ gang gi ming smos pa de 'gugs par 'gyur zhing mtshan mo 'ong bar byed do// mthu stobs kyis slar yang phyir ldog ste 'gro'o//
471a2(rgyud 'bum): skye ba dbang du byed pa la dzA ti dang sna ma'i me tog la lan bdun yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// yang na mngag par bya ste reg pa tsam gyis bdag nyid dang nor gyis kyang dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// gang
471a3(rgyud 'bum): smras pa dang gang blangs pa de thams cad byed do/ / 'bangs dang ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu ma dbang du byed pa la 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ba 'am
471a4(rgyud 'bum): mngag par bya ste bzung ba tsam gyi dbang du 'gyur ro/ / grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur zhing ji srid 'tsho bar nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// rje'u rigs dbang du byed pa la ba sha ka'i me tog la lan
471a5(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so/ / bram ze dbang du byed pas zho dang 'o ma'i bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste/ bram ze dbang
471a6(rgyud 'bum): du byed pa grub po/ / rgyal rigs dbang du byed pa la bu ram dang 'o ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas sbyin par bya ste dbang du 'gyur ro// dmangs rigs dbang du byed pa la gang dang gang gi
471a7(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas te sbyin par bya ste zos pa tsam gyis mod la dbang du 'gyur ro/ / rang gi 'dod pa'i bya ba gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa bya ba rnams ni bklags pas grub par
471b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / don yod pa pad+ma'i chu skyes kyi rtsa ba'i snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga'i sgrub babs so// / de nas don yod pa'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gzungs kyi yo byad dang cho gar 'gyur te/
471b2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs 'di rig sngags 'chang gis dran pa tsam dang / bklags pa tsam dang / phyag rgya bzung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang dbang bskur
471b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyag rgya dran par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs stong phrag bzlas pa 'dis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur
471b4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang des kyang dang por rmi lam gyi nang du mthong ngo // dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis rnam par snang mdzad yid bzhin nor bu'i
471b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bu mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do/ / de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya la rab tu 'jug par byed do// de bzhin
471b6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba rjes su sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sgo rnams
471b7(rgyud 'bum): bye bar gyur pa'i sgor mthong ngo / / gang du 'dod pa der 'jug go// des kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
472a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par gnas so// stong phrag gnyis pa bzlas pas gnyis par rmi lam
472a2(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar blta'o/ / pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gang la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / gzungs dang / gzhal med khang mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par mthong ngo // der yang dus
472a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum du gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang thams cad mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ngo // de la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi
472a4(rgyud 'bum): nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang dkyil 'khor rnams ston par mdzad
472a5(rgyud 'bum): do/ / rig sngags 'chang rang nyid la'ang mngon par dbang bskur bar byed do// legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed do// pad+mo yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang phyag rgyas
472a6(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur
472a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro/ / stong phrag gsum pa bzlas pas rmi lam chen po gsum pa bstan pa mthong ste/ gzhal med khang mtha' dag rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang /
472b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dbang bskur ba rjes su stsol bar mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dus gsum du gshegs shing rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu rdo rje byin gyis
472b2(rgyud 'bum): rlob pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya'ang mthong ngo / / de'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad rig sngags 'chang la rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba
472b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// rang rang rnams kyang rdo rje'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur
472b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rjes su stsol bar mdzad do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i dam tshig la rab tu 'jug par mdzad do// rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i mngon par dbang bskur ba legs so lags so zhe bya/
472b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i rigs yang dag par byin gyis rlob pa'i dngos grub nye bar ston par mdzad do// thams cad du rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas mngon
472b6(rgyud 'bum): par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / stong phrag bzhi pa bzlas pas nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob bo// de la'ang nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
472b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba thob po/ / rmi lam ston pa de'ang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu'i phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams mthong ngo // dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gsheg
473a1(rgyud 'bum): pa de rnams thams cad kyang rig sngags 'chang de la nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / mngon par dbang bskur bas yang mngon par
473a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bar byed do/ / rang rang rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi nor bu gsang ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur ba gtsug gi nor bu byin gyis rlob pa dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon
473a3(rgyud 'bum): par dbang bskur bar byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nor bu'i dkyil 'khor rnams nye bar ston par mdzad do// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i dngos grub kyi dam tshig gis
473a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o// legs so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par byed cing rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gsheg
473a5(rgyud 'bum): pa de rnams kyang ji srid sangs rgyas kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob par yang dag par dgongs par 'gyur ro/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag
473a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// bzlas pa lnga pas rmi lam chen po'i phyag rgya ston par byed
473a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag rdzogs par phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas kyi mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang phyir mi ldog pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen
473b1(rgyud 'bum): por mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do/ / dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa drug pas rmi lam yang dag par ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshes
473b2(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te/ rdo rje'i gdan byin gyis rlob pas byin gyis brlabs te mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhug
473b3(rgyud 'bum): pa mthong ste seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyang rang rang gi rig sngags 'chang phyir mi ldog par mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// legs so legs so zhes bya
473b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gsung brjod par mdzad do/ / dgongs pa cher brtan pas dgongs par 'gyur ro// ji srid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mtha' thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro// /
473b5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa bdun pas rmi lam chen po ston pas de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos
473b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgron me spor ba dang / chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgya chen pos mngon par dbang bskur bar mthong ngo // de bzhin
473b7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa de rnams kyis kyang phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / phyag rgyas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// legs
474a1(rgyud 'bum): so legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod par mdzad do/ / phyag rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor dang / kun nas gsang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub dang /
474a2(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de bzhin du bklags pa dang bzlas pa tsam gyis cho ga dang las kyi 'bras bu ston par mdzad do// don yod pa'i nor bu rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gzungs
474a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga 'di'ang rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro/ / 'di bklags pa dang dran pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por rjes su 'jug par

480a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / na me ru dang / shrI baSh+Ta ka dang / pog dang / sal+la ki dang / gu gul gyi bdug pa dang / hwags dang / sbrang rtsi dang / lnga bskor ba dang / ka dzo ka dang / bal+li ka'i shing dang / bal+li ka dang /

480a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs so// sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa sbar ba gzhal du med pas snang bar byed bzhin pa 'bar bar byed do// phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas sgron ma'i
480a5(rgyud 'bum): shing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dang mnyam pa'i sgron ma'i shing rab tu 'byung ngo / / 'di lta ste/ tu ru ka'i til mar dang / tsam pa ka'i til mar dang / ut+pa la'i til mar dang / sna ma'i
480a6(rgyud 'bum): til mar dang / bAR+Shi ka'i til mar dang / kon+ta'i til mar dang / a ti muk+ta ka'i til mar dang / pa la sha'i til mar dang / tsan dan gyi til mar dang / dzA ti'i 'bras bu'i til mar dang / bal+la'i til mar
480a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / a sho gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i til mar la sgron me rab tu byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ ro brgya pa'i kha zas rnam phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
480b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yul dang dus su nye bar bzhugs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / rnam pa dang /
480b2(rgyud 'bum): zhim zhing mnga' ba/ myang bar 'os pa/ dga' bar bya ba/ yid dga' ba/ tse ya dz+ya dang / tshim par 'os pa dang / dri'i rigs lha rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de
480b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'khor dang bcas pa dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dang bcas pa rnams
480b4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu tshim par byed pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sbrang rtsi mngar ba'i ro myong ba dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i spyan sngar
