480b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par byed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs pa dga' bar 'os pa'i rol
480b6(rgyud 'bum): mo pheg rdib pa rnams dang / 'di lta ste/ dbyangs kyi yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i mi 'am ci dang dri za'i glu dbyangs rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang bcas pa dang / klu'i bu mo dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / lha'i bu mo
480b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / chu las byung ba'i bu mo rnams kyis rnam pa tha dad rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi glu dbyangs kyi rol mo'i sgra rab tu 'khrol bzhin pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams thams cad kyi
481a1(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum pa'i rol mo chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin du 'gyur ro/ / rnam pa sna tshogs par mdzes pa'i bstod pa'i rnam pas rol mo'i cho ga zhib mo ji lta ba bzhin du gsang ba'i phyag rgya dang /
481a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba dang rjes su 'thun pas yang dag par bstod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lhas rjes su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//
481a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bstod pa rnams kyang mtshan smos pas yang dag par bstod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yangs pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ mchog thams cad
481a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa po/ / thams cad du mchod pa'i sprin du gyur pa/ bla na med pa dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu'o// sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin byin gyis rlob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas
481a5(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i mchog gi dngos grub ster bar byed pa'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi ma dang par gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par gyur pa'o// gsang sngag
481a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub dang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o// nad thams
481a7(rgyud 'bum): cad sel bar byed pa'o/ / sdug bsngal mi bzad pa gtug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa'o// bkra shis pa dang yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang
481b1(rgyud 'bum): dag par skul bar byed pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
481b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams ston par byed pa'o/ / klu thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad
481b3(rgyud 'bum): zlog par byed do/ / sems can thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub sbyin par byed pa'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams kyi dbugs 'byin par byed pa'o// ma grol ba rnams grol bar byed pa'o// skyabs med pa rnams
481b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi skyabs so/ / dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon du gyur pa'o// 'khras med pa rnams kyi 'khra sa'o// bsnyen gnas ma byas pa rnams la bsnyen gnas sbyin pa'o// /
481b5(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra ma byas pa rnam la gtsang sbrar spyod pa'o// mi tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas la zhen pa rnams la tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas sbyin pa'o// thub pa'i brtul zhugs ma byas pa rnams la thub pa'i brtul zhugs
481b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin pa'o/ / chos ma yin pa la spyod pa rnams chos la sbyor ba'o// mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba'o// 'jigs pas nyam thag pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o//
481b7(rgyud 'bum): dbul po rnams la nor sbyin pa'o// 'bru dang bza' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'bru 'phel ba chen po sbyin pa'o// mu ges nyam thag pa rnams la skya rgyal gyi tshogs pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// lom nyams pa
482a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi lam ston par byed pa'o/ / dus ma yin par 'chi bar 'gyur ba rnams kyi dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba so sor 'gog pa'o// long ba rnams kyi mig sbyin par byed pa'o// 'on pa
482a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi rna ba sbyin par byed pa'o/ / sna nyams pa rnams kyi sna rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'o// reg pa med pa rnams kyi bde ba'i reg pa la nges par sbyor bar byed pa'o// longs spyod kyi nyam thag pa rnams kyi longs
482a3(rgyud 'bum): spyod sbyin par byed pa'o/ / dran pa nyams pa rnams kyi dran pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o// bsam pa nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag par byed pa'o// tshul khrims nyams pa rnams kyi tshul khrims sbyin
482a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sbyin pa las rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus nyams pa rnams la stobs dang brtson 'grus kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// bzod pa dang bral ba
482a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la bzod pa dang zhi ba sbyin pa'o/ / bsam gtan nyams pa rnams la bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// shes rab nyams pa rnams la shes rab kun tu snang ba dang / blo gsal ba dang //
482a6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab chen po'i snang ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dam tshig mi shes pa rnams la dam tshig sbyin pa'o// phyag rgya dang bral ba rnams kyi phyag rgya yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o// rig sngags dang gsang sngags
482a7(rgyud 'bum): mi mkhas pa rnams la rig sngags dang gsang sngags rab tu sbyin pa'o/ / mu stegs rnams la mu steg smra ba dang / 'jug ngogs bzang po dang / lam rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las
482b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyab kyis phyogs pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub chen po'i mchog sbyin pa'o/ / 'khor ba las ma bsgral ba rnams sgrol bar byed pa'o// mun pas long par byed cing bsgribs pa rnams la myos pa'i mun pa
482b2(rgyud 'bum): sel ba sbyin par byed pa'o/ / sgrib par bya ba rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bral bar byed pa'o// mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams kyi mtshams med pa lnga sbyong bar byed pa'o// ngag nyams pa rnams kyi ngag rnam par
482b3(rgyud 'bum): dag par byed pa'o/ / ma grub pa rnams la mchog gi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// thun tshags dang bcas pa rnams kyi thun tshags dang bral zhing yongs su dag par byed pa'o// ngan pa rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o//
482b4(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog go/ brda mi phrad pa rnams la brda sprod par byed pa'o// kun nas 'khrugs pa rnams kyi sems gnas pa'i mchog go// mchog med pa
482b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la mchog sbyin pa'o/ / rmi lam ngan pa mthong ba rnams la rmi lam chen po'i mchog ston pa'o// bkres pa rnams la kha zas kyi mchog sbyin pa'o// skom pa rnams btung ba chen po'i ro la yongs su
482b6(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod par byed pa'o/ / gcer bu rnams kyis gos dang bgo ba so sor thob cing grub pa'o// mdze can rnams kyi mdze dang bral bar byed pa'o// sha bkra can rnams kyi sha bkra yongs su sbyong bar byed
482b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rims kyis btab pa rnams kyi rims dang bral bar byed pa'o// gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi gdon dang / gshed byed dang / gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa'o// dgra bo phyin ci log
483a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyi dgra rnams dang bral bar byed pa'o/ / dbul po rnams la nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// bu bza' sa rnams kyi bu bza' cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mun pas long bar
483a2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa thams cad kyi sgron ma'i shing dang nyi ma'i 'od zer stong gis kun tu snang ba'o/ / rgyal pos bcom pa rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po cher byin pa'o// lon pa rnams gcig tu byed pa'o// ser sna can
483a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ser sna shin tu 'joms pa'o/ / 'dod chags la chags pa rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu 'joms pa'o// rmongs pa chung ba ma yin pa rnams kyi rmongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i lam
483a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis rab tu nyams pa rnams kyis dge ba'i lam gyi yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'jigs pa med par 'gyur zhing yid chos kyi nang du chud par 'gyur ro// /
483a5(rgyud 'bum): log par ltung ba rnams kyis shes rab dang / blo dang / shes bzhin dang / brkam pa rnams kyi blo bsnyen par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas ma mthong ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'dod par 'argyas
483a6(rgyud 'bum): chos thos pa dang bral ba rnams kyis chos chen po'i ro rgya chen po thos par 'gyur ro/ / dge bdun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bral ba rnams kyis lha dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro//
483a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang po nyams pa rnams kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// yan lag rnam par nyams pa'i sems can rnams kyi so so'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' mthong
483b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang bral ba rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / lhas yongs su spangs pa rnams kyi lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis yang dag pa'i 'dzin par 'gyur ro// nyon mong
483b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang sgrib pas dkris pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / phyag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs spyan ras
483b3(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
483b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mtshungs par dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa rnams kyi dpag
483b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gyi shing chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'bebs par byed pa'i mchod pa'i sprin 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na
483b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid sgrub par byed pa/ rmad du byung ba'i dngos grub yang dag par ston par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha rnams dang / gsang sngags kyi lha thams
483b7(rgyud 'bum): cad spyan 'dren zhing 'gugs par byed pa'o/ / 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'di ni thams cad du gsang ba'i sgo ston par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje don yod pa'i mchod pa'i snying
484a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i gzungs 'di ni dus ma yin pa'i char dang / mu ge dang / dus kyi chu rnam par nyams pa la so sor skyed pa'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te/
484a2(rgyud 'bum): yid rtse gcig tu byas nas sems can thams cad la mchog tu brtse ba dang byams pa'i sems bsgom par bya'o// mchod rten gyi yan lag dang nye ba 'am/ khang stong ngam/ ri bo 'am/ nags thibs po 'am/
484a3(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa 'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ mtshe'u 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ klu gnas pa'i mtsho 'am/ lha'i gnas sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang yang rung ste/ der rig
484a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gtsang mar gnas pas sa gzhi yongs su brtags pa cha mnyam pa mdzes par khru gnyis kyi tshad kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ sa dang ba byung du ldan pas gru bzhi par cha gzhal te legs par byi dor
484a5(rgyud 'bum): byas la shin tu 'jam par bya'o/ / der de'i steng du tsan dan dang dri'i chus byug par bya'o// gur kum gyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya rnams ri mor bri'o// de la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi
484a6(rgyud 'bum): snying po klu mgo bo dgu pa skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa bri'o/ / grwa bzhi'i nang du chud par don yod zhags pa bri'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi khor yug tu ji ltar thob pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags rnams bri
484a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / sgo bzhi rnam par dbye bar bya ste/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i gtor ma sna tshogs pa'i ro'i gtor ma dkar po dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / mar me dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / gtor ma dang
484b1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa'i pog por gyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o/ / rig sngags 'chang gis ches mngon du don yod zhags pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// khro bo'i rgyal po la yan cig bzlas pas mngon par dbang bskur bar bya'o//
484b2(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang khro bo lcags kyu dus gcig tu brjod do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan gsum du brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs te bzlas pa'i
484b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga bya'o/ / don yod pa'i mchod pa nor bu'i snying po lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o// nA ga ge sar dang / na la di na dang / rgya spos dang / gur kum dang / tsan dan dang / yungs kar dang /
484b4(rgyud 'bum): khi kha ra mnyam par sbyar ba'i bdug pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya ste/ klu'i dkyil 'khor du bdug pa dbul bar bya'o// klu'i lte ba'i steng du bdug spos kyi pog por gang ba gzhag par bya'o// lan stong
484b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'i mo nyid la klu'i zhags pa chen po las char gyi rgyun chen po 'byin te ji srid 'dod pa'i bar du char 'bebs so/ / klu'i rgyal po'i ming nas bzung ste bzlas par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po rgya
484b6(rgyud 'bum): mtsho dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'dzag po dang / hu lu dang / u lam bu la dang / chu lha dang / yid ldan dang / e la'i 'dab ma dang / klu'i rgyal po kun nas 'khor
484b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gdugs te/ klu'i rgyal po rnams las gcig smos par bya ste/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis bden par dam bcas pas rnam par bzhag po'i modo nyid la char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed de/ ji srid 'dod kyi
485a1(rgyud 'bum): bar du kun nas sbyor bas char stong phrag 'bebs so/ / yang na yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas klu'i rgyal po'i snying kha'i steng du sbyin sreg bya'o// sbyin sreg byas pa tsam
485a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis mod la 'phral nyid du stong phrag du mar a bi rA yaM char gyi rgyun 'byin par byed do/ / spar mo gang gis nyin mtshan gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par char 'bebs so// spar mo gsum gyis nyin mtshan gsum du
485a3(rgyud 'bum): char 'bebs so/ / spar mo bdun gyis nyin mtshan bdun du char gyi rgyun chen po klu'i rgyal pos 'byin par byed do// yang dag pa kho nar char gyi rgyun ltung ngo // yang na klu'i ras ris bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad
485a4(rgyud 'bum): la kun nas gru bzhi pa'i tshad kyi ras la ri mor bya'o/ / de'i dbus su rig pa'i rgyal po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bri bar bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ ral gri dang
485a5(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa dang / pad+ma thogs par bya'o// zhal khro gnyer can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis spyad pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ ral
485a6(rgyud 'bum): ba zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang bas yang dag par brgyan pa/ chu dang bcas pa'i pad+ma'i gdan bya'o// klu'i rgyal po de dag pus mo g.yas dang g.yon pa btsugs pa bya'o// klu'i gdengs ka
485a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas pa/ thal mo 'chang bas skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang des ras ris de la mngon du phyogs te smra ba bcad nas don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs
485b1(rgyud 'bum): stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya ste/ yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bsnun par bya'o// stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par byed do// gal
485b2(rgyud 'bum): te lo stong du char mi 'bab par 'gyur ba las 'phral nyid du lhas char 'bebs par byed par the tsom med do/ / rlung dang / sad dang / ser ba'i dus su de'i ras ris khang pa'i steng du gzhag ste/ rlung dang / sad dang /
485b3(rgyud 'bum): ser ba thams cad phyir zhing mi 'byung ngo // phyogs gang du ras ris rnam par lta bar byed pa de'i phyogs kyi gnas su rlung dang / sad dang / ser ba mi 'bab ste/ ri 'am dgon dung 'khrigs par yang mi 'bab bo// /
485b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na rig sngags 'chang gis ras ris de gzungs nas klu'i gnas kyi mtshor song nas gnas kyi mtsho der gzhag par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs stong rtsa brgyad du chu la bzlas
485b5(rgyud 'bum): te gnas pa'i mtshor 'phang bar bya'o/ / 'phangs pa tsam gyis mod la gnas der gnas pa'i klu khye'u'i gzugs kyis lus phyed gnas de gnas 'thon te/ ras ris de la phyag 'tshal bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang
485b6(rgyud 'bum): ba la smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang gis bka' bsgo ba ci yin pa bdag gis bgyi'o zhes so// rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bya ste/ klu chen po 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu lta bar gyis shig/ khye'u de'ang phyogs
485b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi kun tu rnam par lta bar byed do/ / ji lta ji ltar mtshan ma mthong ba de lta de ltar rig sngags 'chang la mtshan ma smra bar 'gyur te/ legs par byas pa 'am/ nyes par byas pa de thams cad smra bar byed do//
486a1(rgyud 'bum): @de nas rig sngags 'chang gis brjod par bya ste/ klu chen po char phob la tshim par gyis shig/ 'dzam bu gling ba'i rtswa dang / nag kyi bdag po dang / ri dang / tshang tshing dang / dgon pa
486a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba rnams thams cad du char gyi rgyun 'byin par gyis shig/ lha'i chus kun nas char phob cig/ sems can thams cad kyi lha'i chu'i char gyi rgyun chen po phob cig/ klu'i
486a3(rgyud 'bum): khye'u la smras pa/ kye bcud len mchog tu gya nom pa'i rig sngags kyi ga'i byin cig ces/ rig sngags 'chang gis brjod par bya'o// klu'i khye'u bdud rtsi bcud kyi len gyi mchog zung zhig ces so// de nas
486a4(rgyud 'bum): klu'i khye'u de rig sngags 'chang la mngon du phyogs te thal mo sbyar nas nye bar 'dug go/ rig sngags 'chang gis klu chen po nyon cig ces brjod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rten cing 'brel par
486a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba bstan par bya/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bstan par bya'o// don yod zhags pa'i mdo'ang
486a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya'o/ / gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ston bzhin pa na/ klu'i lus la bdug pa 'khrigs pa'i sprin chen po nges par 'thon te nam mkha'i dkyil du g.yog par
486a7(rgyud 'bum): byed cing gnas so/ / chos ston pa'i skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par byed de/ sa'i mtsho der char pa 'bab pa ma yin no// rig sngags 'chang dang ras ris kyi steng du klu'i
486b1(rgyud 'bum): khye'u de ras ris de la mchod pa byed de/ rig sngags 'chang de la yon dang bcas pas chos la mchod pa 'bul bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang gis smras pa/ rig sngags 'chang gi sar khyod zhugs shig
486b2(rgyud 'bum): de rnams 'di skad ces rig sngags 'chang rang gi khyim gyis mchog go/ / rig sngags 'chang gis smra bar bya ste/ gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par len par byed na/ de'i
486b3(rgyud 'bum): tshe nga khyod kyi gnas mchog tu 'jug par bya'o/ / gal te mi byed na 'jug par mi bya'o zhes so// de nas khye'u de gal te byed na dge ba ston pa mthong ba de'i tshe rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par byed de/ lha rdzas/
486b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi rna rgyan dri ma med pa g.yo ba/ sgra'i cod pan 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// gal te mi byed na khye'u de'i gzugs mi snang bar 'gyur te slar yang mi mthong ngo // yang na rdzu 'phrul
486b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po can gyi klu'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des zangs kyi 'dab ma la don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs de'i steng du bri bar bya ste sbrang rtsis byug par bya'o/ / yungs kar la
486b6(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs su bzlas te gtor bar bya ste gnas pa'i mtsho der 'phang bar bya'o/ / gu gul zho gcig gi tshad kyis mchod nas bdug pa sbyin par bya'o// ji srid du gu gul phyed kyi cha shas kyi
486b7(rgyud 'bum): lha ma las kyi bar du bsreg par bya'o/ / skad cig yud tsam thang cig de la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bram ze'i gzugs kyis klu'i mtshor nye bar 'dug ste/ rig sngags 'chang la shis parjod par byed do//
487a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang gis kyang nad med par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// kye chos kyi don gyi tshig nyon cig/ chos dang 'jig rten mang po'ang skyongs shig ces so// bram ze
487a2(rgyud 'bum): de'ang dga' ste/ rig sngags 'chang ci 'dod pa'i don gang yin pa'i don de smros shig dang / thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro zhes rjod par byed do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po bdun dang / byang chub
487a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po bdun dang / nyan thos chen po bzhi'i mtshan nas smos par bya'o// de nas bram ze de rnam pa de lta bu'i tshig gi sgra thos nas yid rab tu dga' ste snying mgu ba chen por 'gyur nas/ rig
487a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par byed de/ legs so legs so zhes sgra 'byin par byed do// mtshan shin tu bsngags pa gang yin pa de khyod kyis yongs su 'dzin pa dang / legs par yod
487a5(rgyud 'bum): su grags pa'i mtshan shin tu mnyan par 'os pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba ste/ mtshan khyod kyis yongs su bsgrags pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba nyid rig sngags 'chang gang gis 'di lta bu'i sems can de rin
487a6(rgyud 'bum): popoche don yod pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i mtshan 'dzin par byed pa sems can rnams kyi mchog thos par byed do zhes so/ / de nas bram ze de bram ze'i gzugs kyi cha byad de mi snang bar byas nas/
487a7(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gzugs kyi cha byad dang rtags kyis ji lta ba bzhin du/ rig sngags 'chang gi mdun du 'dug ste smra bar yang byed do// rig sngags 'chang mchog ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa smos shig/
487b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog tham brjod pa de ster bar 'gyur ro// yang na mchog tu 'jug par byed do// klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang
487b2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa thams cad dbang du gyur nas nye bar gnas so/ / las thams cad bka' bsgo ba tsam gyis byed par 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa dang yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// sbyar ba tsam gyis mod la
487b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba 'di rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ras ris blangs te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btag par byas nas/ zhing dang kun dga' ra ba thams cad la g.yas phyogs su bskor bar bya ste/
487b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang / tshad ba dang / sad dang / ser ba dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / cha ga pa dang / byi ba dang / ne'u le dang / khyi dang / lce spyang dang / grog srur dang / sbrul go Na sa dang /
487b5(rgyud 'bum): sdig pa dang / sbrang pu traM ma bu ga dang / sbrang bu tri la Ta dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 'phral nyid du yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// lo tog dang / me tog
487b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'bras bu rnams legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// ro bzang ba dang legs par smin par 'gyur ro// don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i klu'i char 'bebs pa'i cho ga'o//
487b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas 'thab mo dang / rkyod pa dang / byed pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / 'brog mgon pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang des rig pa'i rgyal po 'ba' zhig ras la bri bar bya ste/ dpal
488a1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / rtag dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan 'chang ba'i rgyal po chen po bzhi bri bar bya'o//
488a2(rgyud 'bum): tshon sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog gdags par bya'o// klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug par bya'o// don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs 'di'ang brjod par bya
488a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing 'jug par bya ste/ dang por rgyal mtshan gyi mchog mthong ba tsam gyis mod la bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad kyi nad thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang / sgrib pa thams
488a4(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / nad thams cad yongs su grol lo// nyes par byas pa dang sdig pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// dug dang / byang snyems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba'i dug dang /
488a5(rgyud 'bum): dug gi 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// sdig pa thams cad yongs su grol lo// rgyal mtshan gyi mchog la btags pa mthong nas mthong ba
488a6(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis mod kho na la sngon gyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro ba rnams las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ 'di la the tsom dang / yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o// dang por grong khyer gyi
488a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal mtshan gyi mchog 'di zhugs pa tsam gyis mod la mi ngas dang / mu ga dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'brog dgon pa'i nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nang dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang /
488b1(rgyud 'bum): gdon dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / brjed byed thams cad dang / log par 'dren pa'i 'jig pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar
488b2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu
488b3(rgyud 'bum): zhi bar byed do/ / chom rkun dang / g.yon can dang / rkun mo'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed do// rmi lam ngan pa dang / mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par nyams
488b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / yul dang / grong dang / dgon pa pa dang / nags tshang tshing dang / grong khyer dang / rgyal po'i pho brang rnams thams cad du'ang bde ba byed par 'gyur ro// lo legs pa dang / dga' bar 'os pa
488b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tshe ba med pa dang / nad med par 'gyur ro// sems can de rnams thams cad du'ang phan tshun du dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen pos phan tshun byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ro//
488b6(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs 'di yid rtse gcig pas tshes bco lnga'i nya la nyin mtshan thog thag tu smyung bar gnas pas gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// ba byung lnga'i nye reg gis
488b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra dang / khrus dang / dri'i chus tsam gyis rjes su mthun pa'i byug pa byas te/ skyil mo krung du 'dug nas rig po'i rgyal po la mngon du phyogs nas bzlas brjod bya'o// mtshan thog thag tu mchod
489a1(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po rgyun mi 'chang bar bsgrub par bya'o/ / dri'i til mar gyi mar me dbul bar bya zhing / bgrang 'phreng dpag tu med pa byas pa'i bzlas brjod dbul bar bya'o// lan re re bzlas
489a2(rgyud 'bum): pas lan brgya stong phrag yongs su bzlas par 'gyur ro/ / ji srid du rig pa'i rgyal po'i bris sku 'bar bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa 'byin par byed do// rig sngags 'chang dga' bar
489a3(rgyud 'bum): byed cing spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'bar bar byed do/ / nam mkha' nas rig sngags 'chang khyod kyis bzlas brjod kyi cho ga mchog tu byas pa legs so legs so zhes sgra 'byin par byed do// 'di ni rig sngags
489a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang rnams kyi mchog gi bzlas pa'i cho ga ste/ khyod kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas par grub po// khyod kyis don
489a5(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi dngos grub kyang grub bo/ / khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba dang / thun mong gi snying po
489a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzungs smras pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog de thams cad rjes su mthun par stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub bam/ gzungs kyi dngos grub bam/ cho ga zhib mo'i dngos
489a7(rgyud 'bum): grub bam/ rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub bam/ phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dngos grub bam/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/ gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur
489b1(rgyud 'bum): ba 'am/ mig 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul ston pa 'am/ klu'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lha'i gzhal med khang ngam/ gnod sbyin gyi gzhal med khang ngam/ dri za'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lha ma yin gyi gzhal
489b2(rgyud 'bum): med khang ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi gzhal med khang ngam/ mi 'am ci'i gzhal med khang ngam/ lto 'phye chen po'i gzhal med khang ngam/ nyi ma'i gzhal med khang ngam/ zla ba'i gzhal med khang ngam/ skar ma'i
489b3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyi gzhal med khang ngam/ rgyu skar gyi gzhal med khang ngam/ srin po'i gzhal med khang ngam/ 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi gzhal med khang yang rung ste/ de thams cad rjes su 'dzin no// 'di ni khyod kyis bya/
489b4(rgyud 'bum): ba thams cad bklags pas 'grub cing bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// kye rig sngags 'chang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa de rnams rjes su 'dzin no// 'di lta ste/ nor sgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang /
489b5(rgyud 'bum): nor bu smra ba dang / zhags pa'i dngos grub dang / mig sman sgrub pa dang / thig le sgrub pa dang / dbang phyug dang / blon po dang / bkrabs pa dang / mdun na 'don nyid dang / stobs che ba nyid dang / longs spyod la
489b6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / dbang phyug dang / nor 'phel ba dang / gter g.yo ba dang / nyo tshong gi grogs byed pa dang / 'gugs pa dang / khung du 'jug pa dang / ri la 'jug pa dang / nags
489b7(rgyud 'bum): su 'jug pa dang / me la 'jug pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / klu'i char 'bebs pa dang / char gyi rgyun dang / ser ba'i rgyun dang / ser ba 'bebs pa dang / grong lta ba dang / g.yul du 'jug pa dang /
490a1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba nyid dang / ldong ros kyi mig sman sgrub pa dang / ral gri sgrub pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / rtse gsum sgrub pa dang / 'khor lo
490a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa dang / dung sgrub pa dang / gtun shing sgrub pa dang / dgra sta sgrub pa dang / mda' bo che sgrub pa dang / tho ba sgrub pa dang / dril bu sgrub pa dang / rdzas sgrub pa dang / sman sgrub pa dang / bcud kyi len
490a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa dang / ro langs slong bar byed pa dang / rang gi gnas 'bebs pa dang / gos 'bebs pa dang / rims 'bebs pa dang / shi ba slong bar byed pa dang / gdon thams cad 'bebs pa dang / thod pa
490a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs pa dang / bum pa 'bebs pa dang / bum bu 'bebs pa dang / lteng ka 'bebs pa dang / dril bu 'bebs pa dang / tho ba 'bebs pa dang / ral gri 'bebs pa dang / me long 'bebs pa dang / pad+ma
490a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs pa dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo 'bebs pa dang / mdzes par byed pa dang / gar byed pa de rnams thams cad bklags pas grub pa dang bzlas pas 'grub pas rig sngags
490a6(rgyud 'bum): 'chang rjes su 'dzin te/ don mtha' yas shing don mtha' yas pa de rnams thams cad grub pa'i ched du gyis shig ces so// dgos pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ rig sngags 'chang khyod dge
490a7(rgyud 'bum): ba 'grub cing rig pa ste/ rig sngags 'chang 'grub pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten la 'dra pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang khyod shi 'phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro'o//
490b1(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod phyir mi ldog par lung bstan no// 'di ni skye ba tha ma ste/ mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye ba dran
490b2(rgyud 'bum): par yang 'gyur ro/ / khyod dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la mngon par phyogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / gzungs kyi rim
490b3(rgyud 'bum): par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo la ji srid byang chub la mtha' thug pa'i bar du mngon par phyogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sgras lung ston par byed pa smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig pa'i rgyal
490b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i ras ris de'i smin ma'i bar nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa rnam par bkra zhing bkra ba 'byin par byed de/ de ma thag tu kun nas snang bar byed do// kun nas snang bar byas nas kyang rig sngags
490b5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gi lus la bab ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / mi snang bar gyur pa'i de ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang des ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya thob par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
490b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas sgo'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa rnam par
490b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa nor bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu gzigs pa
491a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i gzungs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu gzigs
491a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad+ma rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zhags pa rab tu gnas
491a3(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyu skar kun tu gzigs pa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub
491a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas nor bu'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang phyug gi mthu stobs dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer kun nas snang ba zhes
491a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo yang dag par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gsal bar khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya kun
491a6(rgyud 'bum): tu gzigs pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtag par char 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dngos grub yangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
491a7(rgyud 'bum): me tog ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun nas kun tu rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lce'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i
491b1(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yangs par byin gyis brlabs pa zhes
491b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / blo 'gugs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog mngon par bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung
491b3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dag cing dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yan lag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob bo// mdor bsdu na ting nge
491b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin 'di rnams bklags pa tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgrub pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo/ / gang zhig bzlas pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gsang sngags dang / rnam par
491b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa rnams so sor thob bo/ / ting nge 'dzin gzhan de rnams ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i dngos grub so sor thob bo// lag na rdo rje 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bklags pas
491b6(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang bzlas pa tsam la so sor thob po/ / gang gis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag
491b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong bar gyur pa mthong ba'i dngos grub so sor thob po/ / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dus gsum pa'i ting nge 'dzin
492a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / spyi gtsug kun tu gzigs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor dang / cho ga
492a2(rgyud 'bum): zhib mo gang yin pa de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog tu kun tu gnas so/ / gang gis skye ba brjes pa'i mod dang bsgom pa'i mod la rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sgo
492a3(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gnas so/ / 'di lta ste/ don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
492a4(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug kun tu rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i
492a5(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od 'bar bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
492a6(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nor bu rin po che chen po'i char 'bebs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
492a7(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa dri ma med pa'i bdag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa zab mo'i sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi zhags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don
492b1(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i 'od kyi snang ba rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ 'di rnams la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po rnams so sor thob cing / ting nge
492b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin gzhan 'jig rten las 'das pa brgya stong phrag bklags pa dang bzlas pa tsam gyi grub par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs kyi snying po 'di yon tan che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / rdzu 'phrul dang rnam
492b3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'phrul pa che ba ste/ don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs gsus
492b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa rjes su 'brang ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye bar byed pa/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ gzungs kyi tshig gi snying po gang zhig bklags pa
492b5(rgyud 'bum): tsam dang bzlas pa tsam gyis 'di rnams byed pa'i dngos grub so sor thob po/ / sgrub pa 'di rnams thams cad ni las kyi rnam 'phrul du 'gyur ba ma yin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang de smyung bar gnas te bzlas
492b6(rgyud 'bum): pa gcig dang bklags pa'i dngos grub kyis de lta bu'i rgyas shing gsal ba thob po/ / de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyang so sor thob ste/ don rgya che ba dang / longs spyod dang ldan pa dang / gzungs kyi dngos grub chen
492b7(rgyud 'bum): po so sor thob bo/ / bkod pa yangs pa rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi gsang ba so sor thob po// dpag bsam gyi shing yang dag par gang ba'i char 'bebs pa dang / gzungs kyi
493a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa so sor thob po/ / yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rgya mtsho dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pa dang / kun nas kun tu gzigs pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi
493a2(rgyud 'bum): gzungs kyi gsang ba'i char 'bebs pa'i dngos grub so sor thob po/ / kun nas gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi char 'bebs pa'i gzungs kyi bkod pa rnam par bstas pa dang / don yod pa'i bkod pa rab 'byams kyi
493a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub rab tu thob po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par lta ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa so sor thob po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po
493a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / dkyil 'khor rnam par lta ba'i dngos grub so sor thob po// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yangs pa thams cad so sor thob po// phan yon chen po dang rnam par 'phrul pa chen po byin gyis brlab
493a5(rgyud 'bum): pa 'di rnams so sor thob bo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlob pas byin gyis brlabs pas don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang bklags pa tsam gyis yon tan dang
493a6(rgyud 'bum): phan yon rjes su bsngags pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po so sor thob po// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba skyes shing mchog tu kyi bung zhes byed pa skyes nas/
493a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'i
493b1(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang yin pa 'di mchog tu rnyed par dka' 'o/ / yid bzhin gyi mo bur gyur pa'i snying po'i gzungs gang yin pa ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' 'o// mthu chen
493b2(rgyud 'bum): po dang / phan yon chen po dang / yon tan chen po skyes pa dang mthun pa rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul che bar blta bar bya'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po de rigs kyi bu 'am/
493b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/
493b4(rgyud 'bum): bu mo 'ang rung ste/ lan gcig bzlas pa dang / dran pa tsam dang / bklags pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sdig pa thams cad zad par
493b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa rnams grub par 'gyur ba ci lags/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
493b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rnam par gzigs par 'gyur ba ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rtag tu mchog stsol ba de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la de'i skabs dbye bar
493b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad du gsol/ de lta bu phan yon phul du byung ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog tu ngo mtshar bar gyur pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// lag na rdo
494a1(rgyud 'bum): rje mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i dri ba dris pa de ngas ji lta ba bzhin du da lta bshad par bya yi nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis mod dang brjod pa tsam gyis mod la
494a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu dga' ba dang bcas pas phyag g.yas pa spyi bor 'jog par byed do/ / mngon gsum du rang gi gzugs kyi mdun na nye bar gnas te/
494a3(rgyud 'bum): dbugs 'byin par yang byed do// de ji ltar zhe na/ 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang bzhin gyis lus yongs su dag pa bzung ba'i gzungs kyi snying po'o// 'di ni don yod pa'i
494a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi snying po'o/ / 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang bzhin mthong ba'o// 'di ni bcu gcig
494a5(rgyud 'bum): zhal mthong ba'o/ / 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sprul pa'i sprin mthong ba'o//
494a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni mgrin pa mngon po dang sred med kyi bu'i gzugs mthong ba'o// 'di ni 'jig rten gsum mthong ba'o// 'di ni rta mgrin mthong ba'o// 'di ni pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong
494a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni rdo rje'i snying po chen po mthong ba'o// 'di ni mgo'i snying po chen po'o// 'di ni sna tshog
494b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin mthong ba'o/ / 'di ni don yod pa'i gzugs dang dngos grub kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// 'di ni des thams cad du 'gugs pas na zhags par brjod par bya'o// don
494b2(rgyud 'bum): yod pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungasu brjod par bya ste/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gzhan du
494b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa mthong ba mtshungs pa ste/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di dag mthong ba dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// bklags pa dang brjod pa tsam gyis mod la dus gsum du
494b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi sras gcig pur 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su dag pa'i sku shin tu dri ma med cing yongs su dag pa dang mnyam par
494b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i skur yang 'gyur ro// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyir mi ldog par lung ston cing / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
494b6(rgyud 'bum): tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mthong bar 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyis yang dag par dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro// bdud la sosra
494b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gdug pa'i rmi lam dang / log par 'dren pa thams cad tsa'i bcad par byas par 'gyur ro// bcing ba lngas bcings shing gzir ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang /
495a1(rgyud 'bum): za dang / yi dgas dang / grul bum dang / brjed byed dang / tshangs pa'i srin po rnams thams cad ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro// rims thams cad dang / nad thams
495a2(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / brtsog shu dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / rkang shu thams cad rnam par nyam pa byed do// lus kyi gzer
495a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed do/ / ji ltar shel yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// tshig btsan par yang 'gyur ro// gsang sngags dang cho
495a4(rgyud 'bum): ga zhib mo thams cad kyi dngos grub tu'ang 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag gis cher mchod par
495a5(rgyud 'bum): bya bar 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad kyis mchod par 'os pa gcig pur 'gyur ro// nor dang 'bru 'phel bar yang 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang yid kyi shing rta thams cad yongs
495a6(rgyud 'bum): su rdzogs par yang 'gyur ro/ / chom rkun dang / g.yo can dang / rkun pos rnam par skrag pa dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / g.yang sa dang / khyim rdib pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'ching
495a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// me dang chus dus byed pa dang / rlung dang / tshad pa dang / sad dang / ser ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so//
495b1(rgyud 'bum): dgra thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// thams cad byams pa'i yid du 'gyur ro// bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar byed do//
495b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'jig rten pa rnams kyi yon tan chen po skye ba dang rnam par 'phrul par 'gyur ro// de 'chi 'pho ba'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa
495b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu tshur shog/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song dang / khyod kyis lam yongs su dag par byas pa'o// 'chi ba'i dus su gyur pa na bsams
495b4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid kyis mod la pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong ba tsam
495b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / pad+mo yangs pa'i gsang ba mtha' dag rdzogs pa dang /
495b6(rgyud 'bum): don yod zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo mngon du 'gyur zhing kha ton du kun tu gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rjes su dran par byed do// thams cad du sangs
495b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon sum du mtshungs par lhan cig lung ston pa so sor thob ste/ nam du'ang phyir zhing rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ji srid du sangs rgyas
496a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar dang / ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i lus su gyur kyi bar du 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan yon dang rnam par 'phrul pa bklag
496a2(rgyud 'bum): pas grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bzlas pa tsam gyis dngos grub bshad par bya ste/ snga dro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa dang / mnar med pa'i mthar
496a3(rgyud 'bum): gtugs pa'i sdig pa dang / ri rab lhun po chen po bdun gyi tshad tsam pa spu'i khong bu re rer sgrib pa bsags pa dang / bskal pa stong phrag tu bsags pa'i sngon gyi sdig pa dang sgrib pa de rnams thams cad
496a4(rgyud 'bum): snga dro gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa rnam par nyams par byed de/ zad pa dang yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro// dmyal ba'i 'gro ba chen po bcu drug tu gzhol ba de rnams
496a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad skad cig gcig gis yongs su grol lo/ / smyur bar gnas pa gcig gis bzlas pas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su kun tu bzang po chen po nyid
496a6(rgyud 'bum): thob po/ / gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / pad+mo yangs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod zhags pa'i snying po thams cad du dngos su rjes su 'jug par byed do//
496a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du dam tshig chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dngos su mthong ba sbyin par byed do// dus gsum pa'i de bzhin
496b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams rang gi gzugs kyis dngos su mthong bar nye bar gnas par byed do/ / dkyil 'khor ba'i lha thams cad dngos su rjes su 'brang zhing gnas te/ rtag tu rnam par blta bar 'gyur
496b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing cher bcings par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i rgyal po mam cad kyang rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing dngos su mthong bar gnas par byed do// brgya stong phrag bzlas pa tsam gyis lce rdo rje ltar brtan par 'gyur
496b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing / rdo rje'i snying po dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i kha dog dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ phyir zhing de'i lus la reg pa ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// phyir zhi ba lus 'pho ba'ang
496b4(rgyud 'bum): mi nus shing / yongs su dag cing dri ma med pa'i lus su 'gyur ro// lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro// gdug pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams
496b5(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log par 'dren pa rnams dang / klu ma rungs pa mi bzad pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis lus
496b6(rgyud 'bum): dang phung po la za bar mi 'gyur ro/ / lus pad+ma dkar po'i kha dog dang mtshungs par 'gyur te/ lha rnams lhan cig tu rjes su rgyu bar byed do// kha nas lha rdzas kyi ut+pal sngon po'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
496b7(rgyud 'bum): lus la lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dris bsgos par 'gyur ro// rkang pa dang lag pa gzhon sha can du 'gyur ro// mig gis legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro// bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas
497a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / snyan pa thos par yang 'gyur zhing lha rdzas kyi dris tshor bar yang 'gyur ro// bzang po la reg pa'i lus su'ang 'gyur ro// skra bung ba dang mtshungs par li zhing
497a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khyil ba'i sgrar 'gyur ro/ / nam yang phyir zhing lus kyi nang gi rlung gi las dang dris ngan pas bsgos par mi 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro// 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang /
497a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyen pa'i ngag tu'ang 'gyur ro// lha'i nga ro dang / nga ro bzang ba dang / nga ro zab pa snyan cing mnyen pa dang / mi 'am ci'i sgra lta bu dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs su 'gyur ro// mdzes par
497a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dang zab par 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro/ / lag mthil shin tu 'jam pa dang / sor mo ring ba dang / lag pa'i ri mo shin tu rnam par bkra bar yang 'gyur ro// seng ge'i 'gros dang rtsal gyis 'gro
497a5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i 'gros su 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo gcig pur mchod pa'i 'os su'ang 'gyur ro// dpal rnam thos sras rjes su 'thun par rjes
497a6(rgyud 'bum): su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ / tshig mi mthun pa'ang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro// thams cad du ngag rnam par dag par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub po// 'jig rten las 'das
497a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni skye ba brjes nas/ bgra pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / bsams pa nyid kyis mod la skye bar 'gyur te/ 'od dpag med kyi spyan sngar mdun gyi pad+ma'i snying po las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur zhing / rgyan
497b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa dang / mngon par dbang bskur
497b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mchog byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / mngon par dbang bskur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa byin gyis rlob pas kyang byin gyis brlabs so zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas
497b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i cho ga'i dngos grub bo/ / de nas bsod nams kyi phung po brjod par bya ste/ 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu
497b4(rgyud 'bum): mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dag bsnyen ma gang yang rung bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun gyis yongasu bkang
497b5(rgyud 'bum): bar byas pa dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog gis yongs su bkang nas dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen
497b6(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ba la nor bu rin che chen po sna bdun dang / gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog gis bkang nas phul ba de bas kyang dge ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar
497b7(rgyud 'bum): bskyed do/ / gang zhig dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs par mchod par byed cing / nyi ma re re zhing de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa de kho na bzhin du 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams
498a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de rnams gang gis nor bu rin po che chen po byin pas de rnams kyi dge ba'i bcu drug gi char yang mi phod do// de bzhin du bsod nams
498a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par 'gyur ro zhes so/ / 'jig rten pa'i cho ga sna tshogs pa'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po stong gsum gyi stong
498a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams nor bu rin po che chen po sna bdun gyis bkang ba/ rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog dang / gser dang dngul gyi me tog gis bkang ba rnams
498a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing la'ang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bkang nas phul bar 'gyur ro// mchod
498a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur te/ ji srid byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du mi zad de/ de lta bu'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / bsod nams kyi phung po chen
498a6(rgyud 'bum): por yang 'gyur te/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten la 'das pa'i bzlas pa'i dngos grub dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par
498a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du phan yon chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba chen po gang yin pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga chen po dang / mchod pa'i sprin chen por 'gyur ro//
498b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du yon tan bskyed pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho ga'i khyad par so sor thob bo// dus rtag par rgyun du bzlas pa'i cho ga dang ldan par 'gyur bar bya'o// rtag tu'ang byang chub sems dpa'
498b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mthong 'dod par 'gyur ro/ / rtag tu 'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang yang dag par 'grogs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gang yang rig pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod pa'i mchod
498b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nor bu'i snying po 'di tha na sgra tsam yang rna ba'i bu gar lhung bar 'gyur ba dang / bris pa rnams lta ba dang / po ti 'am/ yi ge 'am/ rtsig pa 'am/ gyang la bris pa lta bar byed de/ mtshams med
498b4(rgyud 'bum): pa lnga'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su zad cing yongs su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ / sngon bsags pa'i mnar med par gzhol ba'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// yongs
498b5(rgyud 'bum): su gtugs par 'gyur ro/ / shi phos nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// nam yang phyis mngal du gan+d+ha pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro//
498b6(rgyud 'bum): ji srid du byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur zhing tshe rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rjes
498b7(rgyud 'bum): gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di bri bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das 'di 'dri bzhin pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skyed
499a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ci lags/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ci dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon dpag tu med do// don yod pa'i lcag
499a2(rgyud 'bum): klu'i rig pa'i rgyal po 'di'i don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skye ste/ phan yon dpag tu med pa dang yon tan dpag tu med pa las byung ba'i rnam par
499a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul pa so sor thob po/ / gang yang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di 'dri bar 'gyur ba nyon cig/ lag na rdo rje rgya mtsho chen po'i 'og tu
499a4(rgyud 'bum): dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ chu dang zheng du dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi pa de la chu'i thigs pa'i tshad kyi thigs pa re re'i grangs su byed par 'dod pa 'am/ de lta bu'i tshad kyi ngos gnyis par
499a5(rgyud 'bum): mtsho chen po las thigs pa re re nas bcu par bya ste/ de la thigs pa ra re nas bgrangs te gtor bar bya'o// de nas rgya mtsho chen po chu'i thigs pa'i grangs kyis zad par 'gyur zhing chu skam par byed do// mtsho chen
499a6(rgyud 'bum): po gnyis pa las chus yongs su gang bar 'gyur gyi/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo de 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi
499a7(rgyud 'bum): phung po'i tshad ni gzungs par nus pa ma yin no/ / de ltar rgya che ba/ de ltar zab pa/ de ltar yangs pa'i yon tan bskyed par bya ba ni/ don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga zhib mo'i
499b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga'i rgyal po'o/ / lag na rdo rje 'on kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po ni dpag tshad stong phrag brgya cu rtsa bzhi 'og tu rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du nub bo// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi steng nyid du gnas so//
499b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu stobs chen po dang ldan par gyur pa gang la la ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po gang yin pa'ang yungs kar gyi 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du byed pa dang / ngos gnyis par rgya mtsho chen po'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab chen po
499b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga de lta bus yungs kar gyi 'bras bu tsam du byas pa las/ slar yang ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu rab tu gnas par byed par nus kyi/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po gang yin pa 'di 'dri bzhin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i
499b4(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba ni mi nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang / de'i gsung gi tshad gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin du yon tan dang phan yon rgya che zhing bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
499b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su 'dzin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro zhes so// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po'i cho ga zhib mo dang phyag rgya 'di ji ltar bri bar
499b6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/
499b7(rgyud 'bum): bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang la la cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di 'dri bar byed pa de/ phyag rgya dang / gsang
500a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / yo byad dang bcas pa'i cho gas/ don yod pa nor bu pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'i gzungs/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'phagra
500a2(rgyud 'bum): ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dri bar byed do// des
500a3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su dag pa'i ngag dang yid kyis dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / yid der gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i mchog dang / gus pa la sogs pa'i 'dri mkhan gyis bri bar bya'o// mchog
500a4(rgyud 'bum): tu gus pa dang zhes dang bcas pas kha zas mi mthun pa spangs te/ legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i kha zas ro bro ba'i mchog dang / legs par 'dus byas shing yid dga' ba'i me tog dang 'bras bu'i btung
500a5(rgyud 'bum): ba gus pa dang bcas pas/ gnas su gi'u wang gi dkyil 'khor dang / me tog gcal du bkram nas dris bdugs te/ dar gyis spras pa'i chos kyi stan la 'dug pas bri bar bya'o// legs par khrus
500a6(rgyud 'bum): byas shing mgo la dris byug/ lus la gos bgos la mchod pa bya'o// tshes brgyad dam bco lnga la so so'i cha shas dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye nas gtor ma dang nye bar spyod pa dbul bar bya'o// mchog
500a7(rgyud 'bum): tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bya ste/ yon dang bcas pas gser gyi rna rgyan sbyin par bya'o// bri bar bya ba yongs su phye nas ma spangs par don yod par bya'o// lag pa brkyang bas bya'o// legs par sbyang ba byas pra
500b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / 'di'i cho gas 'dri bar byed pa gang yin pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / gsang ba bris par 'gyur ro//
500b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs gang ci yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po de
500b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'dri bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta ste/ chu gang yin pa thams cad chu klung chen po dang rgya mtsho chen po'i rjes su zhugs nas ro gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ nyi ma shar ba na mun pas ldongs pa thams
500b4(rgyud 'bum): cad kun tu snang bar byed do/ / de kho na bzhin du don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po 'di dang / don yod pa'i nor bu pad+ma'i zhags pa'i snying po
500b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor ba'i klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'di tham
500b6(rgyud 'bum): cad du mtshungs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rjes su 'jug go/ / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / snying po rnams mtshungs par dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rab tu skyes pa'o//
500b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du mtshungs par mchod pa'i sprin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'o// gang yang dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdul phra rab dang lhan cig pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi tha snyad kyi de kho na nyid yang
501a1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i snying po'o/ / don yod pa'i nor bu mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs dang / don yod pa nor bu pad+ma'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying
501a2(rgyud 'bum): po dang / gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'khor lo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor pa dang / klu'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
501a3(rgyud 'bum): par snang mdzad kyis gsungs pa de thams cad gsang ba'i dam tshig gcig tu byin gyis brlabs so/ / rgyu de'i phyir 'di ni don yod zhags pa'i don yod pa'i las sgrub par byed pa'i mthu stobs kyi dngos grub ste// don
501a4(rgyud 'bum): yod zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o zhes brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du 'dri bzhin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de
501a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang mtshungs pa gcig gis mtshungs pa'o/ / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mor byin gyis brlabs so// 'dri bar byed pa dang / 'don
501a6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa dang / klog par byed pa dang / bzlas pas ni mchod pa'i sprin du byin gyis brlabs so// de'i phyir 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gis legs par rab tu dang ba dang las la spro zhing brtson pas bya'o// shin
501a7(rgyud 'bum): tu gsal ba dang / spro ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pas bri bar bya'o// shin tu 'bad pas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi snying po dang / gzungs dang / phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dang / klu'i zhagra
501b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa bri bar bya/ bklag par bya/ mnyan par bya'o// mthu stobs kyis mnyan par bya'o// mthu stobs kyis bri bar bya/ mthu stobs kyis mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// mthu stobs
501b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis dam pa'i chos mchod pa dang / gus pas 'dri bar byed pa dang / 'dri bzhin pa la bsnyen bkur dang / bla ma la sri zhu byed par bya'o// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o// don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i
501b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'o/ / nor bu rin po che chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gzungs kyi gsang ba byin gyis brlabs pa ni gnyis te/
501b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig ni don yod pa'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs so// gnyis pa ni don yod pa'i nor bu'i pad+ma zhags pa'i snying po'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par 'phrul pa dang / 'khor
501b5(rgyud 'bum): lo dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i klu'i zhags pas rnam par 'phrul pas sprul pa'o// 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che chen por 'gyur ba ste/ don yod pa'i
501b6(rgyud 'bum): dpag bsam gyi shing gi mchod pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ / 'phags pa spyan ras gzi
501b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dam par gyur pa'i snying po don yod pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ 'di ni gnyis par rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po ste/ don yod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
502a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dbang po du ma rig sngags 'chang brgya stong phrag gis yongs su bskor ba dang / rig pa'i
502a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i lha brgya stong phrag du ma dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha brgya stong phrag du ma dang / dbang po dang / lha'i dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris
502a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha'i bu brgya stong phrag rnams dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang /
502a4(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs stong phrag rnams kyis de lta bu'i gsung gi sgra dbyangs thos nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// /
502a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po nyan pa la de rnams thams cad lhan cig tu mthun par rgyal po chen po bzhi sngon du 'gro bas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
502a6(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / rol mo dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs pas mchod pa byed par gyur to// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la'ang mchod pa
502a7(rgyud 'bum): byed par gyur cing / rig pa'i rgyal po de la'ang mchod pa byed do// bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas legs so zhes rjod par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs
502b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba gang yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gnyis par nor bu rin po che chen po don yod zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dzam bu gling du rab
502b2(rgyud 'bum): tu bzhag go zhes so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying por
502b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa thun mong bar mtshungs pa'o/ / thams cad du gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin
502b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mchog tu rnyed par dka' bar gsungs pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag de dag thams cad mthun par gyur pas lhan cig pa kho nar rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing / rig pa'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par
502b5(rgyud 'bum): rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ / 'di yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o// 'di lta ste/ 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / nyan pa dang / bzlas pa'i las su 'gyur
502b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / rig sngags 'chang de la'ang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// dngos grub kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ ngan
502b7(rgyud 'bum): slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang yin pa de'ang cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis kyang
503a1(rgyud 'bum): de la bdag cag thams cad mthun par rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi/ bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / mdapas dang / dga' ba bsgrub par brtse/ sdig pa dang sgrib pa bam
503a2(rgyud 'bum): rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ nang pam cad bsal bar bgyi/ 'jim pa dag 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi/ yams dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa dang / mu ge dang / mi ngas
503a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'brog dgon pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad so sor phyir bzlog par bgyi/ bde ba la yang dag par reg pa dang mchog tu dga' ba bsgrub par bgyi/ bsrung bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/ don med pa'ang so sor bzlog
503a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi/ don la'ang yang dag par sbyar bar bgyi/ don thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi/ rtag tu mchog stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu rgyas pa'i cho ga cho ga zhib mo'i yo byad du dgongs pa'o// de nas yang
503a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje sngon du 'gro bas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de rnams
503a6(rgyud 'bum): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so// drang srong chen po de lta bu byed pa de rnams yongs su bskyang bar bya/ bsrung bar bya/ dngos grub kyang sbyin par bya'o// ngas tshi ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor
503a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mo 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i mched dang / sems can de rnams thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i ched dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i ched du'ang grogs po rnams la rjes su
503b1(rgyud 'bum): gtad do/ / 'di'ang bsrung bar bya'o zhes so// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi rim par
503b2(rgyud 'bum): phye ba'i cho ga spros shig/ don yod pa'i nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi cho ga dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po'i gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub 'di thams cad du thun mong ba'i snying po grub pa'o// de nas byang
503b3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis don yod pa lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i rig pa'i rgyal po don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
503b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / ras ris rnams gsungs pa/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// don yod pa mchod pa'i nor bu'i snying po bla na med pa ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ kun nas shin tu rnam par phye ba/ sa dang ba byung gis legs
503b5(rgyud 'bum): par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra ba'i srad bus char gzhal cing bcad la/ dkyil 'khor bla na med pa'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por bdag gis khru'i tshad kyis kun nas khru bzhi pa sgo bzhi rnam par bye ba
503b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / thams cad du gsang ba thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang pad+ma bya ste/ pad+ma stong phrag gis shin tu mdzes pa lnga lnga'o// pad+ma dkar po bla na med pa la ze 'bru dang ge sar gyi tshad la bab pa/
503b7(rgyud 'bum): yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i ge sar dang ze'u 'bru bkra ba'i dra ba'i snying po lus dang lag tu 'chang zhing / lag pa'i phyag rgya g.yon pa dang g.yas pas bya'o// dar dbyangs dang 'khyil pas spras pa/ zur zur du dpag bsam gyi shing shin
504a1(rgyud 'bum): tu tshad la bab pa cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byed du gzhug go/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi re la'ang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu tshad dang ldan par bya'o// me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs pa bya zhing / de nas me tog gi
504a2(rgyud 'bum): bar du re la bya'o/ / rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pas mdzes pa'o// sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyi phyi rol tu pad+ma dang ut+pa la sngon po'i 'phreng ba'i ri mo'o// ut+pal sngon po'i 'phreng ba'i phyi rol tu nor bu rin po che sna
504a3(rgyud 'bum): tshogs pas rnam par bkra ba'i ri mo 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas mdzes pa'o/ / me tog snu ma dang tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag la sngags kyi nor bu'i ri mo'ang bya'o// de'i phyi rol gyi khor yug tu snam bu'i rnam pa bya'o// ri bo la sna tshogs pa'i sngon
504a4(rgyud 'bum): shing dang / lcug ma bkram pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes pa'o// khor yug tu chu 'bab pa'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di bri zhing / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu 'ang bri bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor bla na med pa phyag
504a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi dang / bum pa dang / mchod pa'i rin po che'i snod sna tshogs pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa bri'o// mtshan ma dang / phyag rgya dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa'i ya la ga dang / pad+ma dang /
504a6(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal 'chang ba/ gos dang rgyan sna tshogs pa thogs pa bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu me tog sna tshogs pa ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / mnad rab dang / a ti muk+ta ka dang / lA nI ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / ut+pa
504a7(rgyud 'bum): la sngon po dang / sna ma dang / spya nar dang / yu thi ka dang / ka dam pa'i me tog gi 'phreng bas mdzes par bya'o// sgo bzhi'i gnas su rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par bya ste/ rin po che'i lcug ma sna tshogs pa dang bus pa gang
504b1(rgyud 'bum): thogs par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi snying por ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o// gang ba'i bum pa yongs su bsags pa dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang / bza' ba'i kha zas ro bro ba'i cho
504b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdugs la bdug pa'i pog por yongs su bsham par bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ legs par khrus byas shing dri bzang po'i dris bsgos te/ rnam pa
504b3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdugal ba byung lngas nye reg bya ste/ don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs 'di lan stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya'o// dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs dang
504b4(rgyud 'bum): mnam pa yid la bya/ mchod pa'i sprin chen po yid la bya zhing bzla ste/ phyogs bcu kun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum du
504b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyis ji ltar dkyil 'khor du yongs su bsags shing / rnam pa sna tshogs su gzhal du med pas ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su
504b6(rgyud 'bum): bsags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa brgya stong phrag yongs su bsags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do// sna tshogs pa'i gos dang / sna tshos
504b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi dri sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi bdug spos sna tshogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs pa dang / ro brgya pa'i kha zas kyi mchog
505a1(rgyud 'bum): ro bro ba'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / sgron ma'i shing sna tshogs pa brgya stong phrag rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po byed do//
505a2(rgyud 'bum): yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra rnams kyi mchod pa'i sprin byed do// de lta bu'i cho ga rnams phyogs bcu rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dus gsum
505a3(rgyud 'bum): du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra rab kyi grangs rnams mchod par 'gyur te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad tu lhun grub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po gzhal du med pa'i mchod
505a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sprin gyis mchod pa byed do/ / gang yang dkyil 'khor chen po rer rjes su zhugs pa'i sems can dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang /
505a5(rgyud 'bum): khye'u dang / bu mo gang yin pa de rnams thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de la mthong bar 'dod pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / lhan cig 'gro ba 'am/ than thos pa tsam gang yin pa de
505a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa chen po yongs su gtong ba yongs su btang bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi phung po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
505a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / sems can re re'i yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa de'i drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam
505b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis mod dang / rjes su yi rang ba tsam gyis mod la 'phral nyid du mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar yang 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi bla ma gcig/
505b2(rgyud 'bum): bur 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba brje ba'i dus su son te 'chi ba'i mthar thug pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis mngon sum du ston zhing snang bar 'gyur ro// lam nye bar ston par byed cing dbugs 'byin
505b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su skal ba mnyam pa nyid kyis skye bar byed de/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par pad+ma la rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa tsam gyi mod la skye ba thams cad rjes su dran par byed/
505b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton du gnas par byed do// ji srid
505b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la mthar thug gi bar du thams cad rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bcings te gnas par byed do zhes so/ / 'di ni skye ba'i tha mar 'gyur te/ mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'dis tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas
505b6(rgyud 'bum): su song ba'i ri dgas dang bya de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ mir gyur pa rnams kyis lta ci smos so// de ltar yon tan dang phan yon chen po'i mchod pa
505b7(rgyud 'bum): dang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o/ / don yod pa nor bu'i mchod pa'i snying po'i gzungs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / phan yon gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs so// / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i ras ris bshad par bya
506a1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba/ 'phral du nad thams cad zlog par byed pa/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i gnas mchog thams cad sbyin pa bshad
506a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ras sam/ gos gzhan nam/ rgya dar la kun nas khru bzhi pa la gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gnas su ri mo mkhan gtsang ma nyid kyis khrus byas/ gos gtsang ma bgos te/ dri sna tshogs pas bdug la/ tshon sna tshogs pa rnam
506a3(rgyud 'bum): par bkra zhing lhag pa ma yin pa snod gsar par bzhag pas ras ris bla na med pa bri bar bya'o/ / dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bya ste/ gzhal yas khang gi khang pa brtsegs par seng ge'i khri la pad+ma'i rdzing bur klu'i rgyal po
