506a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog 'thor bar byed bzhin pa'o/ / g.yon du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bya ste/ don yod zhags pa skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ ral pa'i cod pan
506a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis brgyan pa/ tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ mdung rtse gsum 'dzin pa/ pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa dang / nor bu rin
506a6(rgyud 'bum): po che 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed bzhin pa'o// g.yas su rig pa'i rgyal po bya ste/ phyag bzhi pa/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i cha byad 'chang ba/ 'od dpag med kyi cod pan can/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa
506a7(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa'i gos 'dzin pa/ pad+ma dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri 'chang zhing / nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal mtshan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la nye bar 'dud par byed pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa'o// 'phags pa spyan
506b1(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu lha mo sgrol ma bya ste/ thal mo sbyar ba smad pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa'o// lha mo sgrol ma'i rgyab tu gos dkar mo bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ rab tu bzhad cing
506b2(rgyud 'bum): smin ma dpral bar g.yo zhing / bcom ldan 'das la zur mig gis lta bar byed pa bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i rgyab tu 'phags pa dpal mdzes pa bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed
506b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin pa/ sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi phur ma 'chang bar byed pa'o// thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan bya ste/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa bya'o// gos dkar mo'i rgyab tu khro bo chen po lcags kyu bya'o// dkar po'i gzhogs su
506b4(rgyud 'bum): don yod pa'i lcags kyu bya'o/ / rig pa'i rgyal po'i 'og tu ral pa gcig ma ste/ phyag brgyad pa/ zhal mche ba gtsigs pa/ ral pa gyen du brdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs pa 'dzin
506b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma 'chang ba bya zhing / sdigs mdzub byed pa bya'o// steng du phyogs pa/ skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ bcom
506b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa'o/ / khang pa brtsegs pa'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun bya ste/ 'od dpag med kyang dbus su bya'o// lhas mchod pa byed bzhin pa bya'o// phyag g.yon dang g.yas su rdo rje 'dzin pa/
506b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la zas gsar pa 'dren par byed bzhin pa'o// gzhogs g.yas dang g.yon du khro ba'i rgyal po rdo rje 'chang ba bya'o// 'og gi gzhogs g.yas su rgyal po chen po pa'i bya'o// gzhogs g.yon du gshin rje dang
507a1(rgyud 'bum): chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams rang rang gi mtshon cha 'dzin pa bya ste/ thams cad glu len bzhin pa bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og phyogs kyi rdzing bu'i g.yas logs su rig sngags
507a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang pus mo btsugs pa bya ste/ bdug pa'i pog bor dang me tog 'dzin cing bgrang 'phreng thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta bar byed bzhin pa bya'o// ras ris kyi kho ra khor yug tu ri bo bri bar bya ste/ sna tshogs pa'i me tog gi mgo
507a3(rgyud 'bum): stsogs bkram zhing / rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ chu bo 'bab cing rjes su spyod pa/ ri dgas dang byas yang dag par brgyan pa bya'o// sna tshogs pa'i ri'i lha dang shang shang te'us kun tu khyab pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chu
507a4(rgyud 'bum): gdengs ka dang mtshungs pa'i gnas su gnas par bya'o/ / de nas yongs su sbyang ba byas zin pa dang / ras ris la tshon sna tshogs pas bkra bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya'o// legs par
507a5(rgyud 'bum): khrus bya ste/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste smra ba bcad la/ don yod zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas so// de'i tshe ras ris 'bar bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer kha dog sna tshog
507a6(rgyud 'bum): pa 'byin par byed de/ phyogs bcu kun tu snang bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang dga' zhing 'dod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis bdag gi don yod zhags pa'i snying po dang / don yod zhags pa'i lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal
507a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i snying po 'di'i dngos grub tu shes par bya'o/ / de nas las thams cad byed du gzhug cing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/
507b1(rgyud 'bum): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ khyim bdag gam/ bud med dam/ skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo gang ras ris chen po 'di mthong nas/
507b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba tsam gyis mod la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa rnam par sbyangs shing thun tshags su 'gyur ro// mnar med pa'i sdig pa dang sgrib pa rnams 'phral du yongs su grol lo// bsod nams kyi tshogs dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po bskyed
507b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa thams cad dang / yid kyi shing rta dang / 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / rigs thun mong ba la 'jug pa'i thams cad du thun mong ba'i dam tshig dang / de kho na nyid
507b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa dang / thams cad du dngos grub byed pa'i gnas/ rdo rje'i gdan gyi dkyil 'khor mchog byang chub kyi snying por nye bar bgrod par byed pa/ de kho na nyid kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
507b5(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyir mi ldog par 'jug par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas thams cad du son pa'i dngos grub/ cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par
507b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ phyag rgya thams cad 'gugs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rab tu 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi gnas yongs su brtags te/ sa'i cha mdzes par
507b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsug lag khang ngam/ dgon pa 'am/ gnas nyid dam/ ri bug gam/ tshang tshing ngam/ rgyal po'i gnas sam/ lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/ gzhan yang brangs 'am/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba 'am/ skyed mos tshal lam/
508a1(rgyud 'bum): nags 'dab nyid dang / kun dga' ra ba 'am/ chu klung ngam/ lteng ka 'am/ 'bab chu'i dngo'am/ mtsho phran nam/ mtshe'u dag dang / rdzing bu rnam par bkra ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
508a2(rgyud 'bum): tshon nam/ ne'u gsing sngon po 'am/ me tog skye ba'i gnas sam/ thams cad du rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o// gnas gtsang mar ma nyams pa'i mod la dkyil 'khor der dgod par bya ste/ sa dang ba byung dang
508a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya'o/ / khor yug tu khru bzhi pa/ legs par byugs shing shin tu 'jam pa/ bai DUR+Ya'i kha dog tu bya'o// dkyil 'khor la tshon sna tshogs pa mdzes pas phye ba'i thig
508a4(rgyud 'bum): gdab ste/ cha mnyam par rnam par phye nas zur bzhi pa/ logs bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi rnam par phye ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gi thig gdab po// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying por yang dkyil 'khor khru'i tshad la re kha lnga
508a5(rgyud 'bum): byas pa sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pas thig gdab po/ / pad+ma'i ri mo dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje'i ri mo gsum pa dag go// ut+pal bzhi pa 'am/ nor bu rin po che chen po ni lnga par bshad do// snying po'i
508a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi khor lug tu 'bar ba'i 'breng ba byed du gzhug go/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa/ ge sar dang ze'u 'bru dang bcas pa'i pad+ma bya ste/ de la rig
508a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i lha mo gzugs ji ltar mdzes pa dgod par bya'o/ / ji ltar ras ris 'di la gzugs mdzes pa de bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de lta bu bris nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams mdzes pa dang /
508b1(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba dang / khro gnyer can ma/ drag po sna tshogs gzugs 'chang ba/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji lta ba bzhin du'o// rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ gos sna tshogs pa 'chang ba/
508b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs dang / bud med lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa bsres pa rtag tu bris nas/ pad+ma'i gdan gyis brgyan cing / thams cad pad+ma 'chang ba byed du bzhug go/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa
508b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi byed du gzhug ste/ go cha dang ya lad bgos pa/ drag po'i gzugs 'jigs par byed pa'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba bya ste/ khor yug tu mtshan ma'i phyag rgya thams cad la pad+ma'i gdan
508b4(rgyud 'bum): 'chang ba'o/ / sgo bzhi'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi lha bya'o// gang+gA dang / shI tA dang / 'jigs ma dang / dpe med ma dang / nor bu bzang po dang / kI li ki la dang / gtsigs zhal ma ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams
508b5(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khor yug tu ri bo'i 'phreng ba dag la me tog dang ljon shing sna tshogs pa'i lcug mas khyab cing / tshon sna tshogs pas rnam par 'byes pa bri bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba legs
508b6(rgyud 'bum): par mthar phyin pa dang / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la kho ra khor yug tu tshon sna lngas mdzes pa'i ba dan brgya dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs mdzes pa dang / rnam par bkra ba'i bum pa gang ba dang / gtor ma dang / dril
508b7(rgyud 'bum): bu mdzes pa dang / gang ba'i bum pa dang / bum bu dang / dri sna tshogs kyi chus yongs su gang ba dang / ro sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma bzhag nas/ kham por dang / ril ba gang ba dang / dri sna tshogs kyi byugs pa dang /
509a1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa sna tshogs pas mdzes pa dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba gcal du bkram pa dang / 'bras yos dang / yungs kar nyid dang / sna tshogs pa'i 'bras bu rnams dang / bza' ba'i rnam pa gzugs
509a2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa bzhag nas/ 'bras bu sna tshogs mdzes pa rnams bzhag ste/ khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / gser dang dngul las byung ba'i snod dris gang ba rnams gzhag go/ thams cad ji ltar 'byor pa bya ste/
509a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gzhal du med pa las dman pa nyid du mi bya'i/ lhag pa nyid byed du gzhug go// dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gus pa dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyis bya'o// rig sngags 'chang
509a4(rgyud 'bum): gis gtsang mar gyur nas/ legs par khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos nas/ bsrung ba'i cho gas phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / bsrung ba chen po'ang byed du
509a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhug go/ / de nas gsang sngags kyi las dang / phyag rgya'i las bla na med pa bya'o// de nas sems can gzhug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gang 'dod par bcug nas thams cad kyi dam tshig dang phyag rgya sbyin du gzhug
509a6(rgyud 'bum): go/ phyag bya ba dang bskor ba la thams cad bcug nas/ snyan gsan dbab pa dang spyan drang bar bya/ las kyi cho gas gtor ma sbyin par bya/ me tog dang btug pa dbul bar bya/ bzlas pa'i las rnams dang / las thams
509a7(rgyud 'bum): cad mdor bskus pa byas nas gshegs su gsol ba 'dir bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha rnams la gtor ma'i las kyi cho ga dang / de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa phul nas dkyil 'khor na gnas pa rnams
509b1(rgyud 'bum): gshegs su gsol lo/ / gang gi tshe gsang sngags rnams dang / cho ga zhib mo chen po'i gzungs rab tu 'jug pa na sa'i mthil du ras ris 'bar ba'i mod la 'od zer 'byin par byed de/ dkyil 'khor mthong zhing rig sngags
509b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang yang bar snang la gnas so/ / de'i skad cig la ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i mod la cho ga zhib mo'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang / dngos grub thams cad rtag tu myur du 'byung la/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i
509b3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i rgyal po'i dngos grub bla na med pa dang don yod zhags pa'i dngos grub brjod do// ji ltar yid la byed pa thams cad myur du 'dzin no// 'jig
509b4(rgyud 'bum): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thob ste/ 'di la the tsom med do// sems can dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa gang yin pa de rnams thams cad phyir mi ldog pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsngon
509b5(rgyud 'bum): par yang 'gyur ro/ / byang chub kyi snying por 'dug nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do// sems can gang dkyil 'khor de mthong nas sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams dang / mnar
509b6(rgyud 'bum): med par gzhol ba de thams cad rnam par nyams par byed cing / bde blag tu sangs rgyas nyid du 'gro'o// de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i cho ga zhib mo chen po dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rigs pa'i rgyal po dang / don yod zhags
509b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad skrag par byed pa/ gnod sbyin dang srin po thams cad 'bros par byed
510a1(rgyud 'bum): ba bgegs thams cad rnam par skrag par byed pa/ 'dod pa'i ris rnams sreg par byed pa/ gdug pa'i klu rnams 'khrug par byed pa/ sa'i mthil g.yo bar byed pa/ lha'i me tog dang rin po che sna/
510a2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis mdzes pa dang / lha'i gos dang lhab lhub kyi char 'beb par byed pa/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par skul bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snyan
510a3(rgyud 'bum): gsan 'bebs par byed pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas na gnas pa'i lha thams cad spyan 'dren par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po dang dkyil 'khor gyi
510a4(rgyud 'bum): lha thams thang 'gugs par byed pa/ bde ba thams cad dang phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par byed pa/ bla na med pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa/ chos kyi sgron me 'bar bar
510a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/ phyag rgya dang chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ cho ga zhib mo dang gsang sngags bla na med pa thams cad grub pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ phyag rgya dang mchog thams cad
510a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par byed pa/ gsang sngags thams cad 'chang ba/ gzungs rnams kyi khyad par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ gang gis rnam par snang
510a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzad dang thub pa brgyad pa'i dam tshig gi gnas thams cad la gnas pa/ sdig pa thams cad nyams par byed pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sreg par byed pa/ rtag tu 'khor
510b1(rgyud 'bum): ba las 'don par byed pa/ bdud dang ma rung ba rnams sgrol ba po/ rtag tu chos kyi zam stegs mchog/ rga ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba las grol bar byed pa/ srid pa mi bzad pa ston par nus pa/ tshul khrims dang / gtong ba dang /
510b2(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi dri zhim po sbyin zhing srung bar byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa'i rin po che'i phung po chen po rtag tu sbyin pa/ sangs rgyas dang
510b3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha thams cad la mchod par byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya byin gyis rlob pa/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad
510b4(rgyud 'bum): ston par byed pa/ gzugs sna tshogs dang rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong bar byed pa/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya rab tu ston par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po 'di la gnas par
510b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ ma rungs pa thams cad dang / gdon dang nad thams cad rtag tu rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zlog par
510b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa sgrub par byed pa'o/ / 'jig pa rnams thams cad dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa brgyad po rnams kyis 'jigs pa med pa'o// dug dang / byang snyems dang / phye ma'i sbyor ba thams cad nyams par byed par the tsom med pa zhes
510b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba bshad par bya'o/ / lag pa gnyis bzlog nas lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo'i sor mo dang sdigs mdzub nyid bskums la/ sor mo gsum brkyang la snying kha'i gnas su gzhag par bya ste/ 'di ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag
511a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang mnyam par mchog sbyin pa ste/ phyag rgya brgya stong phrag bye ba gnyis tsam du bcings par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya dang / pad+ma
511a2(rgyud 'bum): yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pas te/ phyag rgya so so so so ba 'di rnams thams cad phyag rgya bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams
511a3(rgyud 'bum): su 'gyur ro/ / bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu byed do// phyag rgya 'di ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i mchog sbyin pa po 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po don yod pa'i snying po'o// shin tu gsang ba'i las thams cad du don yod
511a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dus gsum pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa dang / rigs thun mong ba'i gsang ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du mthong ba'o// phyag rgya 'dis da ltar ba'i 'dod pa thams cad dang yid kyi
511a5(rgyud 'bum): shing rta yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o/ / mchog thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ba'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis gung mo'i sor mos mthe bong gi sor mo bskums la sdigs mdzub kyis bsdigs par bya/ ming med
511a6(rgyud 'bum): dang mthe'u chung dag gcig tu brkyang la/ sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag nas snying kha'i gnas su gzhag ste/ khro bo'i blta ba dang mtshungs par bzhag pas hUM yig gis btsir bar bya'o// 'di ni khro bo lcags
511a7(rgyud 'bum): kyu'i phyag rgya khro bo thams cad kyi mchog dang gtso bor brjod par bya ste/ rig bya ba brgya stong phrag rnams kyi thun mong pa'i phyag rgya thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis khro bo'i phyag rgya dang
511b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su brjod pa dang / de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs gang yin pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs su brjod pa gang yin pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje drag pos 'jigs par byed do// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni thams cad du khro bo'i
511b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal por brjod par bya ste/ nor bu'i rigs gang yin pa'i khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams gdug pa rnams 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o// thams cad du phyag rgya'i gtso bo zhes bya ba/ khro bo'i rgyal po bla na med pa'o// de bzhin
511b3(rgyud 'bum): du khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di 'ching bzhin pa/ ri rab lhun po brgya stong phrag dang rgya mtsho'ang skams par byed do// ri rab lhun po'i ri ni rdul phra rab ji lta bar rnam par 'thor bar byed do// rgya mtsho thams cad kyang skam
511b4(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / ri dang ri bo'ang nyams par byed do// lha ma yin ma rungs pa rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan dang / de'i gnas kyi klu ma rungs pa rnams sreg par byed do// de bzhin du gnod sbyin dang /
511b5(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang / 'byung po dang / gdon ma rungs pa dang / bgegs byed pa'i lha ma rungs pa gang yin pa dang / bdud kyi rigs rnams gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur la/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de rnams thams cad rtag tu
511b6(rgyud 'bum): nyams par byed cing / skad cig de la 'jig par byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i sems can 'jigs par byed pa de rnams thams cad skyabs su 'gro bar byed do//
511b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// thams cad 'grub pa don yod cing dge ba thams cad 'grub par byed do// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub
512a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis rdo rje'i rnam par bskums la/ gung mo yid tsam bskums te/ ming med dang mthe bong gis sor mo'i sen mos sen mo mnyam par bzhag ste/ mthe'u chung brgyad du snying pa'i gnas su bzhag pa 'di
512a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po don yod pa'i phyag rgya rmad du byung ba chen po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i phyag rgya rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi bla na med
512a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams mgon pos snyan par brjod cing lung bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang /
512a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin du nor bu'i rigs kyi gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad du gtso bo ste/ gang gis phyag rgya 'di 'ching
512a5(rgyud 'bum): ba de gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag gi phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bcings par 'gyur ro/ / sdig pa dang / nyon mongs pa mi bzad pa dang / gdug pa thams cad rnam par nyams par byed do// bsod
512a6(rgyud 'bum): nams kyi phung po brgya stong phrag bskyed par 'gyur ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kun nas bskyed par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs par byed cing dgongs par
512a7(rgyud 'bum): byed de the tsom med do/ / byang chub sems dpas thams cad du mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyis rtag par rgyun du srung bar byed do// phyag rgya 'di'i phan yon sngar brjod pas gzhal du med cing grangs med la tshad med
512b1(rgyud 'bum): par rab tu bsgrags shing the tsom med do/ / phyag rgya 'di mthong ba dang bcings pa tsam gyis bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu skyed do// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du gcig brkyang la dpung pa bskums te/ ming med dang mthe bong gi
512b2(rgyud 'bum): sor mo 'dud la mthe'u chung bskum par bya'o/ / ming med kyi mthar reg la/ gung mo bskum la sdigs mdzub rab tu brkyang ste/ snying la'i gnas su 'di g.yo ba tsam mo// me tog gam/ dri dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng
512b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / byug pa dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / sdud pa rnams kyang lag pa g.yon du bzung nas dbul bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha rnams dang / de bzhin du rig pa'i
512b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po rnams dang / de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis de rnams thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi mchod pa bla na med pa dang / mchog dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa'i mchod pa 'di rnams byed de/
512b5(rgyud 'bum): ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba rnams dang / ro brgya pa'i 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gyi mchod pa 'di rnams byed do// phyogs bcu rnams su kun nas rin po che
512b6(rgyud 'bum): sna bdun gyi char 'byung ngo / / gser dang dngul gyi me tog bla na med pa dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bkra ba nyi ma dang gzi brjid mtshungs pas 'bar bar byed do// phyag rgya 'dzin pa tsam gyis don yod pa mchod
512b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i nor bu zhes bya ba 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu ste/ rtag tu phyag rgya'i gsang ba dang gsang sngags rnams yid kyis bsams pas de rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpag bsam gyi shing dang mnyam zhing mtshungs
513a1(rgyud 'bum): bar ji ltar yid la bsam pa bzhin du mchod pa thams cad byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba brgya stong phrag stong rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re'i dus gsum pa'i de bzhin
513a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnams phyag rgya 'di'i mthus bla na med pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par byed do/ / de'i phyir phyag rgya 'di rtag tu byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya bzung bzhin pa ni
513a3(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa bla na med pa dang tshegs chung ngus mchod pa chung ngu'ang tshad med par rab tu 'gyur ro/ / sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa med pa byed do// ri rab lhun po bye ba brgya stong phrag rnams
513a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi phung pos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba de bzhin du/ phyag rgya 'dzin bzhin pas de bzhin gshegs pa re re la de lta bu'i
513a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i cho ga byed do/ / de lta bu'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'i rnam par 'phrul pa ni 'dren pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sdigs mdzub gung mo la reg pa ni dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
513a6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / mtshams bcing ba dang / spyan drangs pa dang / dam tshig la 'jug pa dang / skor ba byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / de bzhin du dri dang / mar me dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gtor ma 'bul bar byed
513a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / de bzhin du khrus dang / nye rig cid dang / gos bgo ba dang / gtsug tor bcing ba dang / srung ba dang / gzhan srung ba dang / de bzhin cing du grogs srung ba dang / dazlas bzhin pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / skyil ma
513b1(rgyud 'bum): krung bcing ba dang / sbyin sreg gi las dang / gzhan spyan drang ba nyid dang / gsang sngags spyan drang ba nyid dang / dngos byu sgrub pa nyid pa thams cad nas thams cad du bya ba thams cad phyag rgya 'dis byed de// gnas thams cad du song ba dang / gnas
513b2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / bya ba thams cad legs par bsngags pa dang / thams cad du mchog gi phyag rgya don yod pa'i las rab tu grub pa dang / yon tan thams cad skyed pa dang / thams cad du rigs thun mong ba'i dkyil 'khor du
513b3(rgyud 'bum): don yod ba sgrub pa po'i phyag rgya don yod pa'i cho ga zhib mo sgrub par byed pa'o/ / don yod pa'i las zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di don yod pa'i mchog sbyin pa zhes brjod par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po lnga po 'di rnams rmang du byung ba'i de kho na nyid
513b4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba dang / don yod pa thos pa nyid dang / don yod pa'i 'bras bu mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa'i de kho na nyid dang / don yod par sdig pa nyams pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad zad pa dang / nyon mongs pa
513b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par sangs rgyas rnams mthong ba dang / don yod par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ba dang / don yod par tshe 'phel bar byed pa'i phyag rgya dang / don yod par dngos grub kyi mchog
513b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par byed pa mchog tu gyur pa'o/ / snying po dang phyag rgya 'di 'jig rten dbang phyug gis sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du bsgrags pa'o// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis khyad par du nyin mtshan du dang / thun mtshams su rang
513b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di 'ching na bkra shis pa'i mchog dang / bsod nams dang / dag pa dang / sdig pa nyams pa dang / don yod pa'i dngos grub dam par gyur pa'i mchog sbyin par byed do// 'di ni thar pa mchog gi gnas mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu
514a1(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'o/ / phyag rgya'i gsang sngags rnams su 'gyur te/ oM a mo g+haM ku sha dz+wa lAM hUM/ oM a mo g+ha kro d+ha daMSh+Te hUM/ oM bid+yA rA dza pad+me dz+wa la hUM/ oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni pa bar+d+ha
514a2(rgyud 'bum): ya hUM/ oM a mo g+ha sarba tra sA d+ha ya shi be hU~M/ phyag rgya 'dzin pa'i sngags so// de nas dge ba'i las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags thams cad du sgrub pa'i thabs kyis de kho na nyid kyi gnas thams cad la
514a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug par byed pa bshad par bya ste/ oM a mo g+ha maN+Da le hUM/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o// oM sa ma man+ta shu b+hi pr-i thi bI sa hA hUM/ sa yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pa ri sho d+ha ni hUM/ dkyil 'khor yong
514a4(rgyud 'bum): su sbyong ba'i sngags so/ / oM a mo g+ho pr-i thi bI sa ra s+tha le hUM/ sa dang ba byung gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha dza laHshra ba Na hUM/ chu'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta ba re swAhA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so//
514a5(rgyud 'bum): oM a mo g+ha bi b+hak+ta bA ba na ba re hUM/ thig rnam par dbye ba'i sngags so// oM nA nA rat+na ba re dz+wa ya hUM/ tshon rtsi'i ri mo'i sngags so// oM dz+wa la bi ma le a mo g+ha shud+d+he hUM/ khrus kyi sngags so// oM sid+d+hi dza le a mo g+ha bud+d+hi hUM/
514a6(rgyud 'bum): nye reg gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha bste ts+tshad hUM/ gos bgo ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ma Ni hUM/ gtsug tor bcing ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Ni ba rad hUM/ bdag srung ba'i sngags so// oM satwa ra~M
514a7(rgyud 'bum): Ni a mo g+ha da~MSh+To ts+tsha/ thams cad du gzhan srung zhing bde ba'i ched du srung ba'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha pra bi sha b+hu ba ne hUM/ gnas su 'jug pa'i sngags so// oM na mo a mo g+ha ba ti n+tu/ phyag byed pa'i sngags so// mr-i
514b1(rgyud 'bum): a mo g+ha tsakre hUM/ bskor ba'i sngags so// oM sa ma ya sid+d+hi a mo g+ha ba ti hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM a mo g+ha puSh+pe pra ba tsa gan+d+hi dzi sa swAhA/ me tog dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang
514b2(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa'i sngags so/ / oM a mo g+ha sa ra saM pU ra Ni ra sa ra sa pra ba ti hUM/ thams cad du gtor ma'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha tu Ti swAhA/ mar me'i sngags so// oM a mo g+ha ba ti tsa ra bi tsa ra san+na ra swAhA/
514b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du gnas pa dang / gnas thams cad du song ba na rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// thams cad du las thams cad byed par rig pa'i gsang sngags sbyar bar bya'o// gshegs su gsol ba nyid kyang
514b4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis bya'o/ / las shin tu rgyas pa gzhan thams cad ni rig pa'i rgyal pos bya'o// legs par byas pa'i las dang / bya ba rnams dang / bya ba thams cad sgrub par byed pa gzhan rnams ni don yod pa'i
514b5(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu dang / khro bo lcags kyu dang / rig pa'i rgyal po'i gsang sngags chen po dang / dpa' bo gcig pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang rang gis las rnam
514b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rtsa ba'i rig pa 'di nyid kyis las thams cad bya'o// de las phyi rol du gyur pa'i rig pa gzhan ni med do// rig pa 'di ni bklags pas grub pa'o// de nas de la yangs shing rgya che ba'i
514b7(rgyud 'bum): brtson pa bya ste/ 'byor pa ji lta ba dang / tshad ji lta ba dang / ji ltar gsal ba rnams 'byor pa dang bcas shing yongs su rdzogs pa dang / shin tu gsal bar bya ba rnams bya'o// gtsang ma gtsang mas khrus byas /
515a1(rgyud 'bum): gos gtsang ma bgo bar bya/ dad pa dang / gus pa dang / mchog tu dang ba bskyed par bya/ bden par smra bar bya/ bden pa phyi rol du 'byung bar bya/ bden par spro ba dang brtson
515a2(rgyud 'bum): bas 'byung bar bya/ lkog tu smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ser sna med par 'gyur bar bya/ lag yangs par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi lam dang / bklags pas grub pa'i rig pa 'di
515a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub par byed par 'gyur bar bya/ sems can thams cad la brtse ba mchog tu bya/ bri bar bya/ 'drir gzhug par bya/ bklag par bya/ kha ton du bya/ mchod par bya/ ri mor bya/ kun
515a4(rgyud 'bum): nub par bya/ cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po 'di gsungs pa dang / don yod zhags pa'i rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par rmad du byung ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa
515a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig thun mong gi gsang ba/ dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba thams cad kyi gsang ba/ phyag rgya dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chog zhib mo
515a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so/ / de nas yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / g+ho 9
515a7(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / mi gang yin pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po dang bcas pa ga le ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
515b1(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du gyur pa ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar song ste/ zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
515b2(rgyud 'bum): thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di bdag gis gzung bar bgyi'o// don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po'i yang lhag pa'i rgyal po/ cho ga
515b3(rgyud 'bum): zhib mo 'di yongs su srung ba'i don dang / mi nub cing rgyas par 'gyur ro// cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po ji ltar rnyed pa de bzhin bris pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// / 'di ni sngon gyi
515b4(rgyud 'bum): lo tsa ba mkhas pa bzhi tsam gyis bgos nas bsgyur ba la/ dar skabs par skabs su chad cing mjug ma tshang ba las/ bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po chos grags dpal bzang po'i byag nas rgyu dpe byung zhing /
515b5(rgyud 'bum): chad pa gsob pa dang madrug sbyar cig ces bkas bskul ba la brten nas/ bam po bcu pa'i nang du/ las kyi don kun sgrub par byed// ces pa nas/ gsang sngags bzlas pa mchog kyis shig
515b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu gnyis pa'i nang du/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang don khyad par can gyi ched du/ zhes pa nas/ rig sngags 'chang gi lus 'bar bar 'gyur te/ shes pa'i bar dang /
515b7(rgyud 'bum): pham mo bcu gsum pa'i nang du/ dkyil 'tshar gyi chog 'di ses pa tsam dang / zhes pa nas/ mi gang cad du nobar bya// rnas pa'i bar dang / pham mo bcu bzhi pa'i nang du/ pad+ma dang /
516a1(rgyud 'bum): chu dang / yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te/ zhes pa nas/ ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing / lan bdun du/ zhes pa'i bar dang /
516a2(rgyud 'bum): bam po bcu bzhi pa dang bco lnga pa'i mtshams su/ dngul gyi pog por brgyad dang / zhes pa nas/ gnas rnam pa gzhan thams cad du ji ltar yid la byed pa'i bya ba thams
516a3(rgyud 'bum): cad du byed do/ / zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu drug pa dang bcu bdun pa'i mtshams su/ de nas sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ zhes pa nas/ phyag rgya'i tshe
516a4(rgyud 'bum): ga dang / sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o// zhes pa'i bar dang / bam po bcu bdun pa/ zhes pa dang / de ma thag par bam po bco brgyad pa'i mtshams su/ de nas rtag tu bzlas pa'i dkyil
516a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ zhes pa nas/ 'jig rten mgon po'i 'od zer gyi sbyin sreg rab tu grol lo// zhes pa'i bar rnams kyi hor kong bsabs shing / mjug
516a6(rgyud 'bum): yongs su rdzogs par shAkya'i dge slong rin chen grub kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'i yi ge pa ni yo ga pa grub pa dpal bzang po'o/ / kun tu lha mo thams cad la'o// zhes pa nas
